pa'o/ /ye shes mngon par 'byung ba las/ /sngags kyis lha yi sku bskyed pa/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga las/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid grub byed pa'i/ /bden gnyis rnam dag rgyu 'bras te/ /yongs su dag pa'i skur rdzogs byed/ /rigs kyi lha yi rnal

'byor pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin rdzogs byed pa/ /sngags kyis bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /ye shes kyis ni sku bskyed pa/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /sgyu ma stong nyid 'jug pa ste/ /dngos pos mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /khams gsum brtan g.yo bdag

nyid bcas/ /ril 'dzin rjes gzhig ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad 'od gsal gnas 'jug pa/ /ye shes zung 'jug thob 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /mngon shes sgrub byed sa bon bcas/ /de las yang dag rab grub 'gyur/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las stobs/ /mtshungs med yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo mchog /A li bcu gnyis dbyangs ldan pa/ /'byung ba lnga yi rlung gis ni/ /lha mo lnga ru gyur pa la/ /dbyangs kyi yan

lag drug cur brjod/ kA li gsal byed yi ge ni/ /Da D+ha da d+ha ya la ta/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi de snyed las/ /drug bcas bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur las/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dag pas gnas 'gyur ba'o/ /yang na dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur

bcas/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis po/ /'grub 'gyur rgyu rkyen nyer len las/ /rgyu 'bras mngon du gsal bar 'byung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun yon tan ni/ /'khor los sgyur las khyad 'phags pa/ /mdzod spu smin mtshams 'od 'bar ba/ /gsang ba

sbubs su nub pa dang / /gtsug tor lta bas mi mngon pa/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor khyab byed pa/ /dbang gi nus pa brtan gyur pas/ /gzugs sku'i yon tan rgyu 'bras kyi/ byed las stobs ldan 'byung 'gyur nyid/ /gsang sngags zab dang rgya che ba/ myur ba nyid

du byin brlabs shing / /bde ba lam byed tshe 'di dang / /bar dor ye shes mngon du byed/ /bla ma las ni grol spyod 'thob/ /mngon sum rten 'brel khyad par ro/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /de nas rang bzhin rtog

pa ni/ /dper na rgya mtsho chen po la/ /bya yi tshogs rnams rgyu ba kun/ /'gro 'ong du ma byed gyur kyang / /rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa bzhin/ /snang ba gsum gyi ye shes la/ /gos pa med cing rtog pa med/ /rtsa rnams rnam par dag pas ni/ /gtum mo ye shes me 'bar ba'o/ /

rlung ni srog rtsol dag pa na/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zlar 'char/ /thig le dag par gyur pa na/ /'od gsal bde ba chen por 'char/ /bag chags rtog pa dag pa las/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas zhing khams mthong / /yi ge dag cing khams dngas pas/ /mkhyen

pa brkyang bas rnam grol 'thob/ /sems gsum zhig nas cha dang ni/ /sems gsum lhag mthong gang yin pa/ /rnal 'byor pa la nges par 'char/ /rtog pa'i rba rlabs ngang gis zhi/ /snang ba skye ba med pa ste/ /snang ba thob pa 'gag pa med/ /snang ba mched

pa mi gnas shing / /gnas pa med pas mi rtag pa/ /nyer thob stong nyid don gnas pa'o/ /'od gsal chos nyid de bzhin nyid/ /mkha' ltar dag pa bde ba che/ /ma 'gags dri ma med zhi ba/ /don dam phyag rgya chen po nyid/ /sa lam nus pa kun rdzogs pa/ /

slob pa'i zung 'jug snying po nyid/ /rdo rje sgo gsum rnam dag pas/ /mi slob zung 'jug mngon du gyur/ /de nyid mthar phyin bla med pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /'jam pa'i

rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsam gtan gnyis kyis ye shes 'jug /de yi khyad par bcas pa bstan/ /rig pa 'dzin pa lnga grub pa/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad/ /'bru gsum bdud rtsi ril bu yi/ /yon tan nus pa myur grub byed/ rdo rje dgug pa'i phrin las

dbang / /dam tshig sha lnga'i yon tan tshul/ /de las dngos grub dbang phyug 'thob/ /mngon gyur 'bras bu phrin las 'grub/ /da ni bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi/ /rdo rje rnam bzhi lha yi sku/ /lus dben rdo rje bzlas pa dang / /snang gsum sgyu lus 'od

gsal ba/ /so sor bsdus pa bsam gtan lam/ /srog rtsol 'dzin pa de bzhin nyid/ /rjes dran yan lag ting 'dzin stobs/ /zung 'jug rim pa bstan pa las/ /rigs kyi cha las de nyid gnas/ /rgyu rkyen lam dang nus 'bral gang / /mngon 'gyur lta stangs

spyod yul kun/ /rim gyis 'char dang cig car ba/ /de nyid thod rgal rim rtogs bya/ /tshe 'dir sangs rgyas lam dang ni/ /bar dor dngos grub 'byung lam dang / /sgo gsum byin brlabs rdo rje yi/ /smon lam phyi dus 'grub par gyur/ /bsam gtan gnas

pa dbang po thabs/ /yul nyid shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ /dbyer med sbyor ba gsang gnas te/ /dus gsum las 'das rtog pa'o/ /rnam shes de nyid gsal ba las/ /ma 'gags yul rjes mi 'brang zhing / /mi g.yo nyon mongs las dag pa/ /rnam par spyod

pa bye brag gsal/ /rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa/ /mi 'khrul lus sems tha mi dad/ /tshor ba las 'das dga' ba nyid/ /'phro ba med pas sems gnas pa'o/ /zug rngu'i rdul mang rnam 'tshe dag /sgo gsum ngang du dul zhing zhi/ /bde ba zag med chos nyid

gnas/ /'du 'bral med par gyur pas so/ /rab tu dul ba rnam shes tshogs/ /dag gyur shes bya chos kyi khams/ /zad cing gzung 'dzin rnam dag pas/ /stong nyid ye shes rtse gcig pa/ /rnam pa kun du mi ldog pas/ /mtshan ma med pa byang chub pa'o/ /snang ba

thob pa stong pa nyid/ mchod pa stong chen gyur pa ste/ /snang tsam thams cad stong pa dang / /nyer thob thams cad stong pa nyid/ /dag pa rab gsal mchog gyur pas/ /ro gcig gyur pa lugs 'byung dang / /lugs bzlog rtog tshogs zhi ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos

'jig rten lam/ /de nyid mchog tu bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid las/ /rkyen las 'byung ba lam gyur/ /rnal 'byor gsal dang mi rtog pa/ /bde ba'i byed pa lta stangs las/ /ka ra Na bcings nus pas ni/ /srid pa gsum po g.yo mi

'gyur/ /bid+hu kun dor gnang sdom las/ /mi 'gyur brtan byed yon tan thob/ /lus gnas rtsa yi pho brang las/ /g.yas pa'i nyi ma rtsol ba ste/ /g.yon pa zla ba srog bcing ba/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa lam bstan pa'o/ /dbu mar byang sems rten byed pa/ /kun

'dar nges gnas 'pho med bzung / /mtshan mar mi 'gyur mchog gi rtsa/ /las kyi rlung sgom bye brag pa/ /'gog pas mun pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse'i steng 'og tu/ /'byung ba rkyen rlung snang ba grogs/ /sgo lnga bzlog las gnas par bya/ /ye shes sgron

me snang ba skye/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig mngon gyur pas/ /rlung sems rnam dag rtags 'char pa/ /yang na 'pho tshe lam 'thob 'gyur/ /de las rang bzhin dag pa'i tshe/ /'od gsal ngang las spro bsdu nyid/ /dbu ma'i lam nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i thig

le thabs dang ni/ /ye shes me ni shes rab che/ /gnyis med d+hU tI'i nang zhugs pas/ /bdud rtsi mi 'pho gsang lam gnas/ /de nyid du ni srog brten cing / /'dzin pa ye shes lam gyur pa'o/ /de las gtum mo 'bar gyur zhing / /las rlung gyen log lte bar phyin/ /

ho las bdud rtsi 'bar 'dzag gyur/ /mgrin par dga' ba snying gar ni/ /mchog dga' lte bar khyad par can/ /gsang bar mi ldog lhan cig skyes/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur 'thob pa'o/ /de nyid ye shes rjes dran gces/ lus ngag yid dang ye shes zhi/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid

mngon gyur pa'o/ /shes pa dag ni rnam dag pa/ /lte bar 'dod chags rtog pa dag /snying gar gnyid kyi rtog bzhi/ mgrin par rmi lam shes pa dag /dpral bar sad pa'i shes pa spangs/ /las rlung rtsa yi 'khor lo yi/ /thig ler gnas pa rten dang ni/ /brten pa

byang sems mi 'gyur thob/ /las kyi phung po log gyur cing / /mnyam pa'i bden pa la 'jug pa/ /gtsug tor sgo ni phye gyur pas/ /'bigs byed brtan pa'i don thob pas/ /yon tan dpag med mngon du gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med

pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang du gyur/ /de nyid yon tan phrin las tshogs/ /rtog med ngang las kun du 'byung / /skad cig mngon rdzogs zung 'jug pa/ /ting nge 'dzin zhes brjod pa ste/ /gsang chen gnas 'thob mngon sangs rgyas/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las

bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas ye shes kun mkhyen pa'i/ /gsang ba rab 'byam grub pa ste/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i don gyis ni/ /thogs med nus pa ldan gyur pa/ /bden pa gnyis

bsres don bstan pa'o/ /phrin las bzhi yi byed pa las/ /grub tshul de nyid bstan pa'o/ /bzlas thabs bcu yis grub pa'i don/ /sngags rnams kun gyi de nyid kyis/ /lam rdzogs sa rnams mngon gyur pas/ /bdag byin brlab par gyur pa'o/ /tshe 'di nyid

dang bar dor ni/ /ye shes dngos grub thob par bshad/ /gong du 'pho ba'i don grub byed/ /bcu bdun lha yi 'khor lo las/ /grub pa rab gsal bde thob pa'o/ /mtshon bya'i 'bras bu mngon grub na/ /mtshon byed nus pa thogs med 'byung / /gsal bya gsal

byed rgyu 'bras dang / /bskyed bya skyed byed rgyu 'bras so/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu 'bras las/ /rgyus ni 'bras bu skyed byed pas/ /'bras bu rgyu las 'byung bas na/ /phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu 'bras so/ /ngo bo gcig par grub 'gyur te/ /rgyu 'bras rnam pa tha dad kyang / /rigs

mthun gnas nyid mtshungs 'bral bas/ /grub sde gcig par grub pa'o/ /rgyu 'bras ma lus rten 'brel te/ /de nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /stong nyid dngos po sna tshogs par/ /gnas kyang ro mnyam 'gag pa med/ /chos rnams snang ba ma lus la/ /nam mkha'i rang

bzhin ngang las 'byung / /sgrib phyogs dang ni snang phyogs dag /skye 'gag de nyid dngos med pas/ /bden gnyis tha dad gyur pa na/ /ye shes lam ni don med 'gyur/ /gsal stong gnyis ni tha dad na/ /rtag chad mthar ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs

la brten nas/ /dngos med ye shes 'od gsal ba/ /zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa/ /rgyu rkyen ma lus dag byed pas/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin mthar thug ni/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ngo bo nyid/ /dngos po thams cad zlog byed pa/ /shing gi tshogs la me 'bar bas/ /bsregs te

dngos med 'gyur ba ltar/ /mthar ni thams cad stong nyid du/ /ye shes mes ni rnam par sbyangs/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings las ni/ /ye shes phrin las 'gag med 'byung / /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ /de nas

rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dpal ldan lus kyi rnam shes dang / /ye shes sgyu 'phrul la sogs bstan/ /lha mo bzhi dang khro bo bcu/ /sna tshogs phrin las du ma mchog /'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /phyi nang dbye ba rim pa yis/ /ma grub

spogs pa'i cho ga ni/ /phur gdab de nyid bstan pa'o/ /'dod pa'i khams na 'gro ba kun/ /rnam rtog rlung gi ra bar tshud/ /bdag 'dzin mdud pas bsdams pa la/ /smin grol ye shes lam rtogs pa/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bkod pa la/ /

so bdun yi ge la dmigs pa/ /bcu drug cha dang ldan pa'o/ /drod ni snang ba rtog bral sems/ /spangs thob yon tan 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /rtse mo mchod pa nus pa rnyed/ /'jigs pa las grol brtan par 'gyur/ /bzod pa snang ba thob pa nyid/ /rtog pa kun las rnam

par grol/ /chos mchog snang ba nyer thob nyid/ /ye shes de ma thag pa che/ /zil gnon rten 'brel phyogs cha 'char/ /rigs pa mngon gyur rtog pa 'dag /de nyid 'khor 'das yon tan thob/ /gzung 'dzin cha 'das lam du gyur/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs

par bya/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ /spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ye shes kyi grub pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir/ dben gnas dben pa yon tan kun dang ldan pa/ lus gnas sems kyi

dur khrod rab tu sgrub pa nyid du bya ba ste/ dngos 'dzin rnam par dag pa nyid kyis so/ /sme sha can ni rtog med ma'i sha la rol pa nyid de/ khyad par du ye shes yang dag pa bsgrub pa ste/ dus rtag tu ye shes kyi ngang las mi 'da' bar bsgrub pa'o/ /rig ma shes rab

ye shes las skyes ma/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa ste bcu phrag gnyis ma nyid do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa/ 'od gsal las byung ba'i lus rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i pho brang dang ldan pa'o/ /

de nyid phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par dag pa/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dmigs pa'o/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig ni yul dang dbang po gnyis med du sbyar ba'o/ /la sogs ni bde ba stong pa nyams su myong ba'i zas kyis khyad par yul la spyod pa'o/ /

de ru cho ga bzhin du zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa yab yum rol pa bde chen mi 'gyur pa yongs su grub pa'o/ /de'i dkyil 'khor rten gzhal yas khang chos 'byung dang / 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang bcas pa rten dang brten pa'i lha tshogs thams cad ye shes las skyes pa/ ye shes

las byung ba'i mtshan nyid bde stong ro mnyam du 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /rab tu bzang bas na 'od gsal ba'i ye shes las skyes pa/ bzhin rab tu mdzes pa ye shes kyi dbang po dang stobs las byung ba nyid do/ /rgyan rnams ni bral ba dang rnam par smin

pa'i cha las 'phags pa'i nor las yan lag bdun ldan ye shes kyi che bas yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dang / reg bya rdo rje ma chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje mar gyur pa rnam par bsgom zhes pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor lnga'i

'khor lo ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor/ dpral ba mgrin pa thugs ka lte ba gsang ba dang bcas par sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dpe dang / sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan dang ldan pa/ ye shes las 'byung ba skad cig gis so/ /der rnal 'byor gyi

dbang phyug gsang sngags kyi rnam par bsam pa'i 'khor lo can gyi gsang ba ye shes kyi bsgrub pa ste/ bde stong gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen por ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i gnas/ tshad med pas yang dag par mchod pa/ dmigs pa rnam par gyur ba'i

nyams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu pa'o/ /de nyid las gsang ba bla na med pa'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can zhes pa ste/ sku rdo rje mi 'gyur ba gsung rdo rje 'gag

ba med pa/ thugs rdo rje rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la/ de nyid dbyer mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la kun tu rnam par snang bar mdzad pa/ rdo rje 'chang chen po/ sku'i 'od kyi snang ba

las spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po dang rab tu chen po/ /spro ba dang bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rol pa ston pa'o/ /yang de nyid du rig ma'i rigs dag pas/ ye shes bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ bram ze ma la sogs pa

ste/ rdo rje rigs kyi sme sha can lta bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni/ btso blag mkhan te dngos po thams cad ye shes su sgyur bar byed pa'o/ /yang na bram ze zhes pa ste/ sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'o/ /rgyal rigs ni rin po che'i rigs la ste/ ye

shes 'bar ba'i che ba dang ldan pa'o/ /rje'u rigs ni pad+ma can la ste chags pa med pa'o/ /rdo rje chos kyi rigs chags pa med pa pad+ma'i 'dam las thon pa lta bur bsgrub pa nyid do/ /yang na gar mkhan gyi rigs kyis kun tu sgyur bar byed pas/ 'di ni ye shes bde chen gsang

ba ye shes myur du thob par byed pa nyid do/ /yang na pad+ma'i rigs kyi rig ma lta bu'am/ gtum pa ma rnam rtog rtsad nas gcod pa dag gam/ khyad par du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ snying ga'i gnas su

stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa/ byang chub rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ rig ma ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ sems dpa' ut+pal la chu'i dri mas ma gos pa dang mtshungs pa/ btso blag mkhan thams cad ye shes su sgyur bar byed pa nyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ye

shes dang mtshungs pa dag ni/ brten bsgrub pa mnyam rjes gnyis su med pas rab tu grub pa'i dbang phyug 'thob pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gcig pa'o/ /yang shin tu spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa las ni/

dam pa gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni/ thabs rlung gi sbyor ba dang / shes rab rig pa stong nyid spros med lhan cig skyes pa rang 'byung ro mnyam bde ba chen po'i sbyor bas ye shes la rol pa gar gyi nyams kyi spyod pa thams cad 'od gsal ba'i ngang las/ zung 'jug bde ba chen por phrin

las thams cad brtsam par bya ba'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems 'da' bar mi bya bas 'da' bar dka' ba ste da phan yon ni sku gsung thugs gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes dang ldan pa de ni skad cig de ma thag tu yang / dpal rdo rje 'chang

byang chub sems rdo rje dang phrin las tha mi dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tha tshig go/ /rdo rje nyi ma nub pa rdo rje ni/ sgyu lus dag pa thabs mi phyed pa/ nyi ma ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa'i cha las nub pa snang ba thob pa las/ khyad par du rang bzhin gyi rtog pa thams

cad rtsa ro rkyang gnyis rlung dang shes pa dbyer med du bsdus nas/ rtsa dbu ma ye shes kyi ngang du/ spang blang med par nub pa chen po nyid de/ de nyid du nam mkha' rnam par dag pa lta bu'i bde stong dbyer med 'od gsal chen po rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngang du gnas par 'gyur

ba'o/ /de las slob pa'i zung 'jug tu ldang bas/ skya rengs shar ba lta bu ste/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dus gsum phyogs bcur khyab pa'i skad cig ma'i khyad par la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gyur pa'o/ /khyad par sgyu lus rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi

rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rgyal po sems dpa' ste/ chos rnams kun dang mtshungs par ldan pa rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba ni/ rin po che bdun dang ldan pa ste/ gnas skabs su 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi rgyan gyis spras pa na/ rgyud gsang chen la rgyan bdun

gyis spras par gyur pas/ sku gsum yan lag bdun ldan du grub pa 'dod dang thar pa rab tu grub pa ste/ dbang phyug brgyad ldan zung 'jug bla na med pa rab tu grub pa nyid do/ /dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa thams cad rnam par 'dzin pa/ rnam par dag par sgyu ma

rab tu mi gnas par bstan pa'i don du/ de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag ces tshad med pa'i byang chub sems las byung ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug chen po/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob pa/ dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ snang ba

gsum po rang bzhin dang bcas pa/ thams cad dag pas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob pas/ lus kyi gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bgrodapas/ rten dang brten pa rang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dpung gi dam tshig 'dzin na

thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las yon tan mi zad pa stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i dbang phyug dam pa brgyad la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos spobs la dbang sgyur ba/ kun gyi mchog tshad med mngon du gyur pa'o/ /mngon par byang chub rnam gnyis las/ /phyi

nang gnyis su dgos pas bshad/ /nang gi dus te cho 'phrul bstan/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ /rdo rje sgo gsum so sor dag /slob ba'i phyi yi mngon byang chub/ /tho rangs mi slob zung 'jug ste/ /sku bzhi gcig tu 'dus pa ste/ /skad cig ye shes rnam grol ba'o/ /dpal

ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gnyis pa'o/ /de las mngon par byang chub pa bde ba chen po'i dbang phyug bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje rnal 'byor pas rdo rje lus kyi khyad par la bstan nas/ rig ma mngon par

'du bya ba las/ mkha' gsang byin rlabs dang ldan pas/ thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i rdo rje chos 'byung pad+mar nub pas/ shes rab ze 'bru rgyas par zla ba dang nyi ma ngo mnyam par gyur pas/ snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba thob pa dang / nye bar thob

pa nub pa can gyi ye shes kyi bsgrub pa kun tu brtsam pa'o/ /'od gsal ba'i ye shes thog ma dang mthar 'byung ba nyid kyis rang bzhin rnams kun 'dar du nub cing rnam par dag pa'o/ /skya rengs 'char ba'i cha ni mkha' snang dag pa'i ngang du ye shes 'jug pa dang bzlog

par gyur pas/ stong pa bzhi las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog ste/ rgyu kun tu byang chub sems 'phel ba las/ rkyen rig ma'i stobs kyis/ rtsa gnas thams cad du thig le 'phel zhing rgyas pa las/ dga' ba'i dus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma

dang / mchog dga'i dus su rnam par smin pa'i khyad par gyi dga' ba'i dus su rnam par nyed pa nyid do/ /skad cig ma gsum las 'das pa'i dus de ma thag pa las/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig ma mngon du gyur pa/ bde stong

ro mnyam gyi ye shes phyag rgya chen po rab tu mi gnas pa'i don zung 'jug chen po thob par gyur pa'o/ /de nyid yongs su dag pa bla na med pa'i che ba bstan pa la/ rgyan rnams don gyi rgyan ye shes kyi che ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu 'char la/ rnam grangs yon tan gyi che ba tshad med

par 'chor ba'o/ /rnam pa thams cad du rim dang cig car du kun tu snang ba'o/ /me tog ni gzugs rdo rje spos ni dri rdo rje ma la sogs kyis sgra rdo rje/ ro rdo rje dang / reg bya rdo rje ma'i rnam par snang ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ byang chub sems rdo rje'i phrin las/ phung po

khams dang skye mched thams cad rten dang brten par gyur pa/ spyi gtsug nas rkang mthil gyi bar du bde ba tshad med pa skyes pas/ snang srid thams cad bde ba tshad med par gyur pa/ sa gsum kun tu sgyu ma'i rol pas mi zad pa'i cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa

skad cig gcig la 'char bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de'i tshe bstan pa sku gsum mchog ni/ bde ba longs sku/ gsal ba sprul sku/ mi rtog pa chos kyi sku ste/ dbyer med ngo bo nyid lhun grub de la/ phrin las thogs pa med par 'char bas rab tu bsgom pa'o/ /

dpag tshad brgya'i ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams tshad med pa'i snang ba chen pos kun tu byas pa spro bsdu'i mdzad pa ston pa'o/ /de las dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni/ thabs snying rje chen po bla na med pa ni shes rab rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i

stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med du gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ni slob pa las 'das pa mi slob pa'i zung 'jug ste/ byang chub ni yang dag pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'o/ /gnas zhi ba ste mtha' thams cad dang bral ba gnyis med zung 'jug

chen po mngon du gyur pas sa bcu gsum pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /nye bar bsdu ba la gdams pa ste/ rdo rje can ni dag pa'i sgyu lus la gnas pa ste/ mi slob pa'i zung 'jug lam thams cad mthar phyin pas srod dus su bdud bcom ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje

snying po'i nus pa thob pa/ thob pas ye shes chen po gsang ba'i gnas grub pa'o/ /tho rangs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i grub pa/ ye shes rab tu mi gnas pa/ gtsug tor chen po rab tu rdzogs pa bde ba chen po mi shigs pa bla na med pa thob pa'o/ /bshang gci'i

dam tshig bza' ba ni/ dbyings kyi ngang du ye shes ro mnyam du thim pas dngos grub ma zad pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba byang chub chen po rab tu rtogs pa'i skad cig gcig rdo rje 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur

pa'o/ /yang dag par gsungs pa phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum cu so gsum pa'o/ /de la 'dir chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs

pa/ sgyu ma lta bur spyod cing 'jug pa nyid/ /sgyu ma de dag byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa las/ /ma dag pa las rnam dag lha yi sku/ /lus ngag yid gsum sgyu mar lam du 'chang / /phung po khams dang skye mched 'byung sogs rnams/ /shes pa gnyis la de nyid yongs bsdus nas/ /

gang zhig stong chen gnyid log gyur pa ste/ /rlung gi byed pas rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur/ /rmi lam yul las bye brag 'khrug par snang / /kun du rtog pa'i rgyu 'bras rmi lam rtog /gang gis mtshan dang nyin du gnyid 'jug pas/ /gnyid log sad pa tha dad gyur pa min/ /sa

mthug bsgribs pas rab tu ring gnyid log /sngar byas 'bras bu ma smin las rnams kun/ /de nas rlung gis las rnams 'byung 'jug 'gyur/ /sngon las smin par gyur na rlung sems dag /'jig rten 'pho ba gnas gzhan dag tu 'gro/ /ji ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs

pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /de yi sku la rkang rus sha khrag med/ /sems can don du khams la 'jug par mdzad/ /sprul pa sgyu mas 'gro don mdzad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin gnyid log sad gyur rim pas sems/ /rnam rtog dra bas bcings pas tha dad can/ /chos rnams las

ni yongs su ma 'das phyir/ bden dang pa gcig dang du mar min/ /phyi rol don du gyur pa ci yang med/ /de phyir rang sems stong nyid cho 'phrul yin/ /sgyu mar snang ba 'khrul ba las bzlog bya/ /cir snang med bdag rtogs par bya/ /rmi lam de nyid rtog med rang gsal

ba/ /'byung ba'i gnas la khams 'dus snang ba gang / /sas brtan chus sdud mes rno ngar chags pa/ /rlung gis yang zhing g.yo byed mi brtan pa'o/ /nam mkha' la 'dus lus bde nyams bzang ba/ /bdud rtsi dag las nus pa 'byung ba ste/ /gla rtsis zhe sdang bzhi

mnyam gti mug nyid/ /ga bur chags byed si h+las nga rgyal bskyed/ /sna tshogs las kyis phrag dog 'du 'phro byed/ /lam gyur dmigs pas yon tan pa rnam 'char/ /sngar phyung ba las phyis 'byung rtags su 'char/ /yul dus mtshan ma nges pa dran pa'i blo/ /

nyams snang blo las ma bcos sgyu mar snang / /de nyid ros zin ye shes grogs yin no/ /rang srog snying por gyur pa sems nyid las/ /chos nyid sems lus khams gsum snang ba la/ /gzhan pa med cing rlung las khams gsum sprul/ /sgyu lus rmi lam rmis pa

bzhin du mthong / /khams gsum rlung rig bdag nyid de bzhin nyid/ /rjes su rtogs pa 'bring gis chos rnams kun/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur 'char ba dang / /rab kyi nam mkha' lta bur rtogs pa ni/ /'od gsal ba la bsam gtan ting 'dzin ldan/ /rjes su rtogs

pa shin tu rab gyur pas/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bur rtogs pa nyid/ /zung 'jug mngon du gyur pa'i don nyid de/ /ngo bo nyid las 'bad med gzhan don du/ /rtog med mi g.yo lhun grub gyur pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum

cu so bzhi pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi/ 'khor lo 'byung ba bla med pa/ gsang chen dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /yab yum rol pa gsang ba yi/ /

'og min gnas nas 'dir gshegs pa/ /byin rlabs ye shes dbab par byed/ /'di ni rdo rje chen po yi/ /dbang bskur ye shes gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor lus kyi gnas rnams su/ /spyi bo lte ba dpral ba dang / /mgrin pa snying ga gsang bar ni/ /bder gshegs

rdo rje chen po yi/ /yab yum phyi nang gsang ba la/ /gnyis med rol pas dbang bskur ba/ /bde chen ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang chen dbang ni dri med pa'o/ /gsang ba rdo rje theg pa yi/ /sdom pa gsang ba rgyas gdab pa/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i snying po ni/ /
yang dag sdom pa bstan pa'o/ /rlung sems 'gyur ldog dus gnad 'gyur ba nyid/ /rlung sems gcig tu gnas sam tha dad 'gyur/ /gal te rlung sems gcig tu mtshungs ldan na/ /thog mar sngon du 'gro ba gang

yin pa/ /'gro 'ong rim pa bzhin du byed 'gyur na/ /sngon du 'gro ba gang yin de rjes su/ /'brangs las gang gang byed pa gang de snyed/ /so sor byed dam gcig tu mnyam par byed/ /so sor byed na gcig pa'i khyad par nyams/ /gcig tu

byed na snga phyi med par 'gyur/ /rlung 'gags na ni rtog pa 'gag mi 'gag /gal te rtog pa bzlog par gyur pa na/ /rlung gis las ni ji ltar byed par gyur/ /'byung ba rlung dang rang bzhin rtog pa dag /mnyam du 'byung 'jug byed dam mi

byed brtag /srog ste rlung dang rnam shes gang yin pa/ /phyi rol 'byung ba'i rlung ni 'gags pa na/ /lus can rnams kyi srog kyang 'gag par 'gyur/ /phyi yi rlung dang nang gi rlung dag las/ /gcig 'gags pas na phyi ma 'gag 'gyur ram/ /

gcig ni log na thams cad log 'gyur grang / /gcig ni log kyang gsum po mi ldog 'gyur/ /'di yi dbye ba khyad par rtogs par bya/ /rlung sems 'gro ldog gi gnas lugs bstan pa'o/ /rtag tu ma byin len pa ni/ /yon tan ye

shes phrin las kun/ /dus med par ni nus pas blang / /rnam rtog ltung byed ma lus pa/ /rang bzhin shes pas rtsa ba bcad/ /chos rnams sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /gsang ba bde chen grub pa la/ /rmad byung bde chen 'dod chags

nyid/ /shes pas rang bzhin med par smra/ /rdo rje 'dzin par gnas par spyad/ /bzlog pa sman nyid ye shes che/ /log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sdom pa thabs dang shes rab dag /gnyis med phyag rgya chen por na/ dus kun du

ni de nyid sdom/ /sdom pa thams cad kyi gsang ba zil gnon rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'dus nas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pa thim 'gyur/ /de gnyis sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /rtog pa'i dpa'

rlabs rab zhi ba/ /nyer dpyad ye shes sgyu ma dag pa las/ /yongs dag rnal 'byor spros bcas dang / spros med las 'das stong pa nyid/ 'od gsal shin tu spros med las/ phyag rgya chen po zung 'jug thob/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las

bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum cu so lnga pa'o/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsang chen tshul mchog ste/ /rdo rje gsum las 'khor lo 'byung / /byang chub sangs rgyas gnas 'jug pa'o/ /de kho na nyid

las mngon rtogs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyur pa'o/ /brjod bya dang ni rjod byed dang / /dpa' dang mngon gyur stobs dang ni/ /chos don khyab par gyur pa'i phyir/ /stobs ldan khyad par rgyan yin no/ /gnas pa dang ni gsal rdzu 'phrul/ /

yon tan phrin las rgyan rim bzhin/ /de ni rjod byed rtag tu rgyan/ /don gyur dgos pa bla na med/ /don gnas byed pa ye shes kyi/ /gsang chen bde mthong khyad par te/ /rgyan las dbye bsdu bstan pa'o/ /de nas bder gshegs rdo rje 'dzin/ /

'dus pa'i tshogs la rjes brtse bas/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes 'dir gsungs pa/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni ye shes che/ /'od gsal rang bzhin yongs su dag /dri med nam mkha'i

dbyings bzhin no/ /ye shes ngo bo nyid 'byung ba/ /khams gsum dag na byang chub spyod/ /'gro ba kun la bde 'byung ba'i/ /dge ba yongs su dag gyur byos/ /dag pa'i lus ni rnam thar gyi/ /sgo gsum grub pa sku rdo rje/ /ngag ni dag pa chos kyi

tshul/ /so sor yang dag rig pa che/ /gsung gi dbyangs ni mi phyed 'gyur/ /rnam shes dus gsum dus med du/ /ye shes byang chub chen por 'byung / /dbyer med bde chen mi gnas pa'o/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam

par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor gyi nang du/

'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu rnams thong / de skad ces ma zer cig ces pa nas/ 'jigs

skrag dngangs nas brgyal bar gyur to zhes pa dang / de dag la slar gsol zhes pa'i bar gyi dpal rdo rje 'chang gi bar gyis gsungs pa ni/ bzhugs pa la ldem por dgongs pa'i the tshom sel ba bstan pa'o/ /srog chags gsod la dga' ba zhes pa

nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur gyi bar gyis gsungs pa ni/ 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to zhes pas bstan no/ /'di lta bu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam/ rdo rje'i tshig ci'i slad du

gsung zhes dris pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams 'du shes ngan pa dang / dman pa'i 'du shes de lta bu ma skyed cig ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog go/ /

'di lta ste sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes pa nas/ dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pas/ bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa'i the tshom sel ba'o/ /sku mi 'gyur ba mi gnas pa ma skyes pa zhes pa la sogs pa nas/

yang de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams lta ci smos te/ nged sgo gsum rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa yang sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje'i byang chub mi shis so zhes pa dang / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o/ /zhes ngo bo nyid chos kyi mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa'i the tshom sel ba'o/ /dgongs pa sgyid

lug pa spang ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu sems can chen po'i zhes pa nas/ rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o zhes pas bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ces pa nas skal ba med pa'i phyir gyi bar gyis gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa 'byung ba dkon pa la gdams

pa'o/ /yang lam ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs shing tshe gcig lus gcig gis sangs rgyas pa bstan pa ni 'on kyang zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i

tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma ngu cig /sdug bsngal gsum bsgom par ma byed cig /byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis na ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ces ma zer cig /gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pas

na sgyid lug pa spang ba'i phyir yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma mthong ma thob

cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes the tshom bsal ba'o/ /sngags kyi sems dpa' mi bya ste/ byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' zhes pa la zhen pa dang ma bral

na 'ching bar 'gyur zhes pa gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa'o/ /mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags zhes pa la sogs pa don gzhan la dgongs pa'o/ /chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam zhes pa mnyam pa nyid la dgongs

pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas ni dus gzhan la dgongs pa'o/ /dgongs pa nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa'i don la dgongs pa ni ldem por dgongs pa dag go/ /dgongs pa spyi ni yang dag par dgongs pa'o/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i khyad par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so drug pa'o/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /mos gus

mthar phyin gyur pas ni/ /lam gyi rim pa kun rdzogs pas/ /sgrib dag yon tan thob pa ste/ /dbang gi rgyal po rnyed pa bzhin/ /las dang dngos grub ma lus pa/ /ye shes mi zad gnas 'thob pa'o/ /dam tshig dag gi 'khor lor ni/ /dga' ba chen pos rol pa ni/ /

lus kyi gnas su rtsa gnas pa/ /'khor lo drug gi rnam pa la/ /thig le yi ge rlung dag pa/ /bde gsang stong nyid ye shes las/ /dbang phyug mdzod spu gtsug tor du/ /gnyis med mnyam pa bde chen du/ /rab tu thim pas rnam grol nyid/ /rten 'brel thams cad mkhyen

par 'gyur/ /las rgyal mchog gi phrin las ni/ /don dam stong nyid ngang las ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur las/ /rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgyur ba/ /zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa yi/ /spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /zhi bar 'dod rnams thams cad kyi/ /der

gnas gnod pa zhi bar byed/ /rgyas la rin chen 'byung gnas dpal/ mA ma kI dang gnyis med pas/ /spro bsdus rin chen char dbab bya/ /dbang la 'od dpag med pa nyid/ /gos dkar yum dang gnyis med pas/ spros pas dbang du bsdu bar bya/ /mngon

spyod gdon mi za ba nyid/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas pas/ /sgrol ma dang ni gnyis su med/ /spro bsdus khro bos las la sbyar/ /de dag las tshogs thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma rmi lam ltar gsal bas/ /bdag byin brlab pa nyid du lta/ /sgyu ma'i dpe bcu

gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa kun 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ji srid gnas pa'i bar du chos thams cad la

dbang sgyur ba/ zab pa dang rgya che ba bla na med pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan du ma rnams kyis rol par mdzad cing rab tu dga' bar mdzad pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab

pa dang ldan pas/ bdag ji ltar bzhed pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dpag tu med par mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los phrin las thogs pa med par rab tu mngon par 'byung ba'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las

bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum cu so bdun pa'o// //e ma'o rdo rje ni snang ba/ e ma'o rdo rje ni mched pa/ e ma'o rdo rje yin par bshad pa ni snang ba thob pa'i ye shes so/ /sgyu rlung sems sgyu ma tsam las 'byung ba'i gang du zhes 'od

gsal ba'i ngang du'o/ /der ni sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'i lus med snang tsam/ ngag med grag tsam sems med rtog med stong pa nyid do/ /der stong nyid 'od gsal ba'i ngang las/ lus ni rnam par bsgom pa sgyu lus rnam par dag pa'i skad cig gis

'byung ba'i zung 'jug gi sku thob par gyur pa'o/ /zung 'jug slob bzhin pa la gnas pas ni/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings kyi don nam mkha' 'od gsal las byung ba'i ye shes kyi lha mo rig ma dang / yang de nyid du thabs snying rje chen po dang ldan

pa'i thabs shes rab gnyis med du sbyor bas mnyes par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /bdud 'dul bar mdzad pas rig ma ni rnam pa sgyu ma lta bu las skyes bu rnal 'byor pa dga' ba chen po'i rol pa ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje ste/ shes rab pad+ma chos kyi 'byung

gnas dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa zhes sku rdo rje dag pa dga' ba'i skad cig /gsung rdo rje mchog dga'i skad cig /thugs rdo rje dag pa dga' bral gyi skad cig dang gsum las rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa ni skad cig bzhi la lhan cig

skyes pa ro mnyam bde ba chen po ngo bo nyid kyi sku mngon du byed pa ste/ khyu mchog byang chub sems rdo rje de ni mnyes par gyur pa/ zung 'jug slob bzhin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grags chen sa bcu pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang mnyam par 'gyur te/ dus dag pa ye

shes skad cig bdun pa la gzi brjid che ba ni/ ye shes dbang phyug nus pa rdzogs pa thob par yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sku gsum mngon du gyur pas longs spyod rdzogs sku ye shes kha sbyor du gyur pa bde ba chen po dang / snying rje chen pos 'gro don mngon par 'byung ba/

'gog pa med pa'i ye shes rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med 'thob pa'o/ /sab+ha zhes bdun pa'i sgra ste des yan lag dang ldan par brjod pa'o/ /de nyid kun du 'ong zhes dang / /ye shes mtshon pa'i

sa thob pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas pas mngon par byang chub chen po nyid/ bdag gi lus ngag sems rdo rje/ /mnyam rjes gnyis su med par ni/ /'gyur ba med don rab rtags dang / /phyag rgya chen po mngon grub pa'i/ /gsang ba dbang phyug cho ga ni/ /byang chub

ye shes rdo rje yi/ /skur gyur sgom pa sgrib bral ba'i/ /zung 'jug bla na med pa ni/ /mkhyen pa rgyas pas rab mi gnas/ /rtog med snang ba med pa yi/ /skad cig nyid la yon tan rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa yis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du gnas/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum cu so brgyad pa'o/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje ye shes kyi/ /byang chub

sems kyi bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus kun du snang bar mdzad/ /sa gsum kun du khyab cing yongs gang ba/ /bum pa rdo rje mi 'gyur chus gang ltar/ /yongs su dag pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di

thams cad kyi/ /gang du 'gro ba sku gsum las byung ba/ /de dag rnams la rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi/ /dpal gyis reg nas dbang bskur gyur thob pas/ /'gro kun bde bar gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes ro mnyam thob/ /dbyer med zung

'jug bla na med par gyur/ /yang dag par ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /chos kun snying po lam las 'das pas na/ /mthar phyin gyur pas 'bad rtsol las las grol/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rnam dag pa/ /zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas gyur pa'o/ /

dngos dang dngos med spangs thob bral ba'i phyir/ /mtshan ma'i chos las rgyu rkyen bral ba'o/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /dmigs med ngang 'byung 'od gsal de nyid las/ /rang dag dbyings dang dbyer med rang grol ba/ /phrin las yongs

su dag pa bla na med/ /yul dang yul can byang chub thob med pa/ /rnam par mi rtog mtha' bral brjod du med/ /de bzhin nyid dag bde chen lhun grub pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa sum cu so dgu pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dus gsum dang / /phyogs bcu kun du zhing khams rab 'byam dang / /kun du gzigs shing kun mkhyen pa/ /ma lus yongs dag ting nge 'dzin/ /thams cad mkhyen pas skad cig las/ /nam mkha' ltar

ni rtog med pas/ /gdul bya dus la bab pa la/ /'bad med par ni sku gsung thugs/ /rgyun mi 'chad cing thogs med don/ /snang med ngang las 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /rgyud kyis bsdus dang ma bsdus las/ /rdo rje ngo bo nyid ston 'gyur/ /de las

mngon par byang chub pa bla na med pa ye shes kyi sku de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba mnyam pa ni chos nyid de bzhin nyid las byang chub pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis spros pa med pa lhun grub stong pa nyid do/ /khyab

cing gsal ba'i ngo bo mngon par byang chub pa ni/ dngos po med pa'i gsal bar gyur pa'i khyab bdag rdo rje'o/ /mi zad pa snang ba'i ye shes mngon par byang chub pa ni/ mi mtshungs pa med pa'i snang ba 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid rtag tu mi 'gyur ba'i

de bzhin nyid do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon par byang chub pa ni/ kun tu 'byung ba thogs pa med pa'i dus dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'gag pa med pa'o/ /yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings mngon par byang chub pa ni/ tha dad par dmigs pa

med pa'i ye shes kyi sku/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems dus gsum thog mtha' kun du dkyil 'khor chen po/ /gsang ba'i bde ba chen po sku gsung thugs rdo rje dam tshig gi 'khor los zhi ba dang / khro bo'i sku sna tshogs su snang ba'o/ /

longs spyod rdzogs pa mtshan dpe ldan/ /yab yum bde chen ngo bo nyid/ /snying rje chen po tshad med pas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bsam pa dang / /mthun par 'jug pas zhi mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin med pas mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje

kun las bsdus pa las/ rab tu byed pa bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /dpag med 'dus pa thams cad kyi/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i gzugs can mchog /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyi/ /gsung dbyangs rdo rje sgra sgrogs pa/ /

nye ba nyid du thos pa yis/ /bde ba dang ni yid bde thob/ /de nyid du ni skad cig la/ /yang dag ting 'dzin sgo thob cing / /rmad byung ye shes dbyangs kyis bstod/ /chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /thugs rje tshad med 'gro skyob mdzad/ /byang chub

ye shes gtso chen po/ /bde chen dpe bral phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gsang ba mi 'gyur ba/ /mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /gar gyi bdag po phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po ma rungs thams cad kun/ /gsung gi nga

ros zil gnon cing / /'jigs byed bdud 'dul chen po nyid/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal/ /chos rnams mi zad mdzod thob pas/ /'gro ba kun la gter sbyin mdzad/ /dbang phyug bla med phyag rgya che/ cod pan gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'jig rten dbang sgyur sa gsum pa/ /dri med nor bu chen po ste/ /mtshungs med sgyu 'phrul rgyal po che/ /byang chub snying po phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la yang dag par bstod pa'o/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dga' mgu yi rangs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas ci yang mi smra bar gyur to/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje

kun las bsdus pa las rab tu byed pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa las rim par brgyud pa/ dpal nA ro ba'i slob ma kha che'i baN+Dita A ka ra sid+d+hi dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims kyis zhus shing gtan la phab pa/

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra hr-i da ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po bud med bcu'i dkyil na cha shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'khor rdo rje dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ dam tshig yongs su spyod

pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ye shes kyi lus yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtse gcig tu 'dris pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje

mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje

mkha' 'gro dang / skyod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / hA ra nu pU ra la sogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gI ta mgrin la sogs pa'i glu mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i

rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / tshod ma sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gsum

rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje

mkha' 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / rnam

par shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo / /de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus

nas mkha' 'gro chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams thams cad kyi/ /

gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog /rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud/ /'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas mkha' 'gro thams cad la rnam par bltas te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du

'chad du mi bzhed pa de bdag cag la mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs/ /

sa 'og ma yi sangs rgyas kyang / /'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na/ /sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir/ /byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad pa ni/ /ston pa rnams

kyi chos nyid do/ /de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa bstan cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas sems dpa' thams cad byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di rang gi thugs las phyung ngo / /oM AHhU~M sa ma ya badzra/ de nas phyung ma thag tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying gar btsud

nas bud med kyi dkyil na thams cad brgyal ba ltar gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de bslang pa'i phyir mkha' 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs

ma thag tu de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis 'khor lo rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje

mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar

gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/ dbugs

rngub par mi mdzad/ dbyung bar mi mdzad/ lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ lus gnas par yang mi mdzad/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs mi dgongs nye bar mi 'jig go/ /thabs dang shes rab stong bar

yang mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'dzud par mi mdzad/ mtho ris la yang mi 'jog /ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar 'tsho ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags

pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/

mi dga' ba rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/ drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang log 'dren dang gdug pa

chen po dang dang sha za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang tsha ba'i gdon dang nad dang sbrul dang sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad do/ /rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad do/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te brjid pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang 'dor ba dang bskum pa dang / 'gyed pa dang spyan mdzes pas smin bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gar

gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen zhing sgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang 'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen por kun

tu khyab par mdzad/ de la khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad de/ de nas chu'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad/ de nas sa'i khams chen por kun du khyab par mdzad do/ /de yang kun du khyab nas bcom ldan

'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad do/ /ri dang sems can thams cad dang / /sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang / /bud med gzhon nu rgan po dang / /skyes pa dang ni ma ning dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /gdon dang skar ma

gshin rje dang / /chu bdag brgya byin la sogs dang / /'byung dang 'byung 'gyur thams cad la/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen po/ /kun du bzang po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun du khyab par byas te gnas/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje

mkha' 'gro byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /las kyi mchog rnams 'grub byed pa'i/ /gsang sngags rnams ni bshad par bya/ /rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya'o/ /oM a kA ro

mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+yA nut+pan+na twAta/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ a aH/ bud med do/ /r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ma ning ngo / /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ skyes

pa'i'o/ /ya ra la wa 'byung ba'i'o/ /sha Sha sa ha 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o/ /k+ShaHchos kyi dbyings kyis bon no/ /badzra d+h+r-ika hU~M/ dzi na dzika b+h+rU~M/ rat+na d+h+r-ika a~M/ A ro lika dzrA+eM/ pradz+h+ra d+h+r-ika kha~M/ mkha' 'gro chen po lnga'i'o/ /dwe Sha ra ti mA~M/ mo har

ti lA~M/ rA ga ra ti pA~M/ badzra ra ti tA~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rten par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o/ /k+Shi ti gar+b+ha k+ShiM/ badzra pA Ni dzrI/ ga ga na gar+b+ha kha~M/ lo ki shwa ra ga~M /ni ba raN biSh+kam+b+hi ni ka~M/ sa man+ta b+ha dra sa~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dam tshig spyod pa la

sogs pa'i'o/ /rU pa badzra dzaH/ shab+da badzra hU~M/ gan+d+he badzra ba~M/ ra sa badzra hoH/ spar+sha badzra kha~M/ d+harma d+hA tu badzra ra~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro mdzes par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o/ /ya mAn+ta kr-ita/ pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ big+h+nan+ta kr-ita/ Tak+ki

rA dza/ nI la daN+Da/ ma hA ba la/ a tsa le ka Na hU~M/ su~M b+ha ni hU~M/ tsakra brti ni hU~M b+hU~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa'i'o/ /wa ri dzi na b+h+rU~M/ te dzo skan+b+ha b+hU~M/ man+ta tsakra b+hU~M/ bar d+ha na b+hU~M/ bi sa ra Na b+h+rU~M/ bi ra dzi na b+h+rU~M/ ka

ro b+ha ba b+h+rU~M/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro gtsug tor rgyal ba la sogs pa'i'o/ /hU~M hrIHkha rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i'o/ /oM me di ne badzrI b+ha ba badzra b+ha ban+b+ha hU~M/ sa'i'o/ /oM badzra prA kA ra Na hU~M ba~M hU~M/ ra ba'i'o/ /oM badzra pany+dza ra hU~M ya~M hU~M/ dra ba'i'o/ /oM badzra bi tA na hU~M

kha~M hU~M/ gur gyi'o/ /oM badzra sha ra dza la trA~M sa~M trA~M/ mda'i'o/ /oM badzra dzA lA na lArka hU~M hU~M hU~M/ 'od kyi'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ stong pa nyid kyi sngags so/ /oM ng+harmang+ha tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags

so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i'o/ /badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hU~M/ thig gdab pa'o/ /badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hU~M/ tshon dgye ba'i'o/ /hU~M ha~MHA dz+haiH dbab pa'i'o/ /badzra

kI la ya mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ phur bus brdung ba'i'o/ /de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sngags kyi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa/ /de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru/ /gsang ba dang ni 'jigs byed dang / /
bde mchog sogs la nga yis ni/ /las dang bcas par rab bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas mkha' 'gro

grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /las kyi cho ga shes pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni las rnams bya/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srad bu ni/ /sems med las byung byas nas su/ /byin rlabs mi bskyed rtag pa ru/ /byas te

thig ni gdab pa'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra Na bzhis brgyan pa ste/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas bklubs/ /srad bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod/ /las kyi bye brag shes pa yis/ /

blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya dgod/ /in+d+ra nI la lta bu yi/ /'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bri/ /shar du rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dkar/ /lho ru rin chen zur dgu ljang / /nub tu 'dab brgyad pad+ma dmar/ /byang du ral gri sngon po bri/ /me yi mtshams

su 'khor lo sngon/ /bden bral ut+pal dmar po dang / /rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma dmar/ /dbang ldan ut+pal ser po ste/ /rdo rje tho ba shar gyi sgo/ /lho yi sgo ru rdo rje dbyug /pad+ma'i sdong bu nub kyi sgo/ /byang sgo rdo rje kha bye ba/ /sbyor ba ldan pas

dgod par bya/ /rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /tshon rtsi dag kyang bsgom bya ste/ /rdul tshon lnga la sogs pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya/ /de nas bum pa gzung bya ba/ /rtsa ba nag nog med pa yi/ /zhabs brtan mgrin ring mchu 'phyang

ba/ lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas/ /mgul par ras kyis yang dag dkris/ /ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa/ /rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang / /spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas/ /bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ rnam rgyal bum

pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi/ lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi/ sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni/ las kun byed pas bzlas byas te/ /ku sha'i chun pos sems can che/ /'jug pa kun la gtor bar bya/ /yon dang

gtor ma mchod phul nas/ /de dag phyi grwar rab bkod de/ /g.yas su rgyal ba spyan drang ngo / /de nas lha rnams rab gnas pa'i/ bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste/ phyag rgya bral ba'i sbyor ba ni/ lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas/ /

bu mo gzugs bzang lang tshos brgyan/ /dbang thob lus rgyas thob pa mo/ /g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te/ /de yis 'khor lo sprul par bya/ /de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa phul nas bstod bya ste/ /bshang gci khu ba

khrag rnams ni/ /dung chen po ru bzhag byas te/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas mkha' 'gro grong mchog tu/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste/ /rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /pho brang

dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas slob ma de yis kyang / /me tog sngags 'dis gtor ba'o/ /oM pra tI ts+tsha badzra hoH/ /de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol/ /de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /

dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rigs su khyod skyes so/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin brlab/ /dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje pad+mo rol pa'i mchog /sngags kyi

bdag nyid shes par bya/ pA sh+ya badzra/ gang dag me tog gsang ba ste/ /de de de yi lha yang dag /de yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te/ /de yi nan tan du sgrub bo/ /dung chen bdud rtsi lnga blud de/ /dmyal ba'i chu 'dis khyod la ni/ /dam tshig 'das na

sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i/ /'thung shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /badzra ud+ka Tha/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa rnams/ /bla mas slob ma sdig bral la/ /ci lta

ba bzhin bsgrag par bya/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog /gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na/ /de ni

sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa/ /de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi/ /gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos/ /bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung / /bla ma la gus dad pa'o/ /

dge bsgom lha rnams mchod byed pa/ /gtong phod yon tan ldan pa'o/ /de nas slob ma de yis kyang / /langs te zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa/ /gos dang rgyan gyis legs par bgos/ /steng du bla re bre bar

bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang / /bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis/ /slob ma sdig dang bral ba la/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro/ /dang po rnam rgyal

bum pa dang / /de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang / /lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang / /rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis/ /skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i/ /rgyal bas bum

pa bzung nas ni/ /de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam/ /de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang / /chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya/ /de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni/ /legs par goms pa dbang thob pa/ /rgyan

gyis rab brgyan rab mdzes pa/ /btsal te bla ma la phul nas/ /de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de/ /nang gi sbas pa btus pa yi/ /gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yi/ /sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje pad+mo las drang ba/ /sbom

po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar nas/ /rkan du rdo rje gzhag par bya/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing / /kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o/ /'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ba'i/ /de dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go/ /yang na

shin tu dad ldan pa/ /gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang / /sbyor goms bla ma la ni dbul/ /bla mas byin brlabs lha mo dang / /sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya/ /de yis blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs/ /ci skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas/ /

rang gi lha dang sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun/ /mnyes byed cho gas sems brtags te/ /mngon sum bde ba rang 'byung ba/ /gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus/ /go ba'i yul de bde ba che/ /bla ma de la dbul bar

bya/ /bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du/ /ci dga' bar ni yon yang dbul/ /slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa/ /yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya/ /dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /bsgrims te de bzhin dbul bar bya/ /slob dpon

gyi ni yul gyi mchog /rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga/ /bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis/ /yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi ma dang seng ge gdan/ /yon gyi mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs/ /gser dang glang po rin chen dang / /

sring mo bla ma la dbul ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te/ /yon de yon gyi mchog yin no/ /shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /rang gi chung ma dbul bya ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs rnam dag pa/ /yon de rin po che yi rigs/ /mu tig phreng ba shin

tu mdzes/ /bu mo rin chen 'dra ba yis/ /brgyan te bla ma la dbul ba/ /yon de pad+ma'i rigs yin no/ /rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang / /chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs/ /glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

kun gyi rje/ /nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no/ /de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang / /mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag gis/ /gsum du shes bya bla ma la/ /blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis/ /ci ste bde ba kun 'dod na/ /dad

mos sems kyis dbul bar bya/ /yid la gang bsams ma phul lam/ /khas blangs de ni ma phul na/ /dmyal ba rnam gnyis su/ /nges par skyes te brlag par 'gyur/ /de bas de rnams rab phul nas/ /gsol ba dag ni rab

tu gdab/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ dkyil 'khor bdag gis mthong / /

gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de nas bla ma de yis kyang / /de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ bsgrims te yang dag brtag par bya/ /dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang / /

gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa de yi ye shes te/ /bla ma las ni thob pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //gang gi thabs

kyis rigs lnga'i don/ /rang gi don gyur kun du bzang / /'di dag gzhan la rab bde'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /yid 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /ci bder gnas la nam mkha' kun/ /sems kyis khyab par byas nas

su/ /rnam brtags e ma'o 'jig rten kun/ /sdug bsngal chos kyis kun nas gtses/ /byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams/ /kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i/ /sngags pas spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ /AHsems kyi rdul phran

cha drug rnams/ /phyogs bcu dag tu phye nas su/ /chos kyi don rnams des bsal nas/ /shin tu dri med sems dag pa/ /'das dang ma 'ongs pa yi sems/ /da ltar yang ni dmigs su med/ /gnyis med de la gnyis med med/ /nam

mkha' zhes pa'ang gnas pa med/ /de ltar kun du brtags nas su/ /'gro ba thams cad shin tu stong / /dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin/ /dngos po med par rang sems bsam/ /'gro ba 'di ni de lta bu'i/ /dngos po gang dag yod min

na/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags/ /sems nyams sems can 'byung bar bsgom/ /'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs/ /dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya/ /rin chen sems ni rmugs pa la/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis

bskul bar snang / shU n+ya tA ti yo ga pA da~M swA hA/ pra b+ha bI A kA sha ta mA pa ga ta sa ma ya/ u pa ta pa yan+ti su ga ta su ga te ga ti shrI badzra swA hA/ pU pu sta~M ha~M/ rnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog sgom pa'i sems/ /sngags

kyi de nyid bskyod byas la/ hU~M zhes pa yi gzugs su brtag /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na/ /gang phyir de ni bsgoms pas thob/ /dam pa nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ byang chub sems tshogs der bcas la/ /rnal 'byor yid kyis

kun bsams nas/ /rgyas par rnam par brtag par bya/ /yi ge b+h+rU~M gyis lha yi gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis ni brgyan/ /sgo khyud rta babs ka ba dag /dar gyi phreng bas rnam par bklubs/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dril bu'i dra ba dag gis

brgyan/ /rtag par do shal me long dang / /me tog phreng bas rgyan rnams bres/ /de yi dbus su seng ge'i gdan/ /seng ge brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /smon lam dbang gis de dag kun/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo

che/ /shar phyogs ba glang shin tu rgyas/ /lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste/ /nub phyogs su ni rma bya bshad/ /de bzhin byang phyogs nam mkha' lding / /mi bskyod khro bo bsam pa ni/ /mthing ga dkar po dmar po'i zhal/ /rdo rje phyag rgya

thugs ka na/ /mthing ga kha dog gsal la bzang / /g.yas na rin chen 'khor lo ste/ /ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na/ /'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o/ /brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsam/ /dang po yi ni stong pa nyid/ /

gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med/ /gsum pa smon pa med pa yi/ /zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya/ /phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bar bsgom/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhag nas/ /ye shes phyag rgya

snying ga nang / /dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas/ /shar gyi gnas su bsam pa ni/ /sngags pa rnam snang thub pa ste/ /dkar dang mthing ga dmar ba'i zhal/ /'khor lo phyag rgya snying ga na/ /rdo rje 'bar

sogs 'od gsal ba/ /rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na/ /ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag par bsam/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /rin chen mgon po lho phyogs na/ /ser dang mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal/ /

rin chen phyag rgya snying ga nas/ /margad lta bur snang ba'o/ /g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma g.yon na'o/ /rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa/ /rin chen char du 'bebs pa'o/ /nub phyogs gnas su dgod bya ba/ /snang ba mtha' yas

bsam pa ni/ /dmar dang mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya snying ga na/ /rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa na/ /'khor lo ral gri g.yon pa na/ /pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhag bsam/ /byang phyogs gnas su don grub ni/ /

ljang gu mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal/ /ral gri phyag rgya snying ga na/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam pa'i'o/ /pad+ma rdo rje g.yas pa na/ /'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /byang gi gnas su bsam par bya/ /sngags

pas phyag drug bsam pa ni/ /spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin/ /de yi don du rnam par bsgom/ mA ma kI yang bsam pa ni/ /ut+pal dang ni mthing 'dra ba/ /zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste/ /mi

bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o/ /chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dge ba ste/ /sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam/ /pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o/ /sgrol ma kha dog ser mo ste/ /'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /

zhal gsum phyag drug rab tu bsam/ /thogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /sgo bzhi sgo srungs dgod bya ba/ /sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed/ /gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin te/ /thub par dka' ba rta mgrin dang / /

khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bsam/ /de dag kun kyang zhal gsum pa/ /drag cing drag por gnon pa'o/ /mthing ga ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dag ni kha dog tu'o/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng thogs de bzhin no/ /

gdon rnams thams cad skrag byed pa/ /gnod sbyin srin po phra men ma/ /ma he seng ge stag rnams dang / /ba lang zhon pa rnams bzhi'o/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can/ /khro bo spyan ni kun nas bsdus/ /sngags 'di rnams kyis
bsam pa ni/ /gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa'o/ /sngags kyi de nyid rjes mthun par/ /sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su/ /sa yi snying po la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam/ /

lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /sems ni de ru zhugs par bsam/ /mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che/ /dbang po'i lam du byung nas su/ /dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan/ /bdag nyid gcig cing gcig

'gyur ba/ /skad cig gis ni brtag par bya/ /khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya/ /de la sogs pas stod par byed/ /de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs/ /rang gi snying gar rab tu gzud/ /gzugs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du/ /rnam par

snang mdzad thub pa bzhugs/ /tshor ba rin chen mgon po yin/ /mtha' yas 'od ni 'du shes su'o/ /'du byed kun du gdon mi za/ /mi bskyod pa ni phung po lngar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni/ /sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs

par bsam/ /sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du/ /de nas spyan ni gzhug bya ste/ /rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam pa ni/ /de yang spro bar gnas par bsam/ /mA ma kI yang chu yi khams/ /brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni

yid kyis bsam/ /de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du/ /gos dkar mo yang gzhug par bya/ /kun du khyab par bzhugs pa yi/ /'od rnams su ni der 'gyur ro/ /sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du/ /bzhugs

par de ni bsam par bya/ /rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /de bzhin yid mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug /de lus khong stong nyid la ni/ /rang sems yon tan bsgom pa'i sems/ /

nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid ci 'dod par/ /de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro/ /sa yi snying po bdag nyid che/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de/ /mig gi phyogs su

zhugs nas ni/ /'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas na/ /sgra rnams thams cad shes pa de/ /rna ba'i rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che/ /sna yi rnam

shes sbyor bas na/ /sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes/ /de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por rab chags pa/ /rdo rje lce yi sbyor bas su/ /ro yi dngos po myong ba des/ /skad cig gcig la de ru 'gyur/ /blo ldan sgrib

pa thams cad ni/ /rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sel/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig /me long gi ni rnam pa ltar/ /rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyor bas su/ /

skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /rnam pa bcu dang drug tu yang / /sbyor ba de ni byin brlabs nas/ /sngags bas de ni sems la gzhug /khro bo lcags kyu dpung pa yis/ /zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o/ /

lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum/ /rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par bzhag /de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag /rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ /g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brten/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de

gnas 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po dkar ba'i gzugs/ /dkar dang mthing ga dmar po'i dbu/ /stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su smra/ /rdo rje phyag rgya rjes su chags pa la/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na

badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin/ /mdun du bsams nas nam mkha' la/ /khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te/ /

dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams bzlas/ /bcom ldan mi mnyam gzhug bcing bzhugs/ /rdo rje phyag rgya thugs kar bsnams/ /g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri g.yon pa'o/ /de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni/ /ci tsam

nus par bzlas par bya/ /skyon yid kyis drangs nas ni/ /de dag thams cad snying gar gzhug /mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na/ /lus kyis ji tsam bskyod pa dang / /tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams/ /de dag sngags dang phyag rgyar

'gyur/ /rtag tu bsgom pa'i sbyor bas ni/ /de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin/ /rnal 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la/ /lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin/ /dbang po lam du gang gyur pa/ /de dang de yi ngo bo dag /shin tu mnyam

gzhag sbyor bas su/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs

pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /ye shes gces pa dri med pa/ /byang chub sems

ni rin po che/ /bla na med pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems ni lus

kyi rnam pa yin la/ lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa

'di ched du brjod do/ /kye ma kun du bzang po 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med/ /rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa yin/ /bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsung spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te/ /chos can med cing chos nyid med/ /nam mkha'

bzhin du dmigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag dngos med de/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin/ /bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i/ /byang

chub sems ni brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /dngos po skye ba med pa ste/ /dngos po ngo bo yod min pas/ /nam mkha'i go 'phang 'thob bo zhes/ /dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od

gsal ba/ /gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /sems can med cing srog kyang med/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med/ /rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub kyis

gsungs so/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa thob nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur

te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag /kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams/ /bdag med chos las legs byung ba/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa yi/ /mi g.yo yi ge

las byung zhing / /rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa/ /byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes/ /dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/

yid kyis hU~M byas rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlab/ /rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya/ /lag pa bstod de bskor ba na/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang / /byon nas drang por phyogs bcing ste/ /dam tshig mchog kyang dbul bar bya/ /

gdan rnams so sor phul nas su/ /mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs/ /sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya/ /rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba/ rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyi bdag /rnal 'byor rnam

gsum shes bya ste/ /byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang / /gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag /rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ /sngags kyi byin rlabs nga rgyal bskyed/ /rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs/ /

byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che/ /phyag rgya tshogs su brtag pa yi/ /rim gyis gzugs kyis rdzogs bya ba/ /de ni brtags pas brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /bsdu dang spro bar bya ba

las/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang / /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par/ /rnal 'byor rig pa dag gis brtag /rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag /'di

ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad/ /nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems/ /byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste/ /de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar/ /dag gyur de nas blo yis ni/ /sems la so sor brtag

par bya/ /sems la so sor brtags nas kyang / /phyi rol rang bzhin stong bar bya/ /sems tsam la ni gnas nas su/ /byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des/ /bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag /zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag /dag

pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa/ /oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi/ /yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ /rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya/ AHzhes bya ba'i spros med gsung / /sems ni hU~M zhes bya bar sprul/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus/ /

snying la gnas pa zla ba'i gzugs/ /de la rang gi yi ge ni/ /mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te/ /nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod/ /rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan

pa/ /cha shas kyi ni dra ba can/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag /de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te/ cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis bklubs/ /

de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi/ /sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma 'phro/ /yan lag bzhi pa dpung ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang / bsnyegs ma dang ni tog ldan ma/ /mtshon cha ma dang rtsed mo can/ /sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o/ /rnam

par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlab/ /kun la khyab par byed pa yi/ /sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas/ /phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste/ /dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro/ /ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la/ /

'os par byed pa'i sngags pa yi/ /'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ /pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni/ /'khor lo kun la pad+ma yi/ /ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang / /e zhes bya ba 'phro ba las/ /mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya/ /mdzes

pa'i rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par blta/ /sgeg dang glu dang gar rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang / /sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod pa bya/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /

bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ /myur ches bya ba bul ba dang / /mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /bzlas pas skyo na lag g.yas kyis/ /bsgrims nas rdo rje gsor

nas su/ /g.yon pas dril bu la gsil zhing / /rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang / /ba dan tshul du byas pas mchod/ /bzlas pa yis ni 'jug brtul nas/ /gshegs su gsol dang rang nyid 'grub/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te/ /brtan

por ci bder 'gro bar bya/ /bar chad du ni gyur na yang / /yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar bsgoms pas sgom byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i/ /byang chub de ni myur thob nas/ /zla nyi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang / /sna tshogs las

kyi thog 'dren cing / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ /rgyal byed pad+ma'i gdung brgyud can/ /gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso/ /dga' chen 'dod dgur lcags kyur 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bzhin

du kun shes shing / /dregs pa 'joms byed khro bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ /sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i/ /me ni lha yi zhal yin pas/ /

sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad/ /sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim/ /tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster/ /gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis bskongs/ /de phyir

sku gsum chos mchog gis/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad/ /gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me/ /dge ba yi ni las rnams byed/ /gdol pa'am dur khrod byung ba yi/ /me ni las rnams rab tu bsgrub/ /thab khung zlum po gru bzhi dang / /

zla gam dang ni zur gsum dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni kha khyer la/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas/ /thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni/ /pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang / /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma bzhag /ji ltar

dmigs pas bdugs nas su/ /lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste/ /dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni/ /blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin bsreg /sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su bzhag /g.yon du chu yi snod dgod do/ /las kun

byed pas bzlas nas su/ /bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya/ /ku sha rtse mo rnon po yis/ /thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya/ /me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang / /g.yas pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing / /gsang sngags 'dis

ni cho ga bzhin/ /me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo / /tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM ag+na ye A di bya A bI she A bI she ma hA shri ye

hA bya kA bya bA ha nA ya swA hA/ phyag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te/ /mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /me yi phyogs nas bong pa ni/ /gsus po che la mig gsum pa/ /gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhir ldan/ /mdog dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /

me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / /las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ /lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la/ /gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng / /g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ /mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la/ /

drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ /'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang / /thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/ /kun la lan gsum sreg blugs dbul/ /de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /'bar

ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya/ /legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab/ /bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs/ /pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i

rnam pa dang / /me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang / /'khyil pa'i mtshan mas mkhas pas brtag /des ni myur du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni/ /oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar/ /dbyangs kyi rgyud ni
