nges par zla bas 'grub par byed/ /ske tshe dug dang yang dag ldan/ /tig ta'i shing gi sbyin sreg gis/ /bsnyen pa sogs ni de bskyed nas/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa kun spyad bya/ /de la sdom pa bzung nas ni/ /nges par 'grub byed gzhan du

min/ /gsang sngags cho ga kun thob nas/ sngags pas bsnyen pa 'grub par byed/ de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi/ /sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya/ /gang nyid sdom par yang dag brjod/ /de nyid brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung / /gzhan du

nam mkha' ji srid par/ /mnar med dmyal bar kun tu 'byung / /ji srid 'tsho bar cho ga bzhin/ /slob dpon sdom pa srung ba la/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /sna tshogs 'dzin pa kun gzhi yi/ /mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /

sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub/ /zla ba gcig gis 'jig rten gsum/ /de yis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /rnam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags/ /'bum phrag drug tu bzlas nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas nas/ /zla ba nya la de 'grub

'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas/ /nges par sangs rgyas kyang thob byed/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab bkod pa/ /nges par lha rnams spyan drangs med/ /ngag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa/ /de nyid rtag tu 'bad bya'o/ /mkhas pas rab mchog

sangs rgyas la/ /sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing byas nas/ /de rnams sngags ni bzlas nas ni/ /rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya/ /sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang / /gal te sangs rgyas bu mo'ang rung / /bzung nas nye bar longs spyad bya/ /ji srid yid ni

tshim par 'gyur/ /dug dang ske tshe yang dag ldan/ /yungs kar til mar bsres pa dang / /rus pa rdo bar yang dag ldan/ /ma tri traM de phye mar bya/ /bshang dang gci ba rab bcug nas/ /brtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis/ /zur gsum mgrin pa'i

me la bsreg /nges par myur du 'grub par byed/ /lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni/ /gang gis 'di ni rab gsal byed/ /gal te 'dir ni sangs rgyas rung / /gang de thal bar byed par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo phyed la yang / /nyi ma'i gung la sbyin sreg

bya/ /bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang / /sbyin byed gzhan du nam yang min/ /gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig /rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'das na ni/ /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /byang chub sems ni rang gis gsungs/ /rengs dang

'bebs pa dang por grags/ /gnyis pas zhes bya bar brjod/ /gsum pa lha yi mchog yin no/ /bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang / /phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin/ snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ bya ba myur du 'grub par byed/ reg pa sna

tshogs sogs dang gnas/ /skyed mos tshal dang dga' ston che/ /dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni/ /bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam/ /ga la te brgya byin nam tshangs pa/ /sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che/ /cho ga shes pas zhag bdun gyis/ /

'joms 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cho ga shes pas khrag gis byugs/ /rang nyid rang gi lus su bya/ /skra grol gtsug tor gyur nas ni/ /mi sdug ma che gtsigs 'jigs par byed/ /dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor/ /rang gis de yi ming bri bya/ /

stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin byed/ /cho ga shes pas gsher ba'i gos/ /khro bo'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas/ /ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'joms/ /khyab 'jug lha min la

sogs lha/ /rkang par byas nas brtsam par bya/ /cho ga shes pas nyin bdun gyis/ /khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sngags thams cad 'chad bas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gsang ba chen po'i le'u

bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i le'u gsungs so/ /bshang dang gci ba bza' bar bya/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal de

nyid ni/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /rma dgu las ni yang dag byung / /'ga' zhig tu ni bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /'dod chags bza' bar bya ba ni/ /phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin/ /

de ni rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /zhe sdang bza' bar bya ba ni/ /rdo rje ye shes rab rtogs byed/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /gti mug bza' bar bya ba ni/ /ye shes thams cad rtogs pa po/ /

de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ /bde sdug bza' bar bya ba ni/ /slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi/ slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ chos dang chos min

bza' bar bya/ de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog de nyid ston pa po/ /ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhig tu/ /sems can khams ni bza' bar bya/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /ji srid 'tsho bar smad pa yi/ /

bya ba thams cad mi bya'o/ /de nyid pad+ma 'chang rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar thob nas rdo rje 'chang thams cad

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar te gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na/ gzhan lta ci smos zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u bstan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi

ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /byin rlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis/ /de nyid sna tshogs rnam bsgom pa/ /cho ga shes pas de steng du/ /yi ge bzhi ni rnam bsgom pa/ /bdag nyid dbus su son byas nas/ /rang gi gzugs su gzugs

mtshon pa/ /rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung / /cho ga shes pas kun dgang bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /sgom pa 'di nyid rab sgrub byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i

dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bzhi lnga'i yi ge rnam bsgoms nas/ /yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par/ /oM yig ser po dang mtshungs pa/ /'od zer lnga po kun du 'khrugs/ /der son bdag nyid sngags pas sgom/ /

dbus su hU~M yig yang dag sbyor/ /rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya/ /'dzam bu rA da mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par gyis/ /sangs rgyas gzugs

brnyan de rnams su/ /'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar/ /bsams nas cho ga shes pas der/ /bsdus nas de la ltung bar bya/ /zla ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi/ /mnyam

med gzugs ni bskyed nas ni/ /gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba/ /cod pan lnga ni 'dzin pa po/ /sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /dkyil 'khor du bzhugs bsams nas ni/ /de yi

sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas/ /gtsug tor de yi bzlas pa bya/ /khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang / /rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang / /bskyed pa'i cho gar 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo

rje gsum kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas de thams cad/ /oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ /

'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i/ hU~M yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms

nas/ 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ bsams nas de yi thugs ka ru/ /zla bar sngags kyi yi ge bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan

'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas/ /dbus su ha~M yig sgom pa ni/ /ngos su rang gi gzugs ltar byas/ /rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya/ /dbus su chos 'chang bsams nas ni/ /pad+ma

rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa/ /phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su rnam bsgom pa/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //

cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas/ /ngos su ha~M yig yang dag sbyar/ /dbus su rang gi rnam pa bsgom/ /'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'dod mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya/ /lag tu mdung rtse gsum bsgoms nas/ de yi snying gar

dkyil 'khor dgod/ chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas/ /phyi nas bya ba yang dag brtsam/ /sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //yang na brtul zhugs can gyis ni/ /bsdu

bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya/ /gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang / /rig pa'i rgyal po rigs bcas pas/ /las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags/ /bzhin du de bzlas bya/ /dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni/ /ngos su lha

rnams dgod par bya/ /snying po sbyor ba de rnams su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge mchod bsgoms nas/ /de yis lha rnams rnam bsgom pa//thams cad kyi ni lag par ni//rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma bsgom/ /mdung

dang yid bzhin nor bu yang / /bsgoms nas myur du sgrub bar byed/ /sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis/ /ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor/ /dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya/ /bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni/ /

rang gi lus la dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/ /'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog /dus rnams kun du rnam bsgoms nas/ /nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur/ /cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

la dgod bya/ /rigs kyi dbang byug rnam bsgoms nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni/ /thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di/ /bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrubs na/ /yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yi

rang gi sngags kyi mchog /phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po/ /cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya/ /myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min/ /phyag rgya chen por rab bsgoms nas/ /nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni/ /dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs

pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor las ngos su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya/ /rin chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru/ /sbrang rtsi mar

gyis rab tu dgang / /sngags kyi yi ge rnam bsgoms nas/ /bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su hU~M gi yi ge 'gengs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'thibs pa ni/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed/ /de la gnas pas

lha yi gzugs/ /tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas/ /cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis/ /gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis

pa'i/ /ut+pal chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che/ /ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /A li bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par

'gyur/ /sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i/ /rtse gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa/ /cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /pad+ma las kyi rdo rje dang / /yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can/ /bdag po'i sngags ni

yang dag bskyed/ /myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min/ /'khor lo de bzhin pad rdo rje/ /bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las/ /sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen po mdung sogs bcas/ /'bar ba'i

phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi/ /rjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas/ /ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems/ /'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun du 'khrugs/ /khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed/ /khro bar byed pa'i khyad par bya/ /

pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /sgom pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyug pa tho ba dgra sta dang / /zhags pa paT+Ti sa sgom pa'i/ /cho gas bsgom par byas

nas ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang / /ye shes dngos grub can du brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces

gsungs so/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /cho ga shes pas sbyin sreg bya/ /de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las/ /rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed/ /oM

yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis/ /sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor zlum/ /rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog /dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o/ /zhi la me yi dbus son par/ /

bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya/ /de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs/ /rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung / /kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas/ /me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /

sngags pas lce yi dbus son par/ hU~M yig de yis bsam par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbrang / /mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad/ /mar khu chen po'i bye brag las/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rigs

su brjod/ /zhi la rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /snying ga'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas/ /'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che/ /pad+ma'i yon tan 'byung ba la/ /

gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog go/ /gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can/ /las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod byas nas/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su

med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po/ /'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po/ /sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs/ /de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig

ye shes sangs rgyas kun/ /rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od/ a~M yig ye shes dbye ba yis/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod pan longs spyod pa/ /kha dog dkar po shin

tu mdzes/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa/ /me stag 'thibs pas kun du 'khrugs/ /rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs/ /brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /cod pan du ni rdo rje sems/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i

gzhi/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go/ /sku yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis/ /mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las/ /rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas/ /thod pa can gyi gtso bor brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi 'di ye shes/ /rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba

rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya/ /nag po shin tu rnam 'gyur khros/ /ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs/ /me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba ste/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs

par byed/ /phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas/ /dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor las/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub/ /rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas/ /dngos grub

thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'chang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba

'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /dmar po 'dod chags 'dzin pa 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong bar/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/ /

de yi cho ga bsgom pa ni/ /'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub/ /rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub/ /sgom pa yang ni myur 'grub byed/ /chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /'dod

pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/ /gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya/ /khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog /spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs/ /me stag tshogs ni kun du 'khrugs/ /phyag bzhi

par ni cho ga yis/ /bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub/ /rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /thar pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sems

dpas sprul pa yin/ /rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba/ /de la lha nyid rab tu grags/ /slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de

skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam/ /yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis/ rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam/ /brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos/ /thams cad las can sngags kyis dang / /gtsug tor sngags kyis

rnam bsgom bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas/ /rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags/ /rgyas pa can la

rigs kyi sngags/ /sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga las/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya/ /thams cad las can sngags kyis ni/ /mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed/ /skrod par byed pa'i cho ga las/ /gtsug

tor du ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags shes pas ni phur gdab sogs/ /pho nya pho nya mo bsam bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /'od zer lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /rtog pas de la bsgom par bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa

nyid/ /sgom pa rnams su shes par bya/ /rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam sgom pa'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams

kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /steng du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go/ /

dkar nag dmar po'i sbyor ba las/ /bsam gtan thams cad du brtag bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun tu bzlas par bya/ hU~M yig oM yig dbye ba yis/ swA hA hU~M yig gzhan gyi gzugs/ /skyed pa'i cho ga byas

nas ni/ /bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya/ /rigs gsum la yang hU~M yig dang / /oM yig ye shes rigs mchog yin/ /sngags kyi yi ge la sogs rnams/ /dpral bar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang

gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /spro ba dang ni gnas par bya/ /'di ni dngos grub tshul bstan pa'o/ /sgrub par rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /

nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la/ /'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go/ /bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la/ /bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su rab bsgrub pa/ /gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /me stag 'thibs pas

'khrugs pa yi/ /rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o/ /grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun/ /'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob/ /de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya/ /dngos grub chen po'i

yon tan 'byung / /bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig

pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi gsung gi

lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ston par mdzad do/ /gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med/ /ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /kun nas ye shes bdag med pa/ /gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan/ /mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /

kun nas 'dod pa yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa/ /rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob/ /byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab

gzhug mdzad/ /rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog /sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos sku thar pa chen po ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che/ /sems can kun dgyes byed pa po/ /dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i

dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ci ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /the tshom med par mnyam par shes/ /sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya/ /the tshom med par 'du shes pa/ /chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya/ /the tshom med par 'du shes pa/ /

'dus byas thams cad 'dod par bya/ /'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la dad

par ci ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'di blta bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de

rnams ya mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong / /rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyis/ /ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyung nas shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyis gang bar mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams

byon nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob/ /byang chub sems dpas snying po byin/ /nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i/ /rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la/ /spros pa dag ni yod ma yin/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye

shes kyis/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to/ /sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag

na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom bu nges par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang ga thugs su zhugs par mdzad do/ /de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //

'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //mkhan chen thar pa lo ts+tsha ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyong stod smon 'gro'i gtsug

lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda

sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan pa'o/ /rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi/ /

chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang / /dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags/ /'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang / /rgya dpe'i dpe dpang ma rnyed cing / /don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la/ /saM skr-i ta la ma byang bas/ /sgra don ji

bzhin ma 'byor ba'i/ /nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing / /phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ /ma dag shes na bcos par zhu/ /rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las/ /dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa/ /de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun/ /

rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig /de nas 'di la dbu nas shog lto gcig ma tshang bas rnyed na bsgyur bar bya'o/ /'di dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba gcig tu 'dod pa yang dag par 'khrul bar snang ngo / /'dis 'khor ba

sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po myur du skems par gyur cig /rgyud 'di la kun mkhyen gnyis pa/ bu ston zhabs kyi 'gyur mi 'dra ba gnyis 'dug pa las/ 'di ni phyis 'gyur bde ba de nyid las bris pa yin la/ rgya dpe zugs pa'i bar
skabs nas/ tshigs bcad rkang pa re re gnyis gnyis tsam gyi bar la/ hor kong ma tshang ba rnams su rgya gram gyi mtshan ma btab yod par shes par bya'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba ta thA ga tagu h+ya tan+t+ra yo ga ma hA rA dzA dwa ya sa ma tA bi dza ya nA ma badzra shrI wa ra ma hA kalpA di/ bod skad du/ dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid

gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje dpal mchog chen po brtag pa dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa yi/ /dus gcig tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi ni/ /b+ha ga la ni snyoms par zhugs/ /gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba/ /gsang ba chen po 'di lta ste/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi

bdag /gsang ba pa rnams ma lus pa'i/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /byang chub sems kyi snying po che/ /chos kun mnyam pa nyid dgongs pa'i/ /mnyam nyid gnyis su med pa'i gnas/ /spyod pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

zhugs te/ /de nyid ngang la gnas pa yis/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med la/ /gzigs shing mi phyed rdo rje las/ /ma g.yos lham me lhang nger gnas/ /mi 'gyur gsang ba 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig pa'i

lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /sna tshogs 'khor rnams 'dus pa ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs rnams las/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun tu bzang pos gsol ba btab/ /rang gi stan las langs nas ni/ /bla gos phrag bar gzar

gyur pas/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar te spyis btud nas/ /gsang ba zhes ni gang la bya/ /ches gsang ba ni ji lta bu/ /gsang ba chen po ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /

'khor rnams kun la rjes brtse bas/ /rdo rje gsang ba kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni snang ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos bdag nyid/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus dang spros pa'i tshul/ /bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad/ /nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs las/ /gsang ba bya ba spyod pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa'i mdo sde las/ /

gsang ba rnal 'byor rgyud du grags/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim shes pas/ /gsang chen rnal 'byor bla med rgyud/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /stong pa snying rje dbyer med phyir/ /bde chen byang chub sems mchog gsang / /de nyid dpal

ldan 'dus pa ste/ /zab dang rgya che'i snying po nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /gnyis med mnyam pa ro gcig pas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'di ni/ /thun mong ma yin rgyal po che/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/ /legs

so legs so sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang po legs par nyon/ /rgyud rnams kun du ma bshad cing / /khyad par dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rim pa bla na med pa'i chos/ /snying po khyod la bstan par bya/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi

gsang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems mchog bla na med/ /rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i mchog /'dod chags can gyi skyes bu rnams/ /rab tu gdul ba'i don ched du/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa mchog gi chos/ /gzhung nyung

rtogs par sla ba'i don/ /'dus pa chen po rdo rje'i tshig /rtogs dka' sangs rgyas spyod yul pas/ /sdom pa gsang ba rgyas gdab phyir/ /dri med ye shes 'byung gnas gter/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /

rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i yul/ /thabs las ma lus sangs rgyas 'byung / /'di nyid gsang ba'i chos nyid can/ /sku yi gsang ba ma skyes pa/ /sems can lus dang snang ba khyab/ /gsung gi gsang ba ma 'gags pas/ /thams cad

sgra dang dbyer mi phyed/ /thugs kyi gsang ba skye ba med/ /phyag rgya chen po lam gyi mchog /'khor 'das chos dang ro gcig pas/ /sbas pa gsang ba mi shes rnams/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /dri mas khebs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /

'gro ba lnga sogs dag tu 'khod/ /gsang ba'i yi ge'i don ma mthong / /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar/ /ka kha ga mtha' na dz+ha'i mtha'/ /da d+ha'i

mtha' dang ma mthar bcas/ /de de rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum/ /thog mtha' gsang ba e dang ba~M/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i yi ge'i gnas/ /'byung dang 'byung las g+hur sgrar bcas/ /'dus pa 'di ni sbas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud tshul sna tshogs rnams/ /

rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa yis/ /du ma nyid du dbang bskur bas/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod pa yi/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i phung po yin/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi/ /khyad par rim pa gang gis ni/ /mdo don mngon par bsdus pa

yin/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH/ a ni skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma'i bar/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i chos rnams kyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung

rab mchog /snying po'i yan lag dag tu bshad/ /thub pa chen pos chos phung po/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa las/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i snod yin te/ /de bas 'di ni rgyud kyi rtsa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las

rdo rje sogs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa ni/ /snying po kun las 'di bsdus yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam

par rgyal ba las chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi

sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog rnams kyis/ /nges par bgrod pa'i lam gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i gsung gis bka' stsal don/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed don bshad gsol/ /ces gsol ba btab pas rdo rje 'dzin pa

chen pos ji lta bar mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi sgo la 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spros dang bral/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni/ /rang 'byung dag par 'char ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub kyi/ /'bras bu nyams snang sna tshogs pa'o/ /

khams gsum sems can thams cad la/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /phrin las dag pa'i stobs su 'char/ /de

nyid gzhan du mi rnyed de/ /shes rgyud gcig gis bsdus pa'i phyir/ /'brel ba can du brjod par bya/ /khyad par chos ni brtag dka' ba'o/ /stong gsum zhing 'di sprul pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgya che 'jig rten khams/ /gsal ba dri ma med pa ste/ /dag

pa rang 'byung ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs chos nyid gcig pa las/ /kun du khyab pa dga' ba'i gzugs/ /rang bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku/ /spro bsdu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /phyogs bcu 'od kyi phreng ba yi/ /snang bas rgyas pa 'phro

zhing 'khrugs/ /gsal dang gsal min gnyis ldan pa'i/ /rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ldan pas/ /phyogs rnams kun du dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul che/ /rigs lngar 'byung ba rnams dang ni/ /phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa

yi/ /lha rnams thams cad 'byung ba ni/ /yang dag ting 'dzin dbye ba yis/ /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang / /yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig ste/ /rigs lngar gyur pa 'di dag gis/ /'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pas/ /dkyil

'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dag dang ma dag gyur pa rnams/ /'dir ni rigs la gnas pa ste/ /rags dang phra ba'i cha brten pas/ /lus sems chos ni rab tu dbye/ /lus ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam par 'byung / /

ngag ni brag ca lta bu ste/ /dbyer med rdo rje lhan cig skyes/ /rten dang brten pa dbyer med pas/ /thams cad chos nyid sems la gnas/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su btags/ /snod bcud snang ba'i yul rnams dang / /brtan g.yo khams

gsum rang rig pa/ /srid gsum ma lus chos nyid de'i/ /snang ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / /thams cad chos nyid bag chags 'byung / /rgyu las 'bras bu bskyed pa'i phyir/ /gcig las du ma'i chos kun shar/ /

du ma nyid du dmigs med de/ /thams cad stong phyir ma skyes pa'o/ /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa rnams rab tu dga' zhing

yi rangs te/ bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa thob nas lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs rdo rje la rab tu gnas par gyur nas ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang lus sgyu mar grub pa dag /nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med/ /dbang

po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /stong pa nyid ni rdo rje'i sku/ /lus ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /dag pa chen po ye shes lus/ /ngag ni brag ca'i sgra dang mtshungs/ /brjod pa'i dus na stong pa ste/ /pi wang sgra bzhin rten 'brel gyis/ /rang

grag brjod pa tha snyad tsam/ /sems ni rang 'byung dag pa la/ /ye shes chen po rang gnas nyid/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa bral ba las/ /snang ba tsam du'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos chos thams cad la zab

pa'i tshul la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla na med pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ ma skyes mi 'gag rol par gang 'byung ba/ /byang chub sems ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /thabs dang

shes rab gnyis med ston pa'i sku/ /sgyu 'phrul rgyal po bde chen 'di nyid de/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /mtshan ma med cing mi 'gyur 'ja' tshon ltar/ /gnyis med gnyis su med min mnyam pa'i sku/ /shin tu dri med nam

mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika /b+h+rU~M dzi na dzika /trA~M rat+na d+h+r-ika /hrIHa ro lika /kha~M pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika /la~M dwe Sha ra ti/ ma~M mo ha ra ti/ pa~M rA ga ra ti/ ta~M badzra ra ti/ ya ya mAn+ta kr-ita/ ma pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ ta pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ ka big+h+na'an+ta kr-ita/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma

dang / /'khor lo bsnams pa'i 'od 'phro ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs tshul lha rnams kun/ /yab yum bde ba nyid du bzhugs/ /dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung

thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rdo rje gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i

ye shes ston par mdzad pa'i phyir/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis chos thams cad las rnam par rtog pa med cing rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor 'dus pa rnams la yang dag pa'i snang ba ston

par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bla ma nyid du ston par mdzad/ /sngags kyi spyod pa spyod mchog gis/ /gsang ba'i

tshul 'di spyad pa na/ /gang spyod de yis ye shes 'thob/ /tshul 'di shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam 'gyur bas/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las/ /yang dag sku ni rab tu 'byung / /

oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+ha rmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ /dag pa'i sngags kyi sgra rnams dang / /sngags dang rlung du sbyar ba nyid/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i ye shes

lnga/ /chos rnams yi ge stong par brjod/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rgyal mchog ni/ /zhe sdang can gyi gdul bya la/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /gtum zhing gdug pa thams cad 'dul/ /dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen gyis/ /nga rgyal can gyi

gdul bya rnams/ /rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /ser snas 'jungs pa thams cad btul/ /tshe dpag med kyis 'od byed kyis/ /'dod chags kyis ni bcings pa rnams/ /pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sred pa can gyi gdug pa

btul/ thogs med grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ shin tu phrag dog che rnams la/ las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sems can ma rungs las can btul/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor yangs pas ni/ /rmongs dang ma rungs mche ba can/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /gti mug mun par tshud rnams btul/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid rigs ni lnga ru bshad/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i sbyor bas ni/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes mchog /khru ni bcu

gnyis tshad mnyam pa/ /ngos bzhi dag la mnyam pa yis/ /bcu gnyis sa ni mngon rdzogs pas/ /bcu gsum pa la gnas pa yin/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /khru ni nyi shu mnyam pa ste/ /ngos re la yang lnga lngar brjod/ /rlung bcu

sngags bcur gnas pa ni/ /blo gros ldan pas shes bya ste/ /de brjod pas ni mchog tu brjod/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug /ngos rer bzhi bzhir ldan pa las/ /bden pa bcu drug rtogs pa yis/ /ye shes skad cig de snyed do/ /mi

bskyod rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /tshe dpag med pa'i snang ba dang / /rdo rje rtag pa chen po ste/ /bsdus pa sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /lus ngag yid ni rnam dag phyir/ /yang dag don du snang ba'o/ /gcig nas gsum dang rigs lnga ste/ dgu dang bcu gsum

nyi shu lnga/ sum cu rtsa gcig bar dag tu/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ /rigs lnga dag las 'byung ba ni/ /de re nyi shur dbye ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid las/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar yang dag pas/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya ru 'gyur/ /

de bzhin gshegs tshogs mtha' yas pas/ /'dus pa chen po 'dir brjod byas/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams shes par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor

chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla na med par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad chos ni ston pa la/ /gsang ba chen

po rnam par rgyal/ /rgyud 'di yang dag ston par mdzad/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog /sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rgya mtshor gyur/ /phung po lnga rnams sangs rgyas

sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sra ba sa yi khams yin te/ /zhu ba chu yi khams su 'dod/ /dro ba me yi khams yin te/ /rgyu ba rlung du rab tu bsgrags/ /mi shigs pa ni thig ler gsungs/ /bde ba nam mkha'i khams

yin no/ /gzugs ni thogs par bcas pa ste/ /tshor ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /'du shes dmigs par bcas pa ste/ /'du byed lus ngag yid sbyor ba/ /rnam shes sgyu mas don sgrub byed/ /reg pa las ni sa yin te/ /lha mo spyan du shes

par bya/ /dro ba me ru rab tu grags/ /gos dkar mor ni shes par bya/ /sdud par byed pa chu yin pas/ /mA ma kI yi ngo bor 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i bya ba bskyod pa rlung / /sgrol ma'i ngo bor brjod par bya/ /thig le snang byed bde skyong ma/ /bde ba

rdo rje reg bya ma/ /de nyid bde chen ye shes ni/ /skad cig tsam du nyams myong bas/ /phral du yid ches byed yin te/ /log rtog ma lus 'joms pa po/ /dngos dang dngos med log rtog dag /bgags nas rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bskal

pa stong phrag du mar yang / /gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed/ /de yang cung zad goms byas pas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas

yang dag pa'i ye shes khyad par du gyur pa bla na med pa las mngon du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching ba rnams/ /de nyid

shes pas grol gyur te/ /'di la nges par 'khor ba yi/ /rgya mtsho'i nang nas dri med 'thob/ /sems can rnams kyi ye shes kyis/ /rgyud ni nges par grol 'gyur ba/ /khyad par las ni rtogs pas na/ /tshe 'dir sangs rgyas gnas su 'gro/ /gang

du yang dag bla ma yi/ /drin gyi ye shes yan lag bdun/ /phra ba'i yon tan mngon du byed/ /sku gsum dbyer med la phyag 'tshal/ /'di ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /tshe 'dir 'bras bu thob pas na/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /dpa'

bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/ /ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te/ /don kun sgrub par byed pa'o/ /dga' dang dga' bral dag gi dbus/ /mtshan nyid dmigs pa brtan par gyis/ /thun nam zla phyed zla ba lo/ /bskal par ye shes che la

sbyor/ /mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgrib pa rang dag lhun gyis grub/ /bde ba chen po mngon byas pas/ /stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/ /de las byung

ba'i thabs bstan pas/ /bde ba'i khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu yi yan lag bdun 'byung ba/ /bla mas brten pa'i rten 'brel gyis/ /ye shes dbab pas sbas pa'i tshul/ /ye shes mthong ba lus dang ngag /rtags 'char sgrib pa rang bdag

ste/ /byin gyis brlabs las 'char ba yin/ /bla ma slob ma'i khyad par dag /ye shes dbang dang cung zad kyis/ /ye shes mthong ba'i spyod yul yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshan dpe ni/ /blo la gsal bar rang lus la/ /mtshan dang

dpe byad ldan par bzhugs/ /kha sbyar e ba~M rnam pa gnyis/ /thabs dang shes rab rtsa yi gnas/ /bde ba chen po thig le yis/ /'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes can/ /snying rje chen po tshad med bdud rtsi'i rtsa/ /rgyun mi 'chad

par bde ba'i byang sems 'bab/ /phrin las stobs ni gzhan don thogs pa med/ /de dag don du yang dag rang bzhin med/ /stong nyid rtogs pas dngos la chags mi 'gyur/ /'di ni rgyu yi dus zhes bya ba ste/ /lam gyi dus ni dbang gi ye shes te/ /

mtshan ldan rig ma yongs su dag pa la/ /sa phyogs gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa'am/ /rgyal nyid skyes gzhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su/ /bshang gci chu la sogs pa byug pa'am/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya/ /nu ma'i dbus bar spyi gtsug

mtha' yi bar/ /cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar/ /lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs lnga rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya/ /rab tu dge ba'i chos ni dri ma med/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /thabs dang shes rab

sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /bde chen mchog tu dag pa 'dir thob byed/ /'bras bu'i yan lag bdun ni tha mar brjod/ /rang byin brlab pa'i lam gyis gang thob pa/ /mtshungs med 'dren pa bla med ngo bo nyid/ /nus pa brtan dang rdzogs pa mngon gyur

pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang / /gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan spras pa/ /cho ga 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid du bya/ /'grub pa'i 'bras bu nus pa brtan pa yis/ /tshe

'dir skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i don

bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par snang ba'i ye shes rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsang ba 'di lta bu gsungs so/ /'khor ba dag la mi gnas pa'i/ /ye shes rdo rje khyod

nyon cig /dngos po dngos min dang bral ba/ /dngos po gnyis ka spong ba ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i chos zhes bya/ /dag dang ma dag spang byar med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i bar du yang / /dbus su mnyam par gnas pa yis/ gtsang dang

mi gtsang dbus su ni/ /ma 'dres pa de mnyam par sbyor/ /rten dang brten can dbus su ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyal ba 'byung / /lus ni mnyam par gnas pa dang / /ngag dang sems kyang mnyam gyur pas/ /mnyam par lta ba mthong ba rnams/ /

ye shes mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba zhes gsungs so/ /kun du bzang po sems dpa' che/ /ji ltar mnyam par lta ba dang / /gnyis su med pa'i chos dag ni/ /bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes

rang bzhin gnyis med chos/ /du ma ma yin gcig min te/ /gsang ba'i rim pa bla na med/ /dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lam gyi rim pa rab sbyor bas/ /cig car 'jug pa phyag rgya che/ /zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa nyid/ /bde ba chen por rtogs

par bya/ /chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/ /ting 'dzin ro mnyam rdo rje yis/ /gsang chen gnyis med rgyal ba 'dir/ /gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung / /mi shigs thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /rang lus rdo rje'i rang

bzhin la/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /sa lam rdzogs tshul lugs 'byung dang / /lugs las bzlog pa rim min pas/ /rgyud du sbas pa rnams gsal ba/ /de nyid nges par bstan pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la mngon sangs rgyas/ /

zhes gsungs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu rmad du byung ba'i tshul zab mo la ngo mtshar skyes te slar gsol pa/ ye shes thob pa'i lus can dag /tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas pa/ /'di nyid rnal 'byor ji lta bu/ /mi gtsang lus las ji ltar

'gyur/ /rnam rtog ngan pa'i bag chags kyis/ /dri mas bslad pas 'di ma mchis/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'chang gis der bstan pa/ /dri ma bag chags bzlog bya'i phyir/ /lam gnyis rang gi gsang ba'i chos/ /'dir ni rtog pa ngan

pa'i tshogs/ /rags pa dang ni phra ba'i chos/ /rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yis/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la/ /blo dang ldan pas legs bltas te/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni sbyang bar bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /slob ma yongs

su smin byas shing / /ye shes rgyud la bskyed pa yis/ /cig car lam gyi stobs kyis ni/ /'dir ni yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /goms pa chung ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /yon tan mthun snang ma gyur te/ /dri nga'i lus ni rgyal ba'i sku/ /sems ni

dri med pad+ma la/ /skyon gyi 'dam pas ma gos so/ /ji ltar 'dam pa'i lus dag las/ /ye shes lus ni rang dgar 'byung / /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor lam/ /rdzogs pas gnas lugs mngon byas te/ /ye shes spyod pas rnam sbyangs pas/ /

shin tu dri med dag par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /thabs kyi myu gu dag gis ni/ /ban+du ka ni rgyas pa bzhin/ /sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/ /yon tan dri med de nyid kyi/ /me tog rgyas pa'i chu skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje theg par sbas pa yi/ /

rnal 'byor mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /bden gnyis zung 'jug rtogs pa las/ /spros bral mtha' dang bral ba'i chos/ /sgom pa'i lam zhes sa rnams bgrod/ /skad cig ye shes 'char tshul la/ /gom pa goms pa'i lam gyur pas/ /sku bzhi'i go

'phang mngon du byed/ /ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams

cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po la sogs pa rnams bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang dang ba khyad par can thob nas stan las langs te/ phyag dang bskor ba du ma byas te ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang 'byung rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /rdo rje

theg pa gsang ba las/ /phyi ma'i dus na gang byung pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams de bzhin gshegs/ /shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan dus dag tu/ /rdo rje'i theg pa gang 'dzin pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje sku gsung

thugs la nges gnas pas/ /byang chub sems mchog rnams la rtag mchod byed/ /zhes gsungs te/ me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las phyag rgya chen po nges par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /

thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa thams cad la/ /mchog ni ston phyir yang dag bzhugs/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog /e ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa/ /e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba/ /e ma'o rdo rje rnam par rgyal/ /

ston ka'i nam mkha' sprin med pa/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun gsal ltar/ /gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes ni/ /bdag gzhan bcas pas snang ba'o/ /ston dus sprin med nam mkha' la/ /nyi ma gsal bar shar ba bzhin/ /

thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa ni/ /don dang sems bcas snang bar byed/ /sprin med mkha' dang mun lta bu/ /snang byed ye shes goms byed pas/ /rang rig rtsal las grub pa yi/ /sgyu ma'i lus ni len par byed/ /de yang yid kyi lus ldan pa'i/ /

rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas/ /mthar ni rang gnas bde bar 'gro/ /sgyu ma'i lus tsam la brten la/ /ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig gis/ /dngos po thams cad bcom nas ni/ /de nas dag

pa'i ngang du gnas/ /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /snang ba thams cad nub byas nas/ /rang 'od rig ma dbyings kyi dang / /snang ba'i ye shes khyab par 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa yi/ /rnam rtog dra ba bsal nas ni/ /bdag med

dmigs pa med pa ru/ /mnyam nyid ye shes khyab par byed/ /snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba tsam yang 'dzin med par/ /yang dang yang du don dam pa'i/ /bden pa mngon du byed pa can/ /'ja' tshon lus kyis 'bad med pa'i/ /'dod pa thams

cad nam mkha' las/ /'bad med par ni stsol 'gyur te/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho/ /rdo rje 'od kyi lus bzung nas/ /bdag dang gzhan don sgrub 'gyur la/ /dmigs pa thams cad zad byed pas/ /bgrod med gnas su bde bar

'gyur/ /rang 'od ye shes ldan pa'i sku/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du mtha' mi dmigs/ /stong pa gsum la 'das pa po/ /thogs med snying rje 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po sa ni chu la thim/ /chu yang me la thim 'gyur te/ /me ni rlung la thim gyur nas/ /

rlung yang rnam par shes la thim/ /rnam shes bzung ba de nyid ni/ /'od gsal bar yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /dang po sgyu ma lta bu la/ /dang po smig rgyu de nyid kyang / /'od zer lnga dang ldan par mthong / /gnyis par zla ba lta bu dang / /gsum par nyi ma lta bu dang / /

bzhi par mun pa lta bu la/ /lnga pa sprin med nam mkha' las/ /mi rtog mtha' dbus med par 'char/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs la sogs pa'i/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams brgyan pa/ /bden gnyis sbyor ba zung 'jug sku/ /bde ba chen po des thob 'gyur/ /

mkha' 'dra chos sku stong pa las/ /rtog med ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/ /tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis/ /'bar dang bral bar lhun gyis grub/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku lus ni/ /'bad pa med par sprul pa'i sku/ /mtha' med rdul bral ji bzhin

pas/ /sems can don kun sgrub par mdzad/ /gang dag gang gis 'dul gyur pa/ /de de bzhin du so sor snang / /mos pa'i dbang gis tha dad par/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /lhun grub bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang snang rig mas nyer

brgyan pa'i/ /'og min gnas su dus rtag tu/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas bzhugs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ltar/ /'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /bde ba che las de 'byung 'gyur/ /rim pa thams

cad kun rdzogs pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid du gnas sems kyis/ /khams gsum pa rnams 'jig byed pa/ /thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen

po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje che/ /dbyer med bde ba ston pa pos/ /gsung ni 'di skad

bka' stsal to/ /mnyam nyid ye shes stong pa yis/ /bdag nyid gzugs ni sbyang bar bya/ /mnyam nyid gnas pas thams cad du/ /ye shes can gyis sgom gyur pa/ /'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i yi ge bder gyur pa/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen ni/ /sems can kun gyi lus la gnas/ /de nyid ye shes snang ba po/ /ko ta k+Sh+ya/ ko ta wa/ ko ta k+Sh+ya wa d+ha/ ko ta ba sha/ ku ti d+ha ri/ ko la k+Sh+ya/ ko la wa/ kol lo wa/ ko la wa shu/ ko la tASh+Tha/ gnas bcu sangs

rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /thabs dang lam gyi khyad par sku gsung thugs/ /lta ba sgrub pa spyod tshul bla na med/ /'bras bu byang chub sems kyi dbang bsgyur bas/ /stobs bcu rdzogs pa gang yin rnal 'byor che/ /snying po 'di ni rgyud rnams kun du sbas/ /dngos

por 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams/ /dngos po'i rnal 'byor 'jig 'gyur ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i gdan dag bsam par bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor can/ /bla

ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag /rgyal po rol pas bsam par bya/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams la/ /ye shes chen po'i dngos grub gsol/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis/ /shes rab 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur/ /'od zer 'bar ba ma bu ru/ /dngos

pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mchod pa'i mtshan nyid yongs ldan par/ /stong pa nyid du mnyam gnas pas/ /gnyis su med pa rnam rgyal ba/ /lhag pa'i lha ni bskyed bya ste/ /'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas bsgoms pa yis/ /

'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /mnyam med sngags ni bzlas nas su/ /sgrub po bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub/ /zla ba gcig grangs sngags kyis ni/ /khams gsum 'grub par the tshom med/ /rnam shes las ni sngags 'byung ba/ /mtshan nyid drug ldan

bzlas nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas/ /zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur/ /de la brtul zhugs spyad pa med/ /sngags med bgrang phreng 'dzin pa med/ /gzung dang sbyang ba sna tshogs dag /gcig nas gcig tu ldog 'gyur te/ /ya yi don

gyis gang yang rung / /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni/ /ra la sogs pa gsum po nyid/ /rim pas 'gro don la 'jug bya/ /me dang rlung dang dbang tshon dang / /chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor ru/ /thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni/ /las ni gnyis gnyis

gnas par 'gyur/ /mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur/ /bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag /me la sbyin sreg brtson pas 'byor/ /bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thob/ /sngags pas de ltar shes nas ni/ /byis pa'i tshul bzhin spyad

par bya/ /spyod pa'i tshul ni bla med pas/ /yang dag ye shes rgya mtsho 'thob/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo med/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin gang med de/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du

bzang / /ye shes ldan pas zhus pa'i don/ /dam tshig de nyid ston pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs/ /sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor du/ /yid 'ong phreng ba kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje'i bzlas ba ye shes che/ /bla na med pa'i thabs mchog

las/ /rdo rje sku yi bzlas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas skur ni byin gyis rlob/ /mnyam med ye shes thob pas na/ /rdo rje gsung gis ngag byin rlob/ /nam mkha'i ngang las rang byung ba'i/ /thugs kyi rdo rje sems nyid kyi/ /gnyis med ye shes rtogs gyur pas/ /

zab dang rgya che'i tshul gnas pa'o/ /'dir ni rtog pa rnam spangs te/ /brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin khyi dang ba lang dang / /srog song mi ste ba lang chen po'i sha/ /sna tshogs sha yi sbyor ba dang / /khu ba dang ni rak+tar bcas/ /mi bskyod pa dang

rde'u chung bsnams pa'o/ /ro'i steng du g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /yang na rgyal po'i bzhugs stabs su rang 'od kyi thabs la 'khyud pa/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po/ /rgyud kun du ni rnyed pa dka'/ /

lus dang b+ha ga byang chub sems/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go/ /yang na snying po dkyil 'khor bstan/ /rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir/ /ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod/ /Na yi yi 'bru lte bar dran/ /Da yi yig 'bru ge sar dag /la yi yig 'bru de

bde 'dra/ /ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags/ /Na yi yig 'bru mdud par brjod/ /Da yi yig 'bru ring po'i dngos/ /la yi yig 'bru bar brjod do/ /ma yi yig 'bru shu kra'i gzugs/ /Na yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i dngos/ /Da yi yig 'bru 'od dang ldan/ /la

yi yig 'bru bde ba'i gzugs/ /ma ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags/ /Na yi yig 'bru snang ba mched/ /Da ni snang ba snang ba thob/ /la ni yang dag dri med mchog /ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags/ /Na yi yig 'bru mchog tu dran/ /Da yi yig 'bru dga'

bral dga'/ /la ni lhan cig skyes par dran/ /ma yi yig 'bru sa zhes bya/ /Na yi yig 'bru chu ru bstan/ /Da yi yig 'bru de ni me/ /la yi yig 'bru rlung gi gzugs/ /g.yo ba'i phyir ni rlung du brjod/ /yang na khyab pa'i phyir ni dran/ /ye shes rnyed pa yi

ni phyir/ /bde ba yi ni chen po lan/ /ye shes ngo bo bde ba che/ /dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso/ /thig le ngo bo yi ge bral/ /rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/ /phyag rgya dang ni sngags dang bral/ /sngags chen

kun dga' ra ba'i lam/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dang bral ba/ /dri ma med pa bcos ma med/ /rgyu mtshan med pa gzhi med pa/ /yang dag dri med gnas dag pa/ /rang bzhin grags pa skye med mkha'/ /dpa' bo'i ngo bo grags pa bdag /rnam pa kun du yang dag

pa dang ni rgya che ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bstan du gsol/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis ye shes kyi snang ba'i tshul las byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor ye shes las grub pa kun du snang

bar byed pa mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od kyis khyab pa bkod pa tshad med pa'i phrin las yon tan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'i gnas rin po che sna tshogs 'dus pa las rang byung ba/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs rim pa du mas mdzes pa/ rdul med cing rnam par dag

pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ sgo phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ pho brang nang du ni dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i ka bas bteg pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i gdung gis bcad pa/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu gnas pa/ khyams phyi ma'i bar

du ni dkyil 'khor drug dang / bar chad srung bar byed pa 'byung po kun 'dul dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /mtshams bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor te bar bar du ni sangs rgyas stong mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul

bla na med pa 'thob pa'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa 'phyang ba/ ye shes lnga'i rtsig pas 'khor yug tu kun du 'khor ba/ sgo bzhi glo 'bur du snang ba/ phyi nang med par gsal ba/ so so'i bye brag gi dkyil 'khor ni rgyas shing

yangs la rnga ma dang mda' yab dag gis mdzes pa/ 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni bkra shis pa'i mchod pa dang rol mo sna tshogs kyis khyab par byed par kun du rgyu zhing gar byed pas mchod pa'o/ /dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdugs

dang / ba dan dag bsgreng bas mtshan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba ston par mdzad do/ /'og min bde ba can gyi pho brang dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa de nyid du dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos dkyil 'khor chen po

mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i pho brang rang byung bar gyur to/ /de dag gi ni spyi dang bye brag tu/ /dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug rab tu 'byed/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'od 'phro

dang / /'od dpag med pa gdon mi za ba rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dbus dang rnam pa lngar bzhugs so/ /mA ma kI dang spyan ma gos dkar dang / /sgrol ma rnams ni mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /byams pas yi snying po shar du ste/ /lhor ni lag na rdo rje

mkha' snying po/ /nub tu 'jam dbyangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /byang du sgrib pa rnam sel kun du bzang / /mtshams kyi grwar ni gzugs sgra dri ro bzhi/ /phyogs kyi sgo skyong khro rgyal chen po bzhi/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhir mi g.yo mgon po dang / /

'dod pa'i rgyal po stobs chen dbyug sngon can/ /steng phyogs gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /'og phyogs gnod mdzes rgyal po ste/ /lhor ni gsang ba'i bdag po dang / /byang du tshangs pa chen po'o/ /mtshams su 'jig rten skyong rnams ni/ /shar

lhor yul 'khor skyong ba la/ /lha chen brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / /lho nub 'phags skyes po la yang / /gza' chen brgyad bcas gnas pa'o/ /mig mi bzang ni nub byang du/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba'o/ /byang shar rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /gnod

sbyin chen po brgyad ces pa'o/ /lha srin sde brgyad yongs kyis ni/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po yongs su bskor/ /gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la/ /lag na rdo rje drag po'i tshogs/ /brgyad ces 'jig rten gsum 'dul te/ /'di dag rnam par bshad pa'o/ /sangs

rgyas stong phrag gcig ni khyams su bkod pa dag /shar phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang / /mngon dga'i zhing khams shel gyi 'od du 'bar/ /lho phyogs nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang / /rdul dang bral ba baiDUr+yayi 'od/ /nub phyogs nyis brgya bzhi

bcu rtsa lnga po/ /bde ba can zhes pad+ma ra ga'i 'od/ /byang phyogs rnga sgra sgrogs pa gser gyi mdog /nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa lngar yod pa dag /nyi shu dag ni rnam pa mtshon phyir gnas/ /rim pas phyogs su gnas pa dag /rgyas pa'i dbye bas 'di bzhugs

pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bla med gzhal yas khang / /rten dang brten pa mnyam med chos kyi dbyings/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa rnam gsal ba'i/ /rtsa ba'i lha tshogs rnams dang spros pa dag /'jig rten 'das pa'i sangs rgyas stong bzhugs shing / /

'jig rten mgon po lag na rdo rje dang / /tshangs pa mi mjed bdag po la sogs te/ /rgyud 'di la ni smin par byed pa'i dbang / /dkyil 'khor chen po khru ni brgyad cu bar/ /ngos re zhing ni nyi shur mnyam par brjod/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sum cu gcig /

de dag re re la yang de nyid kyis/ /rim bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /thub pa'i dbang pos 'dir ni gsal bar bstan/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'khor dang rdo rje yi/ /drag po'i rnam pa khro bo brgyad bkod pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /rdo rje drag

po rdo rje stobs nyid de/ /rdo rje rnon po rdo rje be con rdo rje mche ba'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor du bstan pa ni/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin rdo rje can/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po rat+na ku be ra/ /ljon pa rta mgo gtsug na rin chen

bcas/ /thags ris dang mkha' lding rgyal po dang / /srin po'i rgyal po dri zar bcas pa'o/ /'di dag gsal bar nges par mtshon pa ste/ /snying po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid de/ /cho ga phra mo rim pa ji bzhin du/ /mdo rgyud rtogs pa rnams

las rnam par rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po gsang bar ston pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la sogs pa de dag thams cad rang gi ba spu'i bu gar thim par mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba 'byung

ba zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang gi gzugs rnams bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas de nyid kyi ba spu'i bu ga

rnams las 'thon par gyur to/ /de'i phyir btsun mo thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i mchod pa thams cad bkod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par mchod pa ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar bya ste/ slar sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang /

thugs rdo rje rnams la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i lha mo de dag bde ba chen po'i kun du spyod pas yang dag par mchod pa byed par gyur pa ni la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu sa'i bdag mo'o/ /la la ni mA ma kI ltar chu'i bdag mo

nyid do/ /la la ni gos dkar mo ltar me'i rnam pa'o/ /la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma ste rlung gi khams la kun du spyod do/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rdo rje lta bu ste/ dus dang rnam pa thams cad tu yang dag par mchod pa'i

rgyun gyis mchod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa 'di thams cad kyi sngags dang / bla na med pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra spar+She hU~M swA hA/ rig ma bla na med pa'i sngags so/ /oM AHdzi na dzika hU~M swA hA/ oM AHrat+na d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/ oM AHA ro li ka hU~M swA hA/ oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika hU~M swA hA/

rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags so/ /oM AHdwe Sha ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHmo ha ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHrA ga ra ti hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra ra ti hU~M swA hA/ lha mo spyan la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra rA pe hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra shab+da hU~M swA hA/ oM A

badzra gan d+he hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra rA se hU~M swA hA/ gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o/ /oM AHbadzra me tri nA tha shri ye hU~M swA hA/ oM AHk+Ni ti gar+b+ha ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AHbadzra pA Na ye hU~M swA hA/ oM AHA kA sha gar+b+ha ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AH

many+dzu shrI g+ho ShA ya hU~M swA hA/ oM AHsarba ni bar Na biSh+kaM b+hi ne hU~M swA hA/ oM AHsa man+ta b+ha drA ya hU~M swA hA/ sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ /oM AHye mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AHpradz+nyA n+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AHbad+mAn+ta kr-ite hU~M phaT/ oM AHbi g+h+nan+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM AH Ar+ya a tsal

hUM phaT/ oM AHTak+ki rA dza hUM phaT/ oM AHnI la daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM AHma hA ba la hUM phaT/ oM AHuSh+ShiSha tsakra brti hUM phaT/ oM AHsuM b+ha rA dza hU~M phaT ces khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i sngags rab tu gsungs so/ /sngags 'di rnams kyi nus pa ni/ /thogs pa med pa nyid yin te/ /

'byin dang sdud par byed pas na/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'di legs par sbas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /gsal ba sems can kun gyi sems/ /zhi ba nyid ni 'od gsal ba/ /dngos po du mas ma gos pa/ /de nyid zhes bya

bde ba sgom/ /sangs rgyas sku yi cho ga shes/ /de bzhin nyid du nye bar spyad/ /gzhan du sngags la sogs pa kun/ /dge ba 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas

rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thub pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu gsol/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /thams cad chos ni ston pa po/ /mchog tu dga' ba bdag med pa/ /rgyal bas sngon dus bstan pa ni/ sems can mos pa'i

don du bshad/ bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog /rtog pa'i rnal 'byor gsang mtha' ru/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dbye ba yis/ ngas ni rim pa gsum du bshad/ dman pa mchog dang 'bring rnams te/ tha ma mos spyod tshul dag tu/ /theg pa chen

po'i tshul bstan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad bsdus pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /thams

cad lus la gnas pa rdo rje'i sku/ /mi chod mi shigs rang byung phra ba'i gnas/ /rtog pa'i rlung tshogs 'byung ba'i ngang du dag /rang rig sems ni gar yang g.yo mi 'gyur/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo bcu la gnas 'gyur gang / /rlung bcu 'od kyi snang ba khyab byed cing / /mi

shigs thig le rab tu dang ba yi/ /bdud rtsi rab rgyas snang ba khyab byed pa'o/ /yi ge sgra yi rnam pa gar yod par/ /dran pa skyed byed srog gi rtsa bar 'gyur/ /kun la khyab byed snying po ye shes rlung / /rten dang brten pa mnyam gnas rin chen sems/ /gser dang

gser 'od rab 'bar mtha' yas bzhin/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho rab dngas rgya che la/ /zla zer 'od kyis khyab cing snang ba dang / /nyi shar mdangs kyis snga phyi med par 'byung / /rtog pa med cing mun pa rang sar dag /blo yis snang ba rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /gang du lus

can rnams kyis ni/ /'byung dang byung las gyur pa yi/ /dngos po'i snang ba bcings pas na/ /yid kyis lus ni brtag dka' bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /'di ni bsgrub pa de nyid yin/ /yid bzhin nor

bu lta bur spyad/ /rnam shes sgyu ma'i ye shes lus/ /yongs su rdzogs pa rang byung ba/ /de nyid mi shes byis pa rnams/ /slar yang 'khor ba'i gnas pa'o/ /ji srid 'od gsal gnas kyi nus/ /'byung ba thim 'gyur rtog pas stong / /de srid sgyu ma phra ba'i lus/ /

rlung dang rnam shes ldan pas ni/ /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas par byed/ /gzugs ni dngos por ma grub pas/ /thogs med rgyu zhing mtshungs par ldan/ /'on kyang byin rlabs nus pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga der mi 'jug /chos

dang chos min ldan par 'gro/ /rang lus lus byung ye shes me/ /thams cad kun nas 'bar ba ni/ /me 'od 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /'og nas steng du blo yis ni/ /rab tu dmigs pas kha ba 'bab/ /thams cad

du ni tshig par bsam/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i ye shes 'od/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab bsreg pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'bras bu smin/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed pa ni/ /bdag nyid nam mkha'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis/ /thabs dang

thabs ldan byang chub sems/ /du ma nyid du mi dmigs shing / /rnal 'byor dngos po ldog par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor zhes bya rdzogs ldan dus/ rjes su rnal 'byor gsum ldan te/ shin tu rnal 'byor gnyis ldan nyid/ rtsod ldan dus ni rnal 'byor che/ /yon

tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /rdzus te skyes pa dang po'i mi/ /'od kyi lus tsam gnas pa dag /lha yi bdud rtsi spyod pa'o/ /de dag lus de spangs nas ni/ /shin tu phra ba'i khams zhugs shing / /sgyu ma'i lus su gnas gyur pas/ /srid pa mngon par len par

'dod/ /bag chags dri mas kun bslang ba'i/ /'dod pa log pa mthong ba yis/ /chags pa'i yid kyis lus la 'jug /tshor ba rnam gsum myong ba yin/ /sa zhag ro dang zas gzhan gyis/ /lus nyid rags pa nyer thob pas/ /dang po'i dngos po log

gyur te/ /bu ga dgu ldan dri nga'i lus/ /nyon mongs kyis ni dkrugs gyur te/ /bsod nams stobs nyams dman sar lhung / /rdzus te skyes dang drod gsher dang / sgo nga las byung mngal las skyes/ /'di dag rim pa rnal 'byor can/ /snyigs ma'i dus su rab tu

'byung / /ji srid pad+ma'i sems can gyi/ /lus ni shin tu phra ba ste/ /rnam shes lus byung sgyu mar gnas/ /rigs dang ldan pas dus gsum shes/ /stobs ldan de la rtog pa yod/ /rang nyid sgyu mar ma shes pas/ /dngos 'dzin bdud kyis

glags rnyed 'gyur/ /'di dag rgyun las bzlog pa na/ /srid pa nye bar len mi byed/ /skad cig gsum gyis ye shes thob/ /'chi med bde ba'i gnas thob ste/ /dag pa'i skus ni 'gro don 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po'i gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las mchod pa dang gsang sngags mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje sgyu 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i ye shes bla na med pa'i ngang las rab tu dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med pas sgom pa med/ bsgom par

bya ba bsgom bya min/ de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ sgom pa dmigs pa med pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sa gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs

pa/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /bdag med chos las kun du byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha' gnas su sbyor ba

yis/ /de ltar dngos por rab tu grags/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po gdon mi za bde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za bas gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo spyan mas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srid med mya ngan

'das med pa/ /'di ni rdo rje bde chen po/ /sgom pa med cing bsgom pa'ang med/ /dgos pa mchog tu bsgrubs pas bde/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo mA ma kIs sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snang med gnas kyi mchog /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/ /sems kyi rang bzhin sgom pa ste/ /ji srid du yang med pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo gos dkar mos sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su chags par byed

pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbyangs dang yi ge rnam bral te/ /de ni sems dang thig le min/ /'di ni dam pa'i bde chen te/ /dbri zhing bsnan pa yod ma yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo sgrol mas sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /de bzhin bsgom bya'i dngos gang yang / /stong zhing snang med gnas mchog ste/ /de tshe sdig dang bsod nams dag /ces gsungs so/ /

de nas lha mo gzugs rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis mchod pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dper na chu dang zla ba ni/ /bden min pa'ang ma yin pa/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di/ /dang zhing gsal ba'i rang bzhin no/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo sgra rdo rje nam mkha'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rjes tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ stong zhing snang med gnas gyur pa/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /sems kyi ngo bo sgom pa ste/ /ji srid yang dag bdag med pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo dri rdo rje kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen pos 'gro khyab pa/ /bde ba spangs na rigs pa med/ /bde ba 'bar bas srid pa 'ching / /bde ba sus kyang bzlog mi

nus/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lha mo ro rdo rje dam tshig chen pos mchod pa kun du rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos rnams bden pa ma yin zhing / /pa'ang ma yin pa yi don/ /blang dang dor bar byar med pa/ /de nyid ye

shes mchog tu bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i rdo rje spro ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsam gtan med cing dngos po med/ /sngags med lha yang med pa

nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ye shes lnga yi rab sbyor bas/ /

bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang med/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa nyid/ /du ma nyid du mi dmigs so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags med bzlas pa'ang med pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba gsum kun yod pa ste/ /sgom pa med cing mngon rtogs med/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nam

mkha'i snying po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dam tshig la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun rdzob tu ni 'jig rten yod/ /dpyad pas 'jig rten gang na'ang med/ /rtag tu 'jig rten ldan par 'jug /dag pa dang ni gnas dag pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje ye shes mchog rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skye ba med cing dmigs pa med/ /mi phyed nam mkha'i 'byung gnas te/ /zab

cing rgya che'i rang bzhin can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i rdo rje chos thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /don dam kun rdzob rten 'brel

tsam/ /yang dag tu na gnas pa med/ /chos rnams dag pa ye shes che/ /gnas med dmigs pa med pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /

rgyu dang 'bras bu dag pa'i chos/ /'gro zhing ldog pa'i khyad par gyis/ /rtog pa yang dag mi dmigs pas/ /spros med gos pa med pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa rdo rje mi zad pa sgyu mar rol pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos dbyings ye shes khyab pa'i sku/ /rtog pa med cing dri ma med/ /kun du 'byung zhing dus gsum du/ /phra zhing bdag med tshul mchog go/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /rdo rje 'khor
