lo'i ting nge 'dzin/ /thams cad chos nyid dag pa las/ /mi rtog nam mkha' dri ma med/ /snang ba sna tshogs rang grol ba/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid rtag tu med/ /ces gsungs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje yis/ /mngon par byang chub la zhugs te/ /sgyu mar snang

ba rmi lam tshul/ /rtog dang nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/ /'du 'bral med pa'i ye shes mchog /phyag rgya chen po yang dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo pad+ma'i dam tshig mchog /rin chen 'byung gnas la brten te/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /

skye med rten 'brel rang dag pa/ /chu rlabs g.yo ba rang bzhin med/ /gnas pa med de ston pa po/ /zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa des/ /byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes tshul/ /'gro rnams byang chub sems rang bzhin/ /khams rnams

stobs su gyur pa dag /dag pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas te/ /ye shes brten pa de las 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon/ /mkha' dbyings ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ /rtog pa thams cad dag pa'i dbyings/ /chos rnams thams cad

rkyen la brten/ /rang 'byung ye shes thob byed pa/ /gnas pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo Tak+ki rA dza rgyal/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes brten pa nyid/ /yang dag ye shes dga' bas brgyan/ /lus dang lus med brten pa med/ /ye shes lus ni dri

ma med/ /rtog pa med cing 'gag pa med/ /ces gsungs so/ /khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin/ /'jigs par mdzad pa khros pa'i sku/ /snying rje chen pos gdug pa 'dul/ /ye shes chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /byams pa'i thugs kyis khyab pa po/ /sems can mgon

po dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gtsug tor dam tshig khro bo ni/ /rig pa'i stobs mchog la gnas pas/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rgyas pa po/ /bstan pa'i don ni thob pa ste/ /nyon mongs zad byed ye shes mchog /gnas pa med pas ston par mdzad/ /

ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo che/ /rab tu 'byung gnas la brten nas/ /yang dag stobs ni dag pa che/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas 'gag pa med/ /rol pa'i sgyu ma ston par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje khro

bo stobs po che/ /sku gsum mi phyed la gnas pas/ /rtog pas mi shigs bdud rnams 'joms/ /kun du spyod pa kun du spyad/ /log rtog thams cad gnas su dag /ye shes 'byung gnas chen po'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems

rab tu brtan pa ye shes kyi rol ba sna tshogs su ston pa rang 'byung ba'i rgyud rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po

gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'byung ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad dang / lha mi rnams dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / khro bo'i tshogs thams cad la yang dag par bstod pa/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi sku/ /rtag pa'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /mnyam med dag pa mchog gi mchog /rdo rje

sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob/ /ye shes dag pas yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don grub rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /gos pa med pa'i ye

shes can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /mo ha ra ti'i sngags las skyes/ /sa yi khams ni rnam dag cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum gyur pa/ /lha mo spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dwe Sha ra ti'i sngags las skyes/ /chu yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje

rigs kyi yum gyur cing / /mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rA ga ra ti'i sngags las byung / me yi khams ni rnam dag cing / pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum gyur ba/ gos dkar lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /badzra ra ti'i sngags las skyes/ /rlung gi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /

las kyi rigs kyi yum gyur pa/ /sna tshogs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /rtsa rgyus khams ni dag pa'i sku/ /nyon mongs rnam dag byams pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /mig gi

skye mched sbyong mdzad cing / /sa yi snying po de bzhin gshegs/ /sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni/ /rna ba'i skye mched rnam dag pa/ /phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs can/ /thugs kyi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen

po ni/ /sna yi skye mched sbyong gyur pa'i/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i mchog gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /lce yi skye mched dag byed pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bla na med/ /gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba che/ /yid kyi skye mched rnam dag cing / /dag pa'i sems mchog 'jam dbyangs sku/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' theg pa che/ /lus kyi skye mched dag pa po/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel mdzad/ /

dam tshig rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal dbang po/ /'gro ba'i sems rgyud sbyong mdzad pa/ /kun du bzang po ye shes rol/ /chos dbyings rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gzugs ni yid du 'ong / snang stong kun du rol pa yis/ chos rnams

sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ston/ gzugs kyi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni yid du 'ong / /sgra dang sgra min las grol ba/ /stong nyid rang sgra 'byung ba po/ /sgra yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i dri ni yid 'ong mchog /sangs rgyas thugs mchod bde ba che/ /log

pa sad par byed pa po/ /dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje ro ni dga' ba'i sku/ /dri med bdud rtsi 'thob byed cing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod byed pa/ /ro yi lha mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /ya mAn+ta kr-ita sngags las skyes/ /sku yi gsang ba khro bo che/ /dbang po

mnan cing shar phyogs bzhugs/ /gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita sngags las skyes/ /thugs las skyes pa'i khro rgyal ni/ /gshin rje mnan cing lho phyogs bzhugs/ /rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mAn+ta kr-ita sngags

las skyes/ /gsung mchog pad+ma rang 'byung ba/ /chu bdag mnan cing nub phyogs bzhugs/ /gsung mchog rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /big+hanAn+ta kr-ita sngags las skyes/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /gnod sbyin mnan cing byang phyogs bzhugs/ /

bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rtog pas mi g.yo zhing / /ye shes gsang ba'i don ldan pa'i/ /khro rgyal byin za'i steng bzhugs pa/ /mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs chen po mi bzad pas/ /log 'dren dpung rnams 'joms

mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal bden bral steng na bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po srid gsum 'joms mdzad cing / /snying rje'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sku/ /rlung bdag steng gnas khro bo che/ /dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde

gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes mchog gis dbang bskur ba/ /khro rgyal dbang ldan steng bzhugs pa/ /stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug gsum rtog pa dag byas shing / /sna tshogs sgyu mar gar mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i steng bzhugs lha yi gtso/ /'khor

los sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sku/ /spros med de bzhin nyid las byung / /kA la kro d+ha gnon mdzad pa/ /khro rgyal gnod mdzes phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems las rang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu ma dag la spros

med sku/ /'od gsal bde ba'i bsam gtan nyid/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las/ /rlung sngags las byung rang dag cing / /thams cad chos ni yongs rdzogs par/ /snang ba ye shes rang bzhin tshogs/ /spro dang

bsdu ba nyid gyur pa/ /zung 'jug ting 'dzin la 'jug gang / /dbye bas ye shes dag pa'i gnas/ /mchod pas yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid bla ma'i sku nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba

gsang ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa'i mchod cing bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //rdo rje mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po rdzogs so// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi bkod pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa du ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rdo rje mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshul mi zad pa rdo rje 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don du sems

can nam mkha'i mthas klas par gyur pa'i khams brjod du med pa'i gnas kyi chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid du rab tu ston pa/ rab 'byam chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po tshad dang rgya yongs su chad pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas kyi zhing

khams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas 'gyur ba med par gsang ba'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa'i spyod yul/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par bsngags pa dang / rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang / 'od zer can dang /

ral pa gcig ma dang / ri khrod lo ma can dang / ku ru kul+le dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / dri ma med pa'i rnam par rgyal ma'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mi zad pa bsngags pa rdo rje dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje la sogs pa ri rab sum cu rtsa

drug gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu/ gsang ba'i spyod pa rmad du byung ba ye shes bde ba chen po'i rol pa la yongs su spyod de/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu bde ba'i

ros khyab par byed cing rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po mchod par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'dus pa dpal mchog chen po snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rtogs

par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi rtse mo du ma las phyung ste/ gsang ba chen po'i chos gnas kyi don mngon par brjod pa rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa ston par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa log par dad sel gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad dmigs med par/ /sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa gang / /

gsang ba'i ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis rnam par thar pa'i rdo rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba med/ /thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbyings/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung

gis rdo rje mi zad pa byams pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rmi lam mtshungs pa las/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ /dmigs pa rnams las yongs grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sgyu ma lta bu dmigs pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /srid gsum mig 'phrul mtshungs

med par/ stong pa nyid ni dag pa'i dngos/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos dang chos nyid med/ thams cad rnam par mi rtog pas/ brjod pa kun las 'das pa ste/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ges ye shes sdong pos brgyan

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di la rtog par gyur pa med/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /dngos po nyid du rnam par grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal gyis dri ma med pa'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba byang chub sems kyi gsang / /chos kun snying po rdo rje'i sku/ /lhun gyis grub pa ye shes dbyings/ byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun nas gsal ba'i snying pos ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi

'gyur snang ba med/ dag pa'i ngo bo ro mnyam pa/ phung po lnga ldan nyid kyi ngang / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa kun du snang ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer bskul

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rang gi sems rtogs bya/ de nyid chos kun rtsa ba ste/ snying po 'di nyid sbas par gnas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs snang pas rang dag par ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba gang 'gyur dbyings nyid la/ ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs/ dam pa

'di ni 'dus par gsungs/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i ded dpon rgyal pos 'gro ba sems can thams cad yang dag par sgrol ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji ltar pad+ma chu klung las/ /rab tu skye ba zil 'phro ba/ /de nyid sdong bu 'dir rtogs bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag chen rgyal pos 'gro ba

thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i tshul zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam med nam mkha' yangs pa ni/ /kun la gnas shing mi 'gyur ba/ /dri ma med cing 'bar ba'i 'od/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mi zad pa'i dpal gyi ri rab brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mi phyed rdo rje ni/ /stong nyid byang chub sems rdo rje/ /

snying rje'i snying po dran par brjod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal pos dran pa'i snying po rin po che'i snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /'dir ni chos rnams stong pa nyid/ /chu dang zla ba mtshungs pa ste/ /sgyu ma nyid du 'gag med 'char/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman mi zad pa'i ye shes stobs kyi rgyal pos

phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du snang la rang bzhin med/ /stong pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ /rol pa rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i tog chen pos 'od mi zad pa'i 'byug gnas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang nyid rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te/ rtog pa'i

dra ba rnam gcod pa/ rang las 'char gyi gzhan las min/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po mi zad pa'i dpal gyis zla ba kun du ston par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro kun brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /dngos po mnyam nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gcig dang du mar dmigs su med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i phung pos ye shes kyi sprin rnam par bkod pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la kun rtog bral/ /dus gsum mkhyen pa dus mi dmigs/

yang dag nyid du kun grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po mi zad pa'i snang bas chos thams cad yang dag par khyab pa mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba rnam bral mun pa med/ gang du rtog las rnam grol zhing / grol ba'i rgyu ni bden pas stong / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

nyi ma'i snying pos kun du khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang / /de nyid srog chags srog gyur pa/ /sems can byang chub

snying po can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis snying po kun du rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang du bdud kyi tshogs kun yang / /rang gi sems las byung bas na/ /phyi rol nye bar dmigs su med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu la 'di lta ste/ sa bla'i lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang /

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i bar gyi me tog gi rnam pa la 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pun

da rI ka dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / dzim pa ka dang / na di ke sa ra dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa ste/ 'dab ma lnga pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / bcu pa nas 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i

bar du me tog gis mngon par gtor/ rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor cing lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams mngon par rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su mchod par byed do/ /kun du mchod par byed do/ /legs par rab tu mchod cing lha'i dbyangs kyis legs

so zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mchod pa la 'ong skad lha'i rgyal po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po stobs ldan dang / srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu dang / mi'am

ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyi bu mo yid 'phrog ma dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rat+na ku be ra dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser lus stobs ldan dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga ba

'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas so so nas mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la mgo bos phyag byas shing lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas shing nam mkha' las song ste mi snang bar

gyur nas/ skad cig tsam gyis so so'i gzhal yas khang du stan la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas sa gsum du khyab pa'i 'od kyi snang ba chen po mi zad pa byung ste/ sems can thams cad bde ba dang reg par gnas pas khyab par byas te slar log nas bdag nyid

kyi sku lus kyi ba spu'i bu gar mngon par zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las 'dus pa chen po gsang ba'i

mchod pa thog mar bstan pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'khor lo'i snying po rdo rje kun du khyab par bskor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin can/ /ye shes snang ba mi zad pa'i/ /'od gsal brjod du med pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa mya ngan med pa'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che 'byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad byang chub dam pa'i gzhi/ /lugs 'byung chos kyi rang

bzhin dbyings/ /lugs zlog gsang ba nyer bstan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po ye shes kyi 'byung gnas

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba med cing dpe med pa/ /mtshon pa tsam gyis rtogs dka' ba/ /'dzub kyis zla mtshon bzhin du snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal zla ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med myu gu bskyed pa yi/ /sa bon 'dis ni kun khyab pa/ /

chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phreng ba 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don la rab tu sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba 'di ni rags pa'i lam/ /mched pa 'di ni phra ba ste/ /thob pa mchog tu gyur pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung

gnas 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong pa dngos po yul gyis bral/ /lus kyis stong pa rten 'brel 'byung / /shin tu stong

pa phyi nang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i sprul pa du mar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu mthun gang yin byed pa ste/ /'bras bu dbang sgyur rnam par smin/ /dri ma med pa lhan cig skyes/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me snang ba'i 'od mi g.yo

bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin 'phro ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu rkyen nye bar len pa dang / /lhan cig byed pa'i spyod pa can/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i ngo bo yi/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpung yang dag ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du brtags pa'i rnam pa can/ /de yi dri ma rnam sbyangs te/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal pos de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kun du snang ba dam pa'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams 'di gzhan gyi dbang du brjod/ /spyi dang khyad par dbye ba med/ /skye ba med phyir brjod par bya/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi snying po glog gi 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid

yongs su grub pa las/ /ngo bo bden par 'gyur ba med/ /pha rol phyin pa'i tshul mchog ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu rab tu rgyas pa'i

dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten pas ni kun du ston/ /'das pa'i ye shes dag pa'i lam/ /mi 'gyur ba ni phyag rgyu che/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan ldan dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljon shing rgyas pa'i bsil grib ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'dod khams sgra dang dngos pos stong / /gzugs kyi khams ni lus kyis stong / /gzugs med khams ni yid kyis te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i

dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byams pa chen po'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun du 'byung ba dag /ye shes rig la rnam dbye bas/ /dman pa mchog dang bar ma ste/ /

rigs ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' ba pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gru ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad chos nyid gcig pa'i phyir/ /'di ni theg mchog yangs pa'i lam/ /grub pa kun du spyod pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan

gyi rgyal mtshan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen po yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos sku de bzhin nyid yin te/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku bde chen brjod/ /sprul sku sna tshogs 'gro

don byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan ye shes kyi snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btang snyoms tshad med pa rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni/ /tha dad rtog pa spang ba'i phyir/ /snying po ye shes gyur pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can

'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba bla med khyad par ba/ /zung 'jug 'bras bu rab gyur pas/ /rim gnyis gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi khang bkod pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /snying po kun du bskul pa ni/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul pas/ /myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'i lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshig bstan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi dran pa yang dag par skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyi yi ge gsum/ /spro dang bsdu ba mi byed pas/ /bskul ba phrin las spyod pa min/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i gnas yin te/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid yin/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur spyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa

rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du spyod pa'i snang ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'gying ba dpal gyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi glang po'i stobs mchog snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /srog ni rlung la brten pa yin/ /khyab cing snying por ldan pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad mi 'khrugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing khams rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

sems dpa' dang / /rig ma lha mo khro tshogs bcas/ /thugs ka nas ni bskul ba shis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam

par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam grol snying po du ma'i phung po dag /bcings pa med cing rnam par 'thor med pa/ /tshul 'di thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di nges par

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'joms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzang po yongs su rgyas par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes sku/ /bkra shis dge ba'i mtshan gyis spras/ /de nyid kun gyi rnam par stong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa rab ldan dgyes pas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi dpe byad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sdom pa thams cad snying po ni/ /'dir ni thabs dang shes rab nyid/ /gnyis med de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyems pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /dngos po mi

dmigs snang med pa/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid gyur phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /de nyid ro mnyam gcig pa'i bdag /rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa yin/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi pad+ma'i spyan rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas du ma'i rjes su 'gro ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyan lnga ye shes spyod yul du/ /gnyis snang thams cad nub nas ni/ /zung 'jug ye shes mi

gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi sdes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /skye ba med cing gnas med pa/ /rang 'byung rang bzhin rang gnas pa/ /gnyug ma rgyun chad med pa'i dang / byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer gyis/ /snying gi pad+mo sad mdzad pa/ /de nyid mi 'gyur bde ba thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes dgyes par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum ma lus sangs

rgyas zhing / /dbyer med ye shes rgyas pa'i thugs/ /'gro ba'i mtshan ma dmigs su med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshogs drug rang snang rtog pa med/ /rnam shes brtags pa rnam bral ba/ /gzung 'dzin kun las rnam grol ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa snang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /don dam rnam par mi dmigs pa/ /yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste/ /gzigs byar

med cing rtag tu stong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mi zad pas bde bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang la rang bzhin

ma grub pas/ /mi rtag g.yo ba dngos la ni/ /bden pa dmigs su med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i sbyin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying rjes bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems ni dri mar bcas pa dag /bag chags rtogs pas rab dkrugs pa/ /sa ler bzhag pas rang dngas 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs pas 'gro ba'i blo rang chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang 'byung ye shes nam mkha' ni/ /tha snyad rnams las yongs grol ba/ 'char ba

med cing nub pa med/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod mthong bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu rgyas pa'i nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dad dang ldan pa'i skye bo ni/ shes rab snang ba rab bskul ni/ mun pa la ni snang ba bzhin/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus sbyin pas sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ri rab brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam rtog dri ma spangs zhing gsal ba yi/ /kun nas kun du 'jug pa'i yid dag kyang / /rgyun las bzlog na rang bzhin med par 'gro/ /nges par

gsang ba byang chub bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong gis 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi dmigs

mtshan ma med/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin gnas med par/ /mnyam rjes mi dmigs grol ba'i mtha'/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab

mo'i spyod yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i gnas ni sgyu ma ste/ /sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas pa/ /ye shes mngon par 'byung bas na/ /ngo bo nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa dag /phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings bcas par/ /dpag med dug lnga'i rtog tshogs ldan/ /skye bo shin tu gtum pa dang / /chags dang ser snas 'jungs pa dang / /rmongs

dang ma rungs las brtson rnams/ /rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las/ /sgrol mdzad dkyil 'khor chen po lnga/ /rgyun mi 'chad par don spyod cing / /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa/ /de dang de yi skur bstan nas/ /ris mthun lam du ston mdzad de/ /thams cad

dbyer med dag par 'gyur/ /'di nyid bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi ste/ /rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur ba dang / /dgongs pa lung ston gsang ba'i rgyud/ /ye shes rdo rje bsdus pa ni/ /khyad par ston pa 'phags pa'i chos/ /bzhis bsdus lha mo'i gsang chen dang / /thun mong ma yin ston pa

yi/ /gsang ba bla med rgyud 'dir nges/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med

pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba bstan pa mi phyed pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med bdud rtsi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku bdud rtsi

'bar ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang gi sems las gzhan med de/ /snang zhing gsal bar gyur pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rnam par spro pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rang rig nyams myong ltar/ /gal te sems nyid ma yin

na/ /'brel pa med phyir snang med 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid dang ni sems nyid dag /gang du rtog pas dpyad gyur kyang / /gcig dang du mar mi dmigs pas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mkhyen pa mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyod yul shin tu zab pas na/ rang sems byang chub snying po can/ gdod nas dag pa de nyid de/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya sna tshogs kyi yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab dang rgya chen dbyer med pas/ /snang stong tha

dad med par 'dres/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni de la gsungs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i kha lo sgyur bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri bcas rang rig ltos med phyir/ /rang 'byung ye shes de nyid de/ /rig pa'i phyir na gsal ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgyes par gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zab pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig yin phyir mi rtog pa/ /rkyen skyes gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir/ mi rtog rtog pa byed med

pas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i lhas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems nyid rnam par mi rtog

pas/ gsal la rtog med ye shes nyid/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul can/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud kyi ba dan rnam par gnon

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' 'di/ /gdod nas ma bcos par rtogs gang / /sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal mi dgos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi lag pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /glo bur dri ma byung gyur kyang / /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la/ /

gos dang ma gos med par gsal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /yod med gnyis ka las 'das pas/ /phan tshun ltos pa ma grub phyir/ /tshu rol ma grub pha rol bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal pos sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba tog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yod med tha dad ma grub ste/ /gnyis tsam du yang med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par brjod med dmigs pa bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i seng ges srid gsum thams cad lhang nger gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o sems nyid dri med kyis/ /rnam 'phrul

gzugs sku bsdus pa yi/ /zhing khams rnam par dag par snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yid chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa/ /ngo mtshar ba yi rnam 'phrul dag /nam mkha'i mthas klas khyab par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang zhig sgrub pa gang bsgrub la/ /de sgrub pa la gnas med med/ /bsgrub par bya ba sgrub ma yin/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gsang ba mi zad chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes rdo rje rol par bstan/ /bla med gnas ni tshul thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen gyis pad+ma'i snying po kun du

rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i 'dam las skyes pa yi/ /rang sems pad+ma'i sdong bu ni/ /zil par ldan pa dri ma med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug na nor bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rab tu spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas kun du sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing 'di'i snying po dad pa ste/ /mos dang

brtson 'grus stobs de bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul can zhes bya ba'i zab pa'i snying po gzhal med khang rnam pa du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa 'di kun gyi brten pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems la kun brten kyang / /gnas pa med cing 'gro 'ong med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i

stobs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha' kun du gnas med pa/ /de bzhin rtog bral dri med sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin

te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /shes bzhin smon lam dbang gis ni/ /mngal 'byung rim pa gang yin dang / /zhing dang zhing du so sor yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'dir ni yang dag brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /gzhon nu'i

rol pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin bzo gnas yang dag bstan/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spros/ /'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med/ /sngon gnas pa ni sbyar mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad pa ni/ /thams cad rdo rje'i

dngos gzhi la/ /dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pas/ /thams cad 'di bzhin blta bar bya/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal

ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa ston pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa dri ma med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ /rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa yis/ /snying po sgyu ma'i snang ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po kun du bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag kun rdzob dag pa la/ /brtan g.yor bcas pa'i snang ba

ni/ /rang bzhin med pa nyid du snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rnam par brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /sems nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa dngos/ /de nyid kun rdzob stong nyid do/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

legs pa'i gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgyu mar ston pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma 'khor 'das dag /sems nyid dag dang ma dag pa'i/ /snang ba bag

chags khyad par nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /yid bzhin nor bu rang las rnyed/ /de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /bla ma sangs rgyas drin gyis rnyed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag skyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la/ /yod med mtha' las 'das pa ste/ /mi rtog ye shes kun rdzob nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sku gsum 'dul ba'i zhing / /

ma lus lus pa med pa rnams/ /thams cad byang chub sems kyi rgyan/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pas bkra shis dga' bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho stong gsum ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la rdzogs/ /thams cad ba spu'i tshogs las kyang / /spros nas byang chub sems gsungs so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa chen pos yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ gsang ba bde chen byang chub sems/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i tshul mchog ste/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer mtha' yas ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi tshul 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes tsam nyid na'ang skye ba med/ /gsang ba'i tshul chen bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

brtul zhugs brtan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba ma lus pa'i dbyings la yang dag par dbang bskur ba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las gnas

pa'i chos/ /gnas tsam nyid na gnas pa med/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis 'byung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang / /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs tsam nyid na dmigs pa med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu klung skems pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /

'gro nyid na'ang 'gro ba med/ /gsang pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rtog pa rang 'byung ba/ /rtog tsam nyid na'ang rtog mi gnas/ /tha dad med pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

sred med kyi bus rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rol pa lding ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcings pa med cing grol du'ang med/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam grol ba/ /ye shes brjod pa dang

bral ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /chos kun brjod du med pa ste/ gsang ba zab pa'i gnas nyid la/ brjod tsam nyid na brjod du med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'khor los

sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /don dam rtog pa'i yul min phyir/ /chos sku ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /rang rig ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das yon tan bde spros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnga sgra kun du sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal po dpung bcas yan lag ldan/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa bzhin/ /ye shes rgyal

po stobs chen ldan/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi gaN+DI phyogs bcur sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

theg pa sna tshogs drang ba'i phyir/ /lam 'di rim par bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba'i theg pa gcig pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi

dung 'bud pa rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho rmad du byung ba'i chos/ /gsang chen theg pa mchog gcig pu/ /ma lus dus gsum rgyal ba'i lam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje'i spyan/ /gzigs

pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas dang / spyod yul dang / zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i de kho na nyid chos nyid nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin las ting nge 'dzin

bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la smras pa/ gang du dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'i chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos yin te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa ni rang bzhin med pa'o/ /rten 'brel las

skyes pa'i chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dmigs su med pa ste/ gnas pa med cing rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid de/ de yang dngos po bar dngos po med pa gnyis su dbyer med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub sems dpa'

chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod nas legs so legs so zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i me tog

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yongs su dag par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ /rang sems dri ma bkru bar bya/ /

dag pa'i thugs ni ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don legs sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dag pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /pha rol phyin nam dag pa'i gnas/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i thun mong yul/ /snying po dgyes pa'i rtsa ba ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sprin spro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos nyid dag pa nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul mchog gis/ /'gro ba'i blo yis mun sel ba/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das blo grags pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi dang nang du dngos po'i chos/ /du ma nyid du mi rtog

ste/ /thams cad brten pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spobs pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i tshogs 'byung ba/ /rnam par brtags pa rang byung gang / /sems gsum snang ba'i ngang du dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog de bzhin gshegs pa

rdo rje rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni byang chub mchog /spros bcas spros med tshul dag gis/ /

gsang ba spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phan par bzhed pa rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po khyab pa'i ye shes kun du 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'dir ni gang du rnam shes dang / /ye shes gnyis su med pa ste/ /kun gzhi rtog pa med par gsal/ /byang chub rten 'brel tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rol par ldan pa'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes nam

mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji srid nam mkha' stong ba min/ /rang sems stong nyid nam mkha' las/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes stong nyid de/ /kun ston tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang bral ba'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i dra bas yongs su 'brel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med cing rang stong pa/ /bde chen phyi nang dmigs med

pa/ /ro gcig ye shes sgyu mar snang / /zhen med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi snying po dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang zag dang ni chos dag la/ /bdag med rtogs phyir sems dpa' che/ /sa la gnas dang rigs kyi dang / /legs spyod tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe sbyin dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa bzang po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos don snying po ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byung ba yi/ /zab mo gter 'dra rang las rnyed/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i 'byung gnas rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan du mar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug du ma yis/ /

gsang ba'i spyod pa'i tshul kun la/ /rang gzhan khyad par don 'byung bas/ /spyod pa'i tshul mchog ldan pa ste/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skye dbang mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 'byung ba snrel zhi

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rab rib med pa'i tshul can gyis/ /drang srong skyob pa'i spyod gnas te/ /thub pa mngon par nges 'byung ba'i/ /yon tan tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'byung ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma med cing tha ma med/ /dbus su 'byung ba yang dag spangs/ /ye shes nye bar brgyan

pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das blo gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa kun du bzang po ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ri

bo sna tshogs 'dus pa la/ /ri rgyal brtan par 'gyur ba gang / /rtog med lhun po'i gnas su spro/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs mdzes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por bskul ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings/ /kun du rtog med lham mer gnas/ /de nyid rab tu mi gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das gtso bo mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang phyug spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shing dbang drung ni rdo rje can/ /mi 'gyur ye shes e dang ba~M/ /pad+ma b+ha ga'i dbyings can te/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /

rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yul gyur pa/ /chos kun bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /zab mo'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal seng ge'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdag gzhan tha dad med/ /byams pa chen po'i snang ba yis/ /mi phyed chos ni don grub rgyu/ /sems kyi spyod tshul 'di bstan no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam

par grol ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du mar me tog rgyas pa cher spro ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag ye shes bzang po nyid/ /rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i blo yi nor/ /

bdud rtsi'i snying po rang las rnyed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes lhun grub pas/ /'di nyid rtog med rab gsal ba/ /bsam pa'i dngos po 'jug mi 'gyur/ /sems kyi kun rtog rab zhi ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las rab tu mi gnas pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom

ldan 'das klu'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gdug pa can ma lus pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin tu rgyal ba dri ma med/ /sems kyi glang po bcing mi bya/ /rang grol gsal ba dag

pa'i lam/ /rgyal bas tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa bskyed pa snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /chos kyi phung po de snyed las/ /rtog pa'i ye shes gyur pa na/ /tshul 'di gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog gi ri bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems

bskyed par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma bar dang tha mar yang / /byang chub mchog tu gnas pa nyid/ /nges pa bskyed pa 'byung ba yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu dga' ye shes 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs ye shes gdung rgyud ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis

'dzin/ /'byung po du ma lam la 'dzud/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang sems rgyal po rang 'byung gnas/ /shar nub med pa'i nyi ma las/ /rtog med cir yang gsal ba nyid/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das stobs kyi lha sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bskur ba/ /thob pa'i khyad par sems las byung / /'di ni dus gsum kun du

'byung / /byang chub zab pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phreng ldan yon tan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dpal rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor du ma gsal ba yi/ /yon tan rin chen tshogs spro ba/ /phyi dang nang du rnam phye bas/ /ye shes zab pa'i tshul brjod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas

kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni snang ba bla med pa/ /rgyun du rang sems chos kyi klong / /rgyun mi 'chad pa chos kyi sku/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das spyan brgyan pa'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dag pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba brjod bral thams cad

mkhyen/ /'od gsal snying po ye shes sku/ /spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par sbyangs pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ma 'dres pa dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab dang rdo rje sku nyid dang / /mi 'gyur dus ni thams cad du/ /brtan pa med par rang 'byung gnas/ /bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zil gnon rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

mkhyen pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa/ /spyod yul thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /rnam par grol ba'i 'bras thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes la rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba ro gcig rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba gsum ni

sku gsung thugs/ /de nyid lngar ni rab bsgrags pa/ /dam pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par dben pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams ni/ /rdo rje gsum du rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bden par gsungs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

snying po 'od kyi dra bar 'char ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni kun khyab pas/ /de nyid sku la rab snang ba/ /zhing khams rdul phran skur 'dus pa/ /mi zad tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni kun sgrog pa/ /de nas gsung du rab brjod

pa/ /sna tshogs sgra ni gsung gyur pa/ /de ni gsung gcig tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gnas pa med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes mkhyen pa gcig pa'i thugs/ /dri med mnyam pa nyid gang yin/ /rtog med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha'

yas gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes rdo rje mchog tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid gnas pas blang dor med/ /dus gsum tha dad gzigs pa med/ /skad cig

ye shes bde ba'i dngos/ /chos nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od mi zad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phas kyi rgol ba zlog par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dpa' bo seng ge'i lta stangs kyis/ /mu stegs bdud tshogs las rgyal ba'i/ /tshad med snying rjes bskul bar bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro

ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba/ /ye shes zla ba la gnas pa/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzin pa yis/ /dri med chu rgyun tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas sangs rgyas the tshom rnam par spangs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi me tog gi snye ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig tu mchog gnas mi 'gyur ba/ /tshig don dbye ba dam pa'i chos/ /

bstan pa'i snying po bla med lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus la/ /rab 'byam mchod pa'i sprin gyis ni/ /kun du khyab cing ston pa po/ /'di ni ye shes kun gyi gter/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ 'byung 'jug gnas par dag pa kun du ye shes ston pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan rnams rdzogs pa ye shes sku/ /dngos po med cing snang ba'i

dngos/ /rtog pa med pa mi gnas pa/ /khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rnam par mthong ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba zhi ba'i lam/ /bcing med ye shes bkod ma'i chu/ /dam tshig gsang ba sdom pa las/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa mdzad pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog med 'bras bu dag pa'i ngang / /chos rnams stong nyid snying rjer gcig /tha dad spangs pa lam gyi mchog /zab pa'i tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs bdud rtsi las/ /'thung ba ye shes

bcud kyis rgyas/ /tshe 'dir grub pa mchog ster ba/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /dus gsum 'byung ba rtag pa gang / /thams cad bdag nyid bde bar gshegs/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen

pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa spyod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun tu sdom pa gang / /rigs kyi gnas su gang byung bar/ /sku gsung thugs ni ye shes can/ /dran pa ma

lus tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams ma lus pa la byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

thams cad ye shes gcig par sdom/ /de nyid 'gyur med zag pa bral/ /snying po rol pa rang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa grags pa mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi chos nyid kyi me long zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang / /phung po la sogs rtog bral ba/ /'di ni kun rdzob rnam thar sgo/ /rdo rje tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgra gcan lhas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun nas ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu ni/ /kun nas dkris pa sna tshogs pa/ /stong

nyid ye shes mes bsreg pa/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor ba sna tshogs pa'i mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba bde ba yi/ /'jig rten lha las 'das nas ni/ /snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying pos srid pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba'i mtshan ma'i dngos po rnams/ /srid gsum rang bzhin med mthong bas/ /ye shes 'od gsal mi phyed pa'i/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

shin tu mthor gshegs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid gcig pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba dang ni mun pa dag /rtog pa'i chos nyid gzigs med phyir/ /tha dad snang ba nub pa'i dngos/ /ye shes

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos kyi lam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni sgrib pa med pa'i lam/ /sdug

par bzhi brtse ba can/ /byang chub sems kyi snying po nyid/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po mig 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad ye shes snang ba'i dngos/ /sems can rtog pa yul med phyir/ /gnyis snang ma lus bcom nas ni/ /gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dbyings su gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snod bcud ma lus rin chen gzhi/ /lha mi'i snang ba ston pa che/ /thub pa 'gro ba'i don spyod pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'pho ba med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus la 'pho ba'i ye shes

gang / /rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brten nas/ /gcig pu mi 'gyur dngos med sems/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dang po'i lus ni lha yi dngos/ /lus dben snang ba rten 'brel te/ /sems nyid ye shes stong nyid de/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das skar mkhan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snang ba bkod pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni kun rtog ye shes che/ /bde ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ /zug rngu bral ba byang

chub sems/ /rdo rje'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs mi zad pa'i ye shes chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du gnyis med mnyam pa'i dngos/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ mi zad phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi/ dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum

tshogs pa bla na med pa'i snying po zes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag gzhan dbyer med byang chub sems/ /bde ba chen po sems la rnyed/ /ngal so'i gnas ni bla na med/ /dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni gcig sbyor ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /rjes su bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su

med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rol pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du srog dang snying po med/ /gnas pa med cing kun 'byung ba/ /bar ma do yi rnam shes ltar/ /'byung ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das srid

mtha' gzigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang po yul la rnam spro ba/ /de nyid bzlog ste sems gnas pa/ /lam du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das glog gi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba ye shes 'od kyis ni/ /rtog pa'i dri ma rnam sel ba/ /de nyid rnam grol

bstan pa gang / /gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od mchog ma lus pa rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /dri med lhun grub ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /'od gsal chos dbyings snying po bla na med/ /chos nyid chos can dbyer med pa deb che/ /mnyam nyid gnas pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas seng ges

byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dag pa'i sa yi dbang phyug gar/ /rdzogs pa'i gtsug tor dam tshig che/ /

gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal bas rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgyal mtsho kun gyi rang bzhin thugs/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas skye med ngo bor mnyam/ /rnal 'byor rang sems gcig pur gnyis su med/ /khyad par med pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas mchog

dga' grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying po sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /chos nyid yongs su dag pa gang / /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /

'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la spyod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba gnyis po ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rang la gnas/ /ngang nyid rtog med ye shes sku/ /'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grags pa rdzogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdul bya'i snang ba

nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus med dbang po'i phug gnas shing / /ring du 'gro zhing gcig pur rgyu/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems 'dul byed/ /'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsnyems pa dang bral bas 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /blo ldan sa gsum 'grub pa'i gzhi/ /yon tan 'byung gnas rin chen sems/ /bsam pa'i dgos 'dod skong

byed la/ /khyad par tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mchod 'os lhas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab bdag dpal ldan rdo rje'i

sku/ /'di nyid lus ni dri ma med/ /chos can ma grub rang sar dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po zhes bya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi g.yo ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phung po la sogs dngos med pa/ /gang zag bdag med stong pa nyid/ /chos la dmigs pa rtog pa bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ril por 'dzin pa bsdu ba dang / /rjes su gzhig pa spro ba nyid/ /gnyis med bsam gtan la gnas pa/ /gcig pu byed pa'i tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spos dri zhim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid bde ba chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes bde ba chen po'i ngang / /rtag tu bzhugs pa'i ngo bo

nyid/ /rang 'byung 'gyur med snying po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mchog 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
