so/ /dri med sgyu ma'i chos nyid ni/ /yod med tha dad las 'das pa/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /'gag med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mun pa dang rnam par bral bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi blo'i mun pa sel ba ye shes kyi rol ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di nyid rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /yongs su dag par shes par bya/ /zung 'jug de bzhin nyid las ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i 'gram

pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rtog med dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam pa nyid las gang 'byung ba'i/ /bde chen rang 'byung rang nyid ni/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ste/ /gsang ba'i tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis med mnyam pa rang byung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba rang byung brtan g.yo bcas/ /

thams cad rang nyid dkyil 'khor dang / /bde chen zab pa'i tshul rdo rje/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das skyon rab zhi bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sgron me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtag tu dmigs par bcas pa yi/ /phyag rgya chen po dngos med de/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid du dag /rin chen tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'chang bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig 'phrul

ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang pos slar gsol pa/ /dri med mnyam pa ye shes sku/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de/ /gnas dang ston pa rang byung ba/ /che ba'i bdag nyid slad gnas pa/ /dpal mchog gsang ba 'di nyid du/ /skal ldan rgyal ba bla na med/ /ces

gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rang byung du bstan pa'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las le'u nyi shu pa'o// //

de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bcas dpag med dang / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /rigs dang lha mor bcas pa dpag med dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po du mar bcas pa dag /gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus byas nas/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i bdag po la/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyis dpag med ldan/ /mchod pa'i rim pa phyi nang

gsang ba dang / /de kho na nyid rnam pa mtha' yas pas/ /ye shes rgyal ba mi zad dam tshig gi/ /rin chen sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ /mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'dus pa kun gyi

gsang ba'i don/ /thog ma dbus mthar gnas pa ye shes che/ /gsang ba rdo rje snying po lhan cig skyes/ /brjod bya bla med gyur pas 'dus pa'i chos/ /snying po'i 'bras bu kun gyi rtsa ba gang / /thabs dang bstan pa de yi khyad par mang / /bcom ldan dri med gsang ba bshad

du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems rdo rjes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /gsang ba byang chub bka' stsal to/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /rab tu gzigs nas dgyes gyur pas/ /bcom

ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /gnas 'di zhus pa shin tu legs/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /zab cing rgya che mchog gi yul/ /'on kyang 'dir ni bde gshegs kyang / /the tshom 'jug pa'i gnas yin na/ /de las gzhan par gyur pa yi/ /byang chub

sems dpar gyur pa'i tshogs/ /de las spyod yul lta ci smos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/ /mchog don ngo mtshar spyod pa dang / /thun mong gnas la dmang gyur pa/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che la/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi bdag

po la/ /'di skad ces ni zhus par 'gyur/ /gnas dang dus dang phyag rgya dang / /'dus pa khyad par gyur pa la'ang / /gsang ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /tshad med ye shes zhing khams kyi/ /snang ba rab tu rgyas pa la/ /rgyu thabs khyad par gyur pa yi/ /gsang

chen sku gsung thugs kyi gsang / /de nyid 'dus pa 'di mchog tu/ /ston pa 'phro bar ma gyur pa/ /de srid du ni kun mkhyen gyis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dus pa las/ /lus ngag yid ni byin brlab cing / /khyad par mchog dbang bskur mdzad de/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i

rim phye ba/ /bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang / /shes rab ye shes de bzhin du/ /rab tu bskur bas smin byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ gsang ba byang chub sems rdo rje/ /rtogs dka' mi phyed dam tshig gis/ /gang phyir dgongs te

bshad pa dang / /dgongs min drang ba'i don gyur dang / /nges don ji bzhin pa dang ni/ /ji bzhin ma yin rnam phye bas/ /yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don/ /sbas pa gsum dang mthar thug gnyis/ /dang po gcig dang tshul gnyis ldan/ /dpag med rdo rje'i tshig gi rgya/ /nges phyir

rab tu ston pa nyid/ /'jug bya de dag lus ngag yid/ /rim pa gnyis kyi bde ba dang / /yid bde rab tu myong bgyid pa/ /thabs zab rgya che myur ba'i lam/ /yan lag dam tshig ldan pa yi/ /thob bya thob byed khyad par pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mkhyen

pa'i ye shes bla med pa/ /mngon pa'i ye shes bla na med/ /mngon par byang chub gnas gyur pa'i/ /'bras bu yang dag thob gyur nas/ /gsang ba'i rgyud mchog bstan du gsol/ /de ltar gsol ba btab gyur pas/ /de nas bla med bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs kun

gtso bo yis/ /gsang ba byang chub sems rdo rje/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma rnams/ /stong pa nyid du 'jug pa yi/ /dpag med zil gnon rdo rje zhes/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po de/ /'od gsal dri med dbyings nyid la/ /ye shes 'jug

pa'i ngo bo yis/ /dbyer med gnas par gyur ma thag /rdo rje'i lus kyi rtsa gnas ni/ /stong phrag bdun cu la sogs pa/ /rtsa yi bu ga khong stong dag /thig le zhu ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /byang chub rdo rje'i rnam par ni/ /zhu zhing yang dag gnas par gyur/ /de nyid chos sku'i ngo bo nyid/ /

bde dang stong pa dbyer med pa/ snying rje tshad med rnam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ rnam pa rang ben don nyid du gnas/ /sgyu ma sbyong ba'i dam tshig dang / mngon par byang chub 'od gsal ba'i/ /

stong nyid rdo rje rdzogs pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /rig pa thabs dang shes rab dag /dbyer med bde ba chen po'i sku/ /skyes bu'i rnam par gyur pa dag /gnas pa'i ngang las ldang ba ste/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /yul dang dngos po rnam dag pa'i/ /

sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs pa/ /ye shes chen po'i ngang gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ /sprin dkar dag pa'i tshul can nyid/ /de ma thag tu snang bar mdzad/ /byin gyis brlabs

pa'i rjes zhugs pa/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang / /rang 'byung ye shes lhag pa'i lha/ /thams cad bdag po rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /sna tshogs rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /in dra ni la 'bar ba dang / /dang po mgon po rnam par sprul/ /dung

dang kun da ltar dkar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam pa gsal ba nyid du gzigs/ /de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags kyis 'dul

'gro gzigs nas/ /'dod chags gsang ba'i tshul zhes pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bkod pa rab tu mi zad pa/ /de dag thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /nyid kyi sku la thim par mdzad/ /de nas 'dus pa'i lha tshogs

kyis/ /dbyer med gnas pa'i dad las ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag /yongs su mnyes pa'i don du ni/ /nyid kyi sku las spros pa yi/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i 'od zer gyi/ /rtse mo rnams las spros gyur pa/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma

kI/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya rdo rjer gyur pa yis/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /tshad med yul dang spyod pa yis/ /chags pa chen pos rjes chags nas/ /bde ba'i rol pa ston par mdzad/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che/ /

de nyid me long sogs bdag nyid/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa thub pa'i rgyal/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rgyal po nyid/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa'i/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyal/ /snying po rdo rje ye shes so/ /de nyid rdo rje btsun mo rnams/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i mkha' dbyings ni/ /

dam tshig chen po'i mkha' dbyings te/ /rnyog pa med cing rdul med pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byin brlabs pa/ /phyogs mtshams mnyam par ldan pa la/ /grub pa'i gnas brgyad yongs bskor ba/ /zhing khams yongs su dag pa yi/ /'dzam gling pad ma'i lte ba la/ /sna tshogs mi shigs e dang

ba~M/ /gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi kun du rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /gsang ba

rab tu 'dzin pa po/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /sum cu gsum par ldan pa yis/ /pho brang yangs pa'i gzhal yas der/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong dang ni/ /gnyis dang byang chub sems dpar bcas/ /phyi rol 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen

po yi/ /dbus su yang dag bzhugs gyur pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /mi bskyod pa dang dkon mchog dpal/ /tshe dpag med dang gdon mi za/ /dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i rgyal/ /de nyid sku gsung

thugs ye shes/ /phrin las ldan par bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas rang bzhin dag pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings na gnas gyur pa/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i/ /sems can khams kyi snod bcud dang / /yul dang dbang po thams cad kun/ /rdo rje sems dpas byin brlabs shing / /

dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ye shes kyi ni dbang bsgyur bas/ /de dag thob pa'i khyad par ni/ /tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams la/ /bde ba dang ni yid bde bas/ /gsang ba ye shes spyod yul thob/ /de las sprul pa'i sku byung ba/ /bcom ldan de nyid thugs ka nas/ /sprul

pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag med pa/ /bye ba grangs med bkye nas ni/ /gdul bya gdul phyir dbang bskur zhing / /spyi dang khyad par gyis 'dul 'gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas tshogs dag gis/ /bskul bas ched du brjod pa gsungs/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /byang chub

sems ni rang byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu rtog med mi gnas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /sku bzhi ye shes ro gcig pas/ /mdzad pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /rab 'byam cho 'phrul ston pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi

'khor lo nges par sprul pas rgyud nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /phyi rol yul snang rdzas su 'dod/ /g.yag rnga ne'u gsing lta bu la/ /bar du snang mun shong ba tsam/ /sems las tha dad par gnas pa/ /skad cig mi rtag par 'dod pas/ /yul sems tha dad

bye brag smra/ /phyi rol yul dag phra ba rnams/ /'dus nas rigs pa 'byung ba ltar/ yul dus rnam par nges pa las/ /rigs pa 'dra ba'i rnam par bzhag /yul dgag pa yi tha ma dang / /shes pa skye ba'i thog ma ru/ /phrad par 'dod pa grub pa'i mtha'/ /mdo sde

pa yi dgongs pa smra/ /chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems/ /rnam par rig tsam skad cig ma/ /rang gsal rgyun gnas spros bral 'dod/ /rang rig skad cig gsal ba dang / /mi gsal sna tshogs rtog bral du/ /rnam med rnal 'byor spyod pa smra/ /dngos rnams

stong pa sgyu ma bzhin/ /snang yang bdag las rang stong pa/ /sems kyi rtog pa rnam bzlog ste/ /mkha' dbyings dri med rtog rgyun 'chad/ /'di ltar srid pa zhi ba las/ /rnam grol stong nyid snying rje dang / /dbyer med byang chub sems kyi mchog /zung 'jug rab tu mi

gnas pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus 'dir grub mtha' kun/ /blo yi rim pas 'dir 'dus te/ /de bas 'dir ni chos kun gyi/ /snying po 'dus pa'i rtsa bar gsungs/ /gsang ba bla na med pa'i don/ /ye shes rnam gsum rim 'jug cing / /sgron me 'od gsal snang ba

las/ /zung 'jug rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /lha yi 'khor lo sprul nas ni/ /dbyer med mi g.yo ting nge 'dzin/ /mchog ni dri med rang snang las/ /gnyis med ngang du rab zhugs pa'o/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las/ /rtag tu 'od gsal bar gnas kyang / /

'gro ba'i don las mi 'da' bas/ /dam tshig 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub sems kyi za ma tog /bde ba can ni mi shigs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems/ /'gro ba kun la ster ba ni/ /ma chags pa yi ye shes kyis/ /'dod

chags 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma las/ /gdon mi za ba gnas med pa/ /'od gsal 'bras bu mngon phyogs pa/ /dam tshig 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /zag pa med pa'i dga' ba yis/ /ye shes chen po'i ros khyab pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes

gyur pa'i/ /dam tshig bla med ting nge 'dzin/ /yang dag ye shes nor bu ltar/ /rin chen 'od 'phro sprin tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yang / /mnyes byed rdo rje ting nge 'dzin/ /zag pa bsdus byas bde ba las/ /bcu drug 'gyur gyis khyad 'phags pa/ /

'dod chags rjes su 'dzin byed pa/ /chags par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje las/ /mi phyed 'od gsal bar thim la/ /sgyu ma slu ba rdo rje nyid/ /snang ba thim pas ting nge 'dzin/ /ye shes me long lta bu las/ /srid gsum snang bar mdzad pa

ste/ /snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo ni/ /mi zad sku yi ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba gsum las 'das pa yi/ /rang bzhin mngon par byang chub pa/ /rnam par dag pa rdo rje yi/ /'od gsal ba yi ting nge 'dzin/ /srid zhi mnyam nyid mnyam pa'i sku/ /chos rnams gnyis med ro gcig

pas/ /rin po che ltar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /yon tan gter gyur ting nge 'dzin/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /gang las 'od gsal chos kyi sku/ /mngon par byang chub pa yi tshul/ mi phyed rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ bla med mngon par byang chub pa/ /

gsang ba lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes mchog tu 'gyur/ /chos nyid mi zad dbyings kyi dang / /snang stong tha dad med pa ste/ /ro gcig 'du 'bral med pa nyid/ /stong dang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med

pas/ /kun du stong zhing ma bcos pa/ /lhun grub rdo rje'i ngang gnas pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /'od gsal 'bar ba rdo rje yis/ /tshe dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /snang ba'i dngos po sna tshogs pa/ /

sgyu ma rkyen skyes zil gnon pa/ /rdo rje 'od gsal ting nge 'dzin/ /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje can/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' bas khyab cing dgyes pa chen po yongs su spyod par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas gsang ba gsum gyi dngos/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di gsungs so/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pas/ /lus skams gyur cing sdug bsngal gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni sems byings te/ /de la dngos grub gzhan du gyur/ /brjod pa thams cad yi ge ste/ /kun

gyi rtsa ba a las byung / /de las chos kyi phung po ni/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong dag tu snang / /dbyangs dang gsal byed ngag yin te/ /ngag ni rlung gi rtsa ba can/ /sgrar snang tsam nyid kun rdzob ste/ /thim pa don dam brjod pa'o/ /yang gnas 'di la sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni

'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i yul la rang gi bsod nams dang ye shes gnyis su med par spyad pa spyod par byed de/ rang rig pa'i ye shes sgyu ma dang mtshungs pas spyad pa spyod par byed do/ /'di ltar chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / brag

ca dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / sprin dang / mig yor dang / glog dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sgyu ma'i rnam par blta ste/ de lta na yang don dam pa ni rnam par dmigs su med do/ /chos thams cad

ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir rten 'brel tshogs pa'i snang ba dgag tu med do/ /de yang dag par bden pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' ba'i yid kyis

dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so legs so/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyod pa ngo mtshar zhing rmad du rab tu byung ba rab tu bstan pa gsang ba'i spyod yul la dgongs te rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi

gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dman pa'i spyod pa las ring zhing lam bde ba chen pos ye shes la rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gsang / /gsang ba gsum du

gnas pa gang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngor/ /gsang ba rab tu gyur pa gsungs/ /gsang ba'i yi ge rtogs dka' ba/ /ma 'ongs skye bo gdul slad du/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /phyi nang sbas pa rim pas bstan/ /e yi rnam pas lha mo

spyan/ /ba~M gi rnam pa bdag mar brjod/ ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo/ /yA ni rnam pa sgrol mar brjod/ /shru ni byang chub sems rdo rje/ /ta~M ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /me long ye shes e zhes brjod/ /ka ni mi bskyod rdo rje ste/ /smin zhes don yon grub pa nyid/ /rin

chen 'byung ba sa zhes bya/ /'od dpag med pa ma zhes brjod/ /rtag pa'i rdo rje ye zhes pa'o/ /b+ha ni dri yi rdo rje ma'o/ /yi ge ga ni ro rdo rje/ /bAn ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma'o/ /sa yi rnam pa reg rdo rje/ /rba ni sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /ta ni chos dbyings rdo rje yi/ /thA ni sgrib pa rnam

par sel/ /ga ni 'jig rten dbang phyug brjod/ /yi ge ta ni sa snying po'o/ /kA ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /ya ni phyag na rdo rjer gnas/ /bAka ni kun du bzang po'o/ /tsita ni byams par brjod par bya/ /ta ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /hr-i da ya ni snying po nyid/ /

ba ni dbyug sngon can du grags/ /dzra ni stobs chen 'bar ba ste/ /yo ni mi g.yo gtum po'o/ /Shid ni bya ba nan tan te/ /b+ha ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o/ /ge ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur/ /Shu ni bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /pi ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /dza ni

gshin rje mthar byed de/ /ha ni mthar byed pad ma 'dzin/ /ra ni so sor rtog pa nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba/ /phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /'byung bzhi lha mo bzhi ru brjod/ /yul lnga 'dod yon lha mo lnga/ /rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub sems/ /lus tshigs

la gnas khro rgyal bcu/ /bsdus pa ye shes lngar sbyor ba/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes ni/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang gi dngos/ /mig dang mi yis gnas pa las/ /de nyid kyis ni sbyar ba yis/ /de las gyur pa'i grangs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor de snyed rnams su 'gyur/ /

phyogs dang gdengs ka gdong ba dang / /ris byed rigs kyis phye ba gang / /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa ste/ /gzhan du 'phros pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /ka nas bzung ste rim bzhin du/ /de bzhin ha yi bar dag tu/ /de dag sna tshogs rgyur gyur pa/ /stong phrag sum cu'i

bdag nyid do/ /thabs dang shes rab ngo bo nyid/ /stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa dang / /cha mthun yan lag rgyud gyur pas/ /de dag sde dang bcas pa yis/ /gsang chen rgyud sder brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du/ /

lha 'di rnams ni thog mar bzhugs/ /'dis ni rgyud rnams gsang chen kun/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ces rgyas btab pa'o/ /mdo sde rnams la gnas sogs pa/ /thun mong dbye bas phye ba nyid/ /yi ge bzhi ni thun mong du/ /bsdus pas chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /

mdo kun yul du gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal la sogs pas/ /rnam pa kun du ma bshad de/ /'di skad bdag ces dang por brjod/ /dus gcig dus gsum skad cig ste/ /ston pa rang 'byung che ba'i sku/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa bde bar gshegs/ /de bzhin du ni rtag gshegs la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zhes/ /pad+ma'i ming can btsun mo'i gnas/ /der ni mngon par bzhugs par mdzad/ /btsun mo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rin chen chos dang bcas pa yi/ /rdo rje las

kyi sems mar brjod/ /de dag kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ /bskyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /yul rnams thams cad rten pa'i gzhi/ /yang dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum

sangs rgyas rnams/ /mngon par rab tu zhugs mdzad de/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /rab tu mi gnas dbyer med bzhugs/ /mdo dang gsang bar spyod pa'i tshul/ /don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang / /thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang / /dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas phyir/ /gsang

sngags theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /gsang ba bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud/ /shin tu ches gsang rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rnal 'byor bla med gsang chen no/ /'di ni sku gsung thugs gsang ba/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rnams dang ni/ /rjod byed rang gi mtshan nyid de/ /phung po khams dang

skye mched sogs/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa ni/ /mkhas pa rnams la bsngags pa yin/ /rmongs pa de ltar 'dod pa rnams/ /skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa dang / /rgyud gzhan rnams la nges bstan pa/ /rtag tu rten

'brel tshul de brjod/ /'bras bu rgyus ni rgyas btab cing / /rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gdab par/ /bsam gyi gzhar du dngos grub ni/ /bskal pa bye bar yang mi 'gyur/ /rgyud kun la ni gsang chen gyi/ /snying po phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba yang dag par/ /mi

phyed par ni bstan pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa/ /sku yi gsang ba rtag pa nyid/ /sems can kun gyi ngag la ni/ /gsung gi gsang ba rang byung du/ /sems can kun gyi snying la ni/ /thugs kyi gsang ba snying po bzhugs/ /de nyid snying po gsum ldan pa/ /

bde gshegs snying po 'jug pa nyid/ /sems can sangs rgyas sgras btags so/ /sku yi dngos grub snang ba'i dngos/ /mi zad sprul pas 'gro don spyod/ /gsung gi dngos grub brag ca ltar/ /brjod pa du ma'i sgra ru ston/ /thugs kyi dngos grub rtog pa'i tshogs/ /ye shes bde chen

bsam mi khyab/ /ting 'dzin sems kyi spyod pa ni/ /stong nyid ye shes dngos grub bo/ /de nyid byang chub sems rdo rje/ /bla ma nyid du bsdus pa yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'dzin pas dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /dug nyid nye bar zhi gyur na/ /dag pas dug

med byas pa yin/ /bdud rtsi rim gyis bsten na ni/ /bdud rtsi nyid du nges 'gyur yin/ /de nyid ngo bo yongs shes pas/ /rgyud 'dir lam du gyur pa yin/ /sngags 'dun thabs dang shes rab ste/ /dbyer med de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /shes rab b+ha ga'i brdar

brtags pas/ /dbyangs su brjod pa gsang ba'i tshul/ /A li bcu gnyis rten 'brel te/ /ma rig la sogs 'gag par bstan/ /ro hi ta la sogs pa dang / /khyim ni bcu gnyis rlung dag ste/ /dus sbyor ba dang mtshungs pas na/ /lugs 'byung de nyid lugs

bzlog par/ /de nyid yang dag rim pas bstan/ /kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi po/ /thabs kyi yi ge pha zhes brjod/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni sum cu bzhi/ /dag pa byang sems rang bzhin te/ /khams ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i/ /de dag dag pas ye shes che/ /dag pa'i

dus ni dpe byad dag /nyis 'gyur dag gis bstan pa ste/ /thabs dang shes rab phrag gnyis bstan/ /A li shes rab ma ning bcas/ /'di dag mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis/ /cha gnyis rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi lus gnas pa/ /kla zhes bya ba chu

yin te/ /sla zhes bya bas yin no/ /l+la zhes bya ba me yin te/ /sh+la zhes bya ba rlung yin te/ /'byung bzhi'i dbye ba ma ning ste/ /ye shes dag pa chen po nyid/ /yang dag lam gsal phyogs tsam dang / /mi gsal ba nyid rgyud las 'byung / /rkyen nyid tshogs

gnyis rdzogs byed pa/ /bsod nams bla med 'bras bur 'gyur/ /gzhi ni khong na gnas pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi lus la gnas/ /de yod pas na 'gro kun kyang / /ye shes snying po can gyur pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /

ma ning ye shes dag pa nyid/ gnyis med ye shes 'bar ba yi/ /A li snang ba thabs kyi cha/ /mched pa ka sogs shes rab cha/ /ma ning thob pa gnyis med pa'o/ /sbyor ba don gyi yi ge bzhi/ /sbas pa'i tshul du bstan pa'o/ /char ni stong pa tsheg drag dang / /

thig les brgyan pa bde ba che/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /kun du bzang po sems dpa' ches/ /gsang ba zab dang rgya che ba'o/ /lhag pa'i gsang chen rgyud kyi don/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /khyad par nges shes bskyed don du/ /dpal

ldan 'dus pa nges gsal ba'i/ /bla med dgongs rgyud bshad du gsol/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa po/ /rdo rje 'chang ba tshul 'di dag /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don/ /gsang ba rin chen snying po gsungs/ /gsang chen gleng gzhi'i khyad par dang / /rim pa gleng slong

gyur pa dang / /gsang bar bya ba'i gzhi gang dang / /gsang ba'i dam tshig nges pa dang / /gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang / /'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ji ltar bstan/ /gsang chen rnam bshad thabs dang ni/ /de nyid dang 'brel brjod bya gang / /rjod byed thun mong bstan pa'i

tshul/ /lam la 'jug pa'i dbye ba dang / /gsang ba grub pa'i 'bras bu dang / /gsang ba lhag pa'i lam dang ni/ /gsang ba mchog gi spyod pa dang / /gsang chen rnam par bsdu ba'i don/ /mi 'gyur rkyen gyis ldog bya dang / /dgag sgrub gsang chen 'byung ba'i

tshul/ /phyogs dang thub pa'i rnam dbye ba'i/ /gsang ba 'di dag gnas zhes bya/ /'di nyid 'jug pa'i tshul shes nas/ /grub pa sgrub pa'i tshul spyod do/ /gsang ba rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje

'dzin/ /dang po'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa yis/ /'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba zab pa'i rgyud 'di ru/ /spyod pa'i tshul 'di shes par bya/ /dang po'i sa ni pad+ma ltar/ /ge sar kha dbye'i 'od 'bar ba'o/ /gnyis

pa chu rgyun lta bu ste/ /dri ma sbyong zhing 'byed par 'gyur/ /gsum pa rab tu gsal ba yi/ /'gro ba'i snang ba ye shes sgron/ /bzhi pa ye shes 'od 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i snying po ltar 'char ba'o/ /lnga pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ /'dzag dang smin cing sdud pas sbyor/ /drug pa sgyu

ma'i gzugs brnyan ltar/ /chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa'o/ /bdun pa lta ngan phyogs las ni/ /rgyal 'gyur seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin/ /ri bo mchog ltar ting 'dzin rgyal/ /ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu dang / /snang ba mi g.yo bar gyur pas/ /bdag gi dngos por rab tu brtag /

thabs ldan byang chub sems mchog gis/ /don mdzad 'khor los sgyur ba'i stobs/ /legs thob phyir mi ldog pa'i lam/ /sems dpa' chen po bla ma nyid/ /ji srid sprin ni sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog dbyibs ni tha dad pa/ /mkha' dbyings dag tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /

deng nyid du ni ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kyang / /snang ba gsum gyi rgyun chad dngos/ /ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni/ /de nyid du ni rang thim 'gyur/ /snang ba gsum po dag pa'i lam/ /rin chen sprin gyis 'gro don du/ /bsam pa'i tshul gyis char

pa 'bebs/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i dngos/ /de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i yul/ /'di ltar zhe sdang rnam par dag /de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/ /gang du gti mug dag pa'i ngang / /de ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /snang ba dag pa'i yul gyur

pa/ /thams cad 'od gsal ngang gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mngon 'dus pa'i/ /'od zer snang ba bsam gtan mes/ /dri ma ma lus sangs gyur pas/ /mngon par byang chub dag pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i dri ma med/ /snang ba med cing dngos med pa'i/ /

ma 'dres 'od kyi snang ba 'gyed/ /pad+mo rin chen ge sar las/ /nor bu sna tshogs sdong pos brgyan/ /ma rig mun sel chu bo'i rgyun/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /bde chen sa ni bcu gnyis pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pas/ /rab tu mi

gnas dngos med pa'o/ /zung 'jug chen po dag pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rtog med pa'i/ /sku gsum rdo rjer gcig pa'i bdag /sar gyur pa ni bcu gsum pa/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /rang 'byung 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa

gang / /dbang phyug brgyad ni dag pa'i dngos/ /sgom pa'i lam ni 'di nyid du/ /lam gyi khyad par bstan pa'o/ /mthong lam yan lag bdun ldan pa/ /sku gsum rtogs phyir yan lag brjod/ /tshogs lam dang po dag la ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang / /smin byed

dbang gis gzhi bzung bas/ /bum dbang lus ni lha ru ste/ /gsang dbang tshor ba bde ba nyid/ /gsum pa chos ni ye shes dran/ /bzhi pa sems ni 'od gsal du/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag phyir brjod/ /tshogs lam bar pa nyid la ni/ /ting 'dzin ma skyes bskyed

pa dang / /skyes pa brtan phyir pogs dbyung dang / /yang dag spong ba bzhi po dag /de nyid goms par byed pa la/ /dgag dang bsgrub pa'i phyogs gyur pa/ /spangs thob rim par ldan par brjod/ /tshogs lam chen por gyur pa dag /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir nges pa/ /

chu rlung rdo rje mgon po yi/ /mA ma kI yi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /snying ga'i gnas su yang dag ldan/ /me rlung pad+ma mgon po yi/ /gos dkar mo yi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gyen rgyu mgrin par brjod par bya/ /sa rlung rin chen mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rdzu 'phrul

gyis/ /thur sel gsang bar brjod pa nyid/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor lte bar ni/ /las kyi mgon po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /me dang mnyam pa'i las zhes bya/ /re re'ang lha mo bzhi bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /

lam du rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis brjod/ /gnad ni rnam pa bzhi dag ste/ /lus dang dus dang yul dang ni/ /rlung gi gnad du shes par bya/ /dang po'i ye shes bla na med/ /pad+ma ltar gsal rab 'bar ba/ /sa ni thog mar mngon par par bde/ /rgyu lam yan lag bdun

ldan pa/ /'jug gnas rgyu lam rang bzhin bcas/ /dbang gis 'jug dang rang byin brlab/ /phyi nang gsang ba mchog tu gyur/ /'bru gsum e ba~M ma yar bcas/ /'bras bu snying po phyag rgya che/ /rang bzhin med pa dag pa'i dbyings/ /'od gsal mngon par byang chub pa/ /

tshad med snying rje bsdu dngos kyis/ /nges par rab gang mi dmigs pa'o/ /sems can sna tshogs 'dul don du/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni yang dang yang / /sems bskyed gyur pas lam sbyangs te/ /mdzad pa du ma'i cho 'phrul rnams/ /rgyun mi 'chad phyir sems bskyed pa'o/ /

dri med sems ni rnam kun du/ /rang rig ye shes thogs med pas/ /'gag pa med cing skye med kyang / /sems can don du 'khor zhing lding / /byang chub sems ni mi zad pa/ /de phyir phrin las rgyun mi 'chad/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas/ /kun mkhyen ye shes

nam mkha'i dbyings/ /gdul bya'i khams dang mthun par 'jug /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgyu 'phrul gar/ /de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes brjod/ /rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /yon tan du mas rab brgyan cing / /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang / /ye shes skus

ni gzhan don phyir/ /snang ba'i 'od 'byed dag pa'i don/ /rtag tu bde ba can du bzhugs/ /bde ba chen po dbyer med cing / /thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das/ /kha sbyar sbyor ba gsang ba che/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor

pa/ /me tog dang ni de yi dri/ /dbyer med rten dang brten par gnas/ /mchog tu dag pa bdag med pa/ /sku gsum tha dad bstan pa ni/ /gdul bya'i dbang la gyur pa yin/ /khyad par yan lag nges par ni/ /sku gsum gcig tu bsdus pa'i don/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen mchog /'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa zhes/ /thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa yin/ /sbyor ba'i lam las yan lag bcu/ /rlung gi gnas su brjod par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rlung lnga dbang po lnga/ /stobs lnga de yi khyad par te/ /yan lag

rlung gi gnas pa yin/ /snga ma'i la ltos nas/ /khyad par gong du 'phel bsten/ /dad pa la sogs chos rnams yin/ /'bras bu'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang ba ye shes stobs bcur ni/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa sogs/ /khyad par thob

pa bstan pa'o/ /mthar phyin lam ni rnam gnyis te/ /slob pa'i zung 'jug dang po yin/ /rang rang rig tu bcas pa yi/ /tha dad med pa'i bde ba'i lam/ /rang bzhin dag pa gzugs kyi sku/ /blo bur dri ma rnam bsal ba/ /mnyam rjes khyad par gang gyur ba/ /rtog

pa sbyang ba sems mngon gyur/ /'dir ni ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de nyid chos rnams chos nyid de/ /de ni yang dag mi slu ba/ /de rtogs sangs rgyas yin zhes brjod/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes lam/ /sangs rgyas snying po byang chub sems/ /stong nyid seng ge'i nga ro yis/ /

log bar lta ba'i tshogs skrag mdzad/ /de las snang ba med pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsum yongs su 'byung dang po/ /mi slob zung 'jug gnyis pa ste/ /dbyer med rig ma'i skyes bur bcas/ /rgyas btab drug ldan bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rol par 'char/ /

ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste/ /sems nyid 'od gsal snying po nyid/ /chos sku dri ma med pa las/ /lus sbyangs ye shes ro gcig pa/ /rdul bral bcing grol med pa nyid/ /ting 'dzin mnyam nyid tha dad med/ /byang chub mchog ces bstan pa yin/ /'od gsal de nyid dus

kun du/ /chos nyid dang ni bsam gtan dang / /lam du byed pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /brgyal dang gnyid dang snyoms 'jug ste/ /thams cad du ni 'gyur ba med/ /rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis ster/ /sa bon rkyen dang phrad pa bzhin/ /myu gu rten 'brel tshogs las 'byung / /

rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis dang lam rnam par nges pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi/ /yi ge gnas kyi ston pa po/ /shrI gnyis med ye shes mchog grub pa/ /bde legs kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i/ /dpal ldan rnam

par thar pa'i sgo/ /shes rab snying rje dbyer med pa'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po bla na med/ /mthar thug chos rnams rab 'jug pa/ /sgyu ma'i rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub sems las kun du 'byung / /bde ba mchog las mchog grub pa/ /'khor 'das spang thob med pa

nyid/ /srid zhi mnyam pa nyid rtog pa/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam/ /bde don spros med ngang du 'dus/ /khams gsum rlung las sprul pa ni/ /rnam par shes pa yul la 'jug /de las bdag dang gzhan du rtog /rten

bcas rang stong g.yo ba yin/ /'dir ni rlung sems 'dres pa las/ /snang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin 'char/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyis bdag dang gzhan/ /tha dad mi rtog spyad pa bya/ /kun gyi bla mar gyur pa ni/ /mchog gi phyag rgya chen po'i gnas/ /kun rdzob snang ba sna tshogs pa/ /

ngo bo nyid kyis rang stong pa/ /gnas gsum tshul ni rgyud gzhan las/ /snying po 'od gsal mngon byang chub/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i yul las gzhan/ /ting 'dzin nges par 'dir bstan pa'o/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang chen rgyal po zung 'jug lam/ /

sku gsum dbyer med nam mkha'i ngang / /ye shes tha snyad las 'das pa'o/ /yon tan rdzogs shing kun dbang sgyur/ /mchog ldan rgyal po mdzes shing 'bar/ /zab dang rgya che gnyis su med/ /rang gzhan gnyis med chen po yin/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa ni/ /yang dag

nyid du rnam bshad pa/ /lha mo rnams dang skyes bu yi/ /gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir gnyis med brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las gnyis su med par ston pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen gyi gnas nges par bstan pa mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// //brtag pa gnyis pa rnam par nges pa gsal ba zhes bya ba ste gsang ba'i dpal mchog chen

po ye shes kyi de kho na nyid rab tu brjod pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku gsum mchog tu brtag pa nyid/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum gyi ngang / /brtan zhing mchog tu bzang po che/ /snying po byang chub bla med pas/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba chen po'i

dkyil 'khor du/ /rnam pa gsal zhing dag pa'i sku/ /bsdus pa'i pho brang rgya che bas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' dag /gcig tu gtso bor gyur pa'o/ /khyab par snang mdzad dkon mchog dpal/ /'od dpag med dang gdon mi za/ /rigs kyi dbye ba lnga ru brjod/ /

spyan dang mA ma kI mchog dang / /gos dkar mo dang sgrol byed ma/ /mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ /gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo bzhi/ /bar khyams gnas pa grwa bzhir dgod/ /byams pa sa yi snying po dang / /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /'jig rten dbang phyug

'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sgrib sel kun du bzang po ste/ /sems dpa' brgyad ni lha khyams la/ /khro rgyal bzhi dang ldan pas na/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga nang du dgod/ /phyi khyams dag la khro rgyal drug /de ltar sum cu rtsa gcig gis/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yin/ /

phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba/ /tshangs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /sum cu gsum par gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid du mngon par brjod pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

mi'i zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mi dmigs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams du mar snang ba'i dngos/ /ljon shing 'bras bu ldan pa bzhin/ /

phra ba'i dbye ba shes par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu gzigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod tshul kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /gnas med gnas pa'i mkha' lta bur/ /mi rtog rang byung 'od gsal ba/ /don dam dmigs med ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'bar bas rab tu brgyan

pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba dag par sdom pa'i ngo bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos rnams dngos med cing / /ngo bo nyid dag ye shes sku/ /bden pa 'dis ni khyab par byed/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ye shes gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba skyug bro rmongs pa can/ /

rab rib ldan pa'i rtog pa nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho ltar mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med ye shes rgyal mtshan tog /yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po las/ /rang bzhin bde chen gnas mchog 'grub/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha'i

lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba ma lus kun gyi gsang / /ye shes rol pa bde ba che/ /tha dad spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas gzigs pa dag pa'i dbyings kun nas sprin gyi snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub

sems/ /tshad med bde ba'i char 'bebs pa/ /rang 'byung ye shes rgyal po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa rdzogs pa dpal rgyal po bden pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo kun tu 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rgyal ba ma lus pa'i/ /ye shes sku ste skyon med pa/ /bsam pa blo yi yul las snang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal rdo rje sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun snang ye shes cir mi rtog /nam mkha'i dri med mtha' khyab stong / /rnam rtog ye shes me 'bar sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo rje dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams rin po che'i sprin kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri ma med

pa dag pa'i zhing / /pad+mo rgyas pa snang ba'i dbyings/ /rin chen 'od 'phro mi zad dang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sra ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rol pa ston pa'i dpal rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun

nas 'od kyi phreng ba dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sems su gcig /de nyid ye shes dag pa'i ngang / /dbyer med rtag pa'i tshul mchog ste/ /bde gshegs gsang

ba 'byung ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spyan yangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' dbang dam pa rnam par 'phrul ba dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba

kun gyi ye shes dbyings/ /gsang ba 'gro snying rnam dag pas/ /blang dor med pa'i bde ba thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par dbyes pa'i sku'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kun du sgrogs pa'i

snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i dba' rlabs kun/ /dbu mar gcig tu thim gyur pas/ /ye shes rgyas pa'i snying po dbye/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dri ma med pa chos kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i ye shes 'byung ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du seng ge'i rtsal gyis ni/ /zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes/ /yongs su

bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba'i yon tan 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i yon tan du ma ston pa mi gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas snang ba med pa'i dang / /rtog pas bskyod par mi 'gyur ba/ /mnyam nyid ye shes lhang nge bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi sgyu ma'i rol pa sna tshogs su ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung ba rnams dang srog bcas dang / /mi zang rtsa lcug ma lus kun/ /de bzhin nyid las snang ba yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od mi zad pa'i rin chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i mig rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus can thams

cad la/ /gdul bya dus la bab gyur na/ /nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung nas/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas der ston mdzad/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dkon pa'i tog rang 'byung du 'char ba'i ye shes rol ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rang 'byung ston pa po/ /ye shes 'jug pa 'bad med par/ /thob bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rang rig rang las rnyed par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma phan par grags pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sku kun du ston cing 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dag /gdul bya'i blo yis mthong bar byed/ /de nyid bsam pa'i

tshul gyis 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje 'dzin/ /tshe 'dis 'grub kyi gzhan du min/ /lus ngag yid ni legs gnas pa/ /med par 'grub par mi 'gyur gsungs/ /gsung gcig rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal/ /

gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyal po che/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad/ /'di med rol pa rgyu med 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa nyer bsten pa/ /zhen med ye shes longs spyod pa/ /bde bar bstan pas sangs rgyas 'thob/ /ces gsungs te/ yang dag pa'i longs spyod pa'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ shin tu bde ba chen po'i gnas/ mngon par ston pa'i le'u ste

nyer gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mi zad pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha'i gnas mi 'gyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmigs pa kun bral ba'i/ /snying rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis/ /yul rnams sgyu mar spyad par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa 'od zer dpag med gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du stong nyid chos kyi sku/ /de nyid snying rje dbyer mi phyed/ /

'bras bu snying po byang chub sems/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gdugs khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi snying / /mi shigs ye shes gcig pur bzhugs/ /'gro 'ong med cing khyab par 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes stobs mchog

seng ge'i sgra can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dus gsum du/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can ma lus la/ /rgyal ba kun

gyis dbang bskur mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa'i blo can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum skye 'gyur lus can gyi/ /lus ngag sems ni mi dmigs par/ /byang chub snying por dbang bskur mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' ba'i blo can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dbang / /rtag cing

khyab pa'i tshul du bskur/ /de nyid rnam dag dbang bskur mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po mi zad pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'tsho ba ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /glang chen myos 'dra'i spyod spangs nas/ /bar snang bya bzhin rjes chags med/ /thams cad dus su snyoms par spyad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa tog gi zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod snyoms spyod pa dran par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du grong khyer rgyu ba sogs/ /sna tshogs spyod lam bag yod pas/ /dran pas ma yengs gzhan

don phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di spyad pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen thob sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam rnam par dag pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du 'gro dang 'chag pa dang / /nyal dang zas kyi dus la sogs/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni/ /ma yengs tshul bzhin spyad par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas pa rdo rje sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas/ /bag med gnas las bzlog par bya/ /'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rnam par dag pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa dag pa'i snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus sems bde gnas

shing / /ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /dkar po'i chos la spyod par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos/ /chud mi za ba nges 'byung phyir/ /shin tu dag tshe sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de nyid phra ba rtogs par dka'/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs mtha' yas rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam spangs nas/ /bag med gnas las bzlog par bya/ /

'di ni ye shes bdud rtsi yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lta ba yang dag pa dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dag pa'i 'bras bu bde ba ste/ /ma dag pa las srid par ltung / /rnam par nges pas ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i lam rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges 'byung lam/ /de ni thar ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ /rang sems dag pa

tshul khrims mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rab rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams mi zad pa'i gter 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bla na med pa'i nor bu ni/ /zhen med ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /kun du longs spyod rang las 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad

kyis 'gro bskyob pa dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub ye shes nam mkha' ltar/ bdag med phung po la sogs stong / stong nyid sgyu mas snying rjer gnas/ de nyid tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thugs yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni chos

kyi dbyings/ 'gyur ba med cing kun rtog bral/ mi g.yo mtshan ma med pa nyid/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi shes nyon mongs nad kyis gzir/ de sel dam pa'i bdud rtsi bstan/ bla med thugs rje'i sman gyis gso/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa lha chen po nor 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'phags pa rnams kyis sbyangs pa'i lam/ nang las byung gi phyi las min/ de nyid 'bras

bu mchog las skyes/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni khyad par byin rlob cing / dpag med bde bar gshegs pa yis/ dus drug tu ni byin rlob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gnyis med ye shes dag pa las/ /ci ste min na ldeg pa

ltar/ /de bas sdug bsngal brgyud ma las/ /mthar phyin sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /mkhas pa dag ni ye shes spyod/ /ji ltar chu yi thigs pa ni/ /rgya mtshor bab na lan tshwar gyur/ /lan tshwa 'o ma'i mtshor zhugs pas/ /de nyid slar yang bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /

dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi longs spyod pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med

pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpag med stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /bdag po de nyid kun 'dus pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos byin gyis rlob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu srid pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa rnams/ /

so so'i rig pa'i rtsal gyis ni/ /snying po gcig par shes par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa med pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i dbyangs kyis 'gro ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zhing khams sbyong ba dang / /gang du 'gro ba 'dul ba dag /nam mkha'i dbyings kyis kun du brdung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

chos 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang byung stong nyid sgra/ /gdul bya mos pa'i snang ba la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du bsgrags/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde gnas dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i gnas mi phyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams zag med 'od gsal ba/ /skye ba med cing shin tu phra/ /mtshan nyid dngos pos

stong pa'i chos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sna tshogs sems can sems rgyud ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rang stong pas/ /mi phyed ye shes gnas pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du ma smin smin byed dang / /smin pa grol phyir 'bad pa ste/ /ye shes spyod pa byang chub che/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

phal chen rgyal ba kun du rtog pa nges par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po mi rtag skad cig ma/ /de nyid slu ba'i chos can phyir/ /'dzin pa med pa'i gnas zhes bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa'i dngos/ /dbu ma ye shes rtog bral bas/ /mtha' las 'das pa zung du 'jug /gsang ba gnyis med tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi gsang ba ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/ /chos gang 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /rnam par rtog pa rab zhi

ba/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtog pa'i dra ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /rtog pa med cing dmigs med pas/ /mtha' yas dri ma med pa'i sku/ /snying po byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i gdul dka' ba spangs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra'i dbyangs sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying po rdo rje stong nyid dang / /dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag /rtog pa med cing dmigs med pas/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i stobs rims nad med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang du nad rnams bya ba'i gzhi/ /las dang nyon mongs rtog las spyad/ /de nyid gnas las dag par bya/ /thams cad ye shes spyod pas sbyong / /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par snang ba'i dpal sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi

ljon shing dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog /gsang ba zab dang rgya che'i dbyings/ /spang blang med par grol ba nyid/ /gnyug ma byang chub tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po don sgyu 'phrul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /

gcig las du mar snang byed cing / /de nyid du mar yongs sprul pa/ /sgyu 'phrul byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan 'dzin pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'byung ba rnams dang khams gsum dang / /rnam shes ye shes khams 'dus pa/ /rten dang brten pa sbyang bar bya/ gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes

bus byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma'i snang ba kun du ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa dag pas snang ba dag /rang lus dag pas rnam shes dag /ye shes spyod pas rnam par spyad/ /

'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul zla ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rmi lam dag par ni/ /

rdo rje blo yis rnam par sbyang / /de nyid ye shes rgyal ba yis/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje phal cher sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams kun gyi snang ba'i gnas/ /rin chen 'od kyis rnam par spras/ /sgyu ma tsam du ston pa nyid/ /snying po ye shes gzhir gyur pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ma lus par bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho sprin tshogs las/ /dus gsum kun tu dge ba yi/ /zhing khams

ye shes 'od kyi sku/ /chos rnams sems kyi snang las 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug bcom ldan gyis/ /ye shes spyod pas bsgrub pa yi/ /lhan cig spyod pa bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar mi gnas

nam mkha' ni/ /khyab cing mtshan nyid med pa nyid/ /don dam de nyid dmigs med de/ /brjod pa spangs pa stong pa che/ /mi shigs gsang ba bla na med/ /kun du bzang po zhes grags pa/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /ye shes rtag pas

chos kyi sku/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan gang / /rnam pa gsal bar 'char ba ltar/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ /snang ba me long lta bur brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /ye shes rang rig gzhan rig pa/ /tha dad

med par thugs chud pas/ /de nyid mnyam nyid ye shes brjod/ /gdod nas dag cing skye ba med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes la/ /so sor rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /kun nas ma lus sangs rgyas kyi/ /mdzad pa sna tshogs la

spyod pas/ /bde bar gshegs gnas gcig mdzad pas/ /khyab pa nan tan ye shes brjod/ /gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/ /thams cad las grol de yi tshe/ /rnal 'byor mchog thob rdo rje 'dzin/ /shin tu rnam dag ye shes brjod/ /mchog gyur rgyal ba'i

'byung gnas ni/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pas/ /rab tu mi gnas ye shes gzhi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rang byung dri ma med pa ni/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis/ /gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid/ /

mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bsam mi khyab pa nyid kyis gcod/ /rtog pa'i dri ma'i dra ba yis/ /rin chen sems ni dri mar byas/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid/ /dri ma bral phyir sangs rgyas brjod/ /ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsang chen gyi gnas yongs su brjod pa la rab tu dga' ba'i don ched du brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa

nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad stong pa mi 'gyur che/ /ye shes dam pa ston pa pos/ /kun du gsang ba bka' stsal to/ /

dam chos snying po bcud las byung / /sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/ /shes rab thabs ni tshul thob byed/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang / /'dod yon kun la sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad longs

spyod tshul gcig pas/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bshad do/ /mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pas na/ /sprul pa'i sku zhes 'dir bshad yin/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub

phyir/ /shes nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgom/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rgyal ba chos sku ye shes nyid/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs skad cig gis/ /ye shes mi zad rgya mtsho ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi phyed rdo rje dbang phyug

nyid/ /gnyis med mnyam par ro gcig pas/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rang byung du/ /grub pa bde chen ngo bo nyid/ /thob med thob pas cig car grol/ /spangs thob med pa mnyam nyid che/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

ye shes kyi gnas 'byung ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i rdo rje ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po ye shes bde chen po/ /byang chub

rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mi zad pa sred med kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbyangs kun du bskul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag med dngos po med pa ru/ /ma skyes zag pa med pa'i ngang / /spros pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba

skyob dbul po nges pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glang po'i rtsal thogs pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid

de/ /rang sems zla ba kun+da ltar/ /sa bon gnas te rgyu yi cha/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa ye shes mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa'i mdzod rdo rje

dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs/ /rab tu mi gnas brjod med pa/ /byang chub sems su gcig pas na/ /thams cad dbyer med dag par brjod/ /

ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i nor bu'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gang / /stong gsum 'jig

rten rang gi lus/ /phyi nang gnyis med ye shes che/ /gsang ba zab pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tog gi 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba skyob pa'i don du ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can cho 'phrul gyis/ /gdul bya ye shes lam la bkod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mchod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mkha' lding rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du byams pa'i 'od kyis ni/ /'gro ba kun la khyab

par bya/ /des ni dpag med gzhan don du/ /mtshungs med ye shes gnas thob pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po sbas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byams pas bdud dpung 'joms mdzad cing / /snying rje g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyis phyir mi ldog /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ye shes rdo rje'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen 'bar ba glog gi 'od/ /dri med chu shel

zer 'bab pas/ /tha mal lus ni rgyal bar bsgyur/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rigs sna tshogs su ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lha mo bye ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig tshogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brgya dang / /bde gshegs stong sogs tshul 'dir bstan/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri rab lhun po brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po sgyu ma'i rol pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos/ /

ngo bo nyid dag rang byung ba/ /bdag med ye shes gnas med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' 'dul ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mchog tu sa yi mthar thug pa/ /bcu gsum ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas bla na med/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das pad+mo'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas mi zad pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mnyam nyid ye shes dang / /'gro ba'i bla ma chos don gyis/ /tshad med

thugs rjes yongs su bsdu/ /de nyid mi rtog gsang ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas chos kyi sgra 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sdud cing spro ba dang / /mtshan bcas dmigs pa med pa ru/ /ye shes rgyal la phyag rgyas btab/ /'di ni dag pa'i don ston pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grogs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

gsang ba nges par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang ba til 'bru bzhin/ /sems can smin cing grol byed pas/ /ye shes mngon par bsdus pa

yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyon mongs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dngos dang dngos med pas/ /

mi phyed ye shes bde ba che/ /sna tshogs 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang / /ye shes phyag rgya chen por bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam bu'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi spyod yul bas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mi dmigs bzhin/ /don dam thob tu med pa'i don/ /gzhi med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa spos bzang rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pas lta ngan skrag par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan gzhi med/ /gang du ro mnyam zung 'jug

pas/ /dbyer med rtogs pa rgyal po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor rangs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su 'gro ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi g.yo 'gyur ba med pa las/ /de bzhin nyid du bstan pa yis/ /'jug cing 'byung ba gsang ba che/ /snying po ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde grags dpal

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos grub snying po bdud rtsi'i bcud/ /grub pa'i bla ma'i gdams pa las/ /thob 'gyur de bas gzhan du min/ /gsang

ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mdzad pa'i sna tshogs gdul don du/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul dag gis/ /theg pa mchog tu yongs grags pa'i/ /rdo rje

theg pa'i lam gyur 'di/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i/ /thugs kyi snying po gsang ba yin/ /sku dang gsung gi rdo rje 'dir/ /snying po kun du 'dus pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor bas ni rtag tu spros/ /'dir ni sngon chad bstan pa'ang med/ /ma 'ongs pa na'ang 'byung

bar dka'/ /de bas gsang chen rnyed dka' bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten du/ /'byung bar 'gyur ram ma byon yang / /gsang ba'i yi ge rnam dag pa/ /'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i gnas/ /

gsang chen rang 'byung mnyam pa nyid/ /dpal mchog 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshul/ /ye shes chen po'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gsang ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar dka' bar gdams shing

bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// //de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni srid pa'i dra ba dag /rnam par gcod cing ye shes mes/ /sdug

bsngal gnas 'di bsreg par bya/ /de nyid bde ba kun gyi gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgra gcan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i ri bo 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa sna tshogs las bcas pa/ /g.yeng bas sdug bsngal phung por gyur/ /de bsal ye shes byang chub sems/ /blang dor med pa'i ngang du gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag

rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas/ /mi phyed ye shes bdag nyid gyur/ /de nyid phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas/ /thams cad sdom par shes par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan seng ge'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems rgyud sna tshogs chos nyid gcig par gyur/ /de nyid dang la

dag pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog /dbyer med byang chub sems kyi snang ba las/ /gsang ba bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan dgyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam rtog gi ri bo 'joms pa

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog las rnam byung ba/ de nyid 'joms pa'i rdo rje ni/ /stong nyid bde chen byang chub sems/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du byams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don gang spyod/ sna tshogs ngo bo nyid med pas/ de nyid

mi dmigs tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ye shes la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po

snang med pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don/ gnas med bden gnyis dbyer med pa/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che mnga' pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod pa mi 'gyur pa dbyangs zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dbyings/ thos bsam bsgom pas rtogs dka' ba/ gsang ba'i ye shes dag pa che/ dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul gsang ba rdo rje dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam dag 'od gsal dri ma med/ /ma skyes nam mkha'i

bdag nyid kyis/ /sgyu ma dngos las rnam grol byed/ /de nyid tshul 'di bshad pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer snang ba'i ngos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi glu'i dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bdag nyid can/ /'dus byas rtog las rnam grol ba/ /'dus ma byas pa rdo rje'i ngang / /de nyid dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod spu ldan pa

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /'du

'bral med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub gdul bya la ster bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir

ni so so rang rig pa/ /ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i lam/ /de nyid lam du bsgom pa'i mchog /bsam gtan ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi na bza' mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nor bu'i snying po bsam 'phel bzhin/ /rtog med bsam pa rdzogs byed pa/ /rang byung chos kyi sgra ston pas/ /mi gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog rdo rje'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid dang zhi bar mi gnas pa/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dam pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsum lam gyi ye shes

bcas/ /sa gsum dag pa'i dbang phyug thob/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che sna tshogs pa'i mdangs bkod pa/ rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rjes su dran pa'i gnas ni mthong ba'i lam/ /ye shes skad cig dga' ba bcu drug las/ /phyi nang gnas pas 'od gsal don rtogs pa/ /stong nyid rang 'byung rnam dag tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen seng ge'i nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i rgya mtsho mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs snang ba du mar 'char ba nyid/ /yul ni sgyu ma dngos po

gdod nas dag /dag pa'i ngo bo chos dbyings nam mkha' che/ /sems snang rol pa gsang ba 'dir bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma btsal ma spangs ngang gis dag pa'i sku/ /rnyed par mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde ba che/ /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ni lhun grub pa/ /byang chub sems chen gsang ba theg pa'i mchog /ces gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba mtshan rab 'bar ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams/ /

sems can kun gyi lus la nges par bzhugs/ /dbri bsnan med par 'char pas gsal bar byed/ /de nyid sbas pa'i don du tshul 'di bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gzhal

yas khang nye bar brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang / /tshad med bkod pas rab spras pa/ /rgyan rnams bye brag mtha' yas tshogs/ /snang bde nyid tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma dmad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma'i chos rnams mkha' lta bur/ /dag pa'i

ye shes rang srog go/ /snying gi pad+ma sad par bya/ /de las ye shes blo rgyas pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de dag kun gyi gsang / /ye shes dam pa mchog grub pa/ /gsang chen ye shes lam 'di yis/ /'dod dang thar bar bsgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba chen po'i ye shes kyi don gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i

'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes mchog tu gsang ba gang / /de nyid bsdus par gyur pa ste/ /rtog pa'i dra ba gcod

mdzad yin/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang du sangs rgyas 'od zer snang bas khyab/ /de nyid 'dom gang 'od ni dpa' rlabs gnyis/ /gnyis med gcig tu dag pas dbu ma nyid/ /dbyer med ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi byang chub kyi shing mchog la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen brtan pa'i ljon pa'i shing / /de nyid byang chub sems las byung / /skyes pa sems bskyed rten gyur

pas/ /rang byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos chen po rnams kyis dpag par dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

zab pa shin tu zhi ba'i gnas/ /rdul med rnyog pa med pa'i thugs/ /bsam gtan rdo rje tshad med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa chen po

rnams kyis brtag par dka' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas pa med pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /khyu mchog chen po byang chub sems/ /rang gzhan mi phyed mi dmigs pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa kha lo sgyur ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /
