'khor ba'i rgyun 'di mya ngan 'das/ /de nyid spang du med pas na/ /ye shes shes rab rab gnas pas/ /dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes phyir mi 'ong ba rnams

kyis rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang phyir ldog pa med pa'i sems/ /'di ni ye shes chen po'i ngang / /bla na med pa snying po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug na rin po che'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams gsum snang ba

sems yin phyir/ /sems de stong nyid rgyu med pas/ /gang du dri med gzhan don 'byung / /'di ni tshul chen gsang ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa snyems bral sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zag med 'byung ba med/ /khams dang dbang po yul med par/ /shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lus kyi kun du spyod pa yi/ /rdzu

'phrul snang ba bstan nas 'dul byed pa/ /rang 'byung bsam gtan thob ste ltos med pa/ /gsang ba 'dir gnas ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba tshangs pas dmigs su

med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma med cing mtha' med pas/ /srid rtser mi gnas dbang phyug che/ /dngos po med cing rtag pa che/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas brgya byin gyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ma 'khrug rtog pa med/ /ye shes rgyal

ba kun gyi yul/ /gzugs sogs yul ni rtog tu med/ /thams cad dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lha drag pos dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyon mongs 'ching bdag pa yi/ /sred len rkyen gol log pas na/ /dmigs med ye shes gsang ba nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dga'

ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba khyab 'jug gis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang nas gang du khyab bya ngo bos stong / /thams cad bdag med stong pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /sems can

khams med 'jug par mi gnas pas/ /ye shes chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba lha ma yin rnams kyi dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sa 'og sa steng dang / /sa bla rnams su bstan pa yi/ /dngos grub bdud rtsi thob byed pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal na tshod bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi ye shes gsang ba klu rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku/ /dug med gdug pa rnam bral bas/ /skyon med gtsang ba'i rang bzhin can/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mngon par rol pa srin mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag med mnyam pa nyid thob pas/ /grub pa med pa'i gnas la ni/ /'chi med ye shes tshul mchog gis/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin

chen phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa ye shes nam mkha'i bu mo rnams kyis dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mkha' la spyod 'gro ba'i/ /gya gyur spyod pa'i ye shes can/ /de nyid de

zhes rnam brtags pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba thams cad kyi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen gter 'chang mdzod po che/ /nor gyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas/ /de nyid sa dbang bde gshegs rgyal/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gnas pa'i dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyis sbas pa 'jig rten pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi skye dgu'i chos las dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skyes bu chen po thams cad kyi/ /ye shes gnas ni

mnyam med pas/ /rang gzhan mi phyed byang chub che/ /sems dpa' tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gang du 'gro la gnas gyur pa'i/ /gsang chen 'dir ni gnas gyur na/ /gang la'ang dri mar mi 'gyur zhing / /dgag par bya ba ci yang med/ /las rnams thams cad

byas kyang ni/ /rang byung skur ni rnam par grol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dag pa'i skyes bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// //de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ye shes dag pa'i gnas/ /rin chen phung po gsal

ba yi/ /dang zhing yid 'phrog 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /sa le sgrib med tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par skye ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /mngon par 'byung ba 'phags pa'i lam/ /nyes pa spongs pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /rnam par mthor gshegs 'og min te/ /zab pa brjod med tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po mthong ba sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgyal ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /chos kun mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'jig rten 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa gcig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin

'dzin/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ /mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rtog pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gnas/ /cher mi g.yo ba rang bzhin med/ /rtsol med 'byung bdag pa yi/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal

ldan shing rta chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe byad las 'das pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcom ldan so so rang rig pa/ /gtso bo dpe bral ye shes te/ /bdag po kun 'gro kun khyab pas/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po mi dmigs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /byed pa po dang 'phrog pa rang med/ 'di ni dpal ldan rang byung sems/ /dngos po gsal dang mi gsal mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba bkod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chen po bla na

med pa bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis med gnyis las grol ba yi/ /ye shes rang las skye bar 'gyur/ /de nyid mngon rgyu spong byed pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa gdegs par mdzad pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad snang ba yang dag pa rdo rje gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po med pa sgom pa min/ /dngos por yang dag bsgom du med/ /gang du

ro mnyam mchog gi dngos/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems

can kun gyi bsam pa 'di/ /'jigs pa med pa'i ngang gnas na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med gnas/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'od 'phro'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes blo gros

mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab mkha' la rnam par gnas/ snying rjes sad pa'i mda' yis ni/ bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'bigs/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshan rnam par grol ba'i dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems dang shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ rnam grol mtha' la mi gnas pa'o/ /dgos pa kun gyi

'ching ba bral/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen spos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis

med bde ba mchog tu zhi/ mkha' mnyam rtog pa las grol ba/ gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos bstan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug gnas pa che/ brtan g.yo dag pa'i tshul mchog gis/ dbyer med tshul 'di dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud dpung thams cad pham par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa ngan pas brtags pa yi/ phyi rol yul ni

rdzas stong pas/ thabs dang shes rab rnam dag nyid/ ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nor bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dra ba gcod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po gcig nyid kyi/ nang du snod bcud dngos po'i chos/ kun rdzob bden pas stong ba'i phyir/ 'dus pa der gnas tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang pos byin bas sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gnyis med ngang gnas pa/ /rang bzhin brtag tshogs rab zhi bas/ /snang gsum ye shes dag gyur ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma sangs rgyas srid pa'i tshang tshing 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi rol nga rgyal log bcom ste/ /ye shes gcig pu bdag dag

pas/ /rang byung bsam pa rnam par dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis log rtog 'joms pa'i ri bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun tu rtog pa rab spangs nas/ /'dod chags chags bral ye shes las/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi 'byung gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ /'dir nyid tha dad rtog min zhing / /gzugs dang rnam thar sgo thim pas/ /chos rgyun thob

phyir bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rtags dang bcas 'byung ba/ /gang yin mtshan ma spangs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rang byung ngo bo ye shes bdag nyid de/ /rtogs pas stong pa'i bde ba mi zad yin/ /rlung gi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug pa

ni/ /bde ba rang sems ngo bo dam pas ni/ /tshim 'gyur de las gzhan du g.yo mi 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid gnas pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dam pa'i mdzod chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bstan pa'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi 'gyur ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba dri ma med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin

gshegs kun 'dus pa yi/ /sangs rgyas spro bsdu'i 'khor lo yis/ /rtse mor gyur pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par skyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chos rdo rje

rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang byung ye shes zhi ba'i dngos/ /dag pa rnam dben mngon par 'byung / /phun sum tshogs pa lam gyur gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpe med pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting ge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lha dang lha mo dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dpag med pa/ /

ye shes las skyes mtshungs med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdug pa can rnams gdul bya'i phyir/ /snying rjes gtum pa'i nga ro yis/ /tshar gcad pa nyid bla med bsgral/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i rgyal

po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge la 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dang lha min lto 'phye dang / grul bu ma la sogs sna tshogs pas/ /bstod cing mchod pa'i ye shes

gnas/ /rin chen 'khor lo brjod pa yin/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i nor bu rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /de nas ye shes nor bu ni/ /sna tshogs 'dod pa don byed pa/ /dpag med yon tan 'byung ba'i dbyings/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad+ma'i phreng ba rjes su

dran ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'dam skyes me tog dang / /chu skyes pad+ma gsal ba yang / /'bar ba kha phye 'od khyab pas/ /dag pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtsegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las kyi ral gri rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog pa gcod pa dag /rnam par bdud

tshogs rab 'joms pas/ /ye shes me 'od rgyas pa yis/ /kun du rgyas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs 'dul ba rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya 'bi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs rgyal brgya mtsho'i drung / /gsang ba mi zad mchod pa'i gzhi/ /de nyid kun du khyab byed pas/ /gsang ba dag pa'i mchod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags pa

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sku yi 'dul ba mtha' yas pa/ /sna tshogs zhing khams spyod mdzad pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sbyin pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni brjod pa kun gyi

gzhi/ /thabs dang shes rab sgra rnams las/ /sna tshogs skad du chos ston pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dag par byed pa khrus yin te/ /sgrib ba 'phyag byed spyod lam du/ /thal sbyar 'dud pas bag yod lam/ /dran ldan tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden

par gsungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rin chen sna bdun rang byung ba'i/ /yon tan sgyu rtsal sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad bsam pa'i stobs yin pas/ /

de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho byed gsung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bzang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sna tshogs dbang po'i rim/ /de nyid thabs tshul tha dad pas/ /ldog pa'i dbye ba du mar bstan/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa na tshod bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge

'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rigs can sna tshogs du ma'i snang ba la/ /ye shes rang 'byung 'gag pa med par ni/ /thugs rje chen po mi zad stobs la 'byung / /sangs rgyas

kun gyi phrin las tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i tshogs can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro bo rjes su dran pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gdug pa

'dul byed pa/ /'byung po ma lus tsar gcad cing / /rjes su gzung phyir khro bar bstan/ /de nyid thugs rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par nges pa'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can rjes su dran par zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmig pas 'jug med par/ /sna tshogs khams gsum skye gnas pa/ /mi g.yo ngag las snang med par/ /chos dbyings gcig par tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang gi skye bas bsdus pa'i dngos/ /stong nyid gcig tu ma skyes pas/ /skye ba

med pa'i tshul can te/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal pa dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa rdo rje rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

ngo mtshar sna tshogs 'phrul ba yi/ /gzo yi gnas dang gso sbyong sogs/ /mkhyen pas thabs la mkhas par bya/ /de nyid ye she tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba rjes su dran

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /blo snang yul dag dbang po yis/ /du ma'i dngos po snang ba la/ /ldog pa dang ni rjes su 'gro/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lus gnas cha

shas med par rtogs/ /nges 'byung de bzhin cha shas med/ /cha shas can dang cha med pa/ /shes nas 'dir grol the tshom med/ /dngos po thams cad mnyam pa ste/ /myur du 'jug pa dka' ba nyid/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs rnams par spangs/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od

gsal zhing / /gnyug ma 'dir ni snang ba ste/ /spyod pa'i yul las 'das pa yin/ /rtsod med zhi ba mtshon bya med/ /nges pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /skal ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /shin tu stong zhing rdul med pas/ /sgra las 'das shing yon tan spangs//

dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / /thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ /'gro

ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du

dngos po rnam dag pas/ /yul rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can/ /dus gsum gcig par bsdus pa yis/ /thams cad mkhyen par tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs grags pa'i mchog sangs rgya thams cad kyi

tshul khrims phyi rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul las ni/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam gcad cing / /dben pa nyon mongs las ldog gang / /tshul 'di gsang ba

thob pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rab zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus gang yid kyi las rnams

la/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don du/ /dpag med dka' sbyad khur byed pa/ /ye shes bzod pa chen po yin/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nor bu'i zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyir mi ldog par gzhan don du/ /byang chub sems kyi brtson pa yis/ /tshad med dbugs 'byin chen po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

ba drag shul 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan rdo rje mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten bsam gtan bzhi gnas shing / /ye shes bsam gtan mchog spyod pas/ /

phyi nang rtsol med ngang las ni/ /byang chub sems kyi tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba thub pa brtul zhugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyis sems gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /snying po byang chub mchog sems las/ /tha dad rgyas thebs gcig pa'i sku/ /ye shes de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa 'gro bas kun du mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du dri med dge ba ni/ /rten 'brel sna tshogs spyod pa'i dang / /rkyen las 'byung

ba bla na med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i tshogs 'chang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub sems 'di

gsungs so/ /bdud tshogs rnams las nas rgyal ba/ /de nyid ye shes rlung las ni/ /zag med zhi bas mchog tu bde/ /gnyis med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba 'jig rten bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams rnams dag rnams dang ma dag dang / /gdul dka'i sems can rnams phyir 'dul bar ni/ /phung ba me tog bzhin

du rab 'jug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang chen seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /ye shes gang du 'du ba yi/ /ye shes mngon par 'byung ba gang / /de nyid chags med rnam dag pas/ /byang tshub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po dbang phyug

gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du rgyas pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbang phyug gis/ /lhun grub phyag rgyas rab rgyas pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spong ba'i rdo rje mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par spyod pa sna tshogs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa

mtshungs med spyod/ /'di ni sngags kyi spyod mchog ste/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul thob pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u rab tu rgyas par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

bar zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal gyi stobs mchog ste/ /dri med chu skyes yongs 'dzin pa/ /phra ba ge sar mchog thob pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun du dri ma med/ /bskyod pa med cing 'dzin bral bas/ /chos nyid dang du ro mnyam

pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mnga' dbang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'brug sgra dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

chos rnams kun gyi snang ba ni/ /rtogs dka' bdag med mtshan ma med/ /byams pa'i rang bzhin gzhan phan brtson/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du

'jam dbyangs ka la bid ka'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gsung gi gnas/ /yan lag drug cu thogs med du/ /'gyur ba'i brjod pa las skyes pa'i/ /skad du ye shes tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje dgyes ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag stong ba yis//

rtag tu mnyam pa'i tshul gnas nas/ /'gyur med sna tshogs khyab byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i chu klung skems par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa 'di nyid sbang med par/ /mi gnas mnyam pa'i ngang las ni/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa rlung shugs bcu pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye gnas 'byung las gyur pa la/ /'dod pa'i snang ba 'gro zhing lding / /de nyid sems can

gnas mthong phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la dgyes pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha klu thams cad kyis mchod pa rdo rje zhes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mchod phyir ye shes kyi/ /chags med kun tu bzang po yi/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs thogs med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bul ba don yod pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsang

ba gsum gyi mthar/ /rdo rje bkod pa snying po che/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa'i/ /ye shes snang ba bstan pa'o/ /rang lus lhar gsal byang chub sems/ /gang du srog dbus bzhugs pa na/ /A li kA li mnyam

sbyor bas/ /man ngag gis ni rlung bsdus te/ /de tshe bzlas pa brtan gyur pas/ /de nyid ye shes mchog thob 'gyur/ /mi g.yo mi rtog phra ba'i sems/ /mi mngon gsal min dbu mar bzhugs/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mchog ces bya/ /stong pa nyid dang mnyam

sbyor bas/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /de nyid gsal bas bde ba ni/ /sgyu ma goms pas 'chang bar 'gyur/ /ji srid sgyu ma la gsal ba/ /de srid goms pas 'jug par bya/ /rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob pas/ /rang dge'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /

de nyid ye shes bde chen po/ /thig le'i gzugs can gcig pu nyid/ /snying dbus mi shigs sems gcig bdag /de nyid ye shes rang stong pa/ /sgyu mar ngo bo nyid kyis gsal/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i blos/ /

mkhas pas mthong bas brtag par bya/ /thog mtha' med pa'i ye shes ni/ /ma byung bcos min lhan cig skyes/ /rang rig gnas ni 'dir thob pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba chen po la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ye shes sa gzhi las/ /sna tshogs myu gu bskyed

pa'i rgyu/ /rten 'brel tshogs phyir thob pa nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyal po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyes par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs pa/ /rin chen bdun dang nye bdun gyis/ /brgyan zhing mchod pas bde de thob/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

mthu chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus kyang sems la mi gnas te/ /sems kyang ngag la mi gnas te/ /kun du gnas med mkha' lta bur/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs mchod pa'i bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mchog

stsol bkra shis rgyun du ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /skyes bu de la stsol ba ster/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsil ba'i char 'bebs

pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'dod chags la sogs pas/ /zil gnon de las thar ba yi/ /char bas zug rngu sel byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid sku rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams kun la khyab gyur pa'i/ /lus can kun la rnam par snang / /

de nyid rdo rje'i skur gyur pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gsung rdo rje ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong gsum khams su grags byed pa/ /gling kun skad cig dbyangs kyis ston/ /du mar de nyid ston pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi thugs rdo rje ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'khor los sgyur ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor los dbang bskur bzhin/ /'gro kun ye shes dbang bskur ba'i/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bsgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gang / /chos nyid

mnyam pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /mtshungs med da ltar 'dir rtogs na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du 'phrul ba'i spyod pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /ma dag dag par gang bsgyur ba/ /thams cad blo gros bzang po thob/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

yon tan rgya chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud kyi 'ching ba las 'das phyir/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po yis/ /khams

gsum kun la khyab par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten snang bar byed pa re re zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'od gsal shin tu rnam dag pa/ /dngos po ma spangs ye shes che/ /chos dbyings klong na bde bar gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dpal gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje'i gdugs kyis khyab par byed

pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye bas bsdus pa'i sems can rnams/ /skyob phyir tshad med gdugs kyis ni/ /kun nas kun du khyab par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud ma lus pa 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /log lta ma lus mun pa'i gzhi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sgron

me yis/ /skad cig gcig la sel mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa go cha bgos pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje mchog tu sra ba snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /yan lag bzhi ldan mtshon cha mchog /de nyid bsrung ba bla na med/ /pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa po/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs thabs rol pa/ /'bar phreng du ma'i spro ba can/ /mi zad ye shes byang chub sems/ /stong nyid de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang po sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dung bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas par/ /rab ston dam pa'i chos kyi sgra/ /rnam pa kun du grags pa'i

dbyangs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa chos kyi gaN+DI rab tu brdungs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

gang du chos kyi don ston pa/ /tshad med bsdu dngos bzhi dag gis/ /sdud cing grol byed theg pa'i mchog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i sa 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che sgrog pa

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa med pa rin chen rnga/ /bde gshegs gsungs ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu skul ba'i sgra 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ni/ /rtog med

ye shes khams 'jug pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa ni/ /byang chub tshul mchog bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ /rig pa'i lha mo sna tshogs dang / /thabs cig rol pa bstan mdzad de/ /gsang ba gsungs pa'i

don brjod do/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang / /dngos po ci bzhin rang rig la'ang / /rgyu 'bras bye brag tha dad pa/ /ma 'dres ye shes tshul du gnas/ /nang gnas ji bzhin phyi rol 'byung / /bar ma gsang ba mchog spyod pa/ /rmad du byung ba chen po ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyi

ye shes gang / /de nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar byed/ /de nyid gnyis su med pa yi/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba bde ba che/ /rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/ /bskrad dang gsad dang dbye ba dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams

ni/ /thabs gzhan med par gyur pa la/ /thog ma dbus dang mtha' rnams su/ /gang gis snying rje ma nyams la/ /de nyid de yis byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan du bstan pa'i don las dman/ /nye bar 'grub par dka' bar gsungs/ /de nyid gsang ba'i spyod

yul min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// //

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po chen po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin du mas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba bsdus pa'i dgongs rgyud de/ /mi phyed ye shes mchog sgrub pa/ /bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus shing gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs

kyi rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po de dag gi sems kyi kun du rtog pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang du yang 'di ltar

lhan cig g.yo ba dang ldan pas dbang po sgo lnga'i rjes su mngon par 'gro la snang ba dbang po don dang brang ba dbang po don dang phrad par gyur ba mched pa gsal ba las dbang pos dngos por dmigs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'o/ /gal te sems de nyid dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma gyur na de lta na'ang 'di dag sems nyid yin pas

rnam pa thams cad du phyi rol gyi don skye ba yod pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar ma lus pa'i rang bzhin 'di dag brtags pas stong pa'i sems nyid de/ skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par yongs su gsal

ba'o/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /lus dang sems ni dbyer med de/ /rten dang brten pa 'jug ldog gis/ /kun gyi gnas su shes par bya/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje stong nyid de/ /dbus gnas mngon par byang chub brjod/ /de nyid me long ye shes ldan/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtag /nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes te/ /bdun dang ldan pa'i dbus nyid du'o/ /sngags ni dbus su gnas gyur gang / /sa bon so sor rtog pa ste/ /mngon par byang chub pa nyid do/ /rdo rje la sogs gang gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor

bsgom par bya/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum rtsa gsum brjod par bya/ /sku gsum lus ngag yid yin te/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub brjod/ /rnam par 'phro bar bsam bya ste/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma dang / /nor bu ral gri 'bar ba

las/ /'gro drug rtog pa gcod phyir te/ /ye shes drug pa'i bdag nyid can/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/ /bla med mngon par byang chub brjod/ /lus ngag yid ni byang chub pa/ /gsang ba dngos po'i don yin te/ /lus ni byang chub rnam lnga dang / /rtsa dang

byang chub sems dang ni/ /mi gtsang rdzas dang rnam rtog gis/ /lus kyi chos ni gnas pa yin/ /ngag ni 'byung ba lnga dag dang / /yi ge sgra dang sngags rnams te/ /brjod pa dang ni dbyangs rnams kyis/ /ngag gi chos ni bsdus pa yin/ /sems ni ye shes lnga dag dang / /thig

le bde ba nyid dang ni/ /snang ba gsum dang mi rtog pas/ /sems kyi chos ni gnas pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems kyi dngos/ /srid gsum chos dang chos min dang / /sa 'og sa steng sa bla ba/ /skye gnas 'byung ba brtan g.yor bcas/ /sems nyid lus ni

nam mkha'i khams/ /gzhi dang rten dang khyab byed pa'o/ /mi gsal pha zhing brtag dka' bas/ /rnam par shes pa'i snang ba la/ /snang ba mngon par thob pa las/ /bag chags sa bon yul rnams kyis/ /thams cad rang las 'byung ba nyid/ /mi gnas ye shes lus

la gnas/ /ye shes lus ni 'gag med de/ /dngos med stong par mi 'gyur te/ /lus med lus ni ro mnyam pa/ /lus la thog ma dmigs su med/ /tha ma 'gag ba med pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum du rnam sbas pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sku/ /'di ni

'khor 'das kun gyi rtsa/ /nyams dang myong ba dbyer med de/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong gzugs can yin/ /bde dang gsal ba mi rtog pas/ /snang ba gsum gyi rnam pa ste/ /de nyid zhen pas 'ching bas na/ /srid pa gsum ni rtag pa'i dngos/ /phra ba'i lus

ngag yid gsum la/ /gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ye shes/ /rdo rje gsum du gsang ba nyid/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'gro kun bde gshegs rang bzhin can/ /lus ni sna tshogs mi bzad pas/ /sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /du ma'i

gzugs kyis ston par byed/ /'gro ba chos lam dpal ldan pas/ /ngag gi brjod pa mtha' yas pa/ /gsung gi gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /sgra dbyangs so so'i skad du sgrogs/ /sems can sangs rgyas snying po can/ /sems ni dran rtog dpag med pas/ /

thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /sems can sku gsung dbyer med pas/ /lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed pa/ /rdo rje gsum du rtag gnas pas/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes sku/ /dbyer med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa

brjod du med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /kun du bzang pos legs zhus pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir gsungs pa yi/ /rlung gi dbye dus mtshan nyid dang / /spro bsdu rim pa rgyu tshul dang / /khyad par gsang ba bshad du gsol/ /

de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba'i dbyings nas bka' stsal pa/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /de la rlung gi mtshan nyid ni/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /

mgon po rdo rje re re la'ang / /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo ni/ /re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ru mngon par brjod/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rnams/ /mkhas pas shes nas spyad par bya/ /rlung gi bye brag bstan pa ni/ /tho rangs khyab gnas

dus yin te/ /spyi bo'i gnas las kun khyab pas/ /yi ge a ru mngon par brjod/ /de ni sku yi bzlas pa'o/ /nam nangs thur sel dus yin te/ /gsang ba'i gnas su 'byung bas na/ /A zhes brjod pa dbyangs yin no/ /rdo rje gsung gi bzlas par brjod/ /

nyi ma shar ba mnyam gnas rlung / /lte ba'i gnas su brjod pa yi/ /i zhes sgra tsam du brjod pas/ /rdo rje yon tan bzlas pa ste/ /cung zad dros pas drod yin te/ /snying ga'i gnas su mi shigs pas/ /yi ge I ru mngon par ni/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bzlas pa

ste/ /phyed dus gyen du rgyu ba nyid/ /mgrin pa'i gnas las bskyed pas na/ /u zhes thung rgyu ngag tu gyur/ /rdo rje thogs med bzlas par bshad/ /phyed yol dus su rgyu ba'i rlung / /mig la gnas pa'i rnam pa yis/ /U zhes rab tu brjod pa nyid/ /rdo rje

'dod chags bzlas par brjod/ /dgongs ka rab tu rgyu ba nyid/ /rna ba la ni rab gnas pa/ /e zhes kun gyi brda ru brjod/ /mtshan mo'i cha la rnam par rgyu/ /sna yi rnam shes ldan pa ste/ /ai zhes gsang ba ser sna 'dzin/ /rdo rje gti mug bzlas par brjod/ /

srod la shin tu rgyu ba ste/ /lce la mngon par dbang bas na/ /o zhes sna tshogs sgra brjod pa/ /'gog pa khro bo'i bzlas par brjod/ /nam phyed yang dag rab rgyu ba/ /ba spu'i tshigs kun khyab pas na/ /au zhes tshig tu smra bar ston/ /'di ni dam tshig

bzlas par gsungs/ /srog rtsol dbu mar 'jug pa ni/ /aMHzhes bde bar ldan pa ste/ /rtsa gnyis gzung 'dzin rlung 'gags pas/ /aHzhes stong pa'i sgo yin no/ /gung gnyis rtsa ba'i rtsa yin te/ /gzhan du yan lag nyid du 'gyur/ /A li bcu gnyis

dag dang 'dres/ /de dag dbye ba rim pa yang / /bla ma'i kha las rtogs par 'gyur/ /rlung gi bye brag bshad pa ni/ /tshes gcig snga dro zla ba ste/ /stong pa'i srod la nyi ma rgyu/ /tshes brgyad tho rangs rlung nyid de/ /nyi shu gnyis la cha snyoms pas/ /de yi grangs ni

bstan pa la/ /chu ni nyis brgya nyi shu lnga/ /sa dang me dang rlung dag la'ang / /de nyid bzhin du mnyam par 'byung / /dbyug gu gnyis la chu tshod gcig /de la bzhi brgya lnga bcu yin/ /chu tshod gnyis la 'pho ba gcig /de la dgu brgya phrag gcig ste/ /'pho ba gnyis la thun

gcig ste/ /de la stong dang brgyad brgya'o/ /thun ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin/ /de la nyi khri chig stong ste/ /spyir sdom nyin zhag gcig la ni/ /'pho ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/ /khri phrag gnyis dang stong dang ni/ /drug brgya 'byung bar rgyu ba yin/ /chu tshod sum cu gnyis la

ni/ /dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi yin/ /de dag 'byung ba 'dzin pa ni/ /chu sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi rgyu/ /zhi ba'i las ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sa ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /de yi dus su rgyas pa'i las/ /gnyis pa'ang de dang mnyam pa la/ /dbang dang drag po'i las la shis/ /

rlung gi rim pa de dag kyang / /lugs 'byung dang ni lugs bzlog pa/ /dgra zun du ni rgyu ba dang / /ma dang bu ru rgyu ba dang / /rang thog tu ni rang rgyu dang / /gzhan thog tu ni gzhan rgyu dang / /pho mo phrad par 'byung ba dang / /ma ning dag tu 'byung ba dang / /bsnol mar rgyu dang rkyang pa

ste/ /de dag don ni gsal rnyed 'gyur/ /sa dang chu ru phrad pa sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /gsal dang mi gsal rnam pa yis/ /de yi bye brag shes par bya/ /phrin las bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /chu yi rlung ste ngos gzung ba/ /phyogs dang dbyibs

dang mdog rnams dang / /ring thung rgyu ba phyi nang gis/ /lha mo bzhi dang gnas bzhi dang / /dal dang rtsub dang sbom pa dang / /shin tu drag pa rnam pa bzhi/ /chu yi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i dus/ /zhi ba'i las ni bya bar bshad/ /sa dang me dang rlung dang gsum/ /

gong ma dag gis bsgre bar bya/ /spyir ni rlung gi rnam pa ni/ /'byung ba drag po'i rang bzhin yin/ /'jug pa dbang dang rgyas pa ste/ /gnas pa shin tu zhi ba yin/ /thams cad rlung gis byed pas na/ /sdig pa mi dge ngan song ltung / /'chi dus 'og sgo gnyis nas ltung / /

'pho bas 'bras bu ngan 'gro yin/ /dge bcu spyod pa rlung gi las/ /mtho ris thar pa rnams la ni/ /bgrod pa rlung gis byed pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nas mkha' spyod du/ /'pho bar 'gyur ro sems dpa' che/ /rlung 'khrugs pas ni las rnams 'khrugs/ /zhing

sogs 'khrugs pas las mi 'grub/ /ro snyoms pas ni nad med cing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'byung / /dbu ma legs pa'i lam bzang pos/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas thob nas/ /sku bzhi ye shes lnga 'byung ba/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub/ /

rig 'dzin mos par spyod pa ste/ /dang po las kyi sa zhes pa/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i gzhi yin te/ /de phyir las rnams rlung gis byed/ /ces dpal rdo rje 'chang gis spyod pa'i gnas grol ba'i don du rab tu gsungs so/ /srog dang rtsol ba rab 'jug pas/ /

g.yas g.yon rgyu dang khong nas 'byung / /thabs dang shes rab cha dag gis/ /gsang ba 'dir ni brjod pa yin/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma yi/ /rab tu dbye ba bstan par bya/ /g.yon dang g.yas su rab sbyor bas/ /rim pa ji bzhin rab tu rgyu/ /g.yon gyi mgrin pa nas

brtsams te/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mthar gyur pas/ /zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og tu blta/ /shel dang A li rab 'bab pa/ /g.yas su 'ang lte ba nas brtsams te/ /mgrin pa'i rtsar ni gyen bskyod pa/ /nyi ma'i rtsa ni gyen du blta/ /dmar dang kA li 'byung zhing 'bab/ /

'byung byed sna yi bu ga nas/ /rgyu ba rtsa yi mtshan nyid can/ /'jug pa g.yon nas thur du 'gro/ /'byung ba g.yas rtsa gyen du bskyod/ /ji srid nyi ma shar pa nas/ /nus kyi bar la nyin mo'i cha/ /ji srid nub pa nyid gyur pas/ /nam nangs par du mtshan mo'i cha/ /

mtshams las bar mar gyur pa dang / /nyin mtshan gnyis la zhag gcig ste/ /de las dus bzhir gnas pa yin/ /de las nyin dang mtshan mo yis/ /thun tshod brgyad du 'gyur ba yin/ /yan lag bcu drug dag yin te/ /thun ni phyed phyed dag tu rlung / /sna yi bu gar

yang dag rgyu/ /yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas/ /nyin zhag gsum du thun phyed la/ /zla ba'i rlung ni rab rgyu ba/ /de nas gzhan gsum nyi ma'i rlung / /'dis ni ji srid du/ /yar tshes lnga'i bar du'o/ /mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung ste/ /nyin zhags gsum

du snga dro'i cha/ /grags pa nyi ma'i rlung rgyu ba'o/ /de bzhin tshes ni lnga'i bar/ /thun re yi ni bzhi pa rnams/ /chu tshod du ni brjod pa na/ /nyin zhag gcig gi dus kyi cha/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod par bya/ /de las bsgres pa'i dbyug gu ni/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs kyis ni/ /phyed phyed bstan pas dbyug

gu yin/ /sna rtse'i rlung gi rgu ba dang / /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa las/ /dbugs gcig tu ni brjod pa yin/ /de nyid rlung gi sbyor shes pas/ /dbugs drug grog tu shes par bya/ /srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang / /dbugs gsum rkang pa de dpal ldan/ /nyi ma byang du

rgyu dus kyi/ /nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin/ /nyi ma lhor ni 'byung dus kyi/ /mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /dbyug gu re re 'phel 'grib ni/ /dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya/ /dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas/ /'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin//

dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i/ /drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur/ /thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las/ /phyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na/ /rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas/ /mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag /nyi ma bdun gyi bar dag tu/ /phyin ci

log tu rgyu ba ni/ /de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ /zla phyed bar du log rgyu na/ /nad chen po ni yang dag 'byung / /zla ba gcig tu log rgyu na/ /snying brtse'i gnyen phyogs brlag par 'gyur/ /phyed dang gnyis su log rgyu can/ /thun mong dus

su shes par bya/ /gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ba/ /mnyam po drug tu nyi ma song / /gang tshe skyes pa nyi ma zla/ /de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus/ /'chi bar nges pa'i dus yin no/ /dang po dus sbyor gang shes pa/ /gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir/ /

des ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song / /mnyam po drug ces bya bar bshad/ /nyi ma'i lam ni thams cad du/ /rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag /rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang / /mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya/ /dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung / /bsgrod pa bzhin du

'jug gyur na/ /de yi 'pho ba rdzogs 'gyur tshe/ /srog ni gtang bar the tsom med/ /'dir ni 'chi bdag gzhom 'dod pas/ /nyin zhag gcig gi chu tshod kyi/ /brgyad cha re re'i bar dag tu/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas ni/ /rtsa gnyis nas ni 'byung ba dang / /

'jug pa dbu mar lam gyur pa/ /sbar dang sreg dang bzhu pa dang / /shin tu 'bar ba'i dus dag tu/ /lo drug par du gnas byas na/ /'chi bdag 'joms pa the tsom med/ /g.yas nas chu tshod bzhi dag dang / /de bzhin g.yon nas chu tshod bzhi/ /dbu mar shin tu

bsdams byas la/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba thob/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'chi bdag 'joms pa dang bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ /'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal ba/ /sbyi dang khyad par tshul

gyis ni/ /ngo bo rlung gi chos rnams kun/ /rnam phye rim pa shes par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po 'di shes byos/ /'di dag rgyas par phye ba ni/ /rgyas par gyur pa khri phrag bcu/ /nyon mongs phung po de snyed dang / /rlung dang mnyam par 'gags pa las/ /

chos kyi phung po de snyed thob/ /sa re thob cing rlung 'gag sa pas/ /bcu pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe/ /dam tshig mngon du gyur pas na/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yin/ /sa brgyad par ni gyur ba'i tshe/ /nyon mongs phung po rags pa ni/ /khri phrag brgyad pos spangs

ba na/ phyir mi ldog pa zhes brjod do/ /lhag ma drug brgya stong phrag gcig /snga ma'i gnas su rang dag ste/ /las kyi rlung rnams dag pa yin/ /khri phrag gnyis ni zag med rlung / /sa bcu pa la phyin dus su/ /grangs 'bum gyi ni rnam pa nyid/ /dam

tshig dag tu bstan pa'o/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ /sa bcu po la gnas pa yis/ /chos kyi sprin du gyur pa yin/ /phyin las rigs lnga'i bzlas pa yis/ /sa lnga pa ni mngon du byed/ /khro bo dam tshig bzlas pa yis/ /drug pa mngon du gyur ba

thob/ /dus gsum dag pa'i bzlas pas ni/ /legs pa'i blo gros thob par byed/ /dam tshig mi 'da' bzlas pas ni/ /sa bcu mngon du gyur pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i rlung las 'phos pas ni/ /bsam mi khyab du gyur pa ste/ /zag par bcas pa'i rlung dag ni/ /

rags par gnas pa de snyed yin/ /phra bar gyur pa'i rog pa ni/ /khri phrag brgyad las 'das nas ni/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu 'das pas ni/ /spang bya de snyed dang rtog pa/ /bag la nyal ba spong pa yi/ /bag med rlung ni khri phrag gnyis/ /ye shes dam tshig mngon

'byung ba/ /'bum du brjod pas bsdus pa'o/ /khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag gcig /lhag pa drug brgyar bcas pa gang / /las kyi rlung du brjod par bya/ /de yang bsdus pas thun grangs la/ /dus sbyor chen po bcu gnyis te/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa

bzhi yin/ /ro hi ta dang mo hi ta/ /b+ha dra pri Sha b+ha sha ba/ /kur ma ma kha ra ra N+Da/ /mi ki ra dang bi dri ka/ /byA ku li dang swa pa na/ /kA ma na ru brjod par bya/ /'byung dang 'jug dang gnas pa dag /gcig tu gyur pa dbugs yin te/ /dbugs drug chu srang gcig

yin te/ /chu srang sum cu dbyug gu phyed/ /dbugs drug gis ni dbyug gu phyed/ /dbyug gu gnyis la chu tshod gcig /chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis las/ /thun ni rnam pa brgyad du phri/ /'pho ba'i tshul ni bcu drug go/ /dbyug gu dag pa'i gnas yin pas//

drug cu rtsa bzhir gnas pa'o/ /spyir na sems can khams la ni/ /rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de snyed yod phyir shes pa des/ /rlung yang bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /de yang bsdus pa'i don du ni/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stod pas/ /rnam par dbye ba

mkhas pa yis/ /zag bcas rlung ni ri phrag brgyad/ /lhag pa stong phrag bzhi las ni/ /zag pa med pa'i rlung gyur pa/ /khri phrag gnyis kyis dag pa yin/ /rlung rags pas ni rtog pa'i tshogs/ /de dang mtshungs par 'jug pa yin/ /rtog pa bka' nyal gyur

bas/ /rlung ni phra bar gyur pa ste/ /phrag rags rtog pa dag bas ni/ /rlung ni shin tu phra bar 'gyur/ /rnam rtog dang ni rlung gnyis gang / /mtshungs par mnyam par 'byung 'jug las/ /rlung gi 'jug pa 'byung med par/ /rtog pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/ /

de phyir las kyi rlung dag ni/ /khri phrag gnyis dang stong dag dang / /drug brgya dag tu shes par bya/ /yi ge'i dbye ba'i gnas kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mngon par 'byung ba yin/ /yi ge dang ni rang bzhin gnyis/ /gnas dang rten du shes par bya/ /yi ge dag pas rtog

pa dag/ /rtog pa 'od gsal gnas su spyod/ /yi ge rnam pa lus gnas pas/ /drug gsum rang bzhin rgya drug cu/ /nyin mtshan sbyor bas 'byung bas na/ /lus gnas yi ge brgya dang ni/ /drug cu gnas las 'byung zhing 'jug /de phyir gsang ba'i yi ge

yis/ /thams cad za zhing lding bar 'gyur/ /gnam mkha' mtha' med rtag pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi gnas chen po/ /dpal gyis 'byor pa bla med rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /A li bcu drug phrag gnyis las/ /zhe sdang

las gyur rtog pa 'byung / /de yi rtsa ba thig ler bcas/ /sum cu gsum du gyur pa yin/ /kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / /ya ra la wa dad+ha ste/ /bzhi bcu mngon par gnas pas na/ /'dod chags rtog pa de snyed yin/ /zung gyur drug ldan thig ler bcas/ /mtshan

ma bdun gyis mtshon pa'i phyir/ /dbus ma la brten gti mug pa'i/ /rang bzhin mi rig gyur pa'o/ /snga ma g.yas rtsa la brten pa/ /skyes pa rdo rjer bcas gyur brjod/ /gong du g.yon rtsa las 'byung ba/ /bud med pad+ma'i mtshan mas brjod/ /rtsa yi byed

ba mi 'dra ste/ /khams dang rnam shes 'du ba yi/ /rten du gyur phyir rtsa yin te/ /rnam par bzlog na gnyis su 'gyur/ /thig le 'pho 'gyur phyi rol bzhin/ /zla ba lus la 'pho ba ste/ /tshes gcig la sogs rkang g.yon nas/ /mthe bo sogs 'phel

spyi bor gnas/ /de nas g.yas kyi cha la ni/ /zla ba rim gyis 'grib par 'gyur/ /'phel dang 'grib pa'i khyad par gyis/ /lnga byang chub sems skyed byed/ /dkar phyogs nag po ri ma shes bya/ /spyod pa'i tshul ni de bder spyad/ /gnam stod nyi ma gsang

bar te/ /zla ba nya gang tshes gcig rgyas/ /khyad par sgra gcan rim shes bya/ /bla na med pa rags pa dang phra ba'i gnas 'jug ldog bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gsang ba rab tu 'dzin pa pos/ /khyad par sems gsum rim pa bka'

stsal te/ /snang ba zhes bya rnam par mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba'i cha ste gzung rtog spangs pa las/ /'byung ba mi mngon rlung dang bcas pa gang / /lhang nger gnas pa skad cig dang po yin/ /mched pa'i snang ba rab tu mi rtog ste/ /ches gsal ba las

'dzin rtog ma zhugs pa/ /ye shes phra ba rlung ldan mi snang ba/ /lhan ne gnas pa skad cig gnyis pa yin/ /thob pa'i cha ni shin tu mi rtog pa/ /gsal ba tsam du 'ang mi gnas shin tu phra/ /rlung sems mi phyed gsal bar 'char ba min/ /lham me

gnas pa skad cig gsum pa yin/ /nye bar thob pa dri ma med pa ste/ /rang byung rang gsal bde ba dmigs su med/ phra rags rab gsal ting nge 'dzin du gnas/ /skad cig bzhi pa mi 'gyur khyab byed yin/ /'od gsal ba ni gsam gtan zag pa

med/ /rdul med sa bon med pas mi g.yo ba/ /lhan cig gnas pa chos sku'i snying po ni/ /lhun grub byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma 'di nyid yod med las 'das shing / /dbu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas kun rdzob ste/ /chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i snang

ba las/ /'gas pa med pa'i rol par rang byung ba'o/ /zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can/ /chos dbyings chos nyid dbyer med dag pa'i sku/ /tha dad rnam bral mi phyed ye shes te/ /gsang ba chen po'i lam las 'dir rtogs bya/ /thun mong dbang

phyug dang ni rtags bcas pa/ /dbang phyug brgyad ldan 'char ba 'di nyid do/ /phra zhing yang la phra bar nub pa dang / /spyod par nus dang bdag nyid chen po dang / /dga' mgur byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /ci 'dod byed dang dbang phyug don du 'char/ /

sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang / /thugs kyi dbang phyug de nyid phrin las dang / /rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / /gang 'dod bskyed dang khyad bar don brgyad do/ /phung po khams dang skye mched bsdus pa yi/ /lnga po'i dbye ba lnga ru byas

pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa so sor byin gyis rlabs/ /'khor ba'i las rnams dag ni rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin dbang po'i phyi rol yul bcas lda/ /re re zhing yang bde gshegs lda rnams kyi/ /de la rang rang rtag tu byin gyis rlob/ /ye shes

lnga dang gsum du gnas pas yang dag bsdus/ /zhes gsungs te/ /gsang ba zab pa'i tshul bstan pa rdo mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba

'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bsam mnyam pa nyid 'byung bar bstan par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// //rtag pa gsum pa rdo rje gsang ba ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rab tu gsang ba'o/ /de

nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun/ /gsang chen ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can don du yang dag 'byung / /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /don kun thub pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyal ba de la btud byas te/ /gsang ba dam tshig mkhyen pa la//

mchod cing bstod pas gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje dbyangs ni bshad pa yin/ /e ma tshul bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /de nyid rigs brgya bsdus pa'i sku/ /de nyid tshul mchog byang chub pa/ /rigs kyi sangs rgyas ldar bsdus pa/ /byang chub snying po tshul

zhi pa/ /gsang ba rigs gsum bla na med/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni gcig pa nyid/ /rgyas gdab rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /ye shes rim pa nyid du bstan/ /ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin las/ /khyad par ngo bo rang byung ba/ /yang dag rnam par mi

rtog pas/ /bla med mngon par 'byung bar gags/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dpal ldan chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /rtog pa'i dri ma 'gag byed pas/ /sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /phra ba'i rnam par

gzhug par bya/ /de nyid rnam shes 'pho ba'i dngos/ /gdan bcas sa bon thim par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bar snang khams/ /khyab cing bzhugs par rab bsgom pa/ /yi ge gsang ba rang sngags la/ /them pa gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /thugs

kyi ngo bor bsam par bya/ /thams da sgyu ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos kun rang bzhin mtshungs par blta/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sems su yang / /slar yang bsgoms nas de rab bsdu/ /gsang ba gcig tu dbang bya yi/ /'pho ba sku gsum rim par

'byung / /chos dbyings mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /mi shigs 'og gi gong bu las/ /nA da tsam du snang ba gang / /mi 'gag rang bzhin dag par gnas/ /gsang ba rdo rje'i ri chen gyi/ /rab snang byed pa'i ting 'dzin bshad/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams bdag med pa yi dngos/ /gnyug

ma dbyer med stong nyid dang / /zad pa med cing 'phel med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba'i tshogs na sangs rgyas thams da kyi dri ma med pa'i me 'od rin po che mnga'

ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ /byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /skye med snying gi pad+ma la/ /sa btsan rdzogs pa'i snying po gang //

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar ba'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang byung gi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

zla ba'i snying po 'od 'phro ba/ /chu rgyun 'bab pa'i zer ldan gyis/ /bsam pa'i ye shes rgyun gyis ni/ /thogs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das srid pa las rgal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho

la rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs dngos po'i chos nyid ni/ /spros pa med phyir snang med pas/ /theg pa mchog gi chos nyid kyis/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dngos/ /rtag dang chad ba

las grong zhing / /yang dag don mthong rang grol gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan par sgrogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dri ma med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /gdod nas dag pa de bzhin gshegs/ /snying po ye shes byang chub pas/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i me tog sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes seng ge'i rtsal rdo rje zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las/ /thub pa don kun rdo rje 'dzin/ /mchod de rdo rje dbyings 'dir gsungs/ /de nyid tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs chen gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pas 'du 'bral

med/ /rnam ra grol ba'i phung po can/ /bde chen sku ste skyon med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po lnga dag pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ /byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag /'dus pa las ni skye bzhi ba/ /de yang yul las rab tu 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyim

bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grangs chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid mnyam pa med pa yi/ /rdo rje zla ba 'dus las 'byung / /tha dad

dmigs pa rab zhi bas/ /de nyid tshal 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes skyob pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye she 'byung gnas sa chen ltar/ /de nyid bden mthong chos kyi spyan/ /shes rab zab mo'i spyod yul gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid

mtha' yas pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams yongs su dag par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkhyen pa dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun tu rang byung bas//

'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa/ /thub pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen pos khyab par mdzad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thogs pa med pa'i gnas pa spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zil gnon chos ni gsang ba che/ /mi zad rgyan gyi sgrub pa'i gzhi/ /de nyid nges pa stobs gyur pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa'i dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs ston pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams ni sna tshogs su/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs kyi phyir/ /rnam rol ye shes spyod pa yis/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gsal ba'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gag pa rol pa'i sgra rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing

khams bye bas khams bye ba mtha' yas par/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dbyings gcig gis/ /tha dad du mar khyab byed pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi rtog pa rdo rje'i

snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtag pa sna tshogs bsdus pa yi/ /ye shes gcig gis gnas pa las/ /tha dad ting 'dzin dag pa'i ngang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don yod 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i yul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rkun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /ye shes rdo rje

ro gcig par/ /lan tshwa chu bzhin spyod pa ni/ /skal bzang tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri ma med pa'i rdo rje skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa gang / /rkang gnyis thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ /ma 'ongs bla ma'i gzungs kyi sa gnas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i

dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul mi zad rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtan g.yo ma lus snang ba'i gzhi/ /de nyid kun du bsgyur ba po/ /de nyid

de bzhin gshegs pas sprul/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun brtan pa'i blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu dbang gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdug pa ma lus gdon byung ba/ /de nyid rtog pa'i dra ba las/ /kun byung dag par 'dul byed pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan gyis/ /de nyid byang

chub sems dpa' la/ /rab tu bskul te bstan pa gang / /rab tu nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gang du bsgrub pa yi/ /gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa/ /rgyu dang rtags dang go cha dang / /rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa ste/ /'jug pa sbyor ba'i

rim pa yis/ /dmigs pa bsdus pa nyid yin no/ /rlung dang sngags dang sgra las ni/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /gang du sems kyi snang ba las/ /rab dben ri pa gnyis par brjod/ /rmi las sgyu ma'i chos can las/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i

rim par gyur/ /bsam gtan sbyor dang 'od gsal ba/ /mngon par byang chub rim pa nyid/ de las gnyis med de bzhin nyid/ /rim pa lnga pa zung 'jug lam/ /lus sems ngag gi chos bsdus pas/ /tshul gsum mngon par byang chub pa/ /de nyid ye

shes lnga dag tu/ /rigs kyi dbye bas bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / /thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las chos kyi tshul bsdu ba mngon

bar byang chub ba'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzang rtog skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba rdo rje zhes ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thabs dang bsam pa

gang gang gis/ /lus su 'di spyod pas sgyur bas na/ /sems ni ting nge 'dzin gyis te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ku sha'i rtse mo ltar phra mo rdo rje zhes

ba ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi pha rol pa yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes sku/ /rang rig nyid las tha dad med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod ma'i chu 'dzin pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bde gshegs gdung ni rgyas pa gang / /thugs rje dag pa'i stobs yin

te/ /'gro ba gso ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /byang chub ye shes bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs 'chang ba ltar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sman pa'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'khor ba yi/ /nad sel thabs mchod byams pa'i dpal/ /brtse sems tshad med srung ba po/ /zab pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa legs bsam grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo'i dri ma sel bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i dri ma rnams/ /gzung 'dzin chos kyis bsdus pa'i dngos//

dbu ma'i ngang du rang dag pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes chu bo'i rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi chos kyi lam/ tshul gcig theg pa gcig pa nyid/ /byang chub chen po bla na med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i tshogs chen po sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi gzhal med kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong ba'i dbyings/ /gzhi med rtsa bral 'dus ma byas/ /brjod med nams mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'brib pa med par bsrung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul rin po che'i zom zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa mnyam pa nyid/ /snang ba med cing rnam pa med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros snang ba bkod

pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten mun pa sel mdzad cing / /sa gsum gsal bar byed pa yi/ /glog gi 'od kyis 'char ba po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyis pheg rdob pa'i sgra snyan lta bur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos kyi don 'byung ba/ /bla na med pa byang chub sems/ /ye shes

rgyu dang 'bras bur ston/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i mig ston ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lam gyi rim pa thams cad par/ /'dam chu yi bdud rtsi ltar/ /skal de nyid tshul shes byos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

'od gnas mtshungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhon nu'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi tshul ni zhi ba nyid/ /bcu drug ye shes brgyan pa nyid/ /skad cig bden pa byang chub pas/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag

khrig gis/ /kun du dbang bskur gyur pa yi/ /skal ba can ni kun tu bzang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ /byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rtog pas brtags pa yi/ /snang ba 'di ni sgyu ma tsam/ /de nyid las dang bag chags bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngos

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi shigs rdo rje'i sku nyid ni/ /rnam pa du mas spungs pa gang / /phra rab dbyer med dag pa'i rgyal/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ kun tu ye shes rgyal ba yi/ /drod dang

rtags las 'das pa'i chos/ /bsgom bya med cing dmigs med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzi brjid snang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin snang ba med pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang / /de nyid sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/ /bdag med chos las rang byung ba/ /byang chub tshul di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa chen po mchog gi ye shes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sprin 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dgos 'dod thams cad char bzhin du/ /rang sems nor

bu'i rgyal pos 'grub/ /'di nyid rin chen mdzod chen po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskul ba tshad med pa bla ma'i snying po rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes

kyi 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dpal ldan pa/ /rang rig ye shes gcig la rdzogs/ /rgyun du bde ba ster byed pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden par ston pa yang dag pa'i gnas blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bgrod med lam ni gcig pa'i chos/ /ye shes mig gi yul

gyur pas/ /mthar thug snying po byang chub mchog /rgyal ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'dir ni gsang ba'i bka' spyod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po yi/ /dam tshig ye shes bstan pa la/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa rab ston cing / /

'dir ni sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /theg chen chos la rab zhugs kyang / /de don gsal bar mi shes pas/ /gsang ba'i tshul 'di rtogs dka' ste/ /brda dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang / /ji bzhin pa dang min drang don/ /dngos po'i chos la mi spyod par/ /sgra dang

yi ge'i rjes 'brang ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan bcos la dga' zhing / /tshig don bdud rtsi'i rgyab kyis phyogs/ /de la dngos grub rnyed dka' ste/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa

rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las yongs su dag pa'i gnas rdo rje'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs

te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel yang dag 'byung ba las/ /kun rdzob nyid kyi chos nyid ni/ /dbyer med don dam rnam par dben/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs sbyin ba sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi rin chen sgron me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /de nyid dngos por mi gnas shing / /rang bzhin 'od gsal rtag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du rgyu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje lam du rab zhugs nas/ /

nor bu dri med zla ba med/ /skyon gyis ma gos ye shes nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i dpa' rlabs g.yo ba med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsang ba bla na med/ /mnyam sbyor bde ba dri ma med/ /mi 'dzag mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes

'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du mngon par mi gnas pa/ /gnyis med ye shes chos kyi rgyal/ /rnam par mi rtog chags

med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ster mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang srid

ma lus bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad stong pa nyid las skyes/ /de nyid ye shes rgyu 'bras can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshim par byed pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /sems nyid mnyam par mtshungs pas na/ /mi 'gag go 'byed khyab gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye dgu'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong nyid dngos po ma yin te/ /dngos min gyur ba'ang stong ba min/ /ngo bo nyid
