ni rnam dag pa/ /stong nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /'byung ba bzhi dag nam mkhar nas/ /de nyid gang la'ang mi gnas te/ /sems can sangs rgyas la brten pa/ /sangs rgyas mi gnas tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshugs pa thub pa chen po sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rnga sgra'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /gzod nas ma skyes dag pa nyid/ /srid zhi mnyam nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro 'ong rnam bral tshul thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpags bsam gyi shing lta bur bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sa bon myu gu dang / /sdong bu 'dab ma 'bras bu'i

bar/ /tshul brgyad 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis/ /rten 'brel de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ljon pa'i shing chen po ltar rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro snying rnam rtog zhes bya gang / /rang rig byang chub snying po'i gnas/ /de las yon tan brjod mi lang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

lha'i sil snyan 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi rtag bdag med zhi ba yis/ /'du shes sems pa sngon rgyu las/ /bag chags spangs pas gnas thob gyur/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra bung ba lta bur lding ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par rig byed las 'das shing / /de spangs

bsam pa'i ldog pa yis/ /dbye bas tha dad shes par bya/ /'di ni snying po'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la dgyes ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal zhing khams bkod pa phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing khams gang / /snang mdzad rgyal po'i 'od kyi skus/ /rten mdzad ye shes snang ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

thub pa lha bden sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba bai DUr+yar ston pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gyur ba med pa'i rin po che/ /gcig tu sgyur bar byed pa can/ /nor bu rtog pa'i blo bral ba/ /

nges par tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mun pa smag rum sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i ba'i mun pa

sel ba yi/ /byin brlabs 'od kyi sgron ma yis/ /snang ba ston cing 'joms pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snying por gyur pa rang srogs las/ /mi shigs go 'phang gnas spyod pa/ /de nyid rlung sems dbyer med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thub pa bcings pa med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spro ba dpag med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dbyings ye shes spyod yul bas/ /mi gnas mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid/ /

tshad med rang byung mi rtog phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /nges 'byung rnam par mi gnas pa/ /'khor ba dag pa'i sems gnas pa/ /de nyid ye shes tshul gsum gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gang du sngon byung sangs rgyas dang / /ma 'ongs byon gyur de bzhin gshegs/ /da ltar phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /gsang ba 'di las yang dag 'byung / /sems kyi bslab pa la phyogs shing / /zab pa rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /de nyid mdo sder gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba bla na med pa'i don/ /snying po'i don rnams ston

byed pa/ /'bras bu rtogs pa'i ye shes ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la mngon gyur pas/ /thabs kyi khyad par gyur pa ste/ /rdo rje theg pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor

chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba bla na med ba'i don yongs su skyong ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes don kun 'dzin mdzad pa/ /dus gsum bdag po dpal ldan pas/ /gsang ba ye shes spyod

pa gsungs/ /gnyis med mnyam pa mi 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum rtag tu rang byung nyid/ /skye ba med pa las sprul zhing / /ma skyes rang bzhin brjod du med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /rnam par mi rtog ye shes las/ /sgyu ma tsam du

bstan pa yin/ /rgyu dang lam dag 'bras bur ni/ /gnas pa brjod bya don gyi chos/ /de nyid nges par don ston pas/ /rjod byed sgra yi phyogs su bshad/ /gsang chen theg pa snying po'i don/ /rgyal po che ba rang la gnas/ /mchog tu brtag pa 'dus pa ste/ /bden gnyis zung

'jug ston pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa lha'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid gsang ba'i ye shes che/ /

snying po phyag rgya chen po'i ngang / /zab dang rgya che'i tshul gnas pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbu sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal

ba kun 'dus rig ba'i ngang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas pas/ /sku bzhi ye shes mchog rtag pas/ /dri med 'dul ba'i tshul mchog go/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dal gyis bzhud pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems/ /'bad pa med par 'byung ba ni/ /chos rnams dbyer med gcig pa'i sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs dka' thub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bar 'gro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mthong chos don yod snying po ni/ /'bras bu grub pa'i rkyen 'byung ba/ /de nyid sad byed

rnam par thar/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi skam sar gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems

can rnams kyi bsam pa yi/ /spyod yul sna tshogs 'byung ba na/ /thar ba'i lam la spyad par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dag pa rdo rje sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba sgyu ma yis/ /nye bar 'grub pa yang dag pa'i/ /gsang mtha' tshul 'di nges bstan yin/ /de nyid spyod pa bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang srong skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsod nams mthar thug stobs chen po/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan las 'byung //

'bras bu bzhis ni thub pa'i rgyan/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid stong nyid mtshan ma med/ /smon pa med pa byang chub gzhi/ /rnam thar ye shes 'bras thob pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bzang po sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis sgyu ma lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos gang skye ba med pa dang / /'gag pa med par 'byung ba gang / /bla med gsang ba'i don bstan pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smig rgyu lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan rmi lam dang / /sprul

pa mtshungs par ston ba gang / /de nyid rang bzhin 'byung ba'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rmi lam gzugs snang ltar/ /bag chags snang ba rang dag par/ /dri ma sbyang phyir bstan pa dag /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chu zla lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig gis du mar khyab pa yi/ /ngo bo rang stong thig le gcig /zhen

med phyag rgya 'byung ba yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri za'i grong khyer lta bur 'char ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /dag pa'i ye shes yang dag pa/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba'ang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skrun par mdzad pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sbrul ba lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems/ /de sprul dman par mos ba 'dul/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'gro dpal sangs rgyas thams kyi chu'i chu bur lta bur mkhyen pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lan

tshwa rgya mtshor thim pa ltar/ /dba' rlabs zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /thob med ye shes sbyor don 'gro/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa don legs des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig yor stong

pa'i dngos po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sad pas sad byed pa/ /kun nas ldang ba zhi ba yi/ /bsnyengs med don gsal byang chub pa/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog tshad med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid las grol zhing bde thob dang / mchog

don gnas pa dag pa'i gnas/ /byang chub tshul dag 'khor lo yis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs par ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bstan pa 'di ni byang chub lam/ /de nyid snying po sdom pa nyid/ /bslab pa yongs dag mdza' tshon ltar/ /nges pa'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od zer chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glog gi 'od 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ /glog ltar 'byung ba'i yid kyis ni/ /kun du phrin las bya

ba las/ /'jug ba'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pas byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin 'phro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ sangs rgyas

dus gsum thams cad du/ /dri med rtag bar 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /legs mchod bsam pa'i rgyun bab ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba'i rgyal po che/ /'bras bu ston pa'i las byung ba/ /mi phyed ye shes mnga'

bdag 'chang / /zab dang rgya che'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor lo'i che/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos po kun/ /khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /gzod nas dag pa'i ye shes gnas/ /thabs gzhan gyis

ni sangs rgyas med/ /gsang chen bde ba'i go 'phang can/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / /thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ /

theg pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgyal po'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dul ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang

chus kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa'i dra ba bsal ba yi/ /ye shes rnam thar dag pa yi/ /gsal pa yongs dag rjes 'gro bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba chos 'byung yangs pa yi/ /dag pa dri med gnas kyi cha/ /cha dang cha min rnam spangs ba'i/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha' dag pa'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos dang dngos med las

grol zhing / /'bar ba thig le nA da bral/ /ye shes sku ste rnam dag pas/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'od kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i gnas rdo rje rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu kun du snang ba yi/ /'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs pa yi/ /lha mo gar gyis mchod byed pa'i/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha dbang mi rnams kun la yang / /de nyid ye shes skal ba can/ /bzang po srid gsum

spyad par bya/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i gzhal med dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

chos rnams kun du mi phyed pa'i/ /tha dad blo ni rnam spangs nas/ /yang dag ye shes snang ba can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba 'od srung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkra shis gdugs lta bu zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gling rnams kun gyi sems can khams/ /byams pa'i gdugs kyis khyab byed pa/ /mtha' skor bgrang mi lang bar ston/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nya'i lto lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i chos kyi gnas/ /'dren pa bdud rtsi spyan

yangs pas/ /thugs rje rgyun chad med par gzigs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bgros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad+ma lta bur ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden ba'i mthus/ /drang por smra ba'i ljags dbang po/ /ge sar dmar po ltar ston pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dung lta bur ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshad med thugs kyi gter chen po/ /rnam par dkar ba'i chos phyogs kyis//

bar mtshams med par gnas thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bum pa lta bu rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bum pa chen pos don byed pa/ /thog ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal gyi be'u

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du tshangs dang brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong bar bcas pa yi/ /mchod cing rdo rje'i dbang phyug sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa'i/ /kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu ltar/ /

mi nub dam pa'i gtso bo yis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par mdzes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pas 'gro ba'i ngan song rgyun/ /yongs su gcod cing sbyod mdzad pas/ /rnam par gnon pa'i mchog mnga' ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dpa' bo khengs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni 'gro ba 'dul don du/ /lus srog zas dang longs spyod kyis/ /kun

la chags med tshul du bskyang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sbrang rtsi'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan par smra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /skabs dang 'brel ba'i don 'gyur bas/ /cung zad yang dag don sbyor ba'i/ /phan pa ster ba'i byang chub kyis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi don mthun pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mthong na mi mthun med pa yi/ /dpal gyi zhing du bgrod pa'i lam/ /yang dag don la sbyor byed pas/ /

de nyid tshul 'dir bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rmad du byung ba'i khyad par gyis//

gtso bor gzhan don sems pa gang / /kun snang dpe med mkhas pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ri rab rin chen lhun po ltar/ /brjid cing dpa' ba'i thub pa'i skus/ /sprul pa dngos por mi gnas pa/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du thog ma mi dmigs shing / /tha ma med pa'i ye shes las/ /rnam

par dben don dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /ma 'ongs byang chub don gyi phyir/ /dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku gsum snying po bsdus pa'i bdag /'gro don spyod phyir 'byung ba

ste/ /stobs chen sna tshogs nags khrod du/ /thub pa dpal gyi rgyal po ste/ /shAkya'i dge slong li ts+tsha bI/ /gzhon nu 'phags pa'i blo can gyis/ /rim dang cig car rgyas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung

dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ /gsang ba dag pa mchog gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa grags pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong khams kha lo sgyur byed pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po dge ba'i stobs/ /dpung chen thabs la

mkhas pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi yon tan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang sems dag pa'i nor bu ni/ /yon tan du ma 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /mi zad dge ba rdzogs las 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhing bzang

po mtshungs med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dzin pa'i btsun mo rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /mnyam med bla ma mchog dgyes pa'i/ /tshul 'di dri

med 'od du 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje rab rib sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /'dam skyes pad+ma mdangs thon ltar/ /rang rig gsal ba'i ye shes nyid/ /skyon gyis ma gos phra ba nyid/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshags pa mngon par 'phags pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med ut+pal 'bar ba la/ /rnyog pa'i dri mas ma gos ltar/ /rang grol byung ba'i ye shes mtshungs/ /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin byed 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgron me lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid mi 'gyur snang

ba bral/ /thob med thob bral 'gro 'ong med/ /dbri ba dang ni gang med pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las/ /'gyur ba med cing 'pho ba med/ /rnam pa kun du mkha' dbyings klong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du son pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de ni ma skyes sbyor ba'i dngos/ /tshad med ting 'dzin sbyor ba bo/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kun du rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'gag pa bral ba yi/ /chos nyid

rang byung lhun gyis grub/ /de ni 'gag pa med pa'i dngos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid las dben pa yi/ /don dam dmigs pa'i yul min phyir/ /'dres pa rdul tsam med pa las/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thugs shin tu zhugs pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ri bo gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas pa med pa gnas ba'i mchog /mchog gyur rang byung mkha' la lding / /thugs stobs chos kun 'bras bu che/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri rab lhun po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nam

mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang ba'i chos can ma/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin rgyas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud dang bdud kyi ris

thams cad 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud dang log 'dren ma lus rnams/ /byams pa'i ye shes chen po yis/ /log rtog ma lus zhi mdzad pa'i/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sna tshogs dag pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /grags pa'i rgyal

mtshan dpal be'u/ /'bar ba 'od 'phro nyi ma'i dbus/ /dra ba rin chen nor bu ste/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhal med kyi gnas dag pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpe med ye shes dag pa'i gnas/ /bkod pa mdzes spras rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rang gzhan dkyil 'khor snang ba 'byung / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa 'od 'phro ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun 'gro dbang phyug rdul bral ba/ /de nyid byang chub

dam pa'i yul/ /btang snyoms dag pa bla med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri med rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dren pa mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lta bas mi ngoms chog mi shes/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs mnga' ba/ /ngan 'gro'i srid pa legs skyob pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa ye shes grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su dag par bsngo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul dang dngos po byed pa po/ /rnam par mi dmigs stong ba nyid/ /'khor gsum

yongs su dag pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i sde dpon dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /thar ba'i lam na theg pa che/ /gsang ba dam pa chos 'khor lo/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs bskor ba/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dpa' rlabs gnon pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpag med ye shes phra ba yis/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i byis pa rnams/ /

skrag nas lam mchog dgod mdzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /ye shes bla med gnas thob pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas mchog legs gnas pas/ /bcom ldan 'og min der rtag bzhugs/ /kun du sbyad pa'i

sa phyogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dag pa de bzhin nyid kyi cho ga ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ /dper na nam

mkha' gang du yang / /mtshan can kun la mi gnas te/ /de nyid khyab cing bdag med pas/ /mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ /nam mkha'i chos nyid de la ni/ /kun du rtog pa yod min te/ /rtog cing rjes su spyod pa yi/ /bdag dang gzhan du rtog mi byed/ /

de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rmi lam lta bur snang ba ste/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa bral/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rmi lam dam tshig las byung ba/ /de nyid sgyu mar gyur pa dang / /khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /rmi lam

dang ni dngos snang gnyis/ /khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /gzhan du de nyid rtogs par bya/ /rlung dang bcas pa 'pho ba'i gnas/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgrin par skyes/ /yi ge oM bcas gnas pa nyid/ /a nu ta ra brjod ba gang / /gzung zhing bsgyur

dang spel ba dang / /sru mar dran dang rgyas gdab pas/ /rmis pa bsam gtan lam du 'gyur/ /kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du'ang mi sems so/ /skyes bu

de yang bdag gis rmi lam gyi chos mthong ngo snyam du'ang sems pa med de/ /de bas na khams gsum du snang ba'i bya ba de rnams kyang / /bag chags gzugs su snang ba'i phyir/ /rmi lam lta bur bstan pa yin/ /'khrul ba de nyid rgyu med pas/ /rmi

lam nyid dang mtshungs par bstan/ /snga ma mi gnas rang grol te/ /phyi ma 'byung ba mi 'gag phyir/ /rmi lam las ni 'byung bar bshad/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa rdo rje yang dag par bden pas stong ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rnam par bsgrags pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rnam par dag pas ni/ /khams dang dbang po mtha' yas dang / /bsam pa'i dri ma rang dag pa'i/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtag par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sems can tha ma 'bring dang ni/ /mchog rnams bdud rtsi thob bya'i phyir/ /lhag par spro ba bskyed pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi klu dbang 'dud pa'i rgyal po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshe dang gzugs dang longs spyod kyis/ /gling gsum gnas las mngon 'byung ba/ /las dang spyod pa rtogs pa las/ /bzlog

dang ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rmad du byung pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'jig rten khams ni du ma yi/ /gling rnams kun du 'jug byed pa/ /cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab pa ni/ /'byung ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa sel cing bsil ba

tsan+dan ltar ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du skye dang 'chi ba dang / /nad dang rgas dang rgud las grol/ /chu bo che las sgrol pa po/ /byang chub tshul di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spros pa tshad med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gtong ba spro dang smra ba dang / /mtshungs pa rgyan las 'byung ba gang / /de

nyid dad pa'i sems grol bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di yi 'od zer gang spros par/ /ting 'dzin bskyed dang dad pa thob/ /bde ba skyed la sdug bsngal zhi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma can sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi ma rig pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /byang chub sems gcig dag pa las/ /gzhan du ye shes ma rnyed

pas/ /btsal du med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rdzogs ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'du byed rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sangs rgyas zhing dag pa/ /de snyed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i tshogs/ /rnam dag tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i

snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mig dang gzugs rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bsam pa dug med pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi

can te/ /zla ba tshes pa'i ngo bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rgyal mdzes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye mched drug rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /longs spyod gtsang ba'i bsgrubs pa dang / /lus dang yan lag dngos po yi/ /rdul phran gyur pa legs phul ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul ni/ /bsod

nams tshogs ni sgyu ma ste/ /ye shes tshogs ni nam mkha' ltar/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi reg pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms rab zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan lag bzhi ldan dpung tshogs bcas/ /bla med rnal 'byor pa yi gnas/ /zhing dang bsam pa dag pa yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba kun la snyoms pa

gang / /brtul zhugs khyad par bstan pa ste/ /tshul 'di byang chub snying po yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal dgyes pas khyab pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam dag pa/ /zhing khams 'gyur med rang snang ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi len pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed/ /dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas gang / /zhing

khams gcig par yongs su dag /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i sgra can sangs rgyas kyi srid pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyogs bcu rnam pa thams cad du/ /gang zhugs bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /mdzad pa gcig pa'i rnam thar gyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du ma byon 'byung ba dang / /'das dang ltar bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas

khams rgyud gcig pa dang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rga shi rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /chos kun rtog pa zhi ba yi/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che'i bdag /mdo dang rgyud dang rtog pa las/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang

mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten 'brel dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can smin par byed pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhing sbyong phrin las dag /de nyid mtshungs

pa gcig pa'i sku/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'

de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i stan la ni/ /gnas nas dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dmigs te sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa/ /dang por spro tshogs blo ldan gyis

bya zhing / /dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs bya/ /gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du/ /ma lus kun rtog gis bskyed rnyog pa rnams/ /thugs rje che ldan spyan sdar de dag ni/ /rim

bzhin cho gas thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis dge ba mdzad rnams la/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang zhing / /byang chub bla med gnas su bsngo bar bgyi/ /sems

kyi rol pa ri med zla 'dres bsgrubs/ /snying rje dam pa mi zad pa yi thabs/ /rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing / /sems dpa' dam pa

rnams kyi phun chogs gzhi/ /dngos rnams ma lus ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /dam pa'i chos la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /'ching ba mtha' dag gnas las grol 'gyur zhing / /snying rje mchog gis bsgrub pa'i dpal dang ldan/ /rab dga' la

sogs sa la nges bzhugs pa'i/ /brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la bdag skyabs mchi/ /bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas/ /sgrib pa kun gyis bag chags yang dag don/ /lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyad pa yi/ /sems

ni dam par byang chub mchog tu bskyed/ /rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi lam gcig po/ /sbyin pa la sogs dkar po'i yon tan bcu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos/ /yang dag tu ni rnam par gnas par bgyi/ /snying rjes 'jig rten

sems can ma lus pa/ /lta bas bcings ba du ma dmigs nas ni/ /yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa/ /sngags pas rig pa 'di ni bsam par bya/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste/ /de bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med/ /

rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni/ /ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol/ /tha dad dmigs pa'i 'du shes log pa yi/ /dri ma'i dra ba rnams ni legs bsal nas/ /rtog pa ma lus ye shes rgyal ba yi/ /snang stong dri med ngang las

'di don brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH sarba d+ha rmAH swa b+hA ba shud+h+ho\u0f85 haM/ oM badzra swa b+hU ba shud d+hAH sarba d+ha rmAH swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho \u0f85 haM/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ /de ltar ma lus 'dod pa spangs pa yis/ /bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag rang

rig nyid/ /gzugs ni lhar gyur pa la yang dag mchod/ /dam tshig 'di ni bde gshegs rnams kyis gnang / /rjes su mthun pa 'gro ba'i don rnams dang / /ma lus rgyal ba mchod par yongs su brtags/ /lus la sogs pa'i las rnams

de dang ni/ /rtag tu legs par mnyam par gzhag bya ste/ /rnam pa 'di 'dra'i sems dang lus dang ni/ /ngag gi las rnams ci yang rung ba dag /phyag rgya dang ni sngags kyi rnam pa ru/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de

gsungs so/ /de bas lus sogs dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang las gsungs/ /de ltar rtog pa ma lus spangs pa yi/ /sems ni nag po'i las su ga la 'gyur/ /dngos po gcig la'ang rnam pa sna tshogs

pa'i/ /kun du rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam pa las/ /sdug bsngal bde dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i/ /las kyi khyad par mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rab tu mi gnas ye shes sku/ /'khor ba dag cing rnam par grol ba'i thugs/ /byams mgon

rdo rje de yang de ltar snang / /tshul 'di rtogs dka' phan pa sgrub pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par

rgyal ba las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don 'byung ba rdo rje'i le'u ste bzhi bcu ba'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum ston pa snang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang phyug chen po ye shes kyi/ /'byung ba sku ni 'byung las gyur/ /rten 'brel snang ba gsal bar 'char/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs pa ltar snang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs 'od ni bkye ba yang / /rang

rig bsam gtan las byung ba/ /byang chub don gyi rgyu chen por/ /don 'byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'od zer don chen byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sku yi tshul gyur pa/ /rdo rje skyil krung gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs rin chen brgyan pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal

po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsung gi dbyangs snyan ma lus pa/ /brjod pa 'gag med rang byung bas/ /'di nyid gsang ba don sdug pa'i/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla med sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mchod rten dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

dbyings dang ye shes tshul gcig tu/ /mi gnas ldog pa med pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang gnas pas/ /bla med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams glang po ye shes thogs pa med pa

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje'i ngang / /ro mnyam ye shes mtshungs med pa/ /gcig dang du ma las grol phyir/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtog pa gcod par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshe la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i/ /yon tan tshad med phreng ba can/ /dpag med rin chen gter 'chang mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po

sangs rgyas kun gyi las la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dkar nag las ni rang dag btags pa tsam/ /snang tsam rgyu 'bras 'dis ni khyad par phye/ /snying po don spyod bsam

gtan pa yi yul/ /mchog gyur don ni 'byung ba'i sa/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /dran pa'i stobs ni mnyam bzhag pa/ /shes ldan rgyal po bag yod kyis/ /dpa' bo 'gro ba'i don la spyad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi longs spyod la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /bsrubs pas bdud rtsi'i zhun ma ni/ /'chi med 'gro ba tshim byed pa/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid

ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa rnams/ /sems can 'dul ba'i thabs tshul gyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul

la dbang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams kun du sa g.yo zhing / /'od dang sgra dang me tog char/ /dang ldan tshul dang lhan cig tu/ /dgongs pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so//

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbang mtshungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mos pa sgyur ba la dbang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dran dang 'dun dang mos pa dang / /ye shes thogs med dbang phyug ces/ /

rtog pa yong bral mi phyed pa/ /dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa rdo rje'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam la dbang ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams gcig nas gcig tu bgrod pa dang / /'jug par sgyur ba'i tshul ni mi zad pa/ /bla med 'phen pa rnam dag khyad par 'phags/ /ye shes dri med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

shes rab brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes gang du ye shes kun/ /'du ba rgya mtsho'i chu bran bzhin/ /sdud pa yongs su dag pa nyid/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bden pa bzhi dang gnyis dag

gis/ /yongs su sdud pa bcu gnyis dang / /bcu drug rnam dbye chos 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sbyangs ba'i yon tan ni/ /bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sbyor tshul ye shes gsang ba yin/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i

dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshangs par spyod pa tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtul zhugs sdom pas bde thob ste/ /tshul khrims kyis ni ting 'dzin dang / /bsam gtan shes rab yongs grol skye/ /de nyid byang

chub dgra bcom 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas gos pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thim pa rdo rje ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lan tshwa

chu la thim pa ltar/ /'dres pas so so dmigs pa bral/ /gcig tu byed pa'i bsam gtan mchog /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang bzhud pa dmigs pa med pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun chad med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de nyid 'gro 'ong bral ba'i sems/ /chu la chu bzhag gnas pa las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//

sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can/ /mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran/ /spros pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/ /mtshan med spros pa med pa yi/ /rdo rje glu yis yongs bskul ba'i/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rol/ /sems dpa' gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /

sbyor ba rang gzugs rgyu mthun pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/ /rig ma mngon par bsngags pas ni/ /gnas bzhi rnams su lha mo bzhi/ /rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan gyis

mtshan pa'i spyan la sogs/ /pad+mo rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /gsang sngags rab tu bsam pa nyid/ /'od zer lnga ni 'bar ba yi/ /sbyor ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsam/ /rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ /bde ba phab pas bde thob 'gyur/ /bsrub dang srub pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /ye shes

yang dag bskyed pa yi/ /'byung gnas dbu ma'i rtse ru gzung / /rnam par bzlog cing drangs pa yis/ /rlung dang rnam shes bde chen du/ /ro gcig rtog pa nub pa yi/ /khyab pas rlung dang dbyer med par/ /gnas sogs rnams su rgyas byed pa'i/ /kun tu 'phel ba'i stobs

rgyas pa'i/ /dbang bskur dam pa gnas par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po'i le'u

ste zhe gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i rtse mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan

nyid ni/ /ngo bo nyid med spros las dben/ /mnyam pa nyid la rtog mi mnga'/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i 'dren pa gcig pu pa ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po'i chos las 'das pa gang / /dngos med nam mkha' dag pa yi/ /ye shes 'di ni rmad po che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren dge ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtags pa rtog pa rab zhi ba/ /yul snang rnam rig ma grub pas/ /lugs 'byung dag pa'i nam mkha' nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nang stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi nang tha dad mi gnas pa/ /sems de gang du'ang gnas med de/ /mdor na dngos med rang

bzhin can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i chos can la/ /

ma grub pa yi ngang la gnas/ /de nyid lhun gyis grub pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan stug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /rten 'brel tsam du'ang mi gnas pa/ /rang byung bdag med stong pa nyid/ /gnyis su med pa'i 'od gsal ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa klus sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes sgron me 'bar ba ni/ /mi zad du ma ro gcig pa'i/ /dran pas stong pa bde ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don dam pa stongs

nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bsgom du med pa'i dngos/ /bsgom pa tsam du 'dzin med de/ /mtha' las grol ba mi gnas pa/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal

brgyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig las ni byang chub 'gyur/ /rtog pas stong pa'i chos nyid las/ /mnyam rjes lhag mthong spyod pa can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhum pa med pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du zhi gnas ting 'dzin gyi/ /mi g.yo ba las 'das pa nyid/ /

lung du bstan pa'i phyogs las ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

brjod pas brtags pa rang stong ba/ /lung ma bstan las 'das pa'i dngos/ /mi phyed brjod bral ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems la rgyu med phyir/ /thog mtha' stong pa chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes lugs las bzlog par 'char/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

seng ge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos gad spang bar bya ba dang / /brten bya tha dad med par ni/ /len pa med par rang grol du/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdod nas zhi ba'i chos nyid la/ /ma skyes skye med dag pa'i sems/ /'od gsal lhan

cig skyes pa'i bdag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa' bo chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun

bdag med pa yi mchog /kun du bzang po bde ba che/ /mi zad lhun gyis grub pa'i don/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i gnas dpal phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /nyi tshe'i stong nyid las 'das shing / /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me

tog rgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /dus gsum rjes su mi dmigs pas/ /thog med ye shes bstan pa nyid/ /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po rtag pa'i chos nyid med/ /mi rtag 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid

can/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i chos nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lta ba

ma yin mi gnas pa/ /kun gzhi dag pa'i snying po nyid/ /zab cing phra ba rten gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog rgyal bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor 'das gzung 'dzin snod bcud rnams/ /thams cad bdag med ngo bo nyid/ /stong pa nyid du'ang mi gnas pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /stong pa nyid du mi bsam zhing / /stong min bar yang bsgom

pa min/ /de nyid byang chub dam pa'i gzhi/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab

tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'khor lo'i gtsos/ /tshangs dbyangs rdo rje'i nga ro yis/ /chos 'byung rol ba ston par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar mkhan thams cad kyi bdag rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lam tshol lam gyi lta ba las/ /rnam par bzlog pa bla na med/ /chos rgya bzhi ldan rnal mi lam/ /zab pa zhi ba don spyod

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron me 'bar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsob po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon dang ni myu gu'i bar/ /rim gyis bskyed pa yongs dag

pa/ /de nyid 'bras bu ro 'byin pa'i/ /thabs tshul 'di ni dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srog rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam dag

zhi ba'i chos nyid ni/ /btags pa'i gsan las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes rgyal ba kun khyab pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mngal las skye dang sgo nga dang / /rdzus te skyes dang drod gsher las/ /skye ba'i sems can ma dmigs pas/ /sems can spyod pa mi dmigs so / /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skye ba po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro drug la sogs khams gsum pa'i/ /sems can rnam shes rang nyid las/ /rang 'khrul log shes kyis bcings pa/ /

de grol byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gso ba skyes bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /btags pa'i yid spyod ma zhugs pa'i/ /snang las ma nges grol 'gyur zhing / /sgrib med rang gsal mthong ba ni/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag rgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gang zag rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul rkyen rdzas las grol ba yi/ /the tsom rnam bral sro 'dogs chod/ /rigs med phyir na ye shes che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor shes rab mchog

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed bu rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams rgyud dag pa'i sa gnas pas/ /sa rnams bgrod pa go 'bang mchog /rtse gcig rang byung rang grol bas/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid tshim mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shed las skyes rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs/ /dag pa ye

shes bdag med pa/ /gnyis med mnyam pa rnam rgyal bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i yum min zhing / /gsang ba'i shes rab ral gris ni/ /log lta phung po gcod par byed/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byed pa po rnam par dag pa

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sbyi dang bye brag bla med gnas/ /yang dag ye shes rnam grol bas/ /zag med tshul ni zhi ba las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs par chags med mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /de bzhin nyid la legs gnas pas/ /sna tshogs kun spyod mi dmigs te/ /de nyid ye

shes chen por bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bos byin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa po rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji ltar 'dod pa rang grol du/ /sbrul mdud lta bur bcings las

'da'/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo ye shes mthong ba po rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stobs ldan skyes

bu mchog gis ni/ /gang du rtsal gyi rten mthong bas/ /shugs kyis 'gro ba mda' bzhin no/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi slong pa po rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du spong pa sor zhugs shing / /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /yongs su shes na rnam grol gyis/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

'jig rten dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang po'i gnas las lhag pa'i stobs/ /stong gsum chos kyi dpal ldan pas/ /ye shes char 'bebs ston pa po/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po shugs 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las sna tshogs ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha'i gzugs

su yongs bzhugs pa/ /'dus pa bla med dgyes par rol/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal sku'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gsang ba la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /

gtsug tor tshad med gzhal med pa/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi spyod yul te/ /de nyid gsang ba bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan

lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /yid 'phrog dpag med rdo rje'i gsung / /sems can sna tshogs der ston pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab spyod yul lo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pas byin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje'i gnas kyi

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems kyi gsang ba dag pa ste/ /sems kyi las ni yongs dag pas/ /sems can khams dang mthun par 'jug /bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /

thub pa don gyi ye shes can/ /sku bzhi ye shes rab rdzogs pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid 'di gsungs bar mdzad/ /gang du gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po 'di 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma 'byung ba rnams ni ye shes dgyes pa chen pos khyab cing gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa

nyid bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob la/ /des chos thams cad yongs su dag cing phyin ci ma log par khong du chud pas gnas par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi lha chen po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gu lang dang / drag po'i

rigs su gyur pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par chos 'di la bsrung ba'i phyir de 'dzin pa dag la mchod cing rten par byed do/ /'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'byung gnas so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa

rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /'phags pa rang rgyal ba la gnas pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin par rig par bya'o/ /

rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas bla na med par rig par bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yang 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'di ni gsang ba chen po ye shes kun du 'byung ba'i gzhi gcig

par gnas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba yongs su mi zad pa'i 'byung gnas su bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thog mar byung ba dang / bar du da ltar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i don dang / tha mar phyi

ma'i dus na nges par 'byung ba'i gsang chen nges par 'pho ba'i tshul gyi rnam grangs du ma nga yis bshad par bya yis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gnas dang dus dang chos kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa du ma 'byung ba nges par zung shig /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po

rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon 'byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu srog gcod brtson par 'gyur/ /bskal pa drug 'dzin zhes bya la/ /sangs rgyas zla ba mi 'khrugs pas/ /thams cad zhe sdang

can gyur la/ /srog gcod pa la brtsams pa yi/ /dam chos dgongs te bshad pa la/ /slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /dge slong nag po gtum zhes pa/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas/ /nag po bdud kyi sha zar gyur/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas/ /thams

cad dmyal ba'i srungs mar skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje can gyis ni/ /zhe sdang rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /srog chags gsad par gyis zhes pa/ /khams gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /'khor ba'i

rnam rtog bsad na ni/ /de ni mi bskyod zhing du skye/ /rdo rje can gyi sdom pa las/ /zhe sdang rigs kyi dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams

cad ni/ /rnam par shes pa gti mug pas/ /ma byin len la brtson par 'gyur/ /bskal pa gzung dka' zhes bya la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog /seng ge 'od kyi rgyal po la/ /bstan pa'i dam tshig gnas pa'i tshe/ /thams cad gti mug shas che la/ /gzhan gyi nor

'phrog spyod par 'gyur/ /de dag ldem por dgongs pa la/ /slob dpon seng ge zla ba yis/ /dge slong bzod pa can zhes pas/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam spyad pas/ /drag po mun pa can zhes pa'i/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pas/ /thams cad dud 'gro'i gnas su skyes/ /de ltar

rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis ni/ /gti mug rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /khyod kyis ma byin long zhes pa/ /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu las/ /'phags pa'i nor rnams blangs nas ni/ /sdug po bkod pa'i

zhing du skye/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa las/ /gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /

shin tu g.yem la sred pa yis/ /mi tshangs spyod la 'jug par gyur/ /bskal pa bcud ldan zhes bya la/ /pad+mo 'od 'phro mi bzang ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/ /thams cad 'dod chags spyod gyur la/ /log par shin tu g.yem bar spyod/ /'dod chags kyis ni thar

thob ces/ /de ltar dgongs te gsungs pa la/ /slob dpon pad+mo dpal zhes pas/ /dge slong rgyal ba mchog ces la/ /rjes su bstan dang gdams pa las/ /skye ba de yi 'og tu ni/ /dreg byed mtha' la gnas pa ni/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs bcas pa/ /thams cad

gnas su skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /chos 'dzin pa yi gsung rdo rjes/ /'dod chags rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /gzhan gyi bud med spyod ces pa/ /chos rnams mig 'phrul mtshungs pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun

mo rnams/ /ye shes bde bar rol par bya/ /shes rab bud med spyad na ni/ /bde ba can gyi zhing du 'gro/ /chos 'dzin pa yi sdom pa las/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab

la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can can thams cad ni/ /shin tu le lo'i dbang gyur cing / /du smra ba dga' bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa gzi chen snang ba'i dus/ /bde gshegs rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes/ /sangs rgyas de yi bstan pa la/ /'gro rnams shin tu phrag dog can/ /de la

tshig gis grol zhes/ /rgyal bas dgongs te bstan pa la/ /slob dpon rta mchog ces bya bas/ /dge bsnyen zla ba zhes bya la/ /gsung rab don rjes bstan pa las/ /shin tu 'khrul bas gnas par gyur/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rnam skyed pas/ /drag byed 'khrul ba can zhes pa/ /chung

ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas/ /thams cad cad dbang sgyur bdud kyi lha/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /gdon mi za ba'i phrin las kyis/ /phrag dog rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /

khyod gyis du spros zhes pa/ /chos rnams dri za'i grong khyer las/ /thams cad pa slu ba'i tshig /sgyu ma lta bur bsgrags nas kyang / /kun rdzob spyod pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /'brug sgra can gyi zhing du 'gro/ /las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa las/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i dam tshig

bstan/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba'o/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu nga rgyal cher spyod cing / /tshig rtsub dag gis spyod par gyur/ /bskal pa mi gnas

pa zhes la/ /bde gshegs dkon mchog dpal zhes pa'i/ /bstan pa de la gnas pa'i tshe/ /phal cher nga rgyal gyis non cing / /ngag ma bsdams pas gnas par gyur/ /rtsub pa'i tshig rnams smras pa yis/ /des ni thar pa thob ces pa/ /rgyal ba dgong te gsungs pa la/ /

slob dpon nyi ma'i dpal zhes pas/ /dge slong 'byor ba can zhes la/ /bka' yi dgongs pa bstan pa las/ /gsang ba'i don las rnam 'khrul bas/ /drag byed 'jungs ba can zhes pa/ /chung ma nyi bu'i tshogs bcas pa/ /thams cad lha min srin po'i gnas/ /ri rab sul la gnas pa

skyes/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro bas/ nga rgyal rigs can 'dul bar mdzad/ /snga phyi'i chos ni bden mthong bas/ /'khrul pa'i spyod las log pa ste/ /rtsub pa'i chos rnams smras pa yis/ /ye shes thob

'gyur zhes pa la/ /dngos por 'dzin pa skrag byed pa'i/ /yang dag kun rdzob chos nyid kyis/ /rang bzhin med par bstan pa yis/ /de dag spyod pa don ldan pa/ /rdul dang bral ba'i zhing du 'gro/ /rin chen rigs kyi sdom pa yin/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen

po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /bskal pa rgyan zhes bya la/ /bde gshegs dpal ldan dri med pa/ /ye shes bzang po'i bstan pa la/ /thams

cad nyon mongs lnga spyod pa/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa rags par gyur/ /nyon mongs ma spangs 'tshang rgya zhes/ /rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa la/ /slob dpon kun du bzang po yis/ /dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rab la/ /log par spyad pa'i

rnam smin gyis/ /sgra sgrogs sde can zhes bya ba/ /chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas/ /mi yi gnas su srin por skyes/ /lang ka pu ri'i rgyal por gyur/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /gsang chen rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dug lnga'i rang

bzhin gyis bsdus btul/ /nyon mongs ma spangs lam 'gyur zhes/ /chags sdang rang bzhin shes nas kyang / /dug gsum ye shes gyur pa ni/ /gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i lam/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing du skye/ /bla na med pa'i sdom pa las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig yin/ /dug

lnga'i rtog pa gdul ba ni/ /zhe sdang can la khyab 'jug dang / /gti mug can la tshangs pa dang / /'dod chags dbang phyug chen po dang / /phrag dog dga' rab dbang phyug dang / /nga rgyal can ni brgya byin gyi/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i char bsgyur nas/ /sems can log pa'i lam du

btsud/ /rang gi spyod yul mi 'da'i phyir/ /de la bar chad sna tshogs pas/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul/ /de ltar rdo rje can gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan gar mdzad pas/ /lha rnams gdul bar mdzad nas ni/ /gsang ba'i ye shes ston par byed/ /de ltar gdul

bya gang dang gang gi don du dgongs te gsungs pa rnam par nges pa thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsang ba nges pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang ba mchog tu mi 'gyur

ba rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling gru gsum chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /'di ni mi mdzes kyi 'jig rten gyi zhing khams kyi snying por gyur pa'o/ /dus phun sum tshogs pa ste dus rnams kyi snyigs ma la bab pa thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnam par dag pa ste

gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul lo/ /'chad pa po ni ston pa ste/ /'dir dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pas 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor

gyur ba nyid do/ /de dag kyang chos nyid dang gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rab tu mi zad pa'i don la rab tu dgongs pa dag go/ /de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /'di

lta ste 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni rgyal po zas gtsang mar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dbyangs ni lha mo chen mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lha mo dpal gyi lu gu rgyud ma ni grags 'dzin mar gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgra gcan 'dzin to/ /byang chub

sems dpa' sgrib pa kun tu gcod pa ni shA ri'i bur gyur pa'o/ /kun du bzang po ni gnas brtan kun dga' bor gyur to/ /kun du bzang po rnam par rol pa'i sku can ni mod gal gyi bur gyur ba'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni gnas brtan lha sbyin no/ /tshangs pa chen po ni byang chub sems

dpa'i snang ba'i 'od du gyur pa'o/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba shAkya thub pa nyid du gyur to/ /de ltar mdo dang thun mong du spyod pa'i don du gsungs so/ /'dir ni gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i don du so sor phye nas gsal bar bshad par bya'o/ /

'di lta ste da ltar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor gsang ba spyi'i don du bstan te/ /gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa can gyi kun dga' bor gyur to/ /kun du bzang po ni maud gal gyi bu'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam

par sel ba ni kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ra gyur to/ /blo gros mi zad pa ni shA ri'i bu'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od srung ngo / /sa'i snying po ni ma 'gags pa'o/ /byams pa ni nye ba'i 'khor ro/ /nam mkha'i snying po ni gnas brtan chen po rab 'byor du gyur to/ /gzugs rdo rje

ma ni skye dgu'i bdag mo'o/ /sgra rdo rje ma ni dbyangs ldan ma'o/ /dri rdo rje ma ni rigs ldan ma'o/ /ro rdo rje ni dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma'o/ /reg bya rdo rje ni sa 'tsho mar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas spyan ma ni sa'i lha mor gyur to/ /mA ma kI ni 'od mchog mar gyur to/ /gos dkar mo

ni pad+ma grags mchog ma'o/ /sgrol ma ni sna tshogs 'od 'chang mar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa sman gyi bla dri ma med pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od du gyur to/ /rnam par snang byed de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge thugs rjes

'od kyi snang ba mi zad par gyur to/ /'od dpag tu med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od 'phro mi zad par gyur to/ /gdon mi za ba grub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rin chen 'byung ldan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal rin chen 'od 'phro

ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ye shes kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de ni gzhan yin par mi blta ste da lta rang nyid yin no/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcu rnams la 'di lta ste/ dpal

gshin rje mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur/ bgegs mthar byed ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya bar gyur/ dpal rta mgrin ni rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur/ shes rab mthar byed ni sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya bar

gyur/ khro bo mi g.yo ba ni pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ dbyug sngon can ni de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam par gyur/ khro bo stobs po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin

gyi rgyal po glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po ni sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur/ khro bo gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs

rgyas stong 'jig rten du mngon par 'byung ba la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang gsang ba 'dzin pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i 'od dang gsum gyi sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul gyis spyad pa spyod pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad byang chub kyi shing brgyad dang bcas pa las mngon par byang chub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs bdag nyid du gcig pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa ta la'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can ni mya ngan med pa'i

shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me can ni tsU ta'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel ni b+ha ta ba'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub ni ka ra tsa pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung ni par ka ti ba'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni par ti pa'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni nA ga ke sa ra'i shing gi drung du'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dus gsum du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad kyi zhing khams na bzhugs shing yongs su

skyong bar mdzad de/ gang du rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yongs su gzigs shing byin gyis rlob par ston pa yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'byung ba'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par gyis shig /de yang gang zhe na/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gang du byon pa'am 'jug par mdzad pa du gang
