nas gshegs pa dang / gang du gnas pa'i don gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdzad pa shes par gyis shig /gang du 'di ni mngon bstan pas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung ba dag /mngon par byang chub gnas nyid las/ /'byung dang 'jug par gnas pa dang / /phrin las mdzad pa du

mar ston/ /dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho tshul dang / /lhums su 'jug dang sku bltams dang / /gzhon nu rol dang khab gnas dang / /skyed mos tshal byon gnas gzigs te/ /mngon par 'byung dang gshegs mdzad cing / /dka' spyad mdzad dang bzhengs pa dang / /byang chub snying por

gshegs pa dang / /bdud bcom mngon par byang chub pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad de/ /'di ni dus rnams kun du yang / /thog mar thun mong lam bstan cing / /rab tu dge ba mtshan ma med/ /tha mar the tshom sel ba yi/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod yul dang / /rnam par

nges pa phra bar bstan/ /sangs rgyas ma lus 'di dag nyid/ /zhi bar 'jug pa ston pa dag /bla na med pa'i spyod yul lo/ /sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yis/ /sems kyi rol mo las byung ba/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po ston pa yis/ /mdzad pa phyi nang gsang ba ste/ /dga' ldan pho brang rang lus

kyi/ /bde chen spyi bor gnas pa nyid/ /dam pa 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i gnas/ /rdo rje sngags kyi de nyid las/ /ting 'dzin mnyam par gyur pa ni/ /ji ltar skar mda' 'pho ba ltar/ /byang chub sems kyi glang po ni/ /mche ba drug ldan du gyur pa/ /snying rjes chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rtsa

yi pho brang kha sbyar du/ /byang chub sems ni zhugs par gyur/ /der gnas lhums su 'jug pa nyid/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid 'jug /thabs dang shes rab nus thob pas/ /g.yas rtsa nas ni 'byung gyur pa/ /bltam pa'i mdzad pa zhes brjod do/ /bde ba'i nus pa 'phel ba las/ /rgal

tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi/ /pad+ma yi ges bgrod pa dag /gom pa bor ba'i dus yin no/ /rlung sems 'gro ldog gang gyur pa/ /'khor dang myang 'das bskyed pa ni/ /bram ze mtshan mkhan drang srong gis/ /lung bstan brjod pa de yin no/ /de ltar mnyam par

bzhag pa las/ /rjes thob yul la spyod gyur pa/ /spros bcas spros med rnam dbye bas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga la/ /gzhon nu rol pa'i spyod pa yis/ /lus kyi gnas sogs kun du rol/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed gyur pa yi/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo'i yi ge rnams/ /

pho mo ma ning dbye ba yis/ /yi ge'i gnas la mkhas pa yin/ /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag /'pho tshul grangs dang dbye bsdu yi/ /rgyu tshul spro bsdu gang gyur pa/ /rtsis kyi gnas la mkhas pa'o/ /sa chu me rlung nus pa yi/ /glang po brkyal dang 'gegs pa dang / /pags

pa rim pa bdun gyur la/ /shing sogs rim par gnas gyur pa/ /rlung gi gzhu la me mda' yis/ /'phang ba chu rgyun 'bab pa yin/ /dang por shes rab las thob pa/ /byang sems dmar po gsang gnas su/ /dbang byas btsun mo khab gnas shing / /'byung bzhi'i rlung

rnams btsun mo'o/ /smin mtshams kyi ni mdud pa der/ /thig le phra ba brtan pa ni/ /steng du nyi zla gzas zin pa/ /sgra gcan 'dzin du brjod pa yin/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /phyogs bzhir skyed tshal gzigs pa ni/ /zag bcas rtsa rlung thig le yis/ /srid pa

bskyed pa gang yin pa'o/ /zag med bde ba thob 'dod pas/ /de yi tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /rlung gi rta dang bcas pa yis/ /dbu ma'i mthongs las byung nas ni/ /byang chub sems kyi mchod rten dag /'khor ba'i dra ba bcad nas ni/ /chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram nyid du/ /ye shes mngon

du byed 'dod pas/ /btsan thabs su ni 'gog pa dang / /lus ngag gcung la bor ba yis/ /zug dang dka' thub spyad pa ni/ /mnyam rjes gnyis su med pa yis/ /rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnas pa'o/ /aHthung gsos shing rgyun phab pas/ /'o ma'i bdud rtsi gsol ba

yin/ /gang ba byang chub shing drung du/ /rdo rje skyil krung gyur pa yis/ /rtags dang yon tan 'thob byed cing / /snang ba gsum ni thim pa'i tshe/ /zla ba nyi ma mun pa yi/ /rtog pa'i dra ba gang yin pa/ /bdud btul ba ni srod kyi dus/ /rnam rtog ye shes thim gyur pa/ /nye bar thob

pa'i skad cig la/ /skad cig khyad par lnga pa la/ /tho rangs skya rengs shar ba'i dus/ /nam mkha'i sprin med lta bu yi/ /nyams kyi shes pa 'od gsal ba/ /khyad par mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas thob pa yin/ /'khor lo bzhir ni bdud bcom pas/ /bcom

ldan 'das zhes brjod pa yin/ /mgrin par zag bcas rlung 'gags pas/ /klu yi gnas su zhugs pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i spyi bo nas 'pho zhing / /sa rlung thig le dang bcas pas/ /gser gyi 'khor lo ldan pa yin/ /thams cad dbang du gyur pa ni/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus

dang / /'gro drug sems can thams cad kyis/ /tshangs pa lha dang bcas pa dang / /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskul ba yin/ /sgrol rgyu'i tshal ni mdzod spu ste/ /tshong dpon gnyis ni rtsa gnyis te/ /lam gyur stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /lnga sde bzang po zhes bya

ba/ /dug lnga bskyed pa'i rtsa dang rlung / /bden bzhi chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /sprul pa'i gnas su gsungs pa ste/ /bA rA Na sI zhes ba yi/ /thog mar chags pa'i gnas yin no/ /cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba/ /mu stegs gdul ba'i don du ste/ /spa bkong kun brjod rdzu 'phrul

dang / /byin gyis rlob ba'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad/ /mtshan ma med pa'i chos gsungs pa/ /snying ga'i gnas su bstan pa ste/ /rgyal po'i khab dang bya rgod spungs/ /gnas kyi khyad par theg pa che/ /khyad par 'khor rnams bstan pa la/ /zab

cing rgya che bstan pa yin/ /spyi bo mgrin pa smin mtshams dang / /gsang ba la sogs thams cad du/ /don dam ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid don gsungs/ /gnas gzhan rnams su thub pa yis/ /chos rnams thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten

'das pa yis/ /mdzad pa sna tshogs gang bstan nas/ /srog rtsol de bzhin nyid thim zhing / /thams cad mngon du gyur pa yi/ /sku bzhi ngo bo nyid skur thim/ /bde chen rang byung dri med pa'i/ /dag pa'i zhing khams rab mi gnas/ /rtog med ye shes nam mkha'

bzhin/ /gang du mi mjed 'jig rten gyi/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gnas 'dir ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byung ba/ /dpag med bskal pa 'das pa'i dus/ /thub pa chen po mar me mdzad/ /nga ni bram zer gyur pa yis/ /sems bskyed zhus tshe bsten pa na/ /mngon par

lung bstan thob par gyur/ /de nyid 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang / /gsang ba'i gnas 'di ma gsungs shing / /de yi gong rol sngar 'das tshe/ /sangs rgyas thub chen mchog nyid dang / /rin chen gtsug tor can dang ni/ /rnam par gzigs la sogs pas kyang / /gsang chen 'di ni

ma gsungs shing / /log par dad sel gser thub dang / /rgyal ba 'od srung dag gis kyang / /gsang ba 'di dag ma gsungs te/ /de nyid ston pa'i don du ni/ /gsang chen gnas kyi don 'di dag /de dus sems can thams cad la/ /gang du mngon par spyod pa dang / /thun mong bslab

pa'i tshul bstan cing / /'di nyid gsungs par ma gyur to/ /gang du ma 'ongs dus na yang / /byams pa la sogs rgyal ba yi/ /bskal bzang sangs rgyas du mas kyang / /'di dag lha mi'i mngon sum du/ /gsang ba ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /'gro

drug sems can sna tshogs la/ /snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /dbang po rno zhing don spyod pas/ /dus la bab par shes par bya/ /'di nyid nye bar 'byung ba yang / /gling 'di nyid las gzhan du min/ /gang yang 'og min zhing khams ni/ /ye shes snang ba rgyas pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang

chen bcom ldan gyis/ /rgyun mi 'chad cing khyab pa dang / /rtag cing 'gyur med mchog gis ni/ /gsang chen 'di ni kun du ston/ /gang yang 'das dang ma byon dang / /da ltar 'byung ba ma lus pa/ /gsang chen mchog 'dis ma bgrod par/ /byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te/ /'di ni mthar

thug gnas yin pas/ /de las gzhan pa'i spyod yul min/ /'di nyid gnas pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /'di nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du snang ba yi/ /dur khrod gnas brgyad sprul pa la/ /phyi nang gnas kyi

dbye ba yis/ /phyogs skyong ba dang zhing skyong la/ /mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / /grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ste/ /snying po ye shes phyag rgya dang / /phrin las rol pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /'jig rten pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos ye shes kun du rgyas pas

phyag rgyas rtags mtshon pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mdzad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/ /zhi ba'i don du phyogs skyong gyur/ /de yi rtags ni 'khor dang bcas/ /yum dang rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /grub pa'i rtags kyi rgyas gdab phyir/ /zhing skyong brgyad du khro

bo'i tshul/ /ljon pa'i shing la brten nas gnas/ /zhi ba'i tshul gyis rgyas gdab phyir/ /de yi zhon pa'i gdong brnyan byung / /phrin las phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir/ /tshar gcad rjes 'dzin las rnams mdzad/ /rdo rje dbyug to zhags pa dang / /be con bgrang phreng ral gri dang / /ba

dan tri shUl 'dzin par mdzad/ /snying po ye shes phyag rgya yis/ /rgyas gdab phyir ni gzhal yas kyi/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du bkod pa yin/ /rol pa'i phyag rgya spyod pa'i phyir/ /dur khrod brgyad du gnas pa ste/ /lha dbang bcas dang ma mo dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams

dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang drang srong dang / /sha za rnams dang rig 'dzin tshogs/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis bskor ba yin/ /zhing skyong drag po'i las byed phyir/ /phyag na gri gug thod pa bsnams/ /shin tu 'jigs pa gtum pa'i gzugs/ /shing brgyad nang nas lus phyed thon/ /lus

kyi phyag rgya sbas pa yin/ /de yang so so'i yum dag ni/ /shing gi rtsa bar gnas pa ste/ /zhal zas stobs pa'i tshul du gnas/ /glang po ma he chu srin dang / /rta mchog phyogs gcig gnas pa yin/ /ro dang ro langs dang / /khyu mchog bzhi ni mtshams su gnas/ /steng phyogs

tshangs pa ngang ba zhon/ /'og phyogs sa bdag rus sbal zhon/ /lha dang lha mor mtshungs pa ste/ /'di dag rang bzhin gyis gnas yin/ /chags pa dang khro bo'i skus 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nyid kun tu sprul mdzad pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs sbas nas/ /zhi ba'i skus ni mi 'dul ba'i/ /sems can gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir/ /rang rig ye shes byang chub sems/ /drag po khro bo'i skur bstan pas/ /khro bo zhes ni rnam

par brjod/ /gang du rjes su 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam par bsgyur te zhi bas na/ /slar yang zhi ba de bzhin gshegs/ chos nyid mnyam par 'byung ba'o/ /'di dag gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can don du thabs ston mdzad/ /shAkya thub pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag nyid chen po'i

byin brlabs las/ /rnga bo che dang gaN+DI dang / /chos kyi dung las grags pa dang / /sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra las ni/ /gang zhig dam chos sgra byung ba/ /'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kyang / /chos kyi 'gro ba gang yin dang / /dus der brgyud

pa'i chos bstan pa/ /de snyed bde gshegs rgyal ba yi/ /dngos kyi byin brlab rig par bya/ /ston pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /mi gnas ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /don byed ston pa 'byung ba ni/ /bla med bka' yi dgongs pa dag /yang dag nges par bkrol nas kyang / /gang du

dam pa'i chos sgra yis/ /'gro ba smin par byed pa ni/ /de dus nga nyid der bstan pas/ /bstan bcos shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa

mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas gsang ba chen po thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// //gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi brtag pa bzhi pa las rdo rje dpal mchog chen po gsang

ba'i don gyi rgyal po'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje skye bo 'od chen po/ /'dod dang thar pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes gsang ba bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes kyi nor bu chen po du ma'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod par

byas so/ /mchod par byas nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdun du bdar zhing 'dug ste gsang chen gyi don la phyogs gcig tu zhugs te yongs su spyod par gyur to/ /de la 'di ni gsang chen gyi/ /sku gsum bla med phyag rgya che/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus pa'i/ /chos rnams 'dus pa'i

mchog yin te/ /'di ni khyad par dus 'byung ba'i/ /dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

dpal ldan sangs rgyas skus khyab pa/ /sku yi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /ji snyed sku yi rnam pa mnga'/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po don grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gnas/ /gsung gcig gnas las gyur med kyi/ /mos pa du mas so sor thos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

seng ge'i sde sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag la/ /ye shes sna tshogs ting 'dzin las/ /mi 'gyur nam mkha'i

ngang bzhugs pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /sems kyi rgyun ni mi 'gag phyir/ /ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya yi bar/ /thub pa'i zhing khams bdag po ni/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod las byung / /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rgyu dang 'bras bu yi/ /snang ba mi 'gag

stong pa nyid/ /de nyid rang bzhin gyis dag brjod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thams cad du son pa'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni/ /thams cad rjes su sog gyur kyang / /sems pa mi ldan de bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi

gnas ma lus par mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni sems can khams mtha' yas/ /de yi chos nyid rjes 'gro ba/ /rtog pa mi mnga' de nyid do/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po yon tan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rgyal ba'i sku nyid kyang / /spros med de bzhin nyid dag

pa'i/ /rjes 'gro rtog pa med pa nyid/ /spros pa med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa smra 'don dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /yongs su dag pa'i snang ba gang / /mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ni/ /spang blang dbri bsnan med par grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron me'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcu yongs su dag pa

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos sku ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /chu rlung nam mkhar dag pa gang / /gzugs sku'i rtogs pa mkha' la gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sha'i spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thogs pa med pa rdo rje yi/ /pha lam ltar ni phrin las dag /stobs ni yul du gyur/ /snang med rnal 'byor pa

yi gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa dang ni gzugs dag ni/ /lha yi spyod yul gtsang ma'i gnas/ /'jig rten

khams kun snang bar byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi spyan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i

ye shes las/ /dbyer med bden pa gnyis dag pa/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol brnyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub pa'i spyan rdo rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba/ /chos kyi gter dang ldan pa las/ /rjes su dran pa'i spyan gyis ni/ /dus gsum shes bya mi gzigs med/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi gser sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ye shes kyi spyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum mnyam nyid rnam dag pas/ /dus kyi 'du shes 'jug med pa/ /skad cig ye shes spyod yul ni/ /snang ba med pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan lnga rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gzigs pa'i yul med pas/ /blo snang btags pa'i tshul ma grub/ /de snang gdul bya'i don

spyod pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i lam bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes gzhal du

med pa nyid/ /mi gnas rnam par mi gnas pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur mi rtog pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'du shes dang ni sems pa dang / /lta ba phyin ci log spangs nas/ /ye shes mngon par byang chub pa/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas

pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ /byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes zag pa med pa'i dbyings/ /rang byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar rten med pas/ /dmigs med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa la/ /mchod pa gnas kyi don 'di gsungs/ /me tog rigs ni lha mo'i cha/ /de nyid ye shes dbyings bstan pa'o/ /mkhas pas ut+pal dag ni/ /'byung ba lnga yi rnam pa ste/ /pad+ma rnam pa lnga nyid ni/ /'dod yon lnga yi bye brag ste/ /dzA ti rnam

gsum zhes bya ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha mo ste/ /kar ni ka ra chu yi lha/ /ma li ka ni me yi lha/ /yu ti ka ni sa yi lha/ /ka ra bI ra rlung gi lha/ /lha mo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri rdo rje/ /ro dang reg bya rdo rje ma/ /spyan dang mA ma kI dang ni/ /gos

dkar mo dang sgrol ma ste/ /lha mo dgu yi rol pa gang / /gsang ba lha mo ye shes mchod/ /me tog nyi shu rtsa lnga yi/ /rnam pa gsal ba bstan pa'o/ /sna ma'i me tog pad+ma dang / /ta ma la dang tsam pa ka/ /ku mud dang nA ga ge sar/ /na ba ma li dam na/ pund ri ka da

ma na/ /man+dA ra ba pri yang ku/ /se pha li ka su na ka /bil ba'i me tog ka tha ra/ /sa li ki la ku dza ta/ /a san ke ta sha 'bras bu/ /khardzu ri ka bak+ku la/ /rag ku ta dang a sho ka /kar ku To Da pun d+ha ste/ /me tog ji bzhin bdug spos dang / /zhal zas bye brag shes par bya/ /

dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba'i lha mo'i mchod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa gser gyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos sku ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /spros pa med cing mtshan nyid med/ /rtog bral byang chub sems kyi ngang / /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs byin dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun mtshan nyid rnam bral bas/ /

de phyir nyon mongs med ces bshad/ /rtog pa sna tshogs dag pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yon tan dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snying po kun du 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dbyings tshad med stong nyid pas/ /sangs rgyas sku yang de rjes 'gro/ /ye shes lus su yang dag bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs tshad

med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rdo rje'i rtogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba'i gsung ni chos dbyings kyi/ /nam mkha'i gnas dang mtshungs par yang / /rdo rje'i gsung du ston pa pos/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rol pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /bde gshegs

thugs ni rjes 'gro bral/ /rdo rje thugs te mi bzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rta bdun dpal rdo rje'i zer lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi dang nang du rtog med pa'i/ /dbus na ye shes mi shigs pa/ /gsang ba rol par yang dag 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gya nom pasangs rgyas thams cad kyi zla ba'i snying

po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyer 'gro nyer spyod mi gnas pa/ /khams gsum bskyed dang sdud bral ba'i/ /byang chub mchog tu ston pa po/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros phra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten pa'i gling rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khrul pa dag cing dri ma spangs/ /sna tshogs spyod pa las grol zhing / /phyi rol rnam rtog spangs pa yi/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mi zad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'brug sgra'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /so sor snang ba du ma dang / /gong du gcig

pa'i dngos gang yin/ /de nyid yongs su bsdus pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtsi sman rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i snal ma lta bur phra ba ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshogs drug snang ba ma 'gags pa/ /sems dang yid dang rnam shes las/ /snying gi chu skyes sad byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi g.yo

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun mi chad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dal zhing dal ba'i gnas las skyes/ /zhi ba g.yo med nyid du 'jug /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi

mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid/ /g.yeng ba bral ba'i bsam gtan la/ /mchog tu grub pa mthong byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par brtse ba chen po yis/ /gcig

dang du mar mi gnas par/ /sgra brnyan lta bur ston par mdzad/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams kyi sems cad rnams/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma gnas/ /de yi rgyu dang gnas shes pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo spong sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du yul dang yul rnams kyi/ /dbye ba shes pa'i ye shes mtha'/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi rgyu

nges pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med grags sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa sngon gyi gnas shes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas

kyi gtan tshigs rags phra dang / /phra ba ma lus pa yi gzhi/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin shes phyir/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i phung bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rdo rje

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid pa'i rgyun ni rnam bcad cing / /spong ba dag pa'i tshul gnas pa/ /spang du med pa'i ngang du grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa drug dag pa'i rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu mthun goms pa'i dbang gis ni/ /de yi 'bras bu 'grub par byed/ /de

yi rtsa ba ma skyes phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog pa kun

dang khams dang ni/ /skye ba las ni yongs grol bas/ /bral ba'i 'bras bu dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos brtsegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa dang rtags rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang du gyur pas dngos po las/ /ldog pa med pa'i 'bras bu gang / /thob pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /

nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang las rdzogs pa/ /gang du dbus su legs gnas pa/ /snying por gyur pa gtso bo ste/ /gzhan rnams len cing 'dzin par brjod/ /rdzus te skyes dang mngal las skyes/ /

sgo nga las byung drod gsher skyes/ /'di dag dag pa'i lhar gyur pas/ /dkyil 'khor grong khyer de dang mtshungs/ /gnas med ye shes tshul bstan pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /cho ga gsum dang mngon par ni/ /byang chub rnam pa lngar gsungs pa/ /gal te skad cig

dran rdzogs gyur/ /thams cad rigs kyi dbye ba yis/ /rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bstan/ /rigs ni dbye dang bsdu ba yis/ /bye brag mkhas pas shes par bya/ /'byung ba lnga nyid sangs rgyas lngar/ /mi yi lus ni brtag bya ste/ /dngos de nges par bsgoms

pa yis/ /rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /phyi rol 'gro ba mi mdzes pa/ /slob pa'i 'gro ba'i slar ldog yin/ /mi slob pa yang ma lus yin/ /bde gshegs gsum du rnam par gshegs/ /gzhan du rnam par 'khrul 'gyur bas/ /bla

ma'i bka' las legs par blang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes dri ma med pa gnas pa'i le'u ste

bzhi bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje'i khyu mchog rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin/ /bskyed pa'i

tshul byung rnam dag pa/ /ye shes de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dga' ba dag pa tshad tshad med pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /thob med thob pa stong nyid sku/ /byang chub dang sems gcig tu bshad/ /dag pas rtog pa dag par gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi btang snyoms

chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyab pa'i sku yi phrin las dang / /'jam dbyangs gsung gi dbyangs gang dang / /skye med ro gcig ye shes thugs/ /dag pa tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa yid du 'ong pa'i gsung dbyangs thams cad kyi gnas rdo rje rgyal po lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong gsum zhing khams snod bcud kun/ /ma lus sangs rgyas nyid kyi dang / /snying po chos kyi mngon byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo dbyangs dpal byang chub don ston pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bas mtha' dben pa nags tshal du/ /gcig pu kun gnas pas/ /bsam gtan

rnam thar sgo gsum gyi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun gyi gnas pa rdo rje dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye bo kun gyi

mchod pa'i gnas/ /drang srong dri med sbyang mnga' ba/ /bag yod pa ni rten gnas yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro bas mchod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bkur sti rim gro'i gnas gyur pa/ /dran pa mi brjed gnas bstan pa/ /thub pa blo gros bzang po ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i logs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri ma med

pa'i rnam par grol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa las/ /bsgribs pa med cing 'bad med pa/ /re dogs rnam par bral ba yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa chos kyi mthu rtsal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung pa'i gdon thams cad dag par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mkha' la rgyu ba'i gdon gyi rigs/ /thams cad tshad med thugs rje'i chu rgyun

gyis/ tshim par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' che/ /de nyid bla med byang chub sems su brjod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis ni/ /byin brlabs ye shes rgya mtsho yi/ mtshungs med bde bar skyur ba ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpal ldan phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yis/ /sras po gcig par dbang bskur ba/ /tshim byed ye shes mchog dbang po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du brjod pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs chos kyi sgra 'byung ba'i/ /sil snyan brag ca'i sgra mtshungs

pa'i/ /rgyun chad med par rab ston pa/ /de nyid don dam chos rgyun bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sku yi rol pa mi zad pa/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams khyab par/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdud spa bkong

ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud dang nag po'i phyogs gyur la/ /skrag par byed pas tshar gcod pa'i/ /cho 'phrul bcu drug bstan pa gang / /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mdo yi sde la sogs/ /bcu gnyis tshul dang ldan pa bzhi/ /bslab pa gsum gyi

dbye ba yis/ /chos kyi de nyid bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul snang sems kyi

ldog pa dang / /chos rnams ngo bo nyid shes na/ /dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yi ge'i gnas dang rkyen dag dang / /'byung ba'i tshul dang sde tshan gyi/ /rnam dbye mkhas pas dpyad par bya/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu

dga' bar mdzad ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du thogs pa med pa yi/ /seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs byed cing / /dpal gyi gnas las kun du

rgyal/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /

de dag mi dmigs mnyam pa nyid/ /stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med/ /rang bzhin dag pas snang ba gang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro ba bcom pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po dang ni mtshan ma yi/ /rnam par rtog pa dag pa'i phyir/ /dngos por mi gnas gzhan snang la/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dag pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /ye shes can

rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las lhag pa'i ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun

pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i phyogs dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdag 'dzin nyon mongs med/ /

ngar 'dzin zhi ba'i chos can la/ /bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lha'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dmigs med thugs rje yis/ /byams pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ /bla na med pa'i don bstan pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sbyin par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu'i

gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dmigs pa kun dang bral ba'i sems/ /nam mkha'i ngang las 'ja' tshon ltar/ /de nyid thogs med ye shes kyis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dri za'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sna tshogs rol mo'i cha dang ni/ /sil snyan rnams las sgra byung ba/ /ston pa'i chos kyi tshig grags pa/ /de nyid tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha ma yin gyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rnam par gtsang ba yi/ /dri ma rnam spangs bde

ba'i lam/ /ye shes phyag rgyas brgyan pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nam mkha' lding gi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi spyod yul ba/ /'di ni rnam dag byang chub lam/ /rnam grol rang rig bde ba che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi'am ci'i

gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa mtshungs med pa/ /rgyal ba rigs kyi bdag po'i dpal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so//

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi mdangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sa la gnas pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /dag pa chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i/ /shing rta chen po'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /

bzhi drug ldan pas bgrod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshungs pa

med pa chos kyi don/ /spros pa med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'bras bur ldan pa'i gnas 'di las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bskal ldan shing rta lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas pa med pa dri gsum spangs/ /thub pa rgyal ba spyan rdo rje/ /blo gros mi zad ye shes te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mchog gi ka na ka sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi

dgas kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba med cing 'byung ba'ang med/ /grub pa med pa'i chos nyid las/ /kun du snang ba mi slu ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i gtsug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srul po'i gdon dag pa rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi 'jigs pa yi dngos po las/ /zag med dngos grub 'byung

ba yi/ /dben pa rnam par mi rtog pa/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus srul po gdon dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal/ /thub pa byang chub shing drung du/ /bdud dpung sde rnams rab 'joms pa'i/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skem byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /smra ba'i seng ge bla na med/ /glang po chen po thogs pa med/ /pha rol 'joms pa gyad bzhin te/ /de yi nor bu'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dregs pa spangs

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smyo byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sna tshogs cho 'phrul tshogs/ /sems can mos pa'i snang ba la/ /du ma nyid du bstan gyur pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjed byed kyi gdon dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mthun snang gang zag mos yul te/ /de bas yang dag sangs rgyas la/ /kun rtog mi mngal lham me

bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi grib gnon gyi gdon dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang

dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /'bad dang rtsol ba'i rtog mi mnga'/ /mtha' yas byang chub sems kyi dang / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba tsan+dan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sha za'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tha dad rtog pa yongs mi mnga'/ /rang rig ye shes 'gro 'ong med/ /thams cad grub mtha'i 'dod pas brtags/ /de nyid ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

mya ngan med bdud kyi dpung las rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma chags thogs med rdo rje yi/ /char sprin mdog 'dra'i rtog spangs can/ /tshad med byams pa chen po yis/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag byang chub thabs ldan pa/ /gang tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos/ /de nyid rang bzhin

stong nyid grub/ /mtha' med ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'dir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas shing gsang ba bla med kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar gnas pas ni nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal dang / /byang chub sems dpa'

dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su spyod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par spyod par byed do/ /gsang ba 'dzin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang / /gzungs kyi sgo dang / /rnam par thar pa

ma lus pa yang tshe 'di nyid dang yongs su rdzogs shing kun du spyad pas spyod par byed na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan dang ye shes gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed/ /'jig rten

las 'das pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang srung zhing skyob ba dang sba ba dang yongs su srung bar byed do/ /gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gang gis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / nyan pa dang / phan tshun 'dre bar byed pa dang / sems pa na lha dang / klu dang / gza'

dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi gdon gyis kyang bar chad mi byed do/ bsrung zhing yongs su mchod par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i

rgyud las srung ba yongs su dag pa dang bar chad med pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'phags pa rnams kyi ye shes gang / /phyin ci log dang rnam bral ba/ /de nyid skye 'gag bral ba la/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i

snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi klu chen po brgyad dag pa rdo rje'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes ni/ /gsang ba mchog gi don gnas pa/ /dmigs pa las 'das byang chub

sems/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dag pa lha chen po brgyad dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gzung 'dzin btags pa'i dbang gis ni/ /mthar

gyur te nyid lam gyur pa/ /btags pa'i dri ma dag par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gza' chen po brgyad kyi gdon rnam par dag par rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rkyen las bskyed pa yi/ /rnam pa phan tshun ltos las byung / /gzhan dbang dag pa'i ye shes ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor tog sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu skar gyi gdon ma lus pa rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du phyin ci ma log pa'i/ /gnas tshul yongs su rdzogs grub pa/ /de bzhin nyid dang ye shes don/ /mi 'gyur de

bzhin tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i ge sar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi ris kyi gdon thams cad rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

chos rnams dag pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /rang bzhin sgyu mar snang ba gang / /ngo bo lhun grub dbyer med las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs skyong ba bcu'i gnod

pa'i gdon yongs su dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /ma nor mngon par thugs chud pas/ /skyob pa thugs rje'i ngo bo las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rA hu la rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bag chags dag pa'i rgyud las ni/ /ma rig pa dang bral

gyur pas/ /bdag skyes dag par gnas par bya/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi b+hi snu rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khams rgyud rnam par byang ba las/ /phyir mi ldog par gyur pa na/ /rang rig bdud las grol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi drang srong thams cad rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gdon rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ /rags pa 'og la brten nas te/ /phra ba'i sgo ni steng nas 'jug /dag pa ye shes tshul gnas bya/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyab 'jug gi gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byed pa 'jigs pa'i tshul sbangs te/ /zhe sdang dag pa'i byang chub las/ /stobs

chen pha rol gnon byed pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gdon rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du drag po 'jigs par ston/ /dus mtshan bcas pa 'dod chags bdag /'di nyid nyon mongs tshul dag pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rin chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshangs pa dag pa'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten srid pa gnas pa yi/ /dag pa bzhi las sprul 'dod pa/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang ldan sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chags dang 'jig pa dang / /gnas dang stong pa'i rim par 'di'i/ /dam pa gtsang ma'i zhing du smon/ /tshul 'di sangs rgyas bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par gsungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa 'og dang sa stengs dang sa bla ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mun pa dang ni snang ba yi/ /bstan pa

gnyis la rang rgyal dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul mchog gi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gsung dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams gsum pa las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma dang ni tha ma yi/ /'phel dang 'grib pa'i cha las ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa

gsum las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snyigs ma lnga 'byung dus kyi tshe/ /dus la bab pa'i bskal pa la/ /rgyal pa 'jig rten 'byung ba ste/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa skar rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus gsum las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/ /rdul snyed 'jig rten thams cad du/ /dus gsum dag pa'i ye shes kyi/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyi ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs bcu rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bltas pas mthong med yul med pa/ /

phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /pha rol phyin pa mtshungs med pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab las rgal ba rdo rje rnam pa thams cad las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spros pa kun las 'das nas ni/ /bla med theg pa rab 'byung ba/ /tshul 'di nye bar spyad pa na/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / /gzugs na spyod

ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis gsang ba nye bar bstan pa la mchod par byed de/ lha'i gos dag 'thor zhing lha'i sil snyan du ma yang rab tu dkrol te/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / ut+pal dang / ut+pa la chen po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang gtor to/ /mngon par gtor

to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /zhing khams de dag tu khyab pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan phye mas gtor zhing dri zhim pos yongs su khyab par gyur to/ /de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ /sa bla'i lha dang / /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / /'thab bral gyi lha dang /

dga' ldan kyi lha dang / /'phrul dga'i lha dang / /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bar dang / /tshangs ris kyi lha dang / /tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha dang / /tshags pa chen po'i lha dang / /'od chung gi lha dang / /tshad med 'od kyi lha dang / /'od gsal gyi lha dang / /dge ba'i lha dang / /dge chung

gi lha dang / /chad med dge ba'i lha dang / /dge rgyas kyi lha dang / /sprin med 'od kyi lha dang / /bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams dang / /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / /mi che 'bi lha rnams dang / /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / /shin tu mthong ba'i

lha rnams kyi bar te/ /'og min gyi lha'i tshogs du ma ngang bcas pa rnams kyis gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i don rab tu bstan pa la mchod do/ /rab tu mchod do/ /kun du mchod do/ /yang dag par mchod cing me tog gi char phab par gyur to/ /rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs rab tu sgrogs

par gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab pa la 'di lta ste/ rin po che an da rnyil dang / margad dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ka ru chen po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / man shel dang / bai DU R+Ya dang / mu tig dang / mu men dang / mus la ga lba dang / rin po che'i

rgyal ba bsam 'phel gyi bar du gtor zhing yongs su byur bur rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gdon la yongs su dag cing

kun du mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ye shes brnyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la/ /phyi rol dngos po dag pa la/ /yang dag ye shes sgyur ba po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa grub pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyon mongs rnam rtog glo bur ba/ /de nyid ma rig bag chags dag /rtsa ba bral bas des bcom pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po'i bdud bcom pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa las/ /rmi lam tshul ltar ma lags pa/ /gang du dag pa bdag

med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dag pa ye shes sku/ /

'gro 'ong med cing dbri bsnan med/ /gang du 'du 'bral med pa'i don/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phan par bzhed pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud bcom zhing legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang / /dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang gis/ /brtson 'grub phun sum tshogs pa ste/ /drug po 'dis ni ldan par gsungs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa ye shes ldan pa ye shes lnga dag pa'i dbyings rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos kyi dbyings dang ni/ /me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog /bya ba grub pa nyid dang ni/ /lnga po 'di ni ye

shes brjod/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su rtogs pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du gshegs shing gang du byon/ gang du gnas pa rdo rje'i dang / /zag med dpal ldan de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkar

po rnam par dag pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du so so'i skye bo yi/ /tha mal mos pas lam 'jug pa/ /dge ba'i don mthong nyan thos lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'joms pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rigs kyis rnam par dag pa rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dkar ba'i don ldan pas/ /bdag med bzod pa mnyam pa nyid/ /

chos gang lhag par dad pa na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brgyad pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du chos kyi don rnyed pa/ /thog ma'i 'bras bu mngon gyur pa/ /de nyid 'phags pa'i tshul bstan pa'i/ /bla med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthong ba'i sa

rnam par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang gang mthong ba'i chos nyid la/ /sgrib pa med par rang gsal ba/ /don dang mthun par spyod pa las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dra ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrabs pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dug nyid dag par byas ba yi/ /dug med

gnas ni phra gnas pa/ /bral ba bag nyal ba zhi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chags med ye shes mchog /rags pa dag par spangs pa'i don/ /dman pa las ni phyir 'ong bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mchog

'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byas pa rtogs pa'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bya ba byas pa bstan pa'i don/ /byed pa byas pa khur bor te/ /rtag chad las grol byang chub lam/ /de nyid tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i sa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyams pa med pa'i tshul

khrims las/ /rnams par rtog par mi phyed pa/ /dri med dgra bcom don thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu zla ba can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phags pa nyan thos kyis dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag med don ldan dngos med pa/ /spyi dang bye brag mtshungs med pas/ /'bras bu grol ba thob pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra

gcan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang sangs rgyas pa'i gnas rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /spyod pa rmad byung rgyal ba'i skus/ /'dul med zhing du rdzu 'phrul bas/ /rtogs pa de las spyod par bcas/ /

rang rgyal gnyis po'i tshul du brjod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes lta ba mkhyen pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thogs med

khyab par spyod pas na/ /ma 'dres dus gsum mnyam pa nyid/ /mkhyen pa'i phyogs bral dag pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes ji snyed pa mkhyen pa dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas nyag gcig spyod yul du/ /mngon du ma gyur med pas na/ /thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

skar ma'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du rtog pas ma brtags pa/ /dran pas yid la byed pa bral/ /rab tu mi gnas pa yi yod/ /dmigs

pa med pa'i bdag nyid can/ /gang du dmigs med skye ba med/ /rten 'brel dag pa rang byung ba/ /lhun grub ngang las ma g.yos pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i

tshogs/ /sna tshogs mchod cing bstod byas na/ /ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rigs brgya yis/ /re res brgya phrag bcu yi bar/ /de ltar stong phrag brgya dag gis/ /'bum du bzlas pa yin par brjod/ /bdag nyid

mi bskyod par byas te/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang yum bzhi dang / /sems dpa' drug dang lha mo lnga/ /khro bo'i rgyal po ldas bsdus te/ nyi shu pa yi bdag nyid kyis/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje 'bar

ba rab bsgoms te/ /de las spro dang bsdu byas pa'i/ /bzlas pa stong phrag nyi shu bas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i bsam gtan bsdus/ /de ltar 'khor lo nor bu dang / /pad+ma ral gri'i bar du yang / /re re'i sngags kyi don bsgom pa/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas

te/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis/ /gti mug nga rgyal 'dod chags dang / /phrag dog dag pa'i dkyil 'khor las/ /rigs ni bzhi po kun la yang / /stong phrag nyi shu phrag bzhi yis/ /khri phrag bcur ni bzlas byas pas/ /bsnyen pa nye bar bsgrub pa yi/ /bzlas

ba gsang sngags tshul bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las gsang chen thun mong ma yin pa'i rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste

lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs bzhi ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub

'od po che/ /rtag tu chos rgyal thob pa'i don/ /rang rig mi gnas nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong ba rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mngon par sangs rgyas kyang / /rgyu med rkyen grol byang chub sems/ /'di nyid 'gag par 'gyur med de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad par ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes mngon par mi gnas pas/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /rjes 'gro mtshungs

pa tha ma med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas thams cad mi g.yo ba rdo rjer 'char ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dag pa thar pa'i

tshul/ /rgyud 'di bstan pa med pa'i ngang / /kun du gsang ba mi 'khrugs pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ther zug dang bral ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid ni gnas med pa/ /sgyu mar snang ba kun rdzob tu/ /srid zhi mnyam pa nyid bstan pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis

zhi bar mi gnas pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab kyi ni rang bzhin shes/ /ye shes kyi ni shes bya mkhyen/ /gnyis med shes rab ye shes dag /'dres pas rtogs par bya ba nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang sems stong nyid dag pa ni/ /mthar thug don dam ma yin

te/ /chos sku rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ldog nges pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /chos sku don dam la mi gnas/ /ci yang ma yin don dam la/ /byed pa spongs pas 'bras bu'ang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don la gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad de

bzhin nyid du ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang rig skad cig 'gag med pa'i/ /snga ma phyi ma la ltos phyir/ /rgyun chad mi 'gyur ltos med pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su thim pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'das pa'i sems ni rang grol ba/ /ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob cing / /da ltar gnas med mtshan nyid can/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan zla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par grol ba'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rnam dag bzhin/ theg pa 'di ni

mkha' 'dra ste/ /spong ba med pa'i nyer zhi ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan po/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro dpag med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun rdzob dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /grub pa med pa'i snang ba tsam/ /rten 'brel tsam du'ang gang skyes pa/ /chos rnams dbang po'i gzhu mtshungs par/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu thugs bzhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bkod

ba'i rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba bla med byang chub pa'i/ /'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung la/ /'di med pas na 'di mi 'byung / /bstan pa de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu med rgyu nor ma tshang dang / /log pa'i don dang ngan pa spangs/ /tshogs pa gcig

bar ma grub la/ /'byung ba med phyir rten 'brel bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi yan lag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu las

skyes shing rkyen gyis bskyed/ /gzhi la gnas shing 'bras bur grub/ /srid zhi mtshungs phyir bstan pa yin/ /byang chub de nyid bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par du 'phags pa thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par 'byung ba

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brtag na dben zhing don byed nus/ /mthun par snang la rkyen las bskyed/ /kun rdzob chos kun mtshan nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa las bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul dang dbang po bdag po'i rkyen/ /de ma thag pa'i mtshungs med pa/ /rang bzhin byung ba'i skad cig la/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo 'bral med chos kyi sku/ /mi 'chad 'byung ba

longs spyod rdzogs/ /rang gi mtshan nyid bde ba che/ /dbyer med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi grub pa rdo rje'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

ming dang nges tshig ngo bo gang / /mtshan nyid dbye ba'i don gyis na/ /rgyu 'bras chos las rgyal ba 'byung / /tshad med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spangs pa med cing thob pa med pa rdo rje'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ gang du bskal pa bye bar yang / /spong bar zhugs shing sbyang pa las/ /byang chub ring song 'gyur ba med/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi rang grol 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba blo dbyangs

dge ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i don rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba med pas chos kyi sku/ /'gag pa med pas longs spyod rdzogs/ /gnas pa med pas sprul pa'i sku/ /dbyer med tshul 'di bstan

ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i chos/ /bstan pa nges par legs pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus kyis grol ba

rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus gsum dus med ston pa po/ /tshad med ye shes stobs chen po/ /srid zhir mi gnas bde bar gshegs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus mi dmigs par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bskal pa grangs dang grangs med las/ /'das pa ye shes skad cig

ma/ /bsam gyis mi khyab don 'char 'gyur/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i chos kyi tshig gcigs gis/ /grol ba ye shes thob pa ni/ /nga yi chos rnams des mthong ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lam bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

gnyis ka'i cha las grol ba rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i phyogs dag dang / /las las grol ba 'phags pa'i chos/ /de nyid nges pa bla na med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs bzang po grol ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas de bzhin snang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /gsum la nges par

skyabs song na/ /dag pa ye shes spyod pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs dang bral ba rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba/ /ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas kyi/ /lta bas mi ngoms sku mthong zhing / /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brjed pa med pa sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi chos rjes su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dam pa'i chos la skyabs 'gro ba/ /ma 'ongs pa na rgyal ba la/ /dam pa'i chos sgra thos nas ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di thob byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i spyan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i tshogs rjes su dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song gang / /ma 'ongs pa na nyan thos

dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /lhan cig spyod pa ston par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i mchog thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gcig tu ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba'i rin chen rnam gsum po/ /dbang phyug tshogs pas mthar thug dus/ /gcig pu nyid du thugs la bzhugs/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa zla ba sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i phyogs la zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku gsum rang las lhan cig skyes/ /de nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ /ye shes spyod pa gnas 'di nyid/ /ston pa'i

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa'i chos rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /bcu gnyis dag pa bdag med pa/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul skyob pa'i chos/ /de nyid phun sum tshogs par gsungs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su

mthun pa'i chos la spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems/ /bla med sems dpa' chen po ni/ /don dam bstan pa'i mchog brnyes pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthun par zhugs pa rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang

chub sems dpa' rig pa rnams/ /rang las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang por zhugs pa'i spyod pa'i yan lag rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bsam gtan yan lag lngas gnas shing / /rnam par 'gog pas mi g.yo ba/ /bde chen mnyam nyid gnas pa'i tshul/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa dbyangs bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs pas zhugs pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa na/ /mgon po bdag nyid chen po'i dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas kyi dmigs

las grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chen po'i gzhon pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par zhugs pa rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tshul chen

thabs ldan dri ma med/ /yan lag 'byung pa chos dag pa/ /so sor ma yin mkha' dbyings klong / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtshungs med sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa rnam par dag pa

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mngon par mkhyen pa la/ /rlom sems med pa'i bdag nyid du/ /gcig pa bkag pa'i rgyun las ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

rgyal po rdo rje mkhregs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yan lag 'di dag ldan pas na/ /nges par 'jug pa mi ldog pa/ /sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i mthun/ /

gsang ba de nyid bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms bdag

med mnyam pa'i dngos/ tshad med chu bo'i rlabs las ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ljon shing bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyob pa mtshungs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /sA la chen po'i shing ltar na/ /'dab rgyas rgyal ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /re re'i don du'ang du mar bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rgyun du chos spyod skal ba can/ /ye shes dam pa'i gnas

thob pas/ /yan lag bcu pa bstan pa yin/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba yi ger 'dri/ /sbyin dang mchod pa kha ton dang / nyan dang 'chad pa de bsam zhing / /ting 'dzin ldan pas spyad par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las sde snod kyi tshul yongs su dag par spyod pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdangs snyan pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi 'khrul pa med cing 'dres pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du thun mong yul min zhing / /khyad par gyur pa thub pa yi/ /phrin las dag pa tshad med pa'i/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ca co med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rags pa dang ni phra ba yi/ /kun nas ldang ba dag pa yis/ /dkrugs pas 'khrug pa mi mnga' ba/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsnyel ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can don la dus kun du/ /bskyed dang dbri ba med par

ni/ /rgyun chad med pas 'jug pa dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag spyod pa na'ang / /rtag tu dri med gnas pas na/ /btang snyoms tsam du'ang mi gnas te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tha dad du gzigs pa

mi mnga' ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma spangs mi gnas mnyam nyid de/ /blang dor med pa'i ye shes can/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di dag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa drang srong skar ma la dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yongs su sbyang dang brtag pa dang / /gsal dang dbye ba 'byung ba las/ /khyad par btang

snyoms med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dun pa nyams pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dus rnams phyogs

bcur rgyal ba yis/ /spro ba byang chub snying po'i don/ /sangs rgyas gdung las gzhan mi rtog /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes mnga' ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can gcig gi don du yang / /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /rdul phran grangs 'das rtsom pa che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang

ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dran pa nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpyad pa mi dmigs ma 'dres par/ /yongs su dag pa'i mkhyen pa can/ /snga ma la sogs rtag med phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor par ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ting 'dzin du ma gcig sdud

cing / /gcig las du mar spro ba yang / /de dag snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bzang po'i phung po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i
