ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkhyen pa rig pa du ma las/ /'gog pa med par bzo yi gnas/ /bla med mi bzad tshul thob pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa dpal gsang ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes stong nyid me chen gyis/ /'khor ba'i dri ma ma lus pa/ /chos dbyings ngang du sreg mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

dus rnams kun du thogs med par/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes las/ /'byung zhing 'jug dang gnas par mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngag gi las thams cad ye

shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams ma lus thams cad du/ /khyab byed snying po rdo rje la/ /'jug gnas ldang ba dbyangs brjod pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' dbyings chos nyid rnam

dag dang / /rnam rtog 'gro 'ong mi gnas pas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong

bas 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du brtan g.yo bcas pa yi/ /dngos po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa thogs med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bkod pa'i nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyisems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams kyi

rdul phran dang / /sems can spyod pa sna tshogs dang / /dpal ldan bde gshegs mdzad pa dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yon tan gzi brjid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi da ltar ba'i dus la ma chags

ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'jug pa rdo rje 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtog med me long gzugs lta bu/ /gsal ba 'dzin pa bral ba yi/ /rim dang cig car 'bad med par/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su ma 'dres pa'i chos brgyad rnam par dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di dag ma lus

sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /gsang ba 'dzin pa snying por gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khrugs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tha snyad rnams las 'das pa yi/ /bden par ma grub sgyu ma'i chos/ /dag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gang du mdo don spyod pa yi/ /byang chub mchog

tu sems bskyed pa/ /deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bar du bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /grangs med du ma'i lam 'grod de/ /gang du sa bcur gnas pa yis/ /sprul pa du ma ston par byed/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /ji ltar mngon par

sangs rgyas nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sprul pa sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /sna tshogs gzugs su ston par byed/ /dngos dang sprul dang byin brlabs dang / /cho 'phrul ngo mtshar bskyed pa dag /gdul bya'i don dang bye brag pa/ /spyi dang dngos

dang dngos med dang / /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos gang dang / /srog dang srog ma yin par 'gro/ /gzugs dang sgra dang yi ge dang / /rtswa lcug 'khril shing la sogs pa/ /du ma'i rnam par ston byed 'gyur/ /ye shes 'og min stug por ni/ /'dod chags chen

po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /dang po'i 'og min chos kyi dbyings/ /rang byung nam mkha' dag pa'i zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab spyod yul lo/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub pa/ /'og min gnyis

pa ye shes yul/ /rnam par snang 'dzad gang chen mtsho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyur to/ /gnyis pa 'od gsal lhun gyis grub/ /'og min zag pa med pa'i yul/ /bde chen rgyal pa gtsug tor gnas/ /byang chub mchog dang rab bcings pas/ /byang chub sems

dpa' spyod yul can/ /sems dpa' chen po gsum pa'o/ /yang dag lam ni lnga ldan pa/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa goms pa'i lam/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /dbang gi rgyal po yon tan gter/ /skad cig gcig la goms byed cing / /shin tu sgrim zhing brtson ldan gyis/ /

rang byung thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /nor bu rin chen lta bur ni/ /'gro ba'i dgos 'dod skong byed pas/ /thams cad rdo rje gsum du ni/ /lhag pa'i mchog gi dbang bskur te/ /dus gsum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rig mar bcas/ /lha mo'i tshogs

dang bcas pa yis/ /khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis/ /dbang bskur gyur pas gsang pa'i rim/ /sbas pa'i tshul gyis 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid

rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum gyi zhing khams bstan pa'i spyod yul bla na med pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i mchog 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas gang / /rnal 'byor chos kyi rgyas gdab pas/ /khams gsum ye shes gcig par sgyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa chos sbyin sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos can ma lus rgya mtsho kun/ /rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rnam par tho

'tsham las rgal ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa ma lus par mkhyen pa mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis ni/ /'jig tshogs srid pa bcom nas ni/ /mi ldog byang chub chen po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur

bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud las byung ba'i rtags dang brda/ /mtshan ma'i gnas kyi gtan tshigs las/ /bdud las rnam rgyal lung bstan pa/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i lam nges par de kho na nyid du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun 'byung sdug bsngal spong byed pa/ /lam dang 'gog pa'i bden pa la/ /de nyid nges par 'byung bstan pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ston pas khyu mchog rlabs chen gnas/ /bla med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /yang dag chos kyi 'khor lo yi/ /byang chub de nyid tshul bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya dag ni/ /'dab ma mi ldan 'phur nus med/ /

de la zung 'jug don ldan pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa gcig tu dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /chos rnams bslab pa'i sdom pa la/ /gzhi dang rgyu lam 'bras bu dag /ma nyams sa bon myu gu bzhin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyes bu khyu mchog rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha' dag pa'i gnas mtshungs par/ /yul dang yul can dag pa las/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa yul 'khor spobs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du spyod pa dag pa rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos can chos nyid med/ /kun rdzob blo yi spyod yul te/ /chos kun sgyu ma tsam du gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes dang shes bya kun gyi ni/ /spyod yul blo yi snang ba

las/ /rten dang brten med ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dag pa'i chos sku skye

med pa/ /dri ma bral ba de 'od gsal/ /mtha' las grol ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /srid pa'i dra ba gcod pa yi/ /rnam par zhi ba'i sems spangs te/ /mgon po ye shes gcig par 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung

ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma 'gags gos pa med pa dang / /ma 'dres thabs kyi pha rol son/ /gsal ba blo la 'char ba gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

bdud rtsi gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa snang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun chad med pa'i byang chub sems/ /thams cad de las skyes pa'i dngos/ /phra mo rkyen byung dag pa'i don/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan snyoms pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag /khams

rgyud yul dang dbang po dag /rab tu dag par rdzogs ba ni/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'byung rol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /gnas dag bar chad med pa'i lam/ /chos rgyal zhing khams yongs su dag /mi ldog ting 'dzin zad mi shes/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan mngon

par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par smin par bsod nams stobs/ /bral ba ye shes spyod yul ba/ /khyad par rnam par mi rtog las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa phyogs ma bslad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs la/ /ye shes spyod pa'i sgyu 'phrul gyis/ /bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa mdzes pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phreng ba dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma stongs par/ /ye shes 'khor

lo bskor ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rjes ston/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rjes dran pas/ /gsang ba dam pa bstan pa yin/ /

dang po dbang gi dus yin te/ /mngon par rtogs pa dang po'o/ /ye shes mthong ba'i dang po las/ /sbyor ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs pas/ /rig pa gcig gi ngang nyid las/ /sngags kyi rim pa rdo rje ltar/ /yul sems rlung ni mi phyed pas/ /

gcig tu gyur pa'i rim pa las/ /sems la dmigs pa ye shes che/ /rlung sems 'gro ldog gcig pas na/ /nges pa rnam par dben don bstan/ /phyi rol yul snang sgyu mar 'char/ /rang rig 'od gsal mngon byang chub/ /thams cad bde chen ye shes su/ /yang dag

rdzogs pas rdzogs pa'i rim/ /bsam gtan bsdus pa'i rim pa yis/ /ril bar 'dzin pa rjes gzhig pa/ /gcig tu byed pa gsang ba yis/ /zung 'jug ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /dngos po med pa bsgom pa dngos/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de bas dngos po

dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /gang du lus sems kun rdzob bcas/ /don dam rnam dag zung 'jug ste/ /gang du dmigs pas bsdus pa ni/ /brtson 'grus ldan pas rab 'jug yin/ /rim gyis mngon 'dod le lo can/ /g.yeng ba thams cad

spangs nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di la/ /rnal 'byor brtson pas rab bskul bas/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes mngon du byed pa'am/ /zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che yi/ /rnal 'byor ye shes mchog sbyor bas/ /rim pa rdzogs par gnas pa'i lam/ /

skad cig zhag dang lo yi dus/ /dus ni thung ngus 'grub par 'gyur/ /bskyed pa'i tshul 'di dang por bstan/ /mthar phyin brtan par gyur pa yis/ /gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor te/ /rim gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /rim gnyis

bla na med pa las/ /gsang gsum rdo rje thob par 'grub/ /'dir ni yi ge'i dbye ba yis/ /sgra las khyad par don rtsol ba/ /rkyen dang byed pa ston pa yi/ /sngags ni gsang bar brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyud kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thub

pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /gsang gsum rdo rje 'chang ba'i bdag /sgyu ma'i snang ba las 'das te/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid can/ /ye shes dmigs med ngo bo nyid/ /'dus pa gsang ba gnas

med pa/ /yi ge'i tshig ni dmigs med pas/ /de nyid brjod pas rnam par dben/ /dgongs pas cang ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /gsang ba'i sku mchog dri ma med/ /gzhon nus dbang phyug 'dir rtog go/ /ye shes sku ni mi 'gyur zhing / /ma skyes skye med mchog gi yul/ /

rdo rje gsung ni 'gag pa med/ /mtshan ma med cing dri ma med/ /'od gsal nam mkha' zhes bya ba/ /de nyid las byung der ston pa/ /thams cad dmigs med rtogs su med/ /yang dag snang ba kun rdzob ste/ /legs par bzung yang ma skyes shing / /sgyu ma tsam du'ang dmigs

su med/ /log par zin las ldog par 'gyur/ /de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs/ /thams cad kyis ni 'di skad gsol/ /rdo rje'i tshig gi yul min pa/ /kun du 'byung ba'i dri ma las/ /phyin ci log las rnam par 'das/ /de nyid brjod dang bral bas na/ /rnam

par dben pa spros dang bral/ /tha dad gcig tu brtag mi bya/ /de nyid ci yi slad du ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /byang chub sems su gyur pa nyid/ /skye med tsam du'ang mi gnas la/ /sgyu ma'i dbyings nyid las 'das shing / /ngo bo nyid ni rang byung ba/ /yang dag spyod

par gyur pa gang / /de bzhin nyid du gshegs gyur cing / /ye shes 'jug pas gshegs par mdzad/ /ldog pa'i khyad par rjes su 'gro/ /de nyid gang gi slad du na/ /'jig rten dbang po la sogs pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /ngo bo nyid ni ma dmigs shing / /

ye shes 'jug pa med pas na/ /slar zhing yang dag yul 'di la/ /'di snyam du ni rtog gyur te/ /bdag cag ston pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsang ba chos dag pa/ /yul dus ma bral brjod bral ba/ /rtogs dka' brtag par dka'

ba nyid/ /rig na'ang mi rig pa yi chos/ /gsang ba'i yi ge'i rnam par dben/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /ji ltar rtog cing ston par byed/ /de ltar sems par gyur pas na/ /bsam pa de dag rab shes pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba mi

'gyur rdo rje'i bdag /'dir ni de bzhin gshegs kun yang / /de nyid gzigs pa med pas na/ /bla med byang chub mi shes so/ /phra zhing bdag med stong bas na/ /byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos/ /de nyid ci yi phyir zhe na/ /sgyu ma skye ba med pas na/ /rdo rje mngon par byang

chub pa/ /ngo bo med cing gnas med pa/ /mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa las/ /gnyis med snang ba'i ye shes 'byung / /de ltar shin tu rtogs dka' zhing / /kun dang thun mong ma gyur pas/ /mos dang rig par ldan pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyis ji ltar 'gyur/ /rigs

kyi bu zhes skal bar ldan/ /sems can chen po'i rigs can gyis/ /bla med mngon par byang chub pa/ /snying po mchog la gnas pa yis/ /tshe 'dir rdo rjer sangs rgyas te/ /de nyid sku gsum dbyer mi phyed/ /rdo rje chos nyid dag pa'i phyir/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba che/ /

ye shes rdo rje'i gnas thob 'gyur/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed sbas pa'i don/ /thig le srog gi rnam pa ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su mi shigs pa/ /gsal ba zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /sems kyi rten du gyur par brjod/ /rten 'di gzugs brnyan dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

chos sku gnyis su med pa'i thugs/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gsung rdo rje/ /sprul sku yongs rdzogs grub pa'i 'bras/ /dbyer med rdo rje bde ba che/ /lus ngag sems ni sku gsum du/ /'byung zhing 'jug par mdzad pa gang / /sku bzhi'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang / /de

nyid bla mar gsungs pas na/ /gnas pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /gang du'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ /bden gnyis yang dag rab sbyor ba/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis/ /rigs

gcig tha dad med par sdom/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid du nges/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bla med 'byung ba'i lus can la/ /bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad pa gang / /'khor lo'i sbyor ba byang chub rim/ /yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa yi/ /cho ga legs

par byas na ni/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i mthar klas par/ /phur bu 'debs par gdon mi za/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /phur 'debs de nyid las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchog sbyin pa'i/ /sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i

rim pa gnas pa yi/ /rab tu dga' ba nas brtsams te/ /mngon du gyur pa'i bar du bgrod/ /ring du song ba bdun pa nas/ /mi g.yo ba yi bar dag tu/ /sbyor ba gsum gyis nges par sbyangs/ /las la sbyor bas brgyad pa'o/ /snang ba gsum la zhugs pa dag /

sa bcu la ni nges gnas pa/ /rang bzhin brgyad dang drug cu po/ /'od gsal ba la thim gyur pas/ /sbyang bya sbyong byed gnyis la ni/ /bcu gcig bcu gnyis bde gshegs pa/ /deng gnas bde ba chen po yi/ /bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin la gnas/ /ko Ta k+ShA zhes gyen

du rgyu ba'i rlung / /dang po'i dbang po mi phyed gyur pa ste/ /tshe la dbang ba stobs bcu'i mchog gyur gang / /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen par brjod/ /ko Ta wa k+Sh+ya thur du sel ba nyid/ /brtson 'grus dbang po rtsom pa'i mchog yin te/ /byang chub sems las dbang

ba lha yi gtso/ /mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod/ /ko Ta wad+ha me dang mnyam gnas pa/ /chos kun rtsa ba snying po srog yin te/ /mi brjed dran pa'i dbang po sems la dbang / /bsam gtan nyid dang ting 'dzin mkhyen stobs gyur/ /ko Ta ba sha

srog 'dzin rlung gyur pas/ /mnyam bzhag ting 'dzin dbang po dang longs spyod/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod/ /ku ti da ra khyab byed rlung du gyur/ /chos rnams 'byed pa shes rab dbang po ste/ /skye ba la

dbang kun nas nyon mongs dang / /rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes brjod/ /ko la Ta k+Sh+ya 'di ni rgyu ba'i rlung / /spyod yul dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pa las/ /rdzu 'phrul ba dang las kyi 'jug pa dang / /las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /ko la b+h+ya zhes rab

tu rgyu ba ste/ /rgyun chad med pa brtson 'grus stobs mchog gyur/ /mos pa la dbang 'byung 'jug phrin las la/ /thams cad nyid du son pa'i las mkhyen stobs/ /ko la lo b+ha mngon par rgyu ba nyid/ /gzungs 'gyur dran pa'i stobs las rdo rje che/ /zhing khams spyod pa'i smon

lam gnas mkhas pa/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams ma lus mkhyen par brjod/ /ko Ta b+hi zhes khyad par rab rgyu ba/ /dri med ting 'dzin stobs ni rtsal ldan pa/ /ye shes la dbang phun sum tshogs pa'i yul/ /'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i gnas stobs gyur/ /ko la ta thA na zhes

kun du rgyu/ /shes rab stobs ldan chos la dbang ba gang / /zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin no/ /'di dag gnas zhes mnyam bzhag spyod pa can/ /nye ba'i gnas zhes mnyam longs spyod pa'i yul/ /zhing ni dbang po lnga yi yul nyid de/ /nye zhing 'dod yon rdo rje'i

spyod yul gang / /tshan d+ho dkyil 'khor rang la rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /nye tshan brtan g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /'dus byas byang chub sems kyi rdo rjer 'gyur/ /nyer 'du tshad med bzhi ldan rang byung ba/ /dur khrod bde chen lhan cig rol pa che/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ye

shes rgyas par 'gyur/ /gnas bcu 'di dag gsang 'dzin nga yi yul/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po'i ngang / /gcig dang du mar dmigs med bde ba che/ /chos dang chos las byung ba'i yul mi dmigs/ /ko Ta k+Sha/ ko Ta wa k+t+ya/ ko

Ta wad+ha/ ko Ta pa sha/ ku ti da ra/ ko la Ta k+Sh+ya/ ko la b+h+ya/ ko la lo b+ha/ ko Ta b+hi/ ko la ta thA na/ bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyod ni glang po lta ba che/ /khyod ni bzang po'i rgyan dang ldan/ /khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ /khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ /

khyod ni bden pa'i 'dren pa yin/ /khyod ni gzugs sdug yid 'phrog yin/ /khyod ni 'joms pa cir yang snang / /khyod ni me lce'i phreng ba can/ /khyod ni gnas la skyo ba med/ /khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /khyod kyi sku ni mdzes par bstan/ /rgya mtsho bla na med pa

ste/ /bstod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje nges par ston pa'i gsang ba gcig tu bsdus pa bla na med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gang las bla med dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba/ /rgyud rnams ma lus pa la khyab pa dang / /chos kun la ni 'di yis rgyas btab

pas/ /'dus pa rtsa bar gsungs pa don bstan pa'o/ /snying po'i 'od zer dpag med las sprul pa'i/ /thub pas rab rib kun du nges bsal nas/ /ma lus sems can sangs rgyas rdzogs byas te/ /gsang sngags rig pa'i nang du chud par bya/ /gzugs la

sogs pa'i rnam pa ma gtogs pa'i/ /'dzin pa de ni dngos su mthong mi 'gyur/ /bzung pa dag kyang cung zad yod min la/ /gzhan pa'i dra ba yis kyang mthong du med/ /'khrul ba'i shes rab bya gang yang med/ /yongs su 'dzin pa yod par ma mthong ste/ /cig car

skye bzhin pa ni gzugs mchog yin/ /'di dag 'dzin pa po ni yod pa min/ /dkar dmar la sogs gang zhig mthong pa rnams/ /de nyid dus gzhan dag tu mthong mi 'gyur/ /'di dag gcig la gcig gis 'gal snang phyir/ /rtag tu 'phrul pa'i shes pa dag dang mtshungs/ /

thog mtha' la sogs bye brag snang bas na/ /gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag gcig ma yin/ /rdul phran la rnams kyang snang ba ma yin pas/ /du ma'i gzugs su min ba'ang de dag 'dra/ /rdul phran cha shes med pa nyid kyang ni/ /phra rab du ma 'dus par ma grub pas/ /

dbang chen dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yi gzugs/ /bsags pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni med par 'gyur/ /de bas 'dzin pa po la sogs bral bas/ /rang rgyud la sogs btags pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos rnams ma lus gang / /dri za'i grong khyer dag

dang mtshungs pa yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog rgyun gyis ni/ /ngo bo dag gis de ni 'khor ba ste/ /dag pa phyin ci log dang bral ba yi/ /ngo bo tsam ni rnam par brtags gyur pa/ /srid dang zhi ba yi ni mtshan nyid 'dir/ /chos nyid kyis ni dbye ba gang yang med/ /gang

phyir gzug ba la sogs rnam pa dang / /bral bar thams cad du ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /so sor snang ba rang bzhin kun rtog las/ /thams cad kyang ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams sems las gzhan pa yod min pas/ /bdag dang bdag gir btags pa ma grubs pas/ /gang

zhig gzugs las so sor zhugs gyur pa/ /de yi bdag nyid gang yin de nyid gzugs/ /de bas thams cad khyad par med pa'i blos/ /dngos po thams cad khyad par med par brtag /snang bar gyur pa'i yul rnams gang yin dang / /gang zhig rtog pa'i gnas su gyur ba rnams//

de de gnyis su sbyor dang bral bas na/ /des na rnam par dbye ba du mas min/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin bas dbyangs kyi brjod pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i tshul las 'byung ba'i gnas 'di yang gsungs so/ /dang po a nas brtsams nas aHyi mthar/ /bcu gnyis dbyangs

ni gsung rab yan lag gyur/ /a gang mdor tsam gyi ni spyi yi don/ /rnam par bsdus nas ston pa mdo yi sde/ /A chos rnams thams cad spyi dang bye brag gi/ /rnam pa yi ge tha snyad gsal bar gyur/ /de ni tshigs su bcas par rjod byed pa/ /rgyas par dbye ba dbyangs kyis

bsnyad pa'i sde/ /i chos rnams rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dngos po rnams/ /phyin ci ma log yang dag ston byed pa/ /ma 'ongs pa na 'di las 'di 'byung ba/ /thams cad ston pa lung du ston pa'i sde/ /I rtsa ba yan lag 'brel bar bcas pa'i tshag /

tshigs su bcad par ston pa 'di yang so/ /u zhu ba po dang gnas dang dus dag gi/ /yi rangs dga' bas rgyas pas ched brjod sde/ /U da ltar gnas dang ma 'ongs 'byung ba dang / /rang bzhin bcas pa ston pa gleng gzhi'i sde/ e bdag dang gdul bya gzhan dang

gzhan dag gis/ /skye ba sngon dang tshe rabs thams cad du/ /gnas dang gnas kyi gtan tshigs spyod pa yi/ /'di ltar 'byung ba'i sde zhes bstan pa'o/ /ai byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs las/ /kun du don spyod bzhis bsdus skyes rabs te/ /o lam dang

'bras bu zab dang rgya che las/ /ma rgyas spros pa shin tu rgyas pa'i sde/ /au sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /'phags pa rnams kyi khyad par gyur pa yi/ /lta spyod chos kyis 'dul ba lam ston pa/ /rmad du byung ba'i sde zhes bstan pa yin/ /oM

chos kyi gnas lugs gnyis su med pa nyid/ /nges par 'byed pa gtan la phab pa'i sde/ /aHgsang ba'i spyod yul pha rol phyin pa yi/ /bden gnyis dbyer med ston pa mchog gi sde/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam

bar dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ka la ku Ta ta/ /ka zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i sgo yin te/ /la zhes bya ba gang yang blang dor gnyis/ /ku ni gdug pa can gang phyogs gnas pa/ /Ta ta zhes gnod rab tu zhi bar byed/ /phyogs bcu kun du yang dag pa dang ni/ /yang

dag ma yin 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon ni phyi nang gang / /gnas pa 'di ni sa gsum kun du spyod/ /gsang bar bya ba phyogs bcas phyogs med pa/ /khro rgyal yum bcas rol pas rab tu 'joms/ /dngos por 'dzin ba'i gdon bcu

rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni spyi dang khyad par te/ /mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /mngon par byang chub lngas grub dang po ste/ /thabs dang shes rab gcig bsdus gleng gzhir brjod/ /rig pa'i dbang dang

dkyil 'khor nges byas pa/ /'bras bu nye 'grus spyod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /mi ru 'khrungs pa dang po'i tshul nges sde/ /rab tu byung ba nges pa gnyis pa'i tshul/ /'dul ba'i sdom pa nges pa gsum brjod pas/ /zab mo'i ting 'dzin bstan pa tshul bzhi pa/ /

phyi nang gsang ba'i spyod pa thub pa yi/ /de nyid bla na med pa bstan pa yin/ /kha spyor las byung gzugs ni de song yid bsgoms na/ /gso mar dkar pa'i nad tshogs thams cad 'phrog byed cing / /'o ma'i rgyun ni bab bas thugs ni mnyes mdzad pa'i/ /'chi ba'i

dus la bab pa drag po kun kyang rab tu 'joms/ /'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu sdud pa dang spro

ba'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems rdo rje mtshungs pa med pa/ brtag tu med pa/ bltar med pa/ dpyad du med pa/ ldan pa med pa/ mi ldan pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ dpe med pa'i rang bzhin la yongs su gnas so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos thams cad dang / rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i

phyir 'di lta ste sems kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad de/ dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir ni yang dag bsdus par

gyur pa yi/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bla med bstan pa yi/ /snying po yongs su bsdus pa rdo rje 'chang / /de nyid dkyil 'khor tshul ni bstan pa yin/ /dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu g.yo 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten skye bo dam pa phrad rnyed dka'/ /de bas

thabs dang shes rab la gzhol ba'i/ /yid la byed pa mchog de bsgrub par bya/ /de la thog mar re zhig bstan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas theg pa bsam pa rig 'jug ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje'i stobs kyis ni/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed pa dang / /gtong ba la

sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /zab mo'i tshul dag la ni rab tu mos/ /dpal ldan 'dus par dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /rang nyid dbang bskur phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i/ /cho ga rim bzhin rjes gnang thob pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags bsnyen par

bya/ /la lar dri med chu ni phun tshogs shing / /'bras ldan ljon shing mdzes pas rnam brgyan pa'i/ /ri bo'i tshang tshing gnas su bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrub par byos/ /dang por tho rangs snying gar zla dbus su/ /'od zer rab 'phro dri med yi ge

hU~M/ /dpal mchog de nyid rnam dgong brtser ldan pa'i/ /kha gdong la sogs shin tu dag par bya/ /tsan+dan dri zhim byung pas legs byugs shing / /bzang po'i me tog sil ma gor nas kyang / /stong nyid ye shes mchog gis yi char/ /rim gyis bskyed pa rdzogs

tshul ldang ba ni/ /de 'og hU~M ya~M ra~M ba~M la~M bcas hU~M/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / /dbyibs dang mtshan ma'i bye brag 'byung pa ni/ /shin tu gsal zhing dag par rnam par bsam/ /kun bzang las byung bsam par bya ba ni/ /ston ka'i zla ba lta bur rab

dkar ba/ /mtha' yas phyogs gnas sna tshogs 'od dang ldan/ /gru gsum gyen du gnas pa'i ngo bo ni/ /nam mkha' rang gi ngo bo rang rig pa/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas b+ha ga'i pad+ma nyid/ /de yi dbus su rig 'dzin dbang po dang / /byin za gzhon nu bdag mo'i rang bzhin

can/ /so so'i bye brag gzhi yi khyad par bsam/ /de steng ri yi rgyal po lhun grub pa/ /gru bzhi zur ldan mdzes pa'i ba gam bcas/ /rin chen bzhis skyes phyogs kyi 'od kyis khyab/ /gter mchog yon tan rgyas pa'i bdag nyid gnas/ /de steng pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rjes

mdzes/ /de dbus hU~M las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu gser gyi rang bzhin mu khyud ldan/ /der ni bdag nyid dbus su gnas pa yi/ /dpal ldan zhe sdang rdo rjer gsan nas ni/ /de yi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M las spros pa yi//

ra~M bcu las ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / /de steng hU~M bcu rab 'phros khro bo bcu/ /zhal phyir gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i gdon la yang / /gtso bo'i bka' bsgo'i don du phur bu yis/ /lus ngag yid la brdabs dang brdungs par gyur/ /'di ni bgegs kun 'da'

bar mi nus la'i/ /bsrung ba chen po yongs su bsdus pa yin/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhir dra ba gur dang ni/ /pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje'i bla re dang / /phyogs bcur me dong 'bar ba rgyas pa yin/ /me 'od 'bar bas kun nas 'khrigs pa gang / /rdo rje phur bu bcu phrag gsum dag gis//

rdo rje'i tho ba 'bar bas brdungs pa yin/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor tshad med pa/ /bar chad las rgyal bdud rnams 'joms pa yin/ /skad cig de las rang nyid mi dmigs par/ /yongs su bsdus te b+hU~M las byung ba yi/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i sku lta bu/ /

thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i/ /zer gyis phyogs mtshams ma lus kun du khyab/ /mi mnyam bdag med de phyir zur bzhi mnyam/ /dran dang dbang po mchog bzhi sgo rnams yin/ /bsam gtan bzhi po dag ni rta babs dang / /ting 'dzin kha khyer gyis ni

kun nas bskor/ /kha khyer mda' yab rten pa'i mchod pa'i rten/ /dam pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi tshogs rnams yin/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam spras pa/ /gang phyir 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun rdzogs pa'i/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang / /dril bu sgra

sgrogs phyogs bcu kun khyab pa/ /gang phyir dam chos gsung rab yan lag dgu/ /gdul bya thams cad la ni bskyod pa'o/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang / /me long dra ba dra phyed me tog gi/ /phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa

med/ /ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi/ /yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs/ /ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa/ /rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa yin/ /rdo rje'i gdung dang yang dag ldan pa ni/ /re'u mig pho brang dbus kyi mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje

'dod yon snam bus yongs 'khor ba/ /gru chad rim gnyis lha snam nang skor yangs/ /pany+tsa reg ye shes lnga ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rtsig pa ma 'dres gsal ba las/ /phyi nang med par shel sgong dngas pa ltar/ /dag cing dri med ye shes pho brang ste/ /rin chen pha gu sna

tshogs 'phras spras shing / /dra ba dra ba phyed pa'i do shal can/ /rta babs chos kyi 'khor lo bcas/ /byams sogs tshad med gdugs kyis khyab pa yi/ /rtse mo rin chen bum pas bsdus pa nyid/ /theg mchog gcig tu nges bar bsdus pa ste/ /tshad med mu

tig rdo rje'i ra ba dang / /me 'od phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /chu skyes ge sar du ma'i rnam pa can/ /rigs kyi ye shes bla med brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o/ /bla med mtha' yas 'dod yon rig ma yi/ /lha mo bcu drug dag gis

yongs su bskor/ /stong nyid shes rab rang bzhin ngo bo yis/ /gzugs sogs yul rnams rnam dag pha rol phyin/ /rjes su dran pas mchod pas nyer brgyan pa/ /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun yin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze'u 'brur legs gnas pa'i/ /

nyi zla'i mgon bcas lha yi gnas rnams dang / /rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang pa de ltar bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'byung ba thams cad kyang / /skad cig gcig las skyes ba'i bdag nyid de/

dpal ldan gsang ba'i rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rang 'od bcas pa'i rig mas 'khyud pa ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dung dang kun+da ltar/ /rin chen du mas spras pa'i sku mchog can/ /rnam par snang mdzad shar du rnam par gnas/ /dkon mchog dpal lho 'od dpag nub tu

gnas/ /gdon mi za ba byang gi phyogs su'o/ /shar lho'i grwar ni lha mo spyan ma dang / /lho nub grwar ni mA ma kI mchog dang / /nub byang grwar ni lha mo gos dkar mo/ /byang shar grwar ni lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /shar lho'i gzugs dang lho nub sgra rdo rje/ /nub byang du ni dri yi lha mo dang / /

byang shar mtshams su ro yi lha mo dag /mkhas pas rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya/ /byams pa'i mgon po sa yi snying po dag /shar gyi snam bu dag la legs par dgod/ /gsang ba 'dzin dang nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /lho yi snam bur gnas pa'i sems dpa'o/ /

'jig rten dbang phyug dang ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /nub tu rnal 'byor mkhas pas bsam par bya/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / /kun du bzang po byang gi snam bu dgod/ /gshin rje gshed po shar sgor gnas par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lho yi sgo drung

gnas/ /rta mgrin rgyal po nub kyi sgo drung dgod/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba byang sgor 'byung ba ste/ /shar lho mtshams su mi g.yo mgon po dang / /'dod pa'i rgyal po lho nub grwar dgod cing / /byang shar du ni dbyug pa sngon po can/ /steng phyogs gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba

ste/ /'og phyogs gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsam/ /de ltar rnam par bsams pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /rnam pa ma lus gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /rin chen 'od 'phro nor bu'i snying por bcas/ /ji bzhin bltas te

de yi gtso bo yi/ /thugs ka'i zla gnas mchog gi sa bon las/ /'od zer du ma'i rnam pa rab spros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bla mar bcas pa dang / /rig ma lha mo'i mtshed pa khro bor bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /bar snang zhing

khams rab tu khengs gyur la/ /sdig pa bshags sogs mchod pa rgya mtsho dbul/ /skyabs su 'gro zhing bzod par gsol nas kyang / /gshegs su gsol ba bsod nams tshogs rab bsags/ /de nas phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams/ /ma lus

stong ba nyid du ngas bsams te/ /thams cad ye shes chos nyid dag pa'i ngang / /brag ca lta bu'i sgyu ma'i sgras brjod do/ /oM U n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa A t+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ chos nyid nA da tsam du bsdus pa'i dngos/ /de nyid rtog med sems kyi snang ba'i ngang / /gsang sngags

de nyid skur ni ldang pa'i phyir/ /stong pa tsam du gnas pa chos nyid las/ /rang byung rta bdun rgyal po rnam par bsam/ /bcu drug cha dang de tshogs las byung ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag gi dbus nyid du/ /'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa/ /dbus ma'i gdan la

yi ge gsum gyi ni/ /cho gas pad+ma nyi ma'i ldan pa dag /dpal mchog dang po'i snying po las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu'i snying po ltar/ /rgyu dag mi rgyu'i dngos po ma lus pa/ /dpag med thub ba'i tshogs rnams 'od 'phro ba/ /phyogs sgo mtha' yas khyab par rab bsgrub

pa/ /de nyid ye shes ngang las rang byung ba/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngang du blta/ /oM d+ha rma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'byung ba'o/ /dang po mgon po'i snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /nga rgyal de ldan mtha' yas sprul ba yis/ /'gro ba'i mchog dang

thun mong don byas shing / /yi ge gsum dang gang du zla bar bcas/ /de las 'od 'phros rdo rje snying por bcas/ /thub mchog phra rab bsgrub mtshungs med pa yi/ /kun+da zla ba ltar dkar mdangs ldan pa'i/ /bcom ldan dang po'i mgon po zhes bya ba/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal

ni sngo dang dmar/ /zhal gsum phyag drug mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan ldan phyag gnyis kyis/ /rig ma 'khyud cing rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /'khor lo bar ma tha ma pad+ma ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis bsnams par mdzad pa'o/ /nor bu rin chen ral gri 'bar ba

ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa zung gis mdzes/ /khams gsum khong ni rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /thub pa'i sprin tshogs du ma rnam par 'gyed/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam dag pas/ /thabs dang sher rab bdag nyid snying rje'i mchog /ma lus

'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu nyid/ /rgyal ba skyed byed nyid kyi sku ru bsam/ /mchog tu rjes chags dpag med phun tshogs pas/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten ma lus dmigs nas ni/ /dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras ni de dag dang / /rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus bzhugs bar bya/ /

der ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang / /gzugs sogs ma lus yul gyi rang bzhin du/ /byung nas rig pa de dag thams cad ni/ /rang gi rig pa'i nang du chud par bya/ /de yi pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du ni/ /rnam snang la sogs rgyal ba'i tshogs bcug pas/ /zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs

su gyur pa dang / /des na de rnams de 'og dbang bskur bya/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rig ma sras bcas dang / /lha mo khro bo'i bsrung bar bcas pa dag /yi ge gsum gyi gzugs su thim nas ni/ /de nyid cha dang bcas pa ho dang ha/ /nA dar bcas pa 'dres pa

sems kyi sku/ /snying ga'i chu skyes la ni gnas par bya/ /gang du rig ma bdag nyid bcas pa yi/ /lus la dkyil 'khor rim pa 'dir dbye bya/ gshin rje gshed dang gzhan gyis mi thub dang / /rta mgrin rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bcas/ /mi g.yo 'dod rgyal

dbyug pa sngon po can/ /stobs po che dag phyogs mtshams khro bo rnams/ /gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar/ /rim bzhin dzaHhU~M baM ho hU~M drug bcas/ /lag g.yas mgul pa de bzhin g.yon pa'i mgul/ /kha dang gsang gnas mtha' dang bcas pa

dang / /dpung g.yas tshigs pa g.yon bcas de dag dang / /pus mo g.yas dang g.yon dag rkang pa'i mthil/ /spyi gtsug dag tu nges par dgod par bya/ /byams pa dang ni sa yi snying po dag /phyag na rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po dang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang spyan ras

gzigs dbang ste/ /sgrib pa rnam sel kun du bzang po dag /rim pas mai thI hUM dang a dang ni/ /a dang hrIHdang AM dang saM rnams ni/ /rtsa rnams lte ba dang ni mig dag dang / /rna ba sna dang lce dang rnam shes rten/ /mtshan ma dang ni tshig la khyab par

gnas/ /rab tu bsam pa yi ge rnam dag bstan/ /laM maM paM taM lha mo rim bzhin du/ /spyan dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma rnams ni khams bzhi'i ngo bor brtag /oM AHhU~M dang swA hA rim bzhin du/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang gnas

rnams la rigs kyi sangs rgyas lnga/ /phung po lnga yi ngo bo dag par bzhugs/ /de ltar phra ba'i sgo nas yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha yi 'khor lo lus la bskyed pa yin/ /rang nyid bcom ldan sku yi ba spu las/ /'od 'phros rtse mo las ni rang byung ba/ /spyan dang mA ma kI

mchog na bza' dkar/ /rgyan spras rig ma phyogs su rnam par bsam/ /oM AHhU~M zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ /'di bcas ha ho spel bar rim pa bzhin/ /pad+ma'i nang du bzhugs pa mnyam med pa/ /shes rab chags pas zhu bar byas par bsam/ /de yi mthu yis de dag

gnyis ka yang / /zla ba zhu bar gyur par mthong ba dang / /lha mo spyan la sogs pa de dag gis/ /glu yi sgra yis bskul bar gyur par bsam/ /de ltar glu yi nga ro gyur pa na/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig /snang ba'i 'od zer gyi ni dkyil 'khor can/ /gsang

sngags rang nyid lus su yongs gyur nas/ /de yi 'od zer ma lus pa rnams kyis/ /rang lha dang mtshungs sprul pa'i thub dbang po/ /dpag tu med pa yid kyis bsdus pa las/ /dpal ldan 'das pa'i gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rgyal ba'i bdag po ni/ /

ut+pal sngon po mthon mthing mdog 'dra la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar kun+da byi ru'i mdog /g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas gnyis 'khor lo nor bu 'od ldan dang / /g.yon gnyis pad+ma sdong bu ral gri bsnams/ /rin chen dbu rgyan rna cha gdu bu

dang / /dpung rgyan do shal sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /yid bzhin nor bu gtsug tor dbus mtshan pa/ /lha yi na bza' stod g.yogs sham thabs bcas/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i dbus su gsal bar bsam/ /ma lus 'od kyi 'od 'phro 'bar ba dang / thub pa'i dbang po spro bas rnam

brgyan cing / /skyob pa nam mkha'i yongs khyab zhing khams yin/ /dngos rnams thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa dang / /bral ba dngos po med pa nyid du shes/ /rnam byang gcig tu mngon par zhen pa ni/ /med par byin gyis brlabs pa 'di nyid bya/ /oM d+ha rma d+hA tu sba b+ha ba

A t+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ /de 'og rang rigs sa bon 'od rnams kyis/ rang gi mig sogs gti mug rdo rje sogs/ /ji bzhin bkang nas rang snying dri med zla ba yi/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas hU~M yig ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin mgrin pa dang / /mgo bor gnas pa pad+ma 'khor lo yi/ /

AHdang oM ni gsung gi rdo rje dang / /sku yi rdo rje nyid du bsam par bya/ /de yi thugs ka'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang / /shes rab dam pa 'dus pa'i 'od rnams kyi/ /kun nas rgyal ba'i dbang po mchod nas ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab/ /nam mkha'

lta bu'i ngo bor rdo rje gsum/ /mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmigs nas ni/ /phyogs tshogs kun na bzhugs pa'i thub pa'i tshogs/ /snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag bskul/ /thub pa mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba'i/ /rig pa'i tshogs rnams bum pa

phyag bsnams te/ /ye shes chu yis mngon par dbang bskur bas/ /rang rigs gtso bos cod pan rgyas btab gyur/ /de las bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla bar gnas pa'i ye shes sems/ /rang 'dra mtshungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'

bsam/ /de yi thugs kar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' rdo rje sa bon bcas/ /khyad par gsang ba dam pa dang por gnas/ /de bzhin rang gi lha 'dra rang sngags kyis/ /sprul pa'i rig ma nyid ni yang dag blta/ /skye mched byin gyis brlab

cing yi ge gsum/ /rnam par dgod pa lus ni 'od dang ldan/ /legs par bslabs pa'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi/ /lus la lha yi sa bon bkod nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag nas byin gyis brlab pa nyid/ /yang dag ye shes phyag rgyas rgyas btab ldan/ /

de nyid shes pas spyi ba mgrin pa dang / /snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba las/ /oM AHhU~M dang swA hA'i sa bon rnams/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las tshogs/ /lnga po rnams kyis shin tu byin brlabs te/ /'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro kun khyab/ /de

yi 'byung ba dag la lha mo bzhi/ /spyan ma la sogs rim pas yang dag dgod/ /de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya rdo rje 'i ngo bo nyid/ /nye ba'i spyan sogs lha mo bzhi dang bcas/ /sems ma brgyad kyi rnam par yongs su bsam/ /bde ba chen por snyoms

par zhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje ro langs ma dang rnam par rgyal ba ma/ /rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang ral gcig gam/ /bde bar gshegs yum rdo rje ma dang ni/ sna tshogs rin chen sna tshogs pad+mar bcas/ /sna tshogs las ma nam mkha'i rdo rje ma/ /sa 'dzin rdo rje ma dang bcas

pa yi/ /rol pa'i khro mo bde bas rgyas par dgod/ /'dir ni gnyis su med par 'dus byas pa/ /dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin can/ /oM gyis ye shes 'od zer ldan par gyur/ /AHyis sna tshogs pad+ma lte bar bcas/ /hU~M gi rdo rje las byung dri med

pa/ /yid tshul dam pa'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i/ /shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid/ /thabs dang bcas par 'byung ba rang gi las/ /de yi bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes/ /sngags la dga' ba kun du brtsam par bya/ /oM sa rba ta tA ga ta a nu rA ga na badzra

swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ /lha dang sngags dang bcas las byung rnams kyis/ /ma lus sangs rgyas sogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /rang gi snying po las byung ma lus pa'i/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor sa yi gzugs bsam

la/ /cho ga 'di yis sems ni brtan por ldan/ /'jig rten rnams la phan phyir yang dag dbyung / /ye shes bla med dam pa'i mchod pa brtsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa badzra swa b+hA pa A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rin chen dkyil 'khor pa'i/ /rnam pa du ma rdzogs

pa'i dpal dang ldan/ /der ni so sor mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /ye shes las byung rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ /b+ha ga'i gzhal yas las ni rang byung ba/ /rnam pa yongs su rdzogs par dbyung bar bya/ /badzra d+h+r-ika ces gsang sngags las byung ba/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mgon po thub

pa ni/ /skye bo'i don mdzad dam pa yang dag bskul/ /mthing shun gsal ba ye shes rgyal po'i 'od/ /nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'drar yang dag 'bar/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal nas dkar dang dmar/ /dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan/ /dang po gnyis kyis yum

la 'khyud pa dang / /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin par mdzad pa'o/ /bar ma gnyis kyis 'khor lo nor bu dang / /tha mas pad+ma ral gri legs bsnams pa'o/ /rin chen du ma'i rgyan rnams yongs rdzogs pas/ /tshad med nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras yin/ /dbu ma'i lam nas gyen du

brgyud nas ni/ /thugs ka nas ni byon te legs bltams nas/ /phyogs bcur gzigs shing 'od zer grangs med las/ /zhing khams mtha' yas khyab par legs spro ba'i/ /thub pa mchog gis gdul bya'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /

sems can tshogs rnams ma lus go 'phang bkod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku mchog thob byas te/ /kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od tshogs las/ /blo dang ldan pas legs bsdus bdag nyid la/ /dngos po thams cad kyis ni zhugs par bya/ /skad cig de la bdag nyid

yongs bsgyur te/ /slar yang bcom ldan zhe sdang rdo rje ni/ /rin chen in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog ltar/ /mthing nag cung zad khros pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rdo rje skyil krung dag gis legs bzhugs pa'o/ /mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri la gnas mdzad yin/ /dzi na dzika sngags las

ni rang byung ba'i/ /rnam snang mdzad ces bya ba sku rdo rje/ /ston ka'i sprin dkar dag pa lta bu'i mdog /zhal gsum phyag drug sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /g.yas mthing g.yon dmar rtsa bsku dang mtshungs/ /dang po gnyis kyis 'khor lo dril

bu 'dzin/ /rig ma ye shes legs par 'khyud pa'o/ /bar ma gnyis kyis rdo rje rin chen dang / /tha mas pad dkar ral gri legs bsnams pa'o/ /de nyid thugs ka nas ni phyung nas ni/ /mdzad pa spyod de gti mug can sbyangs nas/ /stobs mchog glang

po'i gdan khri'i steng du ni/ /shar gyi pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su bsam/ /rat+na d+h+r-ika sngags las ni rang byung ba'i/ /dkon mchog dpal zhes bya ba rin chen sku/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi 'od dang mtshungs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug nor bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan/ /g.yas

sngo g.yon dkar gzhon nu rin chen tog /dang po'i g.yas g.yon phyag gis lag bsnol te/ /yid bzhin nor bu dril bu legs pa 'dzin/ /bar mas 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje dang / /tha mas gser gyi me tog ral gri 'chang / /de nyid 'od zer phung po dang bcas pa/ /

phyung ste g.yas logs ngogs su bton nas kyang / /mdzad pa spyod de nga rgyal can don byas/ /slar log rdzu 'phrul rta yi khri la bzhugs/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la lhor gnas pa'o/ /A ro lika sngags las ni rab byung ba'i/ /'od dpag med pa gsung gi rdo rje ni/ /pad+ma

rA ga lta bu'i mdangs dang ldan/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug nges byung ba'i/ /g.yas nag g.yon dkar rtsa ba sku dang mtshungs/ /dang po gnyis kyis pad+ma dril bu dang / /bar pas rdo rje rin chen snye ma can/ /tha mas 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rin chen du mas

spras pa'i bdag nyid che/ /thugs ka nas phyung spro bsdus 'gro ba'i don/ /'dod chags can gyi don byas slar 'dus pas/ /mdzes pa rma bya'i khri la nub phyogs bzhugs/ /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces gsang sngags las phyung ba/ /gdon mi za ba phrin las rdo rje ni/ /rin chen ma rgad ljang

gu'i mdog 'chang ba/ /zhal gsum phyag phyag drug sna tshogs nor bus spras/ /g.yas dkar g.yon mthing rtsa ba sku dang mtshungs/ /dang po gnyis kyis ral gri dril bu bsnol/ /bar pas sna tshogs rdo rje pad+ma sngo/ /tha mas 'khor lo nor bu 'od 'phro bsnams/ /de nyid thugs

ka nas ni legs byon nas/ /mdzad pa spyad de phrag don can don byas/ /'dab mkha' lding khri la legs bzhugs pa/ /byang phyogs pad+ma nyi ma'i dbus bzhugs pa'o/ /'di dag dbus dang phyogs bzhi'i le'u tshe yi/ /rnam pa dag la legs par rab

bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag mtshams kyi grwa bzhir 'byung ba ni/ /rigs kyi lha mo bzhi ni legs gnas pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdzes dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /rin chen mchog gi 'od zer 'bar bas brgyan/ /rig pa'i mgon po dang bcas 'byung ba'i sku/ /thams

cad pad+ma nyi zla dag gnas bsam/ /ma hA ra ti zhes bya lha mo spyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la gnas pas/ /mchog tu sgeg cing sku yi rdo rje 'dra/ /me yi phyogs nyid du ni bsam par bya/ /dwe tA ra ti zhes bya dga' ba che/ /yid 'ong mchog stsol mA ma kI zhes pa/ /zhal

mdzes phyag rgya thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra/ /rnam par sgeg pa bden bral mtshungs su bsam/ /rA ga ra ti zhes bya yum mchog ni/ /dri med rin chen 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ phyogs kyi tshogs khebs rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rlung du gsung gi rdo rje mtshungs par bsam/ /badzra ra tis rab

bskul sgrol ma ni/ /rdo rje dga' ma yon tan mtha' yas pa/ /dri med sku ni don yod rdo rje ltar/ /dbang ldan phyogs su nges par bzhugs mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas yul gyur 'di dag rnams kyi ni/ /dang po g.yas mthar ut+pal dkar po dang / /gnyis pa'i g.yas

mthar ut+pal sngo dang ldan/ /gsum pa'i tha ma g.yon par ut+pal dmar/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'byed mdzad bsnol ma nyid/ /bzhi pa'i g.yas mthar ut+pal dkar po'o/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje lha mo spyan mtshungs pa/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gis me long 'dzin mdzad pa//

de nyid mchod byed lha mo rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /me yi gru chad dag la gnas par bsam/ /sgra yi rdo rje lha mo bden bral du/ /dang po gnyis ni rgyud sbreng mdzad pa/ /kun du mchod byed mdzes pa'i gar ldan pa/ /mA ma kI dang mtshungs pa dgod par bya/ /

rdo rje dri yi lha mo rlung lha'i phyogs/ /dang pos lha rdzas dri mchog dung phor 'dzin/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan rgyan spras pa/ /nam bza' dkar mo dang mtshungs rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje ro yi lha mo sgrol mar mtshungs/ /rin chen pad snod legs bkang btung ba

'dzin/ /'di nyid rol pa'i ye shes gzungs ma lha/ /dbang ldan phyogs kyi grwar ni legs bzhugs pa'o/ /reg bya rdo rje lha mo ye shes yum/ /gsang ba dbyings phyug ma ni dbus gnas pa'o/ /pad+ma zla nyi dag la legs gnas pa/ /byams pa'i mgon po sprin dkar

dag pa'i 'od/ /klu shing me tog 'bras ldan legs 'dzin pa/ /rin chen rgyan ldan rol pa'i sems dpa'o/ /sa yi snying po dung dang mtshungs par mdzes/ /'khor lo 'dzin pa dar dpyangs cod pan ldan/ /rnam par 'gying bag ldan pas bzhugs pa ni/ /shar gyi

lha snam dag la skyil krung gnas/ /gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /gur gum bzang po'i mdog ltar dmar ser la/ /phyag na rin chen rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rgyan bcas kun nas 'od 'bar ba'o/ /nam mkha'i snying po gser gyi 'od mnga' ba/ /

ma rgad ta ni chad dgu pa 'dzin cing / /legs par gtso la blta ba sems dpa' che/ /lho yi lha snam dag la dgod par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /ban d+hu ri ka'i me tog ltar mdzes pa/ /g.yon pa'i pad+ma nges par g.yas pas 'byed/ /sems

dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni dmar ser dngas pa la/ /ut+pal dmar po sdong por bcas 'dzin pa/ /g.yas pas kha 'byed phyag rgya ldan pa ste/ /nub kyi lha snam dag la bzhugs par bsam/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel

ba ni/ /ma rgad ljang gu'i mdog dang mtshungs pa ste/ /phyag na ral gri 'bar ba dang por 'dzin/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bsam/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po ni/ /dur ba'i lo ma'i kha dog mtshungs pa nyid/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa

'gying bag can/ /byang phyogs lha khyams dag la bzhugs par bsam/ /'di dag so so'i gtso bo'i sku mtshungs te/ /zhal gsum phyag drug nges pa gsal bar brjod/ /rnam shes tshogs brgyad rtog pa sbyangs nas ni/ /slar 'dus so sor gsal bar gyur

par bsam/ /ya mAn+ta kr-id ces bya gshin rje gshed/ /mtha' yas 'jigs 'od phyogs kun khyab dang ldan/ /dus mtha'i mi bzad sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor mdog /thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa/ /drag po rigs kyi 'od zer dpag med 'phro/ /

gshin rje mthar byed shin tu gdug pa yi/ /sbrul gyis lus kyi yan lag rnam brgyan pa/ /dpal ldan shar gyi sgor ni bsam par bya/ /pradz+nyA n+ta kr-id ces bya bla med 'od/ /drag cing phyag sogs sku yi rdo rje 'dra/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya gtum po ni/ /lho yi phyogs kyi sgo ru

bsam par bya/ /pad+mAn+ta kr-id ces bya nub phyogs kyi/ /'khor lo'i 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa/ /'od mdangs 'jig dus me 'dra 'jigs par ldan/ /phyag la sogs pa gsung gi rdo rje 'dra/ /gdug pa ma lus rnam gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /thub dbang ha ha zhes ni bzhad

pa yis/ /ri bor bcas pa sgyel bas skrag mdzad pa/ /rta mgrin de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su bsam/ /big+ha nAn ta kr-id ces bya dpa' bo ni/ /dus mtha'i me ltar drag pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'phags pa'i zhal phyag phrin las rdo rje mtshungs/ /de bzhin byang gi sgor ni bsam

par bya/ /rdo rje tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang / /rdo rje gtun shing khyad par 'di dag 'dzin/ /thams cad rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan pa'i/ /cod pan ye shes rgyas gdab bstan pa yin/ /'di dag khro bo mngon par 'byung ba dag /gsang sngags las byung cod pan lhar bcas pa/ /

zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i cha byad ston/ /me dpung klong dkyil 'bar bar rab tu bzhugs/ /me yi mtshams su khro rgyal mi g.yo ba/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mdog mtshungs gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas zhi dkar ba g.yon dmar bzhad pa las/ /dbus

ngam mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i sku/ /dang po ral gra sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin/ /bar mas 'khor lo pad+ma 'dzin pa nyid/ /thams dgra sta nor bu bsnams pa ste/ /pad+ma nyi mar g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /bden bral du ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /shin

tu drag po baiDU r+ya yi mdog /dang pos sdigs mdzub bsnol ma mthe'u chung sbrel/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / /ral gri ut+pal dmar po tha mar 'dzin/ /'jigs rung gsus che pad nyi'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rigs 'dzin du ni khro bo dbyug sngon can/ /

char sprin sngon po lta bu'i kha dog 'chang / /dang pos dbyug pa sdigs mdzub me dpung 'phro/ /bar mas ral gri nor bu legs 'chang ba/ /tha mas 'khor lo pad+ma legs bsnams pa/ /gtum po 'jigs pa sel mdzad der bzhugs yin/ /'byung po 'jigs mdzad

rdo rje stobs po che/ /me tog ut+pal sngon po'i 'od mtshungs pa/ /dang po rnga yab rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang / /bar pas ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /tha mas 'khor lo nor bu 'bar ba ste/ /gdon 'joms sgeg po pad+ma nyi mar gnas/ /steng phyogs shar sgo'i rtsa

bar 'byung ba yi/ /khro bo gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni/ /mkha' 'dra sngo bsangs gtsug tor phyag rgya ni/ /spyi por dang po'i phyag gis bcings pa ste/ /bar ma rdo rje dang ni pad+ma 'dzin/ /tha ma ral gri sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /rnam 'tshe 'joms mdzad g.yon brkyang

gnas pa yis/ /tshangs gnas der ni pad nyi'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'og phyogs nub sgo'i rtsa bar bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu ba yi gdug pa'i dug /ka la ku Ta 'joms pa gnod mdzes ni/ /mthing shun bzang po'i mdog dang mtshungs pa yi/ /dang pos rdo rje sdigs

mdzub zhags pa can/ /bar pas 'khor lo pad+ma tha mas kyang / /ral gri dang ni nor bu rin chen 'dzin/ /sa bdag ma lus gnod mdzes rdo rje bzhugs/ /khro bo bcu po kun gyi rnam pa ni/ /spyan gsum sdang mig phyogs bcur gzigs pa dang / /thung zhing sbom la

gsus 'phyang sbrul brgyad kyis/ /rab tu brgyan cing dbu skra gyen du brdzes/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dpa' ba'i nyams dang ldan/ /smin ma gyen bskyod ag tsom gyen du 'khyil/ /sna tshogs nor bu'i rgyan bcas stag sham can/ /mche gtsigs zhal ni bzhad cing sgra sgrogs

pa/ /ha ha zhes brjod mi bzad gad rgyangs mnga'/ /bka' bsgo rdzogs byed ma lus bgegs 'joms mdzad/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum pad+ma nyi mar gnas/ /de ltar sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor ba'i/ /lha rnams phyag rgya bzhi ldan bskyed nas ni/ /sku bzhi dbyer med

ye shes ngang du blta/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i

rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa rdo rje'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /brtag pa lnga pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang

'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gis yang dag par gsol ba btab pa ni/ /gsang ba 'dzin

pa ma lus pa'i/ /sku gsum chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba'i/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dam pa'i snying po mchog stsol mdzod/ /ces gsol ba btab nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs

chen por dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po dang bcas pa la sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas zhing khams ma lus pa kun nas khyab par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sprin gyi rin po che 'bar ba du mas brgyan pas rnam pa ma

'dres pa'i tshogs kyis kun nas snang bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/ rin po che du ma las byung ba'i gdugs rin po che dang / ba dan rin po che dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu'i rgyal po las byung ba'i lha'i bla re rin po che dang / rin po che du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i dar 'phen

du ma'i tshogs dang / sna tshogs rin po che'i gos las byung ba'i ba dan rgyud du ma'i tshogs dang / sna tshogs 'phyang ba dang / sna tshogs chun 'phyang bskyod pa las dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra sgrogs pa'i ba dan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang lha'i rol mo'i tshogs du

mas yang dag par mchod par byas so/ /gzhal yas khang rin po ches spras pa ni rin po che mu tig gi dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas bai DUr+ya'i gzhi yongs su bkod pa dang / rin po che gser gyi pha gu sna tshogs pa'i 'phra du mas bkod pa ni kha bad kyi tshul du brgyan par gyur to/ /ba ku

la'i gser gyi skar khung gis brgyan pa dang / phyi rol dang nang du yang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i stegs bu la 'khod cing kun nas yongs su mchod par byed do/ /rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i kha bad ni mda' yab kyis mdzes par yongs su brgyan par

gyur to/ /yongs su mchod cing rgyas par byed pa nyid do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi glu'i sgron me dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes lam/ /

mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa la/ /rnam par zhi ba mi gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shugs gnas rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa mthong ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /yongs su dag pa'i sgo dang ni/ /mtha' dbus dag pa rdo rje'i dbyings/ /mtshungs par ldan pa dag pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun tu

gzigs pa med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems kyis sems ni mi mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam che/ /rnam par gzigs pa med gyur phyir/ /byang chub sems 'di gsungs pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srung ba'i dbang pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shes rab rnam par dag pa yi/ /snang ba chen chen po'i

ye shes me/ /ma lus stong nyid rang byung las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /rnam par shes ba skye med de/ /skye ba tsam du bgyid ma legs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes

mngon par rol pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sgyu ma las/ /rnam pa'i dra ba dag pa'i phyir/ /dpe bral bde ba'i sa gcig pu/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid las ma byung ba rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu rkyen yul dag mi dmigs pas/ /rdo rje dag dang ma dag med/ /spros med tshul ni

rnyog pa bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zil gnon dpe med rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

dpag med yongs su bsdu ba'i gnas/ /zag med rmi lam gnas med pa/ /thams cad byed pa po med phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par bsgrubs pa'i

tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /tha snyad gdags pa bral pa'i phyir/ /dngos med ngo bas stong pas na/ /ye shes tsam la dmigs med de/ /mngon par mig nas tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gnas pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dben zhing rnam dag de bzhin nyid/ /chos dbyings ye shes rdo rje las/ /'gyur ba med pa'i ngang

la bzhugs/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum mchod gnas kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so//

lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las/ /rnam par zad med 'gyur ba ltar// /sangs rgyas ye shes de bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bdag med las byung ba'i/ /dam chos seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas/ 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dengs par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

lha yis mchod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gyur ba'i gdan 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du rdo rje'i rlung gis ni/ /rin med dbang chen rdul phran dag /rdo rje ye shes 'gyur med pas/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kun nas snang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bden par smra pa'i

gsung gis ni/ /thogs med rdo rje dbyangs gcig gis/ /stong gsum kun du sgrog par byed/ /byang chub thabs tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i tshul gtsug gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thob par ston pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du mos pas 'jug pa'i sems can la/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bzhi ba dang / /bdag med ye shes stong nyid ston bar byed/ /'di ni ye shes dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa'i sku'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mngon par bsgrub pa 'phags pa'i chos/ /de nyid mtshan ma rtog bral

ba/ /spong ba med cing lhun gyis grub/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal thub pa'i rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyag

rgya chen po mchog chen po/ /dus gsum mi mnyam chos kyi sku/ /don dam rab tu mi gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtan pa bzang pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba sgyu ma'i rnam par ston pa

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma don dam par mi gnas/ /sgyu ma'i tshogs gnyis 'bad med pas/ /de nyid ngang du thob cing grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rin chen phung pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes brjod du med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin rtog pa dag pa'i dang / /de nyid spang blang las grol phyir/ /'od gsal ngang du smrar med don//

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan mngon par bstan pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lkog gyur gnas pa'i

rten dag cing / /tshad med bzhi las 'tshar ba gang / /de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mkhyen/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi/ /snying po mngon par byang chub pa/ /stong nyid ye shes nam mkha'

ltar/ /chos sku rang byung mnyam pa nyid/ /'gog pa med phyir snang ba po/ /'od gsal snyis po 'bras 'byung 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba gsang ba 'dus ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su

med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dbyings dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ltar gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus kyis lus kyi rjes lta zhing / /de nyid rang bzhin med par yang / /cha shas med pa'i rnam pa can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i 'od

kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bde sdug btang snyoms kyi/ /tshor bar rang bzhin med par ni/ /dag pa rkyen bral chos nyid de/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtsug tor gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul dang yul can mi

dmigs shing / /'du shes 'du byed rnam dag pa/ /rang las byung ba'i gnas med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rdzogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab cing phra ba rtag med pa/ /rten byed rnam shes sa bon tshul/ /rtogs pa med par gnas pa ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa seng ge'i snyoms kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di dag la ma la nges par zhugs pa yi/ /bla na med pa'i bdun pa mi phyed pas/ /gong du bgrod

bar byed pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /tshogs pa 'di ni byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 'phags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /dkar po'i phyogs rgyun rab 'phel zhing / /dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa/ /yang dag ye shes rtsom pa'i tshul/ /byang chub dag pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun chad med pa'i bsam gtan gnas/ /yengs med tshul la gnas gyur cing / /bden don spyod pa rnam par 'dzin/ /rnam par sad

byed rten gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dgyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyi sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyad

par gyis ni bsam gtan la/ /sems ni ye shes ngang gyur pas/ /mtshan mas stong pa'i rigs pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa bskyed

pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dge ba'i bag la nyal gyur pa/ /rnam par sad byed rten gyur pas/ /bdag nyid thar pa thob pa'i chos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa ye shes dgyes kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnam par dag par bsrung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag nges par gnas pa yi/ /dag pa'i dge ba phyogs med pa/ /

brtan zhing phyir mi ldog par ni/ /gnas pa byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /sdig tor gyur pa'i phung po dag /log pa'i las rnams nges spong ba/ /tshul khrims ngo bo bstan pa'i mthu/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug med par gshegs pas sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di dag dngos po mi dmigs pas/ /yongs su dag pas rtsa ba bral/ /ldog pa med pa'i tshul gnas pas/ /byang chub

tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dad pa'i dbang po rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyu dag 'bras bus bsdus pa yi/ /

dngos po zhing dag rnam dag pas/ /phra rab brten pa 'dod pa dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi dbang po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dge ba dang ni lhag par spro ba'i chos/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod pa ste/ /sgyu ma'i ye shes 'dis ni spro ba gang / /byang chub tshul 'di nges par bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar de bar dgongs pas

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dran pa'i dbang po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi brjed gzungs su gyur pa ni/ /bde ba bstan pa'i ngang 'byung ba/ /ltung ba bag med gnas spong bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mnyam par bzhag dang rjes thob la/ /sgyu ma khams gsum

lam snang ba/ /dben pas de nyid thob pas so/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa cho ga mkhyen pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dbang po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams/ /ngo bo nyid dag rab ston pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i rgya mtshos sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi rnam par grol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dben don kun shes pas/ /bsam gtan bde la ma zhen cing / /khyad par byang chub sems dpa' chos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mnga' bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dgyes pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dang du blang ba rlom sems med/ /gang du chos dbyings

ngang 'jug pa/ /gcig dang du mar dmigs pas grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba gnyis su med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bral ba med cing mi shigs pa/ /'khrug med bye brag ma sbangs nas/ /'dren pa chos kyi gter gyur ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'di ni gzhal yas khang min yul ni dbang po min cing 'byung

sogs min/ /gzugs la sogs pa ma yin srog gnas min zhing mir gyur 'di ni rgyal ba ste/ /'khor lo'i gtso yi chos nyid yin te des ni dkyil 'khor du mar sprul/ /khams gsum 'di na sna tshogs 'khor lor shes na sems ni ci ste 'khrul bar byed/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu 'dun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo dga' bar mdzad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dang pa'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gzhan rkyen na bas mi rdzi ba'i/ /ye shes mngon par 'phel bas na/ /mchog tu rten

'brel yid ches yin/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i nga ros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sems

bskyed gzhan don du/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa las/ /le lo rnam par spangs pa can/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma zhum pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dran po'i stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag spro ba tshad med pa/ /rgyun du chos rgyun gzungs thob pas/ /rtag tu dge bas dus mtha' gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sred pa'i dri ma

spangs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par g.yengs pa'i dri ma bral/ /'khrig pa bral ba'i bde ba rgyas/ /gzhan du dga' ba tshad med pas/ /de

nyid gsang ba'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i lam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi stobs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du shes rab 'chal

spangs nas/ /rab tu byed pa thogs med pa/ /stong nyid ye shes thugs rje'i bdag /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha thams cad kyis snyan par bsgrags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin yang dag

pa byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun tu khyab pa yi/ /rang rig ye shes 'du 'bral med/ /khyad par mngon par rtogs pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyin ci ma log khyad par la/ /rang

gi lus dang longs spyod tshogs/ /sems can kun la ster bas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na pad+mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lkog tu gyur pa las 'das shing / /gzhon nu'i bde ba rtog bral bas/ /zag med bde bas rgyas gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyams pa med cing 'phel ba'i chos/ /bde ba dang ni dgyes spyod pa/ /ldang ba dang

yang zo bdog bde/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra las rnam par rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pa'i/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid las/ /chos kun rnam par 'byed pa yi/ /rab tu mi gnas tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan grags pas sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes go cha dang ldan zhing / /gong nas gong du 'phel byed pa/ /de nyid 'phel bar gyur pa ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor bzang pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can

la/ phyogs ris med par khyab pa yi/ /gnyis med mnyam par gnas pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyin ci ma log ye shes ni/ /mngon sum dag pa'i ngo bor gyur/ /lhag pa'i sdom 'phel 'gyur ba ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ros sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i rtog pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems dpa' rtogs pas mi phyed pas/ /kun slong ngan pa rnam rtog ste/ /byang chub sems kyi rjes 'gro bas/ /bsgom par bya ba'i tshul 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ltar shar bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ngag rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma 'dres dri ma med ba yi/ /rang gi ye shes der

ston mdzad/ /rnam par dag pas tshul bstan pa/ /byang chub de nyid bshad pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzin pa'i mchog gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag nyid byang chub chen po ru/ /ring ba'i chos dag mngon gyur pas/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sems thob pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo
