bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag ba'i 'tsho ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lus ngag yid gsum gzhan don du/ /nges par sngo ba bla na med/ /yang dag don la rgyun spyod pa'i/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par rtsol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin tu nges par gzhan gyi

don/ /dngos dang brgyud pas mdzad pa po/ /ro mnyam ye shes rol pa ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i dran pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thugs rjes khyad par yul gyur pa/ /bde ba nyams pa med pa dang / /bstan pa snying po 'dren pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal

pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phra rags rtog pa ma lus pa/ /chos kyi dbyings su nub nas ni/ /zung 'jug chos spyod dang gnas pas/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyi snang ba mi zad pas dus gsum du rgyun mi 'chad cing phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus shing lus pa

med pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug dam pas ston par byed do/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dgyes pa'i mchog stsol bas dri ma med par spyod la/ 'phags pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin ba'i lam mtshungs pa med

par tshad med pa'i 'od zer du mas snang ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa nyid de/ 'dir gsang pa chen po'i tshul la phyin ci ma log sa gnas shing byang chub kyi sems rdo rje las nges par thob pa ston pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ston pa yin/ bla ma yin/ bkur

gnas yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin ye shes mi zad pa'i gter yin/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i rgya mtsho yin/ /yon tan dri ma med pa'i gling yin/ /gzi brjid mi zad pa'i nyi ma yin/ /rin chen du ma'i rgyal mtshan yin/ /mi shes pa'i rab

rib sel ba'i zla ba yin/ /mun pa la gnas pa'i sgron me lta bu yin/ /nad thams cad zhi bar nus pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po yin/ /srid pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i gru chen po yin/ dgos 'dod du ma'i gzhi rin po che bsam 'phel yin/ phun sum tshogs pa du

ma'i ljon shing chen po tshad med pas skyob pa nyid de byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes rgyud rgyas par byed pa'i bla ma ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang tha dad med cing dbyer med pa nyid do/ /'dis ni rim pa nges par ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi lam ma lus pa rdzogs par byed pa

'di nyid de dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / bsrung ba'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /

mos par spyod pa dang / 'jug pa'i sgo la spyod pa dang / lam gnas pa la spyod pa rdzogs par byed do/ /rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / 'od byed pa dang / sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur ba dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / /

legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin gyi bar du ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dpe med pa'i sa dang / ye shes chen po'i sa dang / dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bar du ma lus pa'i ye shes thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid de/ mngon

par 'byung ba rol pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul ston pa nyid do/ /de phyir kun nas kun du nges par bla ma la mchod cing brten par bya ba la 'bad pa nyid do/ /'di dag gis kyang lus gcig gis ye shes du ma yongs su sdud par byed pa'i phyir tshe

gcig gis mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus ba rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba bla na med pa'i lam

yongs su rdzogs par ston pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyis bskul bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che'i mdzod rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gsung ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa/ /ye shes chu dang 'o ma bzhin/ /snga phyi gcig tu 'dres pa yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gau ta ma ye shes mngon par rol pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rdo rje'i sprin gyi 'od rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyis/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rol pa gang / /ma skyes de bzhin nyid sbyor bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi chu bo 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /brjod pa tha snyad bral ba yi/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i dbang phyug gang / /skye med ngo bo

nyid ston pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rjes log lta'i ri bo 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par rtog las grol ba yi/ /ye shes phung po'i rang bzhin can/ /mnyam nyid byang chub mi phyed pas/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang pos sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa kun du rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zab mo'i gnas la bsam gtan gang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ /shin tu dgyes par spyod pa ni/ /byang chub tshul

'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub me tog gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung bar ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas lugs de bzhin nyid stong pas/ /rgyu dang

rkyen las rnam grol nyid/ /ma 'gags tha snyad rnyog ba med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis snying pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med ye shes ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtogs par bya ba'i don dam ni/ /rten 'brel mtshan nyid ston pa las/ /stong nyid ye shes chos kyi sku/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshes pa legs stobs kyis

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs pa rab tu zhi ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dmigs su med pa'i don dam ni/ /bsam pa shes brjod yul 'das pa/ /dmigs pa kun las 'das pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzi brjid kyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i 'od zil gnon rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'jig rten srid pa'i

brtan pa dang / /g.yo ba'i sna tshogs gang 'byung ba/ /dpag med 'di yis gnon pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi rtsal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskal ba 'khor ba'i mun pa sel byed rdo rje'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yi/ /blo yi mun pa ma lus pa/ /ye shes snang bas 'joms par mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge

ba'i sgron mes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad sgron me 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'od gsal shes rab med 'bar bas/ /nyon mongs ma lus khyod kyis bsregs/ /zag ba'i dri ma sel mdzad pa/ /

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal ston pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thogs med rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bdud sde shin tu mi zad pa/ /thams cad 'dul

mdzad dpa' po che/ /stobs chen 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha sgra thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdul dka' ma lus pa 'dul bar mdzad pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs

mchog rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du byams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snying rje'i yul gyur gzigs nas ni/ /pha rol rtog pa rtsad gcod pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag par gnas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshungs med ston pa gcig pa dang / /du ma las ni yongs grol zhing / /kun rdzob tha snyad zad byed pa/ /byang

chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i zhal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas dag pa'i klong rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/ /

bstan pa gzhan don phyir 'byung ba/ /thub pa brdal ba chen por 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa thar pa'i brtul zhugs kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bcu gnyis spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /yon tan sdud pa'i tshul 'chang ba/ /dmigs med kun rdzob dag pa che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dri med 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi zhal rgyas pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun nas zhal gyi snang ba'i sgo/ /dpag med zhal dang phyag rgya dag /du mar snang ba'i ston pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs gnas kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshul zab par ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyis sems 'di gsungs so/ /drang srong spyod pa gtsang ma'i gnas/ /ri sul gnas la brten pa yi/ /chog shes bag yod snyengs bral

pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med pas sangs rgyas kyi snang med 'od kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhi ba spros bral mkha' lta bu/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i ngo bo

nyid/ /go 'byed ye shes lhun gyis grub/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po 'phags kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par mi rtog rang byung ba/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa ni/ /ma grub grub pa'i lam gyur pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sems bskyed nges pa dang po ste/ /tshogs bsags pa ni zung

'brel 'byung / /tshad med drod la sogs par 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes mthong ba nyid/ /dang por rdo rje sems dpa' nas/ /dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs goms byed pas/ /bsdu ba yongs su dag pa nyid/ /bla na med pa'i tshul nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las ye shes nges par byed pa gnas gtan la dbab pa'i don gyi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig sman rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/ /chu shing ste

ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin/ /snying po med pa'i snying por gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phel bar mdzad pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun tu rol ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam shes ye shes gzungs can ni/ /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa can/ /dri med sa bon 'byung gnas las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

ye shes mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /'od zer kun du 'bar bcas pas/ /nA da 'dzin med gnyug mar grol/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tsan+dan gyi dri rgyal po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sngon du 'gro ba yid yin te/ /yid kyi 'jug pa'i rang bzhin rnams/ /dag pa

gsang ba chen po nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thogs med spyod pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi g.yo 'gog pa'i

lam spangs shing / /ma rig rdul dang bral ba yin/ /snying gi pad+ma sad byed pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes yang dag par sdud pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtshan ma med pa'i sku gcig pu/ /nyon mongs bral ba'i phyag rgya che/ /dgos pa med par rten cing 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub mchog bgrod

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang / /zhi ba'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhas pas/ /sems can ji srid skyo bskyed pa'i/ /byang chub tshal 'di

bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog tu sprul pa ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'jig rten ma lus pa'i/ /sems can khams dang bsam

ba dang / /bag la nyal ba mkhyen pas ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dgyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul dmigs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems di gsungs so/ /tshad med thugs rje'i dbang gyur pas/ /sna tshogs 'dul ba'i tshul can gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings dang tshul gcig par/ /'gro don de nyid bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pa'i sems can thams cad kun/ /ma lus zad med dbyings nyid du/ /ma gyur de srid bzhugs mdzad cing / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha thams cad pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid gcig pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba gcig kyang ma lus par/ /ye shes dbyings su ma gyur tshe/ /mya ngan 'da' ba

ston mi mdzad/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes bsod nams gzhal du med pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

rang dang gzhan dang bdag dang ni/ /bdag gir 'dzin pa'i gnyis snang zhing / /gnyis med mnyam par rab sbyor bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gshes gnyen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpag med

bde ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du phan pa 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal 'gyur med pas/ /gcig las du mar sprul pa dag /byang chub ngang las sprul pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams can kyi 'gro drug 'dul ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can ma lus srog gyur pa/ /snying po bdud rtsi byang chub sems/ /'pho ba med par rang

'dir rgyal/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal ba 'gro ba skyob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang

dag tshad med bzhi ldan pas/ /rgyu dang lam dang yul gyis ni/ /dmigs bcas dmigs med rim pa dag /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzes pa bla na med pa rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dus ma byas shing rnam dbye med/ /chos nyid ngo bo nyid 'byung ba/ /dag pa'i phyir na 'od gsal pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags

pas bstod pa dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems nyid nyon mongs can min pa/ /blo bur dri ma rlung las byung / /des blangs 'dzin bas rnam 'khrul te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhan cig tu 'byung ba ye shes dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos nyid dang la rang gnas pa'i/ /rlung ni phra ba 'jug byed cing / /dag pa ye

shes tshul du 'jug /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dag pa chen po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtha' gnyis las ni rnam

par gnas/ /sgrib gnyis snyoms par 'jug bcas pa/ /lhan cig 'byung ba mi gnas pas/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba gzigs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal pa ye shes gsag ba'i mdzod

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes rgyas mtsho'i ngang nyid las/ /dba' rlabs sna tshogs tsho 'phrul ston/ /'di nyid yon tan 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rtog med ye shes

dbyings gyur pa/ /nam mkha'i kun du rtog bral pas/ /rlung sems mnyam par gyur pas na/ /mtshungs med nor bu'i gter mchog 'gyur/ /chos nyid ngang du bzhugs pa dag /thun mong tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nor bu'i tog gi rgyal po'i ngo bo'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

legs spyod rnam par smin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cha med phyogs chas stod pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang byung ye shes gnas med rgyal/ /mtha' dbus las grol de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi

gzigs pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa legs dgyes rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa gcig tu 'gyur ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi gnyis tha dad

med pa'i chos/ /gsang ba ngo bo nyid dag par/ /skye ba med la chos 'byung ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu nyams pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dmigs pa rtog bral te/ /kun nas zag med 'phel med pas/ /yon tan rgyal pas bsdus pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ye shes yang dag par 'du ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni mi gtog ye shes nyid/ /mnyam bzhag rjes thob rtsol bral nas/ /gnyis mi gzigs pas rab tu skye/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa dang ldan pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yid la mi byed pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yid la byed pa mtshan mar byung / /de nyid dngos med rtog bral bas/ /

yid la med byed bde ba che/ /rang byung tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas 'brel bdag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang

du bdag nyid gcig pa dang / /rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung dang / /de las byung ba'i tshul med pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag ye shes dra ba 'dzin pa rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so/ /dngos bor 'dzin pa dag byed cing / /dngos med phra bar 'byung ba ni/ /mi slu 'byung ba dgra bcom pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dngos po'i chos nyid dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /gnyis med mthong bas yongs su bsgom/ /de nyid rgyun chad med gyur pas/ /rten

cing 'brel 'byung don bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal spong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mi zad pa'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni yongs su

dag pa'i lam/ /bar chad med par mtha' phyin par/ /rnam shes phung po'i ye shes 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rlag par mdzad pa bdud 'dul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos dag dngos med las grol zhing / /sems dang sems las byung ba yi/ /'du byed dag pa'i sems pa gang / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad las yang

dag par rgal ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyi nang du gnas pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus kyang / /bde dang sdug bsngal kun byed de/ /rgyu 'bras byed pas so sor smin/ /de bas

byang chub sems bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang stong tha dad med pa yi/ /ngo bo ro mnyam sgyu

ma'i dngos/ /dus gsum dngos las 'das pa'i chos/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpa' bo'i 'khor lo dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /bden pa pa las 'das shing / /dngos stong dri za'i grong mtshungs dang / /byed pa spangs pa'i tshul 'di ni/ /de nyid ye shes bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag cing dga' bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi ye shes grub pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas/ /rang rig bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed/ /dngos med gnas las grol bya'i phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud rtsi'i phreng ba dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mos pa dman pa'i sems can la/ /nyan thos rang

rgyal la sogs pa/ /rdzas su grub 'dod de bral chos/ /stong nyid tsam du'ang bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /thob pa med cing 'brel med pa/ /bye brag mdo sde'i rigs las 'das/ /sems tsam du yang bshad pas na/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi don yongs su sdud pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dren pa'i thar lam gsang ba ni/ /skyon med shin tu yongs gsal bar/ /thub pa nyi ma bde ba'i lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i ri rab kyi zom la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ring gnas sa gsum gnas pa yi/ /ye shes dpag med nor bu

yis/ /blo yi gter dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du byang chub mchog gnas pa/ /rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig gis/ /bsngags pas yid 'ong tshig gcig tu/ /byang chub tshul 'di legs bstan yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bsil ba sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi 'gro ba'i sman gyi snying po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba yi/ /dri ma sel mdzad sman chen po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /chos

rnams yid la byed pa kun bral ba'i/ /gzugs can ma yin dngos por ma grub pa/ /stong pa gcig pur mi gnas mnyam pa nyid/ /chos nyid bdag med 'di ni rtogs par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang

ba 'dus pa dpal rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa med par ston pa rdo rje'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rgyal ba sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /phyi rol gyi ni phyogs med cing / /sems las gyur pa ma gtogs par/ /dngos po gzhan yod ma yin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog ge ba'i yul las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems nyid dngos dang dngos med kyi/ /mtshan ma'i chos las

yongs grol ba/ /rnam par thar pa'i don bstan pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul rtogs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtag med zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

sems dang de yi chos nyid dag /rnam dag snang ba sdud pa po/ /bsam pa de yi rkyen can zhes/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye med mtshungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad rnam rig tsam du'ang mi gnas

pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems kyi spyod pa'i khyad par las/ /'das pa smon pa med pa'i ngang / /ma grub pa la gdags bya med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtag par dka' ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems ni dngos por ma mchis te/ /rtog pa mi ldan dbyings gnas pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di

legs bstan pas/ /zag med stong pa nyid gnas pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dgyes pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du sangs

rgyas zhi ba dang / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dag /don dam pa la 'dzin med phyir/ /spang blang med par grol ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan zla ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dben pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgra tsam thos pa'i yul yin gyi/ /rtogs par byed pa sgra ma yin/ /mi rtag dngos med las grol phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das ba ma yin pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'gyur med cing / /des gsungs chos ni rgyas pa las/ /'dren pa yang dag byang chub pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba nyon mongs nad kyis ni/ /rnam par

gzer zhig nyen pa la/ /'chi med bdud rtsi ster mdzad pa/ /snying po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag med zhi ba'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri med pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs shing / /mnyam pa seng ge'i khrir gnas las/ /g.yos med rnam 'phrul du ma las/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsod rnams dgyes

pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi reg tu med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos rnams gang la'ang mi gnas pa/ /bar snang rgyu ba'i bya bzhin du/ /rtag tu thugs rjes rjes su 'gro zhing / /byang chub sems 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par dkar zhing gtsang ba yi/ /zhen med gzhan don dge spyad pa//

zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin te/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog tu zhi ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zhing khams

bye ba phrag brgya ru/ /mdzad tshul mtha' yas ston pa ni/ /ye shes spyod pas don mdzad pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /drag cing gdug pa rngam pa yi/ /tshul ni dag pa bde ba'i lam/ /bla med dri med tshul zhi ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ zhe gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi gcig dag du ma las yongs su grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du tha snyad las 'das shing / /rnam par mi phyed pa yi sems/ /mtshon du med las mtshon pa nyid/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan

pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgra las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /de nyid brtags pa rkyen sbyor

bas/ /'byung gnas mtshon pa don ston pas/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshes pa 'khrul pa med pa'i blos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthong du med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /ma rig pa las rkyen stobs kyis/ /rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed par/ /glo bur dri ma zhes bya gang / /stong pa de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i

gnas thams cad las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dri ma rnams ni rlung las byung / /rnam shes bdag 'dzin dra ba gang / /mtshungs par dag pa mchog gyur pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'gro ba skyob pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams sems dang rlung las ni/ /rnam 'phrul sa gsum khyab

'byung ba/ /dri ma kun nas rlung la brten/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /thabs chen yang dag ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'jig rten don grub pa/ /sems can kun gyis smad pa yi/ /bya ba 'di la mi bya med/ /shes

rab thabs dang ldan pa la/ /sdig par grags pa yod min zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa la/ /rdo rje can ni nyid kyis gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa

mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal mchog chen po de kha na nyid 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tog ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin tu gdul dka' dag byed pa/ /ma lus skyed byed rang byung sems/ /gnas pa'i ngo bo byang chub sems/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par grags pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ye shes de bzhin nyid la ni/ /mi rtog rab tu mi gnas pa/ /rgyus stong lam dang 'bras dag pa'i/ /

byang chub de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mgon po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun du son zhing dge ba

yi/ /du ma'i ngo bo dag pa'i gnas/ /ye shes bsrung ba med pa'i tshul/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal ljon pa 'du shes yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par sdud pa'i rlung dag gis/ /'phral du bag chags rtog pa gang / /sbur ma lta bur sdud pa'i phyir/ /dag pa de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gti

mug rab zad rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun mkhyen dbang po mchog 'byung ba/ /dngos po'i chos las 'das pa yi/ /dri ma kun nas spangs pa

dag /gsang ba de nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i ye shes can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'dren

pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes skyong ba po/ /tshad med bde ba'i 'byung gnas ni/ /de nyid ye shes bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gdung ba sel ba'i sman gyi mchog /gsang ba 'chi med ye shes chu/ /rang gzhan mchog tu thob pa ni/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brtag tu med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes lhun grub pa/ /de bas mi rtog par bshad de/ /bsam pa'i byed pa yod min te/ /med pa'i sems su gyur ma yin/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs bstar ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul kun las 'das pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rtogs pa 'gag med pa/ /mi rtog snying po gsang

ba'i rgyan/ /bde chen byang chub dbang po'i gnas/ /spyod yul bskyed pa tshul gnas pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par gnas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzod ma nas stong pa'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thub pa bdag gzhan mnyam nyid du/ /rtsal ldan 'jigs pa kun sgrol mdzad/ /bsil bas tshad pa kun skyob pa/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

ba mya ngan rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems pa thams cad dang bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems 'di kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /ljon pa'i shig ltar 'dab rgyas pas/ /dmigs

med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar dgyes pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam rtog bdud las rnam rgyal ba/ /mchog tu

dgyes pa rin chen mnyes/ /'khor lo lta bu'i shugs 'chang ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la tha dad med par rtogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /chos la dbye ba rdul tsam med/ /so sor brtags pa blo yi lam/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'gro ba'i dpal sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi kun du rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rmad byung ba'i spyod pa dag /bye ba dpag med ston mdzad pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mdzes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus gsum kun du khyab par ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mdzad pa du ma'i spyod yul du/ /snang grags srid pa rtog ge ba/ /

thams cad zil gnon rdo rje ches/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la'i 'od sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /kun mkhyen

sa ni 'jig rten du/ /u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /du ma ma yin gcig pa nyid/ /de bas dam chos mchog tu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus gnas me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe dang bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang

chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du dam pa'i chos gnas shing / /kun du dge ba dag pas na/ /rnam par 'tshe ba du ma 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye

shes 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can la/ /dge ba ye shes tshul gnas kyang / /thob med dam pa'i sgra sgrog byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par brtse ba seng ge'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chu klung 'bab chu rnams dang ni/ /rgya mtsho'i chu ni tha dad par/ /sna tshogs gcig

par rgyun 'bab pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drang srong 'dul ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lha yi drang

srong thams cad kyis/ /bstod cing bsngags par gyur pa gang / /bden pa'i stobs las byung ba nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brjod

kyis mi lang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gsang ba chen po 'di'i ngang la gnas shing kun du ston pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon par sgrub par byed pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i

gnas nges par lung ston pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las gsang ba dag pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gsum

pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings 'byung ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i tshang tshing thibs po dag /ma rig rkyen can rlung

las byung / /'jig rten dra ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i chos nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems

'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni kun du khyab pa yi/ /rlung las sdud dang spro ba dang / /smin dang nyams pa byed pa yi/ /tshul 'dis phra pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs ba lha'i bdag bos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas

bde ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /zag bcas rlung las rtog pa ste/ /zag med ye shes chos nyid rlung / /gnyis su med pa'i dbyings gyur pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun du ston pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nges 'byung bla na med pa'i lam/ /yongs su smin pa'i lam rdzogs pa/ /kun du sbyor ba spangs pa

yi/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bstan

pa'i sgor 'jug pa/ /rjes 'brangs gzhung lugs gnyis gsungs pa/ /gang zag dang ni chos yin te/ /byang chub tshul bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu zhi ba rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du 'ching dang grol med par/ /rlung ni rnam par 'jug ldog pas/ /byang chub mi rtog chos nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

bsod nams blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /lam bzang theg mchog bla med pa'i/ /yon tan 'phel byed bzang po yi/ /rgyal mtshan gsang pa chen po nyid//

byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin byed 'od 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa las ring du 'gro ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'gro ba'i bsam

pa'i nor bu ni/ /ye shes re ba rdzogs byed pa/ /phyi nas 'byung med rang gnas phyir/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdul med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag stong nyid nam mkha' ste/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs/ /blo yi byed pa dang bral ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid

phung pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnyog pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /snang ba med cing kun brjod bral/ /gnyis med dag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba/ /byang chub sems

'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsal ba chen po rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /

rnam shes rlung dang 'dres pa yis/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu gsal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te

byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa dag /rlung las byung phyir 'di dag pas/ /dri ma ma lus dag par byed/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rab rtsal thub pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /rkyen byung las kyi rlung dag pas/ /ye shes ngang du zhi ba ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa 'od spyod pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shin tu rtul med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos por snang ba rgyu las byung / /de nyid dngos med rkyen bral ba/ /gcig tu mtshan nyid med par gnas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glu dbyangs rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpe med pa'i tshul rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mi phyed rdo rje mtshon du med/ /ngo bo nyid dag 'phral byung ba'i/ /dri

mas gos pa med pa nyid/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su dag pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /

kun du sbyor ba rlung nyid de/ /de nyid bya ba 'jug byed pa/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos po ru/ /brtag pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zab pa rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag rab tu sgrub pa yi/ /snying po'i don du byung ba ni/ /'phags lam gsang ba 'di nyid de/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' bas

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i chu bo zlog byed pa/ /spyi las khyad par so sor 'byung / /mngon par brtson pas thar pa che/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyob pa tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chod pas/ /'di ni bsam gtan mchog tu gsungs/ /

lus can kun la byin rlob mdzad/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyis srid par lhung ba nges par 'don pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang

du blang dang dor med pa'i/ /byang chub skam sar 'jog mdzad pas/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyal po nyid/ /de nyid byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gang du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen

po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsang ba 'di nye bar lta zhing sems pa dang / rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa dang / thos shing 'dzin par byed pa 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nang du gnas pa'i gsang ba mtshungs pa med pa'i blo can de la kun nas kun du mkhyen cing gzigs

par byed/ chos nyid gcig tu 'jug pas nye bar spyod par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

mnyam pa nyid gcig par ston pa rdo rje'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kun

dngos po med pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / /gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid de/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis yongs dag pas/ /sku ni nam mkha'i khams mtshungs ba/ /gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa'i/ /byang chub sems las 'byung ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don gyi blo dang bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /so sor rtogs pa bral ba yi/ /dmigs med bsgom du med pa yi/ /mthar thug lam las 'das pa po/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan

pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa lha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthong ba spyod pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yang dag tu ni rtog med pa'i/ /dus gsum dus med mtshan ma

grol/ /grub pa rdo rje dbyings gyur pa/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kun nas brjod du med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /sna tshogs dngos las byung ba yi/ /mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i tshul/ /mnyam nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang

dag par sgrub pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du bde ba'i mthar son pa/ /mi 'gyur g.yung drung dpal 'byung ba/ /mkhyen du med cing rnam 'byed bral/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i ye shes kyi nor bu 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /khyad par ye shes rin chen blo/ /tshad med dge ba'i stobs 'byung ba/ /

mi gnas byang chub rgya mtsho'i gnas/ /khyad par ye shes mchog bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog tu zhi ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs

so/ /gang du rtog bral brjod 'das pa/ /'gro ba'i mtshan ma dag pa'i dngos/ /tshad med rtog pa rab zhi ba/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba dmigs med

rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /yul dang dus dang bsam pa dang / /rnam par rig pa las 'das shing / /rnam pa ma lus nub pa'i bdag /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtog med rdo rje'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dang chos nyid med pa yi/ /rnam par rtog dang mi rtog med/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun grol

bas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dbang gi rgyal po baiDU R+Ya/ /

de nyid rin chen bsam 'phel zhes/ /bsam pa'i don kun sgrub byed ma/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dmigs med rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dpe med brjod 'das blo yul bral/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gdod nas snying po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi lhun grub rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rang sems 'od gsal dag pa las/ /'phrul byung rkyen grol chos nyid dang / /rgyun chad med pa'i lam gyis rgyas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bag chags gcod pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa kun du shes bya dang / /nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs/ /mkha' yi sprin tshogs

dengs pa ltar/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i gnas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di

gsungs so/ /kun gyis mthong med lta ba bral/ /rtsa ba'i rten med stong nyid dbyings/ /don dam chos nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad mtha' gzigs pa sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi kun nas bral ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhigs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sku bzhi ye shes lnga ldan pa/ /dag pa'i de bzhin nyid la brten/ /snang la zhen med rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes skye med sbyor ba yis/ /chos kun mngon gyur byang chub kyi/ /rnam pa

mi rtog de bzhin nyid/ /khyab pa nam mkha' ltar sangs rgyas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod spu ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam grol rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos

rnams sems su bsdu ba dang / /sems kyang lus la bsdu ba dang / /lus ni ye shes nyer sbyor ba'i/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon

par 'phrul pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mthong chos 'bras ldan gzhan gyur dang / /de las gzhan pa'i rgyu tshul las/ /skyob pa 'dren pa bla med gnas/ /ye shes tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro sangs rgyas thams cad kyi seng ge rnam par rtse ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rtag tu byang chub sems las ni/ /mi g.yo 'od

gsal lhun gyis grub/ /tshad med ye shes mkha' khyab thugs/ /de nyid tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang 'byung gi gnas mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing gi lhun rnam par phye ba'i ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can lus su dmigs

med kyang / /de dag skye ba yongs grub par/ /rang gi sku ni der byin brlab/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa rdo rje'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sems can mos pa du ma yi/ /tshul gzigs ngag dang sku dag kyang / /phra dang rags dang yangs dang dog /rnam par dbye ba ston par mdzad/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa bsod nams sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par tshad med ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du las dang ye shes la/ /'jug pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin can/ /phyir mi ldog par

gyur pas na/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'jug pa mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi

dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab la gnas pas/ /bde gshegs spyod pa gcig nyid la/ /'jug pa ye shes tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor mya ngan med pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /ting 'dzin gcig la mnyam bzhag pas/ /'jig rten khams ni du ma ru/ /grangs med ting 'dzin la 'jug pa/ /zad mi shes par bstan pa yin/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnam par snang ba med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /mtha' dang dbus med dag pa yi/ /zhing dang

sems can khams rnams dang / /chos rnams mnyam nyid yang dag pas/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba dang bral ba ye shes rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gang du chos rnams 'byed med par/ /mnyam nyid spyod pas kun du yang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni mnyam nyid de/ /phrin las mnyam nyid tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa chos kyi sgron me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ltar chags med pas/ /ma chags thog mtha' med par ni/ /skye 'chi med pa'i

lus ston cing / /ngag dang sems kyang de ltar gsungs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rab tu gnas med chos rnams

ni/ /rang bzhin med pa'i gzhi yin te/ /chos rab shin tu zab pa ste/ /yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med mtshan nyid gcig pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rgyun chad med cing thogs med pa/ /sgrib pa med cing 'pho ba med/ /ldan dang mi ldan med pa nyid/ /'dzin med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

shugs kyis dor ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gzhi med tha dad med pa dang / /dam chos rgya mtsho tshad med pas/ /rnam par spros pa yang med de/ /dag pa

byang chub tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba tshad med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /nyer len med cing nye bar mi len

med/ /rjes 'brang med cing rjes su ldog pa'ang bral/ /thob pa mngon par chags pa bral ba gang / /chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di 'dres pas bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu

gsang ba dbyings rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gnas med rgyun gcod bral ba'i chos/ /phyir mi ldog pas 'gyur med pa/ /sprul zhing grub dang dbang byed med/ /gang du g.yo med tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i dbyangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang rgya yongs su chad pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /shin tu dang zhing dmigs med pa/ /

'dren pa med cing phyi nang bral/ /gol med g.yang sa dag pa yi/ /nam mkha'i dbyings mtshungs bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don dang ldan pa rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi len pa med cing dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgra dbyangs mi zad brjod med pas/ /rdo rje'i tshig la mi gnas pas/ /yi ge med par rab shes pa/ /yan lag tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don gsung ba

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshungs pa med pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rnam dag ye shes gang / /de ni don dam ma yin te/ /spyad dang rgyu dngos bskyed pa'i phyir/ /don dam gnas med tshul bstan pa'o/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa gsal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gang du bsgrub pa med pa'i rgyan rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /bsam mi khyab

pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'dul ba tshad med dag pa las/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhal sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub

kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mi rtog cing / /sku gsum rdo rje'i spyod yul las/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba mi zad pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos dbyings zad med kun rtog bral/ /du mar snang zhing mi 'gyur ba/ /yang dag ye shes spyod yul du/ /dmigs med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

snang bar mdzad pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi zad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sgrib pa bkod pa tshad med pas/ /dbyangs sgra du ma brjod med pas/ /

mi zad thog mtha' rab zhi ba/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sems pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /gsang

ba 'dzin pa ma lus pa'i/ /dbang bskur mngon thob rdo rje can/ /mi phyed mi zad stobs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par

bskul ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don bskul ba/ /tshangs pa'i gnas kyis khyad par du/ /bskul ba tshad med byang chub sems/ /de nyid yang dag bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa/ /ye shes phung po rnam mang nye bar sgrub par mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas bzhugs mdzad pa/ /de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pa char mi 'gro/ /khyu mchog rnams kyis ye shes sa mchog

'di thob nas/ /phyogs bcu kun du skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa/ /ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas/ /rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes phrin las gnas/ /

zhing khams kun du gnas pa rnam par spyod par byed/ /khams rnams bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang / /phra zhing che dang rnam par phye ba yang dag 'jug /stong gsum shin tu phra ba kun la 'jug byed de/ /khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus kun rnam par phye ba dang / /rgyud

drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams/ /rnam par phye ba'i tshad med 'jug byed pa/ /smon lam byin gyis bde gshegs yang dag skul bar mdzad/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dran mngon 'dod pa/ /ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas

kun las 'thob/ /brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs med gang yod pa/ /spyod yul shes pa tshe 'di nyid la thob gyur nas/ /de yi rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur 'thob/ /yul yangs ting 'dzin de dag thob pas g.yo mi mnga'/ /gang tshe de nyid sangs

rgyas mngon par dbang bskur tshe/ /pad+mo rgya chen kun spras brgyan pa 'byung / /de yi 'od zer khrag khrig mtha' yas stong phrag can/ /phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rab zhi byed/ /chos rab don du rgyal sras dbang bskur thob par mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas

mdzad pa rgya mtsho rnam thar las/ /bdud rtsi dri med ye shes mngon dga' 'thob/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod pa 'di yang dag par gsungs pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal rgyas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje

rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag ni drung nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba 'dug par gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla bas 'di skad ces smras so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

ting nge 'dzin dang lta ba mtshungs pa med pa spyod pa zab pa'i snying po 'di gdul bya la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur grang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma dang / chos thams

cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa smin cing grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / /tshad med pa rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir lus

can ye shes ldan pa dag la kun du 'jug par byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis zab pa bla na med pa brjod du med pa'i gnas las rgya mtsho ltar rnam par grol ba ston pa shin tu ngo mtshar te legs so legs so

zhes bya bar brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po spyod pa tshad med pa dang ting nge 'dzin la 'byam klas pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i dgongs pas chos kyi dbyings dang gnyis su med par kun tu rol pa ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rmad du gyur pa ston pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa stong 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi zhing du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing gsang ba chen po'i 'og min gyi gnas su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi spros pa las 'das shing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas

stong mngon par sangs rgyas nas re re zhing la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / bla na med pa'i 'bum phrag dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te gnas pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa re re zhing la yang byang chub sems

dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rgyal po drung na 'khod pa yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po gsang ba bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa yongs su snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems can

gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jug par byed cing byin gyis rlob par byed la/ ye shes yangs pa'i spyan gyis chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas

par mdzad do/ /gsang ba 'di rab tu bstan pa na de'i tshe de'i dus na de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po bcu drug gi sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa du ma thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

chen po zhing bye ba phrag brgyad kyi byang chub sems dpas gnas pas ni ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs pa med pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du ma mngon par thob bo/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i grangs de snyed kyang gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi

ngang las skad cig re res mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsang ba nye bar bsdu ba'i don du gsol ba/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba'i snying po ye shes sku gcig

tu/ /rnam par phyed pa 'od gsal ba yi gnas/ /gsang ba chen po'i gnas 'dir mngon sangs rgyas/ /gang du sems nyid byang chub mchog gyur ba/ /'dren pa chos kyi rgyal po tshul 'di yin/ /zhes smras pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma

lus pa'i thugs yi rangs shing / rab tu dga' bas rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bla na med pa'i yongs su 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba chen po bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor

'khor lo 'di lta ste/ thun mong du gyur pa'i bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / khyad par yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchog tu gsang ba thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang de nyid las byung rgya cher ston pa dang / /zab mo dang ni bla med tshul mchog ste/ /phyi

nang gsang ba de nyid ye shes kyi/ /dkyil 'khor tshad med 'dir ni bstan pa yin/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa stong dag gi/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor spro dang sdud pa dang / /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsang sngags 'bum phrag ste/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes lngar

bsdus pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rnam dbye gsal ba yis/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya ru 'gyur ba ste/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor mngon par phyung ba yin/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbye ba yis/ /rtsa ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum du bsdus/ /

mdo don spyod dang theg pa'i don/ /de nyid bsdus pa gcig pa sdom pa che/ /tha dad pa dang 'byung ba nye bar gyur pa las/ /lus dang yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du/ /gsang ba du ma nye bar sdud pa'i tshul/ /spyi dang bye brag dkyil 'khor 'dir gsungs so/ /bcom ldan

rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor du/ /reg bya rdo rje'i dbus su mngon gnas nas/ /rdo rje mi bskyod shar gyi gnas su dgod/ /rdo rje skyil krung gnyis med sbyor bas bzhugs/ /lhor ni dkon mchog dpal lo/ /nub tu 'od dpag med pa'o/ /byang du don yod

grub pa'o/ /shar lho'i grwar ni lha mo spyan ma'o/ /lho nub tu ni mA ma kI'o/ /nub byang du ni gos dkar mo'o/ /byang shar du ni rdo rje sgrol ma'o/ /de ni nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyi khyams kyi grwa bzhi la me'i phyogs su gzugs rdo rje ma'o/ /bden bral du ni sgra

rdo rje'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su dri rdo rje'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni ro rdo rje'o/ /shar gyi snam bu la byams pa mgon pa mgon po dang sa'i snying po'o/ /lho'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'o/ /byang

gi snam bu la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po gnas pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do/ /lho sgor ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /nub sgor ni pad+ma mthar byed do/ /byang sgor ni bgegs mthar byed do/ /shar lho mtshams kyi grwar ni

mi g.yo ba'o/ /lho nub tu 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /nub byang du ni dbyug sngon can no/ /byang shar mtshams su ni stobs po che ste khro bo'i rgyal po nyid do/ /steng phyogs shar gyi sgo drung du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /'og phyogs nub kyi sgo drung du ni gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam

par dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'od dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /reg bya rdo rje dbus su mngon gnas nas/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod nub tu gnas pa ste/ /bde

chen ye shes tshul mchog legs par bzhugs/ /shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /lhor ni dkon mchog dpal lo/ /nub tu 'od dpag med do/ /byang du don yod grub pa'o/ /shar lho'i grwar ni lha mo spyan ma'o/ /lho nub tu ni mA ma kI'o/ /nub byang du ni gos dkar mo'o/ /

byang shar du ni sgrol ma'o/ /de ni nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyi khyams kyi grwa bzhi la me'i phyogs su gzugs rdo rje ma'o/ /bden bral du ni sgra rdo rje'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su dri rdo rje'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ro rdo rje'o/ /shar gyi snam bu la byams pa mgon

po dang sa'i snying po'o/ /lho'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal lo/ /byang gi snam bu la sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po'o/ /shar sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do/ /lho sgor

ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /nub sgor ni pad+ma mthar byed do/ /byang sgor ni bgegs mthar byed do/ /shar lho mtshams su khro rgyal mi g.yo ba'o/ /lho nub tu ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /nub byang du ni dbyug sngon can no/ /byang shar du ni stobs po che ste/ /de

ltar gyur pa'i khro bo rnams so/ /steng phyogs su shar sgo'i rtsa bar gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /'og phyogs nub sgo'i rtsa bar gnod mdzes rgyal po dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du

gsungs so/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du/ /reg bya rdo rje dbus su mngon gnas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lho yi le rtser bzhugs/ /de nyid dkon mchog legs par gyur pa'o/ /shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /nub tu ni 'od dpag med do/ /

byang du ni gdon mi za ba nyid do/ /shar lhor lha mo spyan ma/ /lho nub tu mA ma kI/ /nub byang du gos dkar mo/ /byang shar du rdo rje sgrol ma'o/ /de nas nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyi khyams kyi grwa bzhi la me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje na/ bden bral

du sgra rdo rje/ rlung du dri rdo rje/ dbang ldan du ro rdo rje'o/ /shar gyi snam bu la byams pa rdo rje dang sa'i snying po/ /lho'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dbyangs dpal/ /byang gi snam bu la sgrib pa rnam par sel ba

dang kun du bzang po'o/ /shar sgor gshin rje gshed do/ /lho sgor rnam par rgyal pa'o/ /nub sgor rta mgrin no/ /byang sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o/ /shar lhor mi g.yo ba/ /lho nub tu 'dod pa'i rgyal po/ /nub byang du dbyug sngon can/ /byang shar du stobs po che'o/ /

shar stod du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /nub smad du gnod mdzes rgyal po ste/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu dang ldan bcas par 'byung ba'o/ /de ltar rin po che'i rigs yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /bcom ldan gdon mi za

ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /reg bya rdo rje 'dzin la byang gi phyogs su dgod/ /bde ba'i stan la legs par bzhugs pa'o/ /shar du rnam par snang mdzad do/ /lhor ni rin chen 'byung ba'o/ /nub du 'od dpag med do/ /byang du don yod grub

ba/ /shar lhor spyan ma'o/ /lho nub tu mA ma kI'o/ /nub byang du gos dkar mo'o/ /byang shar mtshams kyi grwa ra ni lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /de ni nang gi pho brang la gnas pa'o/ /de'i phyi khyams kyi grwa bzhi la me'i phyogs su gzugs rdo rje ma'o/ /bden bral du sgra rdo rje'o/ /rlung gi mtshams

su dri rdo rje'i/ /'byung po'i mtshams su ro rdo rje'o/ /shar gyi snam bu la byams pa dang sa'i snying po'o/ /lho'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dbyangs dpal lo/ /byang gi snam bu la sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /

kun du bzang po'o/ /shar sgor ni gshin rje gshed/ /lho sgor sher rab mthar byed/ /nub sgor pad+ma mthar byed/ /byang sgor bgegs mthar byed pa nyid do/ /shar lhor ni mi g.yo ba'o/ /lho nub tu ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /nub byang du ni dbyug sngon can no/ /byang shar du ni

stobs po che'o/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /'og tu khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po gnas pa ste/ khro bo bcu mngon par 'byung ba'o/ /de ltar las kyi rigs phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /gang du lha mo spyan ma gtsor

gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor der ni rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso/ /reg bya rdo rje shar lho'i grwar bzhugs pas/ /dkyil 'khor nges par sprul pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje mA ma kI las gtsor gyur pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de dang gnyis med de/ /reg bya rdo rje lho nub grwar gnas te/ /lhag ma

gzhan rnams sngon dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rdo rje gos dkar mo dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis su med par dbus su bzhugs pa ste/ /reg bya rdo rje nub byang grwar bzhugs pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo nges par sprul pa'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis med pa de bas

bzhugs pa de nyid de/ /reg bya rdo rje byang shar grwar bzhugs pa/ /tshar med lha mo bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis med bzhugs pa dbus kyi gtso bo ste/ /reg bya rdo rje me yi phyogs su'o/ /sgra yi rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis

med bzhugs pa dbus kyi gtso bor gyur/ /reg bya rdo rje srin po'i phyogs su'o/ /dri yi rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis med dbus kyi gtso bor gyur pa ni/ /reg bya rdo rje rig 'dzin phyogs su'o/ /ro yi rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbus gnas mnyam par sbyor ba'i

tshul nyid do/ /reg bya rdo rje dbang ldan phyogs gnas pa'o/ /'di dag mchod byed lha mo bzhi dag gi/ /dkyil 'khor so sor nges par bstan pa yin/ /'di dag rigs ni so sor bstan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor tha dad rim pa bstan pa'o/ /byams pa'i mgon po gtso bor

gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa shar phyogs dang po'i sar/ /'pho ba'i rim pa bstan pa bla na med/ /reg bya rdo rje dbus su 'khril par bzhugs/ /sa yi snying po gtsor gyur dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa der gnas 'pho ba ste/ /reg bya rdo rje'ang

dbus su gnas pa'o/ /phyag na rdo rje reg bya rdo rje dang / /gnyis med dbus gnas tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dang po'i gnas der 'pho/ /rdo rje dbang phyug reg bya rdo rje dang / /gnyis med dbus gyur gtso bo 'pho ba'i tshul/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nub tu 'pho

ba mdzad/ /'jam dbyangs rdo rje reg bya rdo rje dang / /gnyis med bde chen nub tu gtso bo bzhugs/ /sgrib pa rnam sel reg bya rdo rje dang / /gnyis med rdo rje 'dzin pa byang du gnas/ /kun du bzang po reg bya rdo rje dang / /gnyis med dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /byang

phyogs lha snam dag tu bzhugs pa mdzad/ /'di dag kun du rim pa shes par bya/ /gshin rje gshed po dang ni reg rdo rje/ /gnyis med bzhugs pa gtso bo 'pho bar bstan/ /shes rab mthar byed dang ni reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa lhor gnas pa'o/ /

rta mgrin dbang dang reg bya rdo rje ma/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa nub sgor bzhugs/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang ni reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa byang sgor gnas/ /mi g.yo mgon po dang ni reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa shar lhor

gnas/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po dang ni reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa nub byang gnas/ /dbyug sngon can dang lha mo reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa nub byang du'o/ /rdo rje stobs po che dang reg rdo rje/ /dbus bzhugs rdo rje 'dzin pa byang shar

gnas/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po dang ni reg rdo rje/ /dbus gnas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'og phyogs su/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba reg rdo rje/ /dbus 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa steng du dgod/ /'di dag thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rnal

'byor mkhas pas dgod/ /rdo rje'i gdung dang rdo rje'i ka ba ni/ /rin chen bum pa pad+mar mdzes byas pa/ /du mas bteg pa'i tshad med phreng ba can/ /re re la yang sgo bzhi rta babs ldan/ /dkyil 'khor chen po tshad med sgo bzhi las/ /lhor ni gsang ba'i bdag

po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dbus su sna tshogs bde ma dag dang ni/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba bstan pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dril bu dang / /nor bu 'khor lo pad+ma ral gri ste/ /shin tu mtshungs pa rdo rje gdengs po ste/ /rdo rje be con rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje

drag po bzhi yang gtso bor mtshungs/ /sgeg mo phreng ma glu ma gar ma dang / /me tog bdug spos mar me dri chab ma/ /khyams su rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / /rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje spyan dang ni/ /rdo rje ba dan rdo rje 'ching mdzad dang / /rdo rje nag po rdo rje las

bcas pa/ /phyogs gnas shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /thun mong khro rgyal bcus ni yongs bskor ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor byang du ste/ /lha mo zhi ba mo dang gnyis med pa/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ser zhing thal mo sbyar/ /

'khor lo sdigs mdzub ral gri nor bu ste/ /shar du brgya byin khyung mgo lho ru yang / /dbang phyug shang shang gdong dang nub dang byang / /khyab 'jug seng mgo can dang glang po'i mgo/ /phyogs kyi bdag po dag dang mtshams bzhir yang / /zhi ba mo dang dbang mo

drag mo dang / /tsa muN+Dir bcas rgan byed ma dang ni/ /gtum pa ma dang phreng ldan me tog ma/ /de dag dang bcas lha srin sde brgyad dang / /phyogs skyong bcu yis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /khyams kyi phyi rol khor yug mtshams bzhi la/ /rgyal chen bzhi bcas rol

pas yongs bskor ba/ /bkra shis dang ldan pad+ma'i shing bcas pas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i thun mong gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos po thams cad kyis ni bltas

nas kyang / /snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /drangs nas bde bar gshegs rnams bsgom par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i/ /ting 'dzin las byung bum pa'i bdes gang ba'i/ /'khor lo bsams nas de

nas gshin rje yi/ /mthar byed tshogs bcus bar chad bsrung bar bya/ /rang gi snying po mngon bzlas mchod yon ni/ /tsan+dan bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes dbul/ /rang la ji lta bzhin du kun dbang bskur/ /cho ga 'di yis thams cad mchod par bya/ /

pad+ma'i nang gi sa bon 'od rnams kyis/ /gzugs la sogs pa thams cad drangs nas ni/ /yang dag byang chub yid kyi ngo bo ni/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom par bya/ /shes rab ba spu re re las spros pa'i/ /'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs/ /ma
