lus nam mkha'i khams ni kun du khyab/ /de las blo dang ldan pas rab tu spro/ /'od kyi sgo las nges par 'byung ba yi/ /yan lag dri med rgyan kun gyis legs brgyan/ /me long pi wang gling bu rdza rnga dang / /bzhad ma glu ma phreng ma gar ma dang / /rdza rnga che dang me

tog bdug spos dang / /mar me dri chab zhal zas snod 'dzin dang / /gos dang chos 'byung la sogs 'dzin pa yi/ /bcu drug rig ma lha mo rnam sgeg cing / /rol pa'i lag pas kun du sgyur ba ni/ /'od kyi snang bas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra

bas khyab pa dang / /dngos rnams sgyu ma lta bur so sor ni/ /yang dag rig cing 'jig rten lta mkhas pa/ /rtog pa ma lus kun las nges grol zhing / /mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /gzugs la sogs pa lha mo rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams

cad kyis/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing / /tha dad rnam par rtog las nges grol ba'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ sgra yi yul rnams ma lus pa rnams ni/ /brag ca'i sgra dang mtshungs par nges brtags la/ /rang yid lhag

pa'i lha ru gnas pa la/ /chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par bsam/ /'bar ba'i oM gyis byin brlabs rlung dang me/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas rab 'bar bdud rtsi lnga/ /de nas yi ge gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i nang du chu dpar bya//

ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni/ /hU~M dgod rdo rje'i lce ni bzang po dang / /snying ga'i zla 'bi dbus su ma lus pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor lo des ni tshim par bya/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / /de bzhin dran dang bsam gtan rnam dag pa/ /sgo

bzang srung bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /shes rab rnam par ma lus yul du snang / /mtshan ma med pa'i dga' ba rnam dag pa/ /ma lus lha mo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /dbang po'i sgo dag bdag dang rnam rtog dang / /'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam par dag pa yang / /me long

la sogs dri med ngo bor bsam/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rang bzhin te/ /de nyid rnam dag rnal 'byor 'khor lo'i gtso/ /de yi sems ni rnam par dag pa yin/ /gzugs la sogs pa mi shes rnam bral bas/ /dri med phung po la sogs ngo bor grub/ /

ser sna la sogs dag par gyur pas ni/ /pha rol phyin pa dkar po'i chos rang bzhin/ /bdag gzhan rnam rtog med par snang ba ni/ /'ching ba med bar gyur kyang bzhin/ /zab pa dang ni rgya che ba yis ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can sems

yin/ /dam pa'i don du dbye ba med pa dang / /rnam 'byed med cing ci yang mi snang ste/ /gang du gzhan du 'dzin pa'i rnam ldog pa/ /de bzhin dbye ba la sogs rtog bral yin de ltar brtags na rang snying dri med la/ /zla ba la gnas mtshan ma bsgom par bya/ /

gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni/ /rang yid kyis ni 'od zer dang bcas bsam/ /rang sems 'od zer dri med las 'das pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchog gyur pa/ /slar yang de nyid du ni nges bzhugs shing / /ye shes bdud rtsi 'bar bas

bsam par bya/ /nang gi lus dag de bzhin thams cad kyang / /de yis kun du mthar ni snang byas nas/ /ba spu re re'i khong nas byung ba yi/ /'od zer tshogs kyis kun du dag par bya/ /yang na mtshan ma phra mo bsam pa ni/ /'od ldan sna rtser

gnas pa thub pa yi/ /'khor lo nang du chud byas snying rje yi/ /nang gi shes rab dam pa nyin mtshan bsam/ /mtshan ma brtan po mthong na spro ba yi/ /'od zer de yi sprul pa'i thub dbang dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi phyag mtshan bsnams/ /blo dang ldan pas

yang dang yang du spro/ /yang na bzlas pa rtse gcig sems nyid ni/ /dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems dbang po/ /rang gi sngags ni sna tshogs 'od ldan 'bar/ /de nyid blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsang ba nye bar bstan pa las rgyal po mchog mngon par

'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par rol pa 'byung ba'i rgyal po 'di bstan to/ //skyes bu la la bsod nams ldan gyur pas/ /gter gyi

'byung gnas chen po rnyed gyur pas/ /brgyan pa'i gnas kyi rgyan du rab sbyangs nas/ /de dag lus dang mthun pa'i rgyan du byed/ /de nyid mkhas pas chos kyi rgyan thob nas/ /sems dang blo yangs rgya mtshor gyur byas shing / /ji ltar sngon thos chos rnams rtogs par

byed/ /mi mthun tshul du mos pa tshol mi byed/ /de ltar rgyan gyur shin tu mthun par spyod/ /rnam par mi bsgom chos ni gang yang med/ /de dag chos rnams ji bzhin rgyan byed cing / /chos kun khong du chud pas mdzes par byed/ /mkhas pa rnam dag rin chen rgyun gyur

pas/ /rgyud 'di'i gnas la legs par brgyan mthong bas/ /dga' ba'i sems yid dang bas spro ba bskyed/ /chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug /chos rnams mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par

bsgom la rnam par brtson/ /rgyal ba gcig pur gnas thob mi byed cing / /chos rnams mi mnyam med par rab tu spyad/ /de ni bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan pas/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/ /ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa yis/ /

de yi bsam pa byang chub mchog la brten/ /mnyam bzhag sems dang ldan pas de brtson te/ /bsam gtan ye shes yid kyis rab tu spyod/ /bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang / /gsang ba 'di dang bral bar mi byed cing / /de yi brtson 'grus 'jig par mi

'gyur ro/ /gsang chen theg pa 'di ni gang rnyed pa/ /mi de phyir mi ldog la gnas pa yin/ /srid pa lta ba ma lus gcod byed pa/ /skyes bu dpa' bo nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di dag gsang ba yang dag don 'jug ste/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar thug nges

rtogs yin/ /chos nyid zhi ba'i mthar thug thob gyur pas/ /de la mi dga'i yid byed gang yang med/ /dpe med ye shes ji skad gsungs pa ltar/ /de yis chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du byed/ /mi mnyam tshul du rtogs par mi byed cing / /ye shes mnyam nyid

yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub/ /dam tshig gnas la nges par brtson pa yis/ /nyams pa med par sdom las rgyud bsdams te/ /gsang ba'i ting 'dzin mtha' yas sgo thob pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dag tu/ /gsungs pa thub pa'i dgongs pa

ma nor bar/ /don gsal khong du chud pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /tshe 'dir bla med mngon par byang chub 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul yongs su 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /spyod lam

kun du mnyam pa'i yid kyis ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba shin tu ma bsdams pa/ /gsang sngags rgyal po gsal bar brjod par bya/ /sku la sogs pa bzhin du'ang bsam pa ni/ /cig car spro ba dag ni legs par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i sku sogs

pa'i/ /'od kyi sgo yi snang bas yang dag gang / /de nas snga ma bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis kun du bkod pa spro/ /yongs su sbas pa'i rig ma mchog rnams ni/ /bde chen bcas pas gzhan gyi dbang mthong nas/ /rnam par

sgeg pa'i thub dbang tshogs rnams ni/ /mthar ni rang gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /rang gi snying po de nyid nges rtogs pas/ /sems kyi spyod pa skyo bas zhugs gyur na/ /rig ma'i tshogs kyis ye shes glu blangs pas/ /rab tu bskul bas yang dag mchod par

bya/ /sems ni bzang po'i chu rgyun srog dang ni/ /rtsol ba 'od kyi lcags kyus drangs nas ni/ /ji bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /bdud rtsi des dbab ye shes nyams mi bya/ /de ltar lan re ngal so byas nas ni/ /sngar bshad cho gas bstod pa de nyid

shes/ /gsang sngags dam pa nyin mtshan bzla ba ni/ /sngags las kun du chags pa med par bya/ /mchod cing bstod dang gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /sngags pas rab tu 'bad de rnam bya zhing / /oM la sogs la 'khor lo bsdus nas ni/ /sku la sogs pa

brtag pa dag tu bya/ /de ltar de nyid mthong zhing rnam grol bas/ /sems can khams rnams kun du dmigs nas ni/ /snying rjes 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /smon lam kun du bzang po nye bar gnas/ /ldang zhing dag pa'i sems pa rang lha yi/ /rnam pa'i

nga rgyal yid la byas nas ni/ /kun du snang bar bya ba'i yul rnams ni/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin du yongs su bsam/ /'di ni gsang ba'i spyod yul bya ba ste/ /las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rol pa mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o// //brtag pa drug la gsang ba ye shes

rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /nam mkha' ye shes rdo rjer 'byung / /byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtso/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'dir rab gsungs/ /oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marta marta badzra d+h+r-ika phaT a hU~M

swA hA/ oM shA shwa ta sa nA ma sha sha e h+ye hi dzi na dzika A hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra d+harma sa ma ya s+t+waM hu lu hu lu A ro lika hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra sU r+ya Da ta d+harma na sa ma ya staM/ a ha~M rat+na d+h+ri ka hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra phra ba phru ba hriHhriH pra dz+nyAd+h+r-ika hU~M phaT swA hA/

oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la ta Sh+Thi sid d+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shang ka re shAn+ting ka re g+ha Ta g+ha n+Da/ g+hu T+Ti ni g+hu T+Ti ni/ g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya/ g+ha T+Ti ni swA hA/ oM ka Te ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/ oM ma hA sau khya ta re tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM AH badzra sba r+she d+harma d+hA

tu a nud pa da ni gA thaM bid+ya d+ha ra hU~M swA hA/ oM AH badzra rU pa pU dza ma hA sa~M g+ha ra bing+ya d+ha ra hU~M swA hA/ oM AH badzra shab+da ma hA pU dza saM b+ha ra dz+nyA na bing+yA d+ha ra hU~M swA hA/ oM AH badzra gan+d+he ma hA dz+nyA na saM gar bi d+yA d+ha ra hU~M d+ha ra hU~M swA hA/ oM AH badzra ra se ma hAH dz+nyA na saM ka ra bi d+h+ya d+hA ra

hU~M swA hA/ oM AH badzra mai tri nA tha dza ya bi dza ya shud+d+ha bi shu d+d+he sid+d+ha sa twa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra ma hA k+Shi ti ga r+g+hA ya dza ya bi dza ya shu d+he pi shu d+d+he sid+d+ha sa twa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra ma hA badzra pA Ni dza ya bi dza ma shud+d+he sid+d+he sa tA b+ha ba hU~M phaT

swA hA/ oM AH badzra A kA sha r+b+hA yadza ya bi dza ya shad+d+he ba shud+d+he sid+d+ha ma hA sid+d+ha sa twa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra AR+YA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya dza ya bi dza ye shud+d+ha bi shud+d+he sid+d+ha ma hA sid+d+ha satwa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra many+dza shrI g+ho Sha dza ya bi dza ya shud+d+he sid+d+ha ma hU~M

sid+d+ha sa twa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH sadzra sarba ni bar Na bi Sh+kaM bi ne dza ya bi dza ya shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sid+d+ha ma hA sid+d+ha satwa b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AH badzra sa man+ta b+ha drA ya dza ya bi dza ya shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sid+d+ha ma hA sa twa b+ha ba hU~M paT swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA NAM/ oM

kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba du Sh+TA na sa twa da ma ka /a si mu Sha la par shu pA sha ha sta/ tsa tu r+b+hu dza tsa turmu kha Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha sarba du Sh+DA na/ a pa ha ri Ne ma hA big+h+na g+hA ta ka bi kr-i te A na na sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+TA T+Ta/ ha sa nA di ne/ byA g+h+ra

tsa ra ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karmA ni tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ sarba mA na trA na b+hi n+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ pa ra mi drA na/ A kar+sha ya A kar+Sha ya sarba b+hu tA na/ ma tha ma tha/ ni rma tha ni rma tha/ sarba du Sh+TA na/ pra bi sha ya pra bi sha ya/ maN+Dal ma d+h+yai bai shwa s+hA hA/ dzi bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku

ru/ mAM kA R+YaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ /mA bi lam+ba mA bi la mA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ /hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarbA na nA sha ya/ r-i pU na/ ka ra ka ra/ /bi g+hA na sarba A shA/ /pa ri pU ra ka /he he b+ha ga bA na/ ki ny+tsi ra' ya si/ nam sarba ar+tha

sA d+ha ya mAn+da kr-id hU~M phaT swA hA/ /na maH sa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+t+wa badzrA NAM/ oM AH badzra pra dz+nyA n+ta kr-id/ ka ro ma hA ka ro/ tsaNA la ni/ Dad ta ka ra/ badzra kha D+ga ni kr-i n+tan/ badzra sa ra g+ha na/ ts+tsha bi hU~M dza ya bi dza ya dzi na ri ni ta/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT swA hA/ na maHsa m+t+na kA ya

bAk+tsi t+ta badzrA NAM/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha badzra pad+man+ta kr-id/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka /dz+wa li ta/ bi s+phu lid+ga/ a T+Ta tA sa/ nA di ne/ ke sha ri sa Ta to pa Ta da ka ra/ badzra khu ra ni ra g+hA ta na/ tsa li ta/ ba su d+hA ha lin shwa sa ma ru tod k+shi pa te d+hA ra NI d+hA ra b+hi Sha na

aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ a pA ri mi ta/ bal parAkra ma Ar+ya ga na b+hAM ta/ b+hU ta ga na a d+h+yu Shi ta/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ ha la grI ba/ khA pa bA da/ pa ra man trA na/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ sid+d+hi ma mi/ I da sha/ A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsAn/ sarba gra he Shu a/ pra ti ha to d+hA bA/ badzra daMSh+TA

kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i dan du Sh+Ta/ gra ha na du Sh+Ta sarbaM bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ /ma tha ma tha/ ma rda ma rda/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bu d+hA d+harma saM g+ha/ bud+d+ha dz+nyA na tAM ka rma ku ru ku ru/ shI g+h+raM ha ya grI bA ya phaT/ badzrA ya phaT/ badzra gA Ta ya/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra di Sh+TA

ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ par man+t+ra binA sha nA ya phaT/ sarba trai lo kya b+ha yi ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badzra ku la san trA sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ namaHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzra NAM/ oM na mo

badzra kro d+hA ya/ big+ha nAM ta kr-id/ ma hA daM shro da ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu Sha la par shu pA ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ta ku N+Ta lI/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza ya gardza ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi lhA bi

nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzi bi tA na ta ka ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ na maH sa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA nAM/ oM AR+Ya a tsa la kA na tsaN+Da/ kro d+ha ka badzra/ Na Ta Na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A ba de sha ya/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ma hA

ma t+ta ba la ka d+hu na d+hu na/ ti ni ti ni/ kha da kha da/ big+ha nAM ma ra ma ra/ du Sh+ThaM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarbAn ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi sha badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tri ba lI ta/ raM ga nar ta ka /oM oM oM/ hAM hAM hAM/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M

as man+ti ka /trA Ta ma hA ba la shA ta ya/ pa ra man trA na/ aM aM hAM hAM/ mAM shud d+h+yaM tu lo ka /tu badzrAM na mo stu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaH/ dz+wA la ya trA Ta/ a sa ha na na ma swA hA/ na maH sa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA N+DaM/ oM Tak+ki rA dza kro d+ha ka badzra/ ma hA ba laM par kra ma/ b+ha ya ka ra/

dza ya bi dza ya/ ku li ra she She badzra yo ni ra/ tsin+d+ha tsin+d+h+ma/ kar kha khar ka /sarba du Sh+TA na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ namaHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA NAM/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ nI la

daN+Da badzra/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma b+ha ga bA na bA yu Te ge na/ b+hu tA na shI g+h+rAM/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bA ta ya bA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba karmA Ni

tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hA k+Sha ya b+hA k+Sha ya/ as+thi mi daM a s+ya/ ru d+hi ra ma dz+dza me da ba shA ma dz+na/ ru d+hi ra pri ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ sarba big+hA ni/ sarba bid+yA ni/ sarba bid+yA ni/ sarba man+dA Ni/ sarba karmA Ni/ kri tri ma Ni/ Shi dA ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ /b+ha ny+dza b+ha\u0f85/ marda

marda/ i daM me kA r+ya sA d+ha ya/ hU~M ni lA ya ni lA ya/ nI la badzra daN+Da ya/ tu ru tu ru/ bih+g+ran binA ya ka /nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dI b+ha tsaN+DA ya ka /nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dI b+ta tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha tU NA~M hr-i da yA ni pI Da ya/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ pa ra bi d+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe da ka hU~M bi d+yA nA ma shi Sh+Ta ka sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/

badzra d+ta ra pa tsa naM tsa/ mar mA ni ni krin+ta/ hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M kr-i tA D+tA ya/ de pa r-i Shi bi drA ba kA ya/ ha na badzra da N+De na swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA NAM/ oM shrI badzra kro d+hA ya badzra/ pa la ma hA phel laM ba

la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ dza ya prA pa te/ oM dz+yo ti n+ni rad/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ nA ga ASh+Ta kA na/ sab+ta pA ta la ga taM b+hu dzaM/ oM ma hA ba lA ya/ nA ga ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ b+ha ri shA

pa tA ya swA hA/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ A nA ya ho b+ha ga bA na bi d+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM AH u Sh+NI Sha badzra tsakra warti sarba lo kI shwa ra/ lo ko ta ta ra/ yan+t+ra man+ta tan+t+ra/

tsu r+Na pra yo gA di/ ma ma kr-i te ye na ke na tsit+tA ni/ kr-it+ta ni/ sarbA ni b+hi n+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kaM b+ha ya kaM b+ha ya/ bid+ha nas ya bi d+hA nas ya/ sha ta sa ha sra bi Sha bi tsU rna/ u Sh+NI Sha bi dza ya/ tsakra wa rti/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma mu kaM sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ gdug ba can thams cad mA ra ya rbad phaT swA hA/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ sa tra a pra ti ha tA wa pa ti d+ha rma te/ ba li nAM/ oM a sa ma sa ma saman+ta to nan+ta tA/ wa pa ti shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sma ra

sma ra Ni/ bi ga ta/ rA ga bud+d+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba lA/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na/ ma hA bar lak+Sha Ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na/ sA ga re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /brtan g.yo khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs rnams brgya yi bdag

nyid 'gyur/ /de las ye shes lnga bdag nyid/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /sna tshogs rgyal ba lha yi sku/ /phyag rgya bsdus pa nyid du gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /snying po gsang chen gcig tu bsdus/ /chos lnga dag gi phung po can/ /bag chags

bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa/ /de dag rnam par spyod byed pa/ /chos kyi sgo las gyur pa yi/ /khri phrag brgyad dang stong phrag bzhi/ /yi ge dam pa ston pa nyid/ /ting 'dzin yan lag lnga ldan pa'i/ /mnyam nyid dag pa'i tshogs su brjod/ /ji ltar mkha' la nyi

shar yang / /dmus long gis ni mthong ba med/ /de bzhin lam gyi rtags rnams kyang / /blo gros ldan pa de dag las/ /kun gyis mthong ba'i yul ma yin/ /rab rib med na de mthong 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam rtags gang / /de nyid dag pa'i spyod yul te/ /

rang gzhan gnyis kas ma mthong yang / /de ni med par mi 'gyur te/ /zhing khams dag pa rnams su 'char/ /rdzu 'phrul sbas pa'i tshul du gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam sbyor rnam rgyal thugs rje stong pa ro mnyam srid dang zhi ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal rab

tu mi gnas bde ba che/ /mkha' dang mtshungs pas 'gro 'ong rnam bral dus gsum las 'das dngos dang dngos med phyogs cha mtha' dang dbus las rnam grol dag cing dri med rnam par dben/ /gsang ba chen po mi zad dpal ldan 'dus 'dir rtogs dka' zab cing rgya che de bzhin

gshegs kun mtha' yas pas ni yang dag don/ /rgyal ba thams cad bla med gnas 'dir byang chub dam pa bdag dang gzhan don sku bzhi rab rdzogs ye shes mngon gyur gter mdzod gsang chen dga' ba'i snying po'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo du ma rab tu 'byed cing spro dang

bsdu ba'i rgyud kun ma lus 'dus pa'i bdag /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun la rnam par g.yogs te bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen bdag nyid dngos/ /chos rnams dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs las yang dag gsal ba'i rim pa kun ldan mchog spyod yul/ /byin

brlabs dngos grub rgya mtsho'i chu las skal ldan 'thungs te rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshe 'dir skad cig dag gis thob/ /slob dpon las ni drin thob bla med brtan pa'i blo ldan dngos po kun/ /gsal dag shin tu phra ba mchog zhi'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /

gnyis med rtog bral dpe med ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor pas mnyam bzhag /bsod nams min grol rang byung dpal ldan gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur/ /sems ni rab dang phan pa'i sems kyis rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi sdom pa mi zad de bzhin bslab par rab bsten

gyis/ /de ring tshegs chung bde bas shin tu myur du 'gro ba'i sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam zhing mtshungs la dpe med rtag pa chen po nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta yo ga tsit+ta ut+pa ta yA mi su ra te sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa ni zla ba la rdo rje rtse

lnga pa lta zhing rdo rje bzhag ste/ tiSh+Tha badzra ya thA su khaM zhes pas 'khor lo bskur bar bya'o/ /deng khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis/ khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil

'khor 'dir ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi byed cig /dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yin no/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ sA swa to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da ya m+ne/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoH a khaM bI ra hU~M/ pra ti ku su ma/ pri tI ts+tsha/ any+dza li nA

tha hoHzhes pas me tog dor bar bya'o/ /oM shrI sarba ta thA ga ta ya ma hA su kha d+h+r-ika a b+hi She ka na tA/ badzra satwa a d+hi dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsha/ a d+hi pa d+hi twe no dr-i D+ho b+ha ba sa ma ye hU~M/ oM badzro d+da ka ya b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ su ra te s+t+wa ma haM/ oM shrI badzra d+hA tu shA na ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha

a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa A oM badzra d+harma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa khaM/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+TA na hU~M hU~M phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ /sarba pA paM hU~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra d+ha ro A dz+hA pa ya ti sarba bi ltaM k+Sha ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

oM AH badzra mud ga ra badzra A ko TA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma naM nir+yA ta na pU dza sgA ra Na ka rma badzri Ni hU~M AH /oM AH badzra puN+De hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma naM ni R+YA ta na pU dza s+phA ra Na ka rma badzrI Ni dz+dzaH/ oM AH badzra d+hU pe hU~M/ /oM namaHsarba ta thA

ga ta A t+pa naM ni r+yA ta na a nu rA ga bU dza sgA ra Na ka rma bA na hU~M hoH /oM AH badzra dI ba hU~M/ oM na maH sarba tA thA ga ta A t+ma ni ni R+YA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+phA ra Na karma ru dri AH /oM AHbadzra gan+d+he hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka ta na b+h+yo badzra ma Ni aM/ oM AH

badzra nai bi d+ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta sU R+Ya b+h+yo badzra te dzo dz+wa la hi/ oM AH badzra baM she hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri bU ra tsin t+ya ma Ni b+h+rA dzA gra b+h+yo hi maM/ oM AHbadzra mU rany+dze hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA prI ti pra mA R+Ya ka re b+h+yo badzra ha s+yai ha/ oM AH badzra mu ku

Te hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga tA d+ha rma ta sa mA d+hi bi sU no mi ma hA d+ha rmA sA a kr-i ti/ oM AHbadzra lA s+yai hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA ni ra ha re sU no mi ma hA g+ho Sha b+hu ge d+hAM/ oM AH badzra mA lai hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta tsa kra a kA b+ha ra ba d+ha ti sarba pu na na

ta na yai tU no mi sarba maN+Da le hU~M/ oM AH badzra gI ti hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta sa na ta b+ha sha shud+d+ha saM gI ti g+ha yaM stu no ni badzre badzre baM/ oM AH badzra nr-i t+ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga te d+hU ba me g+ha spA ra Na pU dza karma karma AH oM AHbadzra A dar+she hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta p+caSh+pa dra sa ra snA

pa Na pU da karma ki ri ki ri mAM/ oM AH badzra ra se hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha dz+wa la spA ra Na pU dzi karma b+ha ra b+ha ra mAM/ oM AH badzra spA r+she hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta g+ha N+Da pas mu drA sbA ra Na pU dza ka rme ku ru ku ru mAM/ oM AH badzra d+ha rma hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH /oM

sa ma ya pU dza sarba karma ni rma ta s+t+waM/ a na ya swA/ a ho su khaM/ sA d+hu sA d+hu/ su baM ha ta twAM/ rU po t+ya h+ye ar+tha pra ba ti/ ha hA hU~M ha/ sarba ka ri duHkha tshe d+ha/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi pra ti sha sta/ su ba shit+tA/ sha trUM b+ha k+Sha/ sarba sid+d+hi ma ma hA ra ti/ su po sho b+ha shro sU khya

sarba pU dza bra ha da ni pha lag mi su ta dza gri /su gan+d+ha gi /a ya he dza/ a ya hI hU~M hU~M ho/ s+pho Ta baM g+haN+Da a a/ a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+ha r+m+mA/ pa ra~M pa ra a nu pra bi sh+ta sarba d+ha rmA A d+yA na ta a nu pra ti Sh+Sha sarba d+ha rmA/ oM su sU pra tiSh+Sha ta badzra swA hA/ oM sarba pU ra pU ra/ sU ra

sbu ra A brta ya hoH/ na maH sa man+ta b+ha dra bu d+d+hA nAM/ a bi sh+m+ya ye sbA ra Na nyi maM ga ga na khaM/ d+ha rma d+hA tu A kA sha sa ma n+ta/ sa rba ta thA ga ta thA a pa ri sho d+ha ni maN+Da li mA ma pra ni te/ su bya d+hi dz+nyA na ba len/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba len+ta/ ban+d+ha sa s+than na ba li na tsa swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo du ma'i tshogs/ /khro rgyal du mar bcas pa la/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa yi/ /gsang ba tshad med rgya mtsho yi/ /mchod pa ma lus tshogs kyis ni/ /kun du bzang po'i tshul bstan pa/ /nam mkha'i khams

ni mi zad pa'i/ /kun nas kun du sprin gyur pas/ /rnam dag zhing khams khengs gyur pas/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod cing sems can don/ /'khor ba stongs par ma gyur tshe/ /bla med mchod pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /de nyid ting 'dzin bstan pa

yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las gsag sngags dang mchod ba/ /bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o// //de nas

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par ston pa gsang ba tshad med pa mngon par 'byung ba 'di rab tu gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor du ma'i bdag nyid can/ /

byang chub mchog tu gnas pa yi/ /ye shes dri med dra ba gsungs/ /'gro kun 'khor ba'i mun pa yi/ /nyon mongs rtog pa gzhom pa dang / /tshe 'dir mchog don thob bya'i phyir/ /dgyes pa chen po 'dir gzhug bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /

gsang ba'i don la gsol ba gang / /yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thar pa'i grong khyer bstan du gsol/ /de skad lan gsum brjod pa yi/ /gzhan don tshul 'di bstan pa ste/ /bsnyen pa nye bar sgrub pa dang / /sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po ste/ /rnal

'byor bzhir ni brjod pa yin/ /dang po'i mtshan nyid gsang ba dang / /nyer spyad cho ga tshul bzhin te/ /byang chub sems las rab byung ba/ /gsang ba tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /gsang ba cho ga nges bstan bya/ /sa btsal ba dang sa brtag pa/ /sa bslang sa gzung

sa gnas pa/ /sbyang dang dag byed rim pas bya/ /ri bo'i ngogs dang dben gnas dang / /tshal dang skye bo med gnas pa/ /dur khrod chu ngogs gling dag dang / /byin rlabs ldan sogs gnas su shis/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang / /rim pas dus kyi dbye ba yis/ /

nyams dga' ba yi sa phyogs su/ /ye shes ldan pas nye bar 'grub/ /snum zhing mnyam la tshwa sgo med/ /skyon med phyogs na yid 'ong yin/ /ring du brkos sa slar khengs shing / /lhag par 'phel na shis par grags/ /phyed gyur mnyam dang bri dang mtho/ /rim shes

lto 'phye chen po yi/ /mdun phyogs lto bar kha bltas brko/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha klu dang / /gang yang rung ba sa lha mo/ /mchod bstod gtor ma sngon 'gro bas/ /nges par gnang ba byin par bsam/ /khro bo chen po du ma dang / /yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/ /

bsrung zhing bdag la mchog stsol bar/ /bsam pa ye shes rnal 'byor yin/ /gshed rjes sa yi lha mo dag /bdag la gnang ba byin nas ni/ /bar snang bzhugs pa de nyid kyang / /shin tu dgyes pas brtan par bzhugs/ /thun mong ba dang khyad par gyis/ /sbyang ba sngon du

'gro ba yin/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /khyad par zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /sngags brjod reg pas gnas par gyur/ /de nas spyan drang mchod bstod pa/ /sngon 'gro gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi/ /gsang chen dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku yi

mchog /gsang chen dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni chos las byung / /spyod pa ye shes rnam sbyangs ba/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /gsang chen dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /spros med

ye shes dag pa yi/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces ni phyogs bzhi nas/ /gsol ba gdab cing phyag byas nas/ /mthong ba gzigs phyir khro bo yis/ /shin tu lta stangs bgegs gzir zhing / /brtul

zhugs drag pos rdo rje'i gar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khros pas bya/ /de nas bgegs la bka' bsgo zhing / /rol pa'i sgyur bas blta bar bya/ /gsang sngags phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /slob ma'i bgegs dbyung bar chad bsal/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma sngon 'gro bya/ /

khro bo'i phur pas gdab pa dang / /gtor mas bgegs bsal cho ga bstan/ /de nas bsgrub pa lhag par gnas/ /sa yi lha mo lhag gnas pa/ /phyag rgya bcas shing mchod gyur bas/ /bskyed cing bstod pa brtsam par bya/ /oM skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i

tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /mi bzad bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par bya phyir bla med pa'i/ /rgyal

ba gsang chen dkyil 'khor bri/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /der ni thim par rnam par bsam/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi/ /kun du bdud rtsi lnga dang ni/ /ma da naM gis legs par byug /rdo rjes dri yi thig le bya/ /lha gnas shes

par bya/ /me tog sil mas gtor bar bya/ /bskyed cing bstim dang bzhugs pa la/ /spyan drang dbang bskur mchod pa dang / /bstod pa la sogs sngon 'gro bya/ /lha la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /gnang ba byin nas bzhugs su gsol/ /rdo rje bum pa'i

mtshan nyid ldan/ /khyad par ldan pa rtsa ba yi/ /lha grangs dag dang mnyam pa'am/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /las bum dang ni bkra shis pa'i/ /bum pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ /'di dag kha rgyan mgul chings can/ /snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang / /'bru lnga spos

lnga rin chen lnga/ /chu klung chu bcas khyad par te/ /tha dad pa dang gcig pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sta gon bya/ /khyad par bar chad bsrung don du/ /bsrung ba'i phur bu khra bor bskyed/ /mchod bstod gnyis med ldan byas la/ /gtor ma ldan pas bka' bsgo bya/ /

de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i rim/ /spro ba bskyed dang gnang ba sbyin/ /sdom pa dbog dang bsrung ba gdags/ /so shing dor bar bya ba dang / /de ltas lung bstan ku sha las/ /sngas dang stan sbyin gzengs bstod nas/ /rmi lam gdab phyir nyal du gzhug /slob mas

maN+Dal me tog byas/ /khrus byas phyag 'tshal mdun gnas la/ /khyad par spro bskyed rjes 'jug bya/ /rigs kyi sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /blang ba bye brag shes par bya/ /rang gi lus tshad mnyam pa yi/ /sum sgril srad bu btsos pa yis/ /gsang sngags brjod cing bcing

bar bya/ /so shing tshad ldan gtad byas pa/ /lho phyogs ngogs su maN+Dal la/ /lhung ba'i rjes su brtag par bya/ /rtswa mchog byin pa mi smra bar/ /seng ge'i stabs kyis nyal bar bya/ /nub mo'i rmi lam ci byung ba/ /ci byung nang par smra bar gyis/ /khyad par gzengs bstod

nyal du gzhug /nang par rmi lam ngan gyur gang / /gsang sngags sbyin sreg rim pas zlog /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang / /sgo bzhi'i phyogs kyi rnal 'byor dang / /las kyi skyes bur bcas pa yis/ /mchod bstod lha la gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus

phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di zhes pas/ /gsang chen dkyil 'khor 'byung ba yi/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs shig /dngos grub ma lus bdag la gsol/ /zhes ni lan gsum

brjod par bya/ /de nas las kyi cho ga ni/ /sar pa legs par bkal ba dang / /tshad ldan mdzes pa'i srad bu yis/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs gnas pas/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /khyad par ye shes ldan pas ni/ /slob dpon shar lta slob ma nub/ /

slob dpon lhor 'dug slob ma byang / /gnyis pa yang ni gdab par bya/ /tshangs pa'i thig nas brtsams nas ni/ /mkhas pas cha shas gdab par bya/ /me yi phyogs su gnas pa yis/ /byang ltas shar gyi thig gdab bya/ /rlung du gnas te lhor bltas pas/ /nub

kyi thig ni gdab par bya/ /de nyid nas ni byang ngos gdab/ /mer gnas lho phyogs thig bya zhing / /de nas rlung gi phyogs su bya/ /bden bral gnas pas dbang ldan bar/ /tshad ldan rim pas gdab par bya/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po yi/ /pho brang le tse

dgu par bya/ /so so'i lha khyams dang bcas pa/ /sgo bzhis kun nas brgyan par dgod/ /spyi khyab pho brang nang ma la/ /le tse nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor so sor shes par bya/ /bar khyams la ni dkyil 'khor drug /gsang ba'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor dang / /

tshangs pa chen po'i pho brang ste/ /sum cu gsum du bri bar bya/ /bar bar shar du rdo rje dang / /'khor lo sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /lhor ni nor bu rin chen 'bar/ /nub phyogs pad+ma ut+pal/ /byang du ral gri rgya gram bcas/ /stong dag gi ni gnas yin no/ /de nas sgo

bzhi rta babs bcas/ /bcu drug ka bas bteg pa yi/ /gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo dang / /rim pas zung du steng du dgod/ /rus sbal rdo rje rgya gram bcas/ /rin chen pad+ma nor bu yis/ /sbras pa bsnol ma'i stegs byed pa/ /stegs bu dag las glang chen dang / /

sha ra b+ha dang pad+ma yi/ /lcug phran yal gar bcas pa yi/ /bkra shis dang la zung gyur pas/ /mu tig chun 'phyang mdzes pas brgyan/ /de stengs rin chen brtsegs pa la/ /bya khyung logs gnas phyir bltas pa'o/ /zur gnyis chu srin bsnol ma dang / /seng ge

shang shang de steng du/ /ru ru gnyis dang chos 'khor che/ /gdugs dang bcas pas kun nas brgyan/ /'dod yon pany+tsa re ga dang / /ba ku la yi rtsig pa'i gseng / /rin chen shar bu sna tshogs dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /rin chen pha gu ba gam can/ /rtse mor

mda' yab bkod pa la/ /kra ma shIr+Sha'i phreng ba dag /yongs su bkod pa mdzes par gyur/ /tshad med thar pa'i grong khyer gyi/ /mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs par bsam/ /de nas rin chen rnam lnga sogs/ /nor bu'i tshogs ni du ma yis/ /byin gyis brlab cing tshul shes

pas/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshon gyis bya/ /khyad par sgrub cing rgyan bkod pa/ /mchod pa du mas yongs su bskor/ /sgrub pa chen po slar bstan pa/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub nas bdag 'jug bya/ /de nas slob ma 'jug don du/ /yan lag 'di dag ldan par bya/ /stod

g.yogs smad g.yogs gtad pa dang / /gsol ba gdab cing gdong g.yogs bcing / /me tog phreng gzung sems bskyed cing / /don dri khas blangs nang du gzhug /tshogs bsags mna' bsgag dam chu blud/ /dam bsgrag bka' bsgo ye shes dbab/ /me tog dor rjes

mthong ba dri/ /spyi gtsug me tog phreng ba gdags/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol nas lha ngo bstan/ /dkyil 'khor rnam dag don bstan cing / /'dod lha ngos gzung rigs shes bya/ /'di dag cho ga rtogs par bya/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i lam 'jug pas/ /sems bskyed mchog tu

dmigs ldan zhing / /tshad med blo bskyed bslab par bya/ /gsang bar ye shes rdo rjer bslab/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni/ /ye shes yon tan phrin las kyi/ /byin gyis brlab pa lnga bya ste/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma dang / /rin chen ral gri'i spro bsdu dang / /

rigs lnga lha mo lngar bcas las/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i lha tshogs kun/ /ye shes chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /dngos grub skal ba 'bab par mdzod/ /rtags dang brda dang mtshan ma kun/ /rnam pa yongs su shes par bya/ /zhi

ba'am ni rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg nye bar dbul bar bya/ /thun mong dang ni khyad par gyi/ /phyag bya slob ma mdun gnas te/ /lha sras nyid du bskyed bya ste/ /shar nas 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /me tog phreng ba dang por sbyin/ /maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro bas/ /mdun

gnas de la dbang bskur sbyin/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar che ba'i byin brlabs pa/ /bdag cag bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /gsang ba'i snying po deng bdag gsol/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bla med dbang ni bskur mdzad de/ /rdo rje gsang

chen dbang bskur ba/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /de nas gang du rdo rje dpal mchog chen po 'dus pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang yang dag par bskur bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mngon par 'byung ba

de dag kyang ye shes kyi snang ba las yang dag par 'byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i sdong po du ma las sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'bar ba du mas rgyas pa kha phye ba la seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa gsang ba 'dzin pa po dang / lha tshangs pa yang re re zhing du gnas pa las 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i rigs nyis

brgya phrag gcig dang / rin po che'i rigs nyid brgya phrag gcig dang / pad+ma'i rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig dang / las kyi rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyis brgya phrag gcig ste/ 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sku'i ba

spu'i bu ga las kyang 'od zer bye ba phrag du ma byung ste/ de re re las kyang sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med pa 'phros te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba chen pos khyab par byas shing mdzad pa mtha' yas pa'i rol pa mngon par 'byung bar mdzad do/ /thams cad kyang bla na

med pa'i theg pa la 'dzud par mdzad de/ mchog tu skyabs su 'gro ba ston cing 'jig rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dag la ni tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis mngon par dbang skur bar byed do/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa

la mos pa rnams la ni chos thams cad bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /rang rgyal ba'i theg pa la mos pa rnams la ni rten cing 'brel ba bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /de dag gi lam dang lta ba dang spyod pa yang dag par bstan cing de dag gi tshul gyis

'dul bar byed do/ /gang du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la mos pa rnams la ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing de nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ sbyin pa chen po gtong ba'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /tshul khrims yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed

do/ /bzod pa la gnas pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos thams cad

kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dbang skur bar byed do/ /de dag kyang tshad med grangs med pa'i nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos ston cing dbang skur bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams la ni tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas chos ston cing dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis dbang skur bar byed do/ /chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul

gyis dbang skur bar byed do/ /'dir ni rin po che'i gzhal yas khang zhing khams rnam par dag par dpal longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon par 'byung ba'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /bla na med pa'i sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa la ni thabs dang

stobs dang ye shes dang smon lam rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i lam las bcu'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su dbang skur bar byed do/ /gang de sangs rgyas kyis mi 'dul zhing dus la ma bab pa de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i

rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang dpung chen po bzhi dang bcas pa thams cad la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngon par 'byung bas bstan cing dbang skur bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de dag kyang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis nyi shu rtsa lnga po re re las yang lnga lngar rigs

brgya'i sgo nas dbang skur bar byed do/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams la ni sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i tshul gyis rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar brgyan pa'i snang bas rig ma dang lha mo'i tshogs du mas 'dod pa'i longs spyod mi zad pa yongs su dag pa la dgyes

pas yongs su spyod par mdzad cing khro bo'i rgyal po du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' so so'i rigs dang bcas pas rig pa dang brtul zhugs brtan par byed pa dang / chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba bla na med pa khyad par du bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs

'dus pa chen po bla na med pa la rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga'i nang du chud par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo tshad med pa chos kyi pho brang dam par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs yon

tan phrin las du mas bdag nyid du dbang bskur bar mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos phyag mtshan dang zhal la sogs pa'i rnam par snang bar gyur pa ni 'od zer dpag tu med pa bkye ba de dag tshur bsdus pas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa de dag so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang bar byas shing 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas snying po'i dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la gsal bar snang ba bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang tha dad pa med pa'i sbyor bas thams cad

gnyis su med pa thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor bas bde ba chen po'i bde ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras bkug pa'i zhing khams yongs su sbyangs pa'i sku rnams so so'i spyi bo nas zhugs/ rtsa dbu ma brgyud de yum gyi pad+mar byon/ de nas gyen du gshegs te nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa

khengs pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis dbang skur bar byed do/ /de yang bar snang gi phyogs mtshams khyab par byas te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing med pa thams cad la gsang ba chen po'i dbang skur bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rnam pa yis/ /sa yi

khams rnams dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje'i lus su byin gyis brlabs/ /mA ma kI yi bdag nyid kyis/ /chu yi khams la dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje dag byed byin gyis brlabs/ /la la gos dkar mor snang bas/ /drod kyi khams ni dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje'i 'od dpung

byin gyis brlabs/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i bdag nyid kyis/ /g.yo ba dbugs la dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje skyong byed mar byin brlabs/ /lha mo gzugs kyi rdo rje mas/ /sna tshogs gzugs rnams dbang bskur bas/ /snang stong gnyis su med par bsgyur/ /lha mo sgra yi rdo rje

mas/ /sna tshogs sgra yis dbang bskur bas/ /grag stong gnyis su med par gyur/ /dri yi rdo rje lha mo yis/ /sna tshogs dri yis dbang bskur bas/ /gsal stong gnyis su med par gyur/ /lha mo ro yi rdo rje yis/ /sna tshogs bcud len dbang bskur bas/ /myong

stong gnyis su med par gyur/ /lha mo reg bya rdo rje mas/ /'khor 'das reg bya'i dbang bskur bas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes las/ /bde stong gnyis su med par gyur/ /mig gi rnam shes sa snying po/ /rna ba'i rnam shes gsang 'dzin pa/ /sna la nam mkha'i

snying po dang / /lce ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste/ /lus la sgrib pa rnam par sel/ /yid la kun du bzang pos so/ /nyon mongs can yid byams pa ste/ /kun gzhi 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /de ltar byin brlabs dbang bskur te/ /rnam shes

brgyad ni dag phyir ro/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dag /'joms byed khro bo'i rgyal po bcus/ /tshigs tshogs dge par dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar phrin las tshul gyis ni/ /gsang ba bla na med par gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen

pos ni srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa/ thog ma dang bar dang tha mar rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos thams cad la 'du 'bral med cing tha dad par rtog pa med pa/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa/ dbyings

dang ye shes zung du 'jug pa/ mnyam pa nyid mi gnas pa bde ba chen po'i tshul du yang dag pa'i snying po'i gsang ba chen po'i dbang bskur bar gyur to/ /'di ltar yang dag pa dbang bskur ba 'di bstan pa na so so'i skye bo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcus

mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i don la gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcus tshe de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams 'og min de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par sku gsum gyi rol mo mngon par ston cing mi zad pa'i ngang las yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du yang

rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i skur bstan nas thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du mngon par spyod par mdzad do/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /gsang chen ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /mnyam nyid bde ba chen po yis/ /ye shes dri med

dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang / /cod pan nyi shu rtsa lnga yis/ /rig pa'i dbang ni ston par mdzod/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin par gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa'i/ /mi bskyod rang byung byang chub

sems/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od/ /'khor lo 'dus pa'i rgyal chen por/ /rdo rje rtag pa ye shes can/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ro/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin gter 'chang ba/ /dbang phyug

chen po chags pa med/ /rin chen 'byung gnas nor bu 'dzin/ /rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /dpal ldan pad+ma 'bar ba'i mdangs/ /rab 'bar rgyal ba'i spyan 'chang ba/ /'od dpag med pa thub pa che/ /pad+ma rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /dpal

ldan sangs rgyas phrin las sku/ /ye shes rgyal po sgyu 'phrul che/ /gdon mi za ba thogs pa med/ /las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM na maH /sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra ra t+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sam ya shri ye hU~M/ oM namaHsarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra bud+d+hA a b+hi Shiny+tsa

sam ya shri ye bru~M/ oM namaH sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra ra tA a b+hi Shi ny+tsa sa ma ya shri ya oM/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye hrIH/ oM na maH /sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sam ya shri ye khaM/ de yang chu'i dus su ni mi

bskyod pa'i bum pa'i chus bkru bar byed do/ /rin chen gyi ni me tog phreng ba rna ltag g.yas par ro/ /pad+ma yi ni bum pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /las kyi ni rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bkra shis du ma'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ni dbu rgyan rtse

lnga pa nyid do/ /rdo rje mi bskyod pa ni bum chus char dbab pa'o/ /pad+ma'i ni rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bcas pa'o/ /las kyi ni sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /brtag pa'i bkra shis brjod pa nyid do/ /snang ba mtha' yas kyi ni rdo rje 'bar ba gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro/ /rin po che'i

ni me tog rab tu gtor ba'o/ /las kyi ni sgra brnyan gyi tshogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsang sngags brjod pa'o/ /don yod grub pa ni dril bu gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ni khrus char ro/ /rin po che'i ni me tog char ro/ /pad+ma'i ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lo mas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi

ni tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni gsang mtshan gdags pa'o/ /rin chen gyi ni me tog spyi bor ro/ /pad+ma'i rdo rje mgo thog tu'o/ /las kyi ni dril bu mgo thog tu'o/ /rdo rje ni rdo rje dril bu bsnol bas mgo thog bzhag cing bum

chus gtor ba nyid do/ /de ltar rigs kyi dbye bas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du rab tu shes par bya ba nyid do/ /gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang gzungs sngags kyi lha tshogs rnams kyi sku sna tshogs pa lta bas ni kun du sku'i dbang ngo / /gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs

sngags du ma'i sngags brjod pa dang sgra du mas ni kun du gsung gi dbang ngo / /gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags kyi snying po dang ting nge 'dzin du mas ni kun du thugs kyi dbang ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po mngon par thob par 'dod pas ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi

dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin par bya'o/ /spyod pa brtsam par 'dod pa la ni brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /ji ltar thabs kyis 'dul gyur pa/ /chos

kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /gzhan dag drug dang bla ma ni/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /chos gos rna ba ltar/ /mar me mdzad dpal phyag rgya las/ /gsang ba chen po'i tshul bstan pas/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te/ /thub pa de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gtso/ /rkang gnyis gtso bor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs phyag rgya sbyin mdzad de/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /dbang mchog thob pa tsam gyis ni/ /slob ma yon tan bdag por gyur/ /khams gsum gyi

ni rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang / /der ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing / /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yis/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /khyed rnams the tshom med pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig ma rnam

par gzhug bya zhing / /bla na med pa'i bla ma las/ /bdud rtsi dag pa'i blo blang bya/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun/ /rang 'bab ye shes bcud kyis len/ /'chi med ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /

byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems bzang pos/ /bu khyod dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de nyid longs spyod rtsal sbyangs te/ /gsung gi rdo rje rab bsgrub phyir/ /rtog med bde ba'i gnas las skyes/ /dri med gsang ba'i dbang bskur

ba'o/ /de nas rig ma'i dbye ba ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /glang po can dang ma/ /dung can ma dang sna tshogs can/ /pad+ma can ni rim shes pas/ /phyag rgya'i dbang ni thob byed yin/ /las kyi phyag rgya ma shes rab ma ste/ lo bcu gnyis

ma 'am/ brgyad gnyis ma'am/ bcu gnyis gnyis ma'i rim pa ste/ de yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par skyes pa'am/ sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa'i stobs las grub cing ye shes kyi rgyu mthun las byung ba'am/ dbus kyi yul du skyes pa/

dbang po tshang pa/ yan lag nying lag yongs su rdzogs shing mtshan dang ldan pa/ dbang bskur ba thob cing sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes pa las a bad+hU tI ston pa'am/ ston pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma de las kun 'dar gyi sna rtse las bskyod pa'i

bde ba las dga' ba dang / mchog dga' dang dga' bral dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las ye shes mngon sum du nyams su myong ba skyed cing / de las thob pa des snang grags brtan g.yo ma lus pa la rgyas btab pa'i ye shes ro gcig pa'i ngang du rtag tu

gnas par bya/ des ni gsang ba'i spyod pa la gnas na shin tu myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par byed do/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'od kyi rig ma las byung ba rang snang ba'i lha mo las rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya chen po ni lhan cig

skyes pa'i ye shes byin brlabs bla ma'i brgyud pa las thob par byed do/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa'i ye shes las 'da' ba med par spyod pa ste/ gsang ba zab dang rgya che ba'i/ /ye shes rab tu mi gnas pa/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong

ro gcig tu/ /bla med gsang chen dbang bskur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sras bcas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal mchog 'dir ni gang bstan pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du/ /rigs kyi dbye ba bsdus pa'i lam/ /

bsam mi khyab pa'i khyad par gang / /bya ba spyod pa'i tshul kun gyi/ /rgyud sde sna tshogs lha rnams kyi/ /dbang bskur rab tu thob pas na/ /gnyis su med pa'i rgyal zhes brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang

ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba chen po tshad med pa rdo rje'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsang bdag pa'i tshul gnas te/ /phrin las sna

tshogs sbas pa yi/ /de nyid rab tu bstan pa'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gsang ba'i dbang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i tshul yang dag par dbang bskur ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi phyed pa ste/ dpal gsang

ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba la spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras thu bor gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyis grogs tshangs par mtshungs par spyod par blta ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po du mas ni

yang dag par srung bar byed do/ /lha mo'i tshogs rgya mtshos ni kun nas de la yongs su mchod par byed/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang / gu lang la sogs pa du ma lha ma brgyad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi

'khor dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa du ma rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang mchod pa'i rten du byed la/ dngos po phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed do/ /de'i phyir de'i gnas kyi sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ 'di nyid ni byang chub sems

dpa' kun du bzang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snying por bla na med par gnas pa kun du bzhag po'i spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor du ma'i sgo nas sems can gyi

bsam pa rdzogs par bya ste/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po tshad med pa bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dbugs dbyung ba dang /

gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa thob par byed pas 'bras bu'i lam las mngon par dga' bas rgyas par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pas/ /yang dag ye shes

mtshan nyid can/ /gnyis med mnyam pa nyid sbyor bas/ /sna tshogs du ma las 'phro ba/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /dpag med 'od zer tshogs las ni/ /dbang bskur gyur pa'i lhag pa'i lha/ /'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /lus ngag

yid la gnas nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rgyun las ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /dbyer med ngo bo nyid gcig pa/ /bde ba chen po'i ngang bzhugs pas/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las/ /mnyam par sbyar ba'i yan lag gis/ /bde dang bde chen lhan

cig skyes/ /dpal mchog rang byung phyag rgya che/ /'di las bcom ldan 'das bdag byed/ /sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag dbang ni skur byed pa/ /de nyid bla ma yin par brjod/ /'dir dbang skur ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /

slob dpon de las gces pa yi/ /srog ni gzhan du yod ma yin/ /rdo rje byang chub sems nyid dang / /tha dad med phyir bla ma ni/ /rgyun du mchod cing bsten byar gsungs/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su ni/ /bla ma la ni nges par dbul/ /'dis ni

dngos grub ma lus pa'i/ /'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs par bstan/ /dpal ldan dbus kyi gnas gyur pa/ /'khor lo mchog gi 'khor lo nyid/ /bla ma mchog la dus rtag tu/ /spyi bos btud de phyag byar 'os/ /'di ni spyod pa bstan pa la/ /

zab pa yi ni spyod pa dang / /de bzhin rgya che ba yi tshul/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po yis/ /brtul zhugs tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /lha mo nyi shu'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan kun rol pa/ /'dir ni rgya cher gyur pa ste/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms ma

dang / /so sor 'brang dang rma bya che/ /tshal 'dzin ma dang rjes 'dzin ma/ /tsun da dang ni ral gcig ma/ /nor rgyun ma dang rin chen sgron/ /'od zer can dang dug sel ma/ /ri khrod lo ma can dang ni/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mtha' yas sgo dang

rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ /shes rab 'phel byed las sgrib sel/ /ye shes mi zad za ma tog /sangs rgyas chos kyi mdzod dang ni/ /ku ru ku l+le gdugs dkar mo/ /'di dag gzungs kyi lha mor brjod/ /zab pa'i spyod tshul bla na med/ /lha mo dgu dang lhan cig tu/ /

gsang ba'i ye shes rol pa ni/ /mgon po kun du spyod pa'o/ /gnyis med ye shes bde ba che/ /lha mo lnga dang bcas pa yi/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ni/ /mnyam bzhag chen po'i spyod pa yin/ /'di dag spros bcas spyod pa dang / /spros med ye shes tshul

gyur pa/ /shin tu spros pa med pas ni/ /'dod dang bsam pa 'jug pa dang / /dus kyi khyad par rnam dbye bas/ /b+hu su ku dang kun du bzang / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /tshar bcad pa dang rjes 'dzin

gyi/ /phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /brtan g.yo dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/ /bag med 'tshe ba rnam spangs pas/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul sbyor ba/ /stong nyid ye shes shes rab mas/ /khyogs dang brlabs dang khyung lding dang / /bkal ba dang ni

bskyod pa yis/ /tshangs par spyod dang bde bar rol/ /de nas gsang ba'i tshul gnas ma/ /rdzogs par rlung gi rnal 'byor bslab/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu mnyam bzhag las/ /'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrangs bya zhing / /ji srid 'bum gyi bar du ni/ /sgra dang

bral bar rtag tu bzlas/ /sgrub pos sgra dang bal bar ni/ /'bum bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /'chi bdag 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ /ye shes lnga yi bar dag tu/ /'chi ba bslus par the tshom med/ /rtag tu nang par tho rangs dus/ /stong phrag gcig

tu chags med par/ /de nyid rdo rje bzlas byas pas/ /bar du gcod las bzlogs pas na/ /de phyir rlung gi rnal 'byor la/ /kun du mnyam bzhag gnas par bya/ /de nyid bum pa can bcings pas/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal ba 'thob/ /de nyid rig

pas lus kun las/ /lus kyi khong stong rtsa sbubs dag /rlung gis nges par dag byas pas/ /de nyid rngub pa dang bcas pas/ /khyad par 'joms pa rlung gi las/ /dbu ma nyid du gnas pa ni/ /'byung ba zag pa med pa dang / /shin tu bde bskyed byed

yin/ /rlung gis sems ni skyon med par/ /rab zhi 'byung ba ldog pa dag /gcig tu gnas par byed pa'i las/ /'di ni rnal 'byor lam du gsungs/ /sgo lnga'i rlung ni bsdu ba yang / /dbang po nang du zlog pa las/ /phyi rol nye bar dmigs mi 'gyur/ /

'di ni yid kyi rlung zin pa'o/ /g.yo bcas rnams la rengs byed pa/ /srog ni brtan pa'i tshul gyis su/ /'gyur ba med par gyur pa gang / /snang ba'i rlung ni brtan pa'o/ /brtan pa'i yal ga rlung gi lam/ /rab tu gtod pa'i

sbyor ba yis/ /srog rtsol 'bog par gyur pa na/ /g.yo med brtan pa nus pa thob/ /tshad dang grangs las 'das pa yi/ /mnyam med kun 'dar mar gnas pas/ /rtog pa ma lus nub pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /rtog pa

kun las mi g.yo ba/ /de nyid ye shes rgyal ba che/ /skyil krung gcig la gnas byas te/ /byang chub shing la rgyab rten nas/ /mnyam bzhag nye bar bcings pa la/ /bsdams grol khyad med gyur pa dang / /kha zas gos kyi rtsol med pa/ /phung po'i bdud

las rgyal ba yin/ /rlung ni rgyu ba mi tshor dang / /dbu mar 'byung ba brtan pa yis/ /dngos rnams sgyu mar mthong ba yis/ /lha yi bu yi bdud las rgyal/ /rang rig ye shes kyis dag pa/ /nyon mongs dug gsum rlung dag la/ /tshar bcad pas ni 'jig rten lha'i/ /

gzugs dag 'gas par byed pa yin/ /rjes gzung bas ni slar sdud pa/ /gcig tu byed pa 'di las 'grub/ /nang du zla ba'i rlung bzung nas/ /'khrul 'khor drag spyod gtum pa can/ /A li las byung dag pa las/ /zla bas 'pho bar mi nus so/ /gsang

ba bzlog pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /chu tshod lnga yi bar dag tu/ /nyi ma'i rlung la kA li yis/ /bcings pas nyi ma 'pho mi 'gyur/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral bar/ /rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa nyid/ /phra ba sems kyi rnam pa las/ /rnam rtog ri bo bcom

pa'i phyir/ /phyi rol ri bo 'joms pa dang / /thal bar yang ni byed nus pa/ /bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas so/ /dug gsum las ni rang bzhin rnams/ /log rtog dri ma ma lus pa/ /gzhom byed mi g.yor gnas byas nas/ /dpung chen dengs par the tshom med/ /

'khor ba'i chos nyid spangs pa na/ /dug nyid bdud rtsir sgyur ba dang / /rang byung bdud rtsi sbyangs gyur pas/ /bkres skom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bsam pa rnam par dag gyur la/ /dug sbrul 'tshe bar mi 'gyur te/ /de las gzhan du bzlog pa yis/ /dug sbrul gzhan la spong

bar byed/ /shin tu khros par gyur nas kyang / /klu rnams la ni bka' bsgo bas/ /log par lta ba'i rgol ba kun/ /dug sbrul chen pos za bar 'gyur/ /gal te dad gyur de dag la/ /ting 'dzin spo ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dug rnams skad cig gcig gis sel//

ye shes rlung las gyur pa yi/ /'pho med mi chod rdo rje las/ /sems can gdug pa'i srog chags che/ /stag sogs kha ni 'ching bar byed/ /gang du thabs dang shes rab las/ /mnyam sbyor khu ba'i rnam pa ni/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga de las ni/ /bskyil

dang bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gang gA la sogs chu bo rnams/ /gang zhig bzlog ste 'bab par gyur/ /rtsa gsum las ni byung ba dang / /rtsa phran gzhan las 'bab pa dag /gal te zlog par gyur pa dag /shin tu chu bo skems par byed/ /srid rtse la sogs

'jig rten pa'i/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin gnas byas la/ /de nyid stong par bcug na ni/ /lha chen dag kyang 'jig 'gyur la/ /gzhan du a rdza ka bzhin byed/ /de nyid du ni gsang chen gyi/ /phrin las phran tshegs bstan pa ste/ /rgyud kun du ni ma bstan

cing / /sbas pa lkog tu gyur pa yin/ /gzung 'dzin rtsa las rlung 'jug pas/ /'khor ba'i srid pa skyed par mdzad/ /yang dag kun 'dar nyid gnas na/ /rnam grol zhi ba mchog thob 'gyur/ /lte ba'i gnas su srid zhi dag /sna tshogs 'dus par

'byung gnas te/ /rtsa bcings lha yi bu yi bdud/ /'byung po bye ba la sogs pa/ /phyi rol du ni 'dul bar mdzad/ /skyon dag yon tan gyur pas na/ /mtshon cha'i char la sogs pa yang / /rin chen me tog dag tu 'bab/ /sdug bsngal bde bar shar ba'o/ /

snying gar yang dag yongs gsol bar/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa nus gyur pas/ /yid bcings pas ni phyi rol du/ /nyon mongs dri mas mi gos pa/ /spangs pa rnam dag lam gnas pas/ /nyon mongs bdud ni bcom pa'i phyir/ /

mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs pa las/ /rnam par bskyod pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /mgrin par longs spyod yongs grub pas/ /rlung bcings pas ni ro drug la/ /longs spyod bkres rgud mi mnga' ba/ /gnod pa sna tshogs zil gnon cing / /yan lag

drug cu'i dbyangs 'byung zhing / /phung po'i bdud las rgyal bas ni/ /mdangs dang 'od zer lhag par 'byin/ /rlung 'bog zag med gnas thob pa'o/ /spyi bo gtsug tor 'byung gnas der/ /thig le 'gyur ba med brtan pas/ /'chi bdag bdud las

rgyal ba ste/ /dge ba ye shes dri med lam/ /mthar phyin rnam par rol pa yi/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bcings pa med cing grol med la/ /'gyur ba med par bzhugs pa'o/ /nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang / /drug brgya bcas pas rlung dag na/ /

thams cad dbu mar thim pa ni/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung / /kha sbyor du ni gyur pa las/ /sbyor ba de la goms byed na/ /des ni 'od gsal go 'phang gnas/ /gang gi rnal 'byor

spangs pa dang / /rlung gi rnal 'byor spong byed pa/ /des ni bde ba mi 'thob cing / /skyes bu tha shal de dag brlag /dus kun du ni g.yo ba yi/ /rlung la rnam par goms pas ni/ /lus sems gnas rnams byin brlabs phyir/ /kun du son par gyur pa'o/ /de las bde dang sdug bsngal

dang / /mtho ris ngan song gar 'jug pa/ /lus kyi sgo nas 'pho ba nyid/ /rang dbang du ni 'byung bar bstan/ /snying ga'i rtsa yi yan lag ni/ /brgyad po bkra shis yan lag gyur/ /de nyid lha mo lus gnas pas/ /dpal be'u la sogs mdzes par byed/ /

mgrin pa'i gnas su skyes pa yi/ /rtsa yi yan lag 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /las kyi rigs las byung ba yi/ /sems dpa' bzhi bzhir yang dag 'byung / /de nyid rnal 'byor rgyud du bstan/ /lte bar mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /rtsa yi

ljon shing 'dab rgyas pa/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo/ /drug cu rtsa bzhir 'byung ba'o/ /spyi bo'i gnas su skyes pa yi/ /tshul ni yang dag sum cu gnyis/ /mkha' gros sum cu rtsa gnyis dag /yul dang yul du 'byung ba yin/ /nang du dbu ma'i khong

stong du/ /du ba lta bu'i snang ba 'char/ /de las rnam par mngon gyur pas/ /gnod pa sra ba'i skyon bral te/ /rtsig pa dag la mi rdug ste/ /bar snang bzhin du thogs pa med/ /nang du dbu mar rang byung ba'i/ /smig rgyu lta bu 'char ba ni/ /brtan

pas lus la dbang thob byed/ /chu la sa bzhin bya ba la/ /nges pa nyid du mngon par 'byung / /kun 'dar ma yi stong pa der/ /'byung pa me yi rang bzhin las/ /srin bu me kher mthong gyur pa/ /'bar ba de nyid brtan pa las/ /bsregs kyang

mi 'tshig grogs su 'char/ /brgyal bar gyur pa'i bde bar 'gyur/ /dbu ma'i khang pa'i mthongs su ni/ /mar me 'bar ba gang gis mthong / /phyi nang rten 'brel 'dzom pa na/ /sna tshogs rlung gi stobs chen gyis/ /bskyod par mi nus phrin

las te/ /gal te myur bar ye shes 'gro/ /gal te a ba d+hU tI'i nang / /gzhal yas ye shes dag pa der/ /thams cad nam mkha' lta bu yi/ /stong pa nyid du 'char ba la/ /ye shes sprin med nam mkha' ltar/ /chags med mkha' la

lding bar 'gyur/ /bu ga dgu nas rgyu ba'i rlung / /rnal 'byor pas ni mnyam zin pas/ /byung ba spangs pas gnas pa nyid/ /de tshe dri chen dri chu dang / /ngar snabs mi 'byung stobs su 'gyur/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rtags yin no/ /gang du lus kyi 'byung ba

bzhi/ /me rlug mgrin par brtan gyur pas/ /de nyid du ni sprul pa dang / /stod las me 'bar 'od zer stod/ /dgug pa'i las kyis 'grub pa yin/ chu rlung snyig gar brtan pa las/ /'byung ba chu ru 'bab byed cing / /kun du sdud par byed pa

dang / /zhi ba smad nas chu 'brub 'char/ /rlung gi rlung ni lte ba ru/ /mnyam par zin na phyi rol du/ /du mar sprul par nus pa dang / /rdo rje rkang mgyogs nyid thob byed/ /sa yi rlung ni gsang gnas su/ /zin pa de la ri bo ltar/ /mi g.yo skyil krung mi phyed

cing / /glang po lta bu'i nus par 'gyur/ /de nyid srog dang rtsol ba ru/ /rab tu thim phyed rdo rje yin/ /snying gi rtsa mdud grol ba las/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar rgyas par byed/ /smin mtshams gnad kyi sgo phye nas/ /mdzod spu kun du 'byung bar byed/ /'dis ni 'gro

ba'i lus kun la/ /'jug pa rdzu 'phrul cher ston to/ /'phel bar byed pa'i rlung gis ni/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i gter thob pas/ /bum pa bzang po grub pa'o/ /yon tan dri ma med pa'i rlung / /sna tshogs lha mo rol ba can/ /bcu drug phrag ni bzhi dag tu/ /brgya

phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /de las kun du spyod pa yis/ /gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub/ /'dir ni bdud rtsi bcud len du/ /nyams pa med pas dbang thob pas/ /mi snang bar ni byed pa yi/ /rdo rje bcud len mchog yin no/ /rtog pa'i tshogs ni bde

don du/ /mi rtog ye shes rgyal po ru/ /bsgyur ba rlung gis byed pa can/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /gang du dngos po yongs bsgyur nas/ /bde ba chen por spyod pa can/ /mi ro lus las dngos grub brten/ /ye shes ro langs dngos

grub yin/ /chos kun sgrib med rang gsal du/ /rgyu 'bras mtshan nyid don spyod pas/ /sa 'og gter mthong sa le ba/ /dngas pa'i ting 'dzin ngang las byung / /ting 'dzin ye shes log rtog la/ /rnam gcod ral gri'i dngos grub ste/ /gar 'dod dbang

phyug grub pa'i rgyal/ /'dir ni rlung sems sbyangs pas 'grub/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i pha rol du/ /skad cig gis phyin nyi zer zhon/ /dngos po du ma'i snang ba la/ /sgyu mas sprul pa cher ston pas/ /mchil lham dngos grub phra mo yin/ /rags pa

mchog ni mkha' la spyod/ /gang du rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /mkha' la brten pa'i pho brang las/ /dag pa'i tshul gyur lus kyis ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gzhal med la/ /khyad par mkha' spyod zhes brjod do/ /sa 'og lha min phug stong

las/ /gang du brgyud pa rnyed nas ni/ /ri rab la ni mngon 'dzegs nas/ /gnas pa thun mong mkha' spyod de/ /gzhan du rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ /skyil krung rdo rjer sangs rgyas pa/ /snying po mi 'gyur 'byung gnas yin/ /gnas gzhan longs spyod

'phags pa'i yul/ /ri rab zhes bya mi yi lus/ /'byung ba bzhis ni bsdus pa dag /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor ba'i/ /lha tshogs dag tu gyur pa ste/ /de yi rdul phran lus las byung / /de nyid rten dang brten

par bcas/ /de snyed bcas par yang dag 'byung / /dur khrod brgyad dang bcas par ni/ /'khor yug 'jig rten sprul bdag /ges par 'byung ba bstan pa yin/ /dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rig pa ni/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /phyi nang

spyod pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lus kyi gnas su kun du rol/ /mar me'i tshe dang rab 'bar bcas/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni 'bar pa'o/ /rtsa ni rgyas pa zhig skyong la/ /rlung bcu phyags bcur gnas pa las/ /phyogs mtshams dbye bas phye ba yin/ shing

ni rdo rje can gyi rtsa/ /drung ni spros pa med pa ste/ /byang chub 'od gsal zhes bya ba/ /rtsa ni dbu ma nyid las stan/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa dang / /srid zhi mnyam par spyod pa'o/ /'gro ba kun la khyab pa yi/ /bla med byang chub sems kyi mthus/ /zhe sdang

gi ni gnyen po ches/ /khyab 'jug 'dul bar mdzad pa'o/ /bdag nyid phung po khams dang ni/ /skye mched lha ru gsal ba las/ /'dod chags rtog pa dang bral ba'i/ /dbang phyug chen po 'dul ba'o/ /tha mal rtog pa dag nas ni/ /

zhen med sku ru gnas pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dul byed pa/ /gti mug dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje ra ba la sogs pas/ /brgya byin la sogs phyogs skyong bcu/ /nges par 'dul mdzad bsrung ba che/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bstan pa yin/ /tshad med bzhi ni goms pa

yi/ /ye shes mthu yis skar mda' gtong / /'di yis dga' rab dbang phyug ni/ /phrag dog bcom pas de bzhin gshegs/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /gsang ba 'dir ni mngon brjod pas/ /'dir ni skyes bu gang 'jug pa/ /blo gros ldan

pas chos 'byung ba'i/ /kun du bzang po nges par ni/ /'gro ba'i don du bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las las

phran tshegs bstan pa dang spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o// //de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mchog mkhyen pas/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bka' stsal to/ /nam

mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngos re zhing / /dpag tshad re la cha chen te/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba

yis/ /logs re la ni gnas pa ste/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dpal mchog las/ /rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ /rnam par mkhas par rtag par yang / /rigs rnams rab tu dgod bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lha mo dang / /byang chub

sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po bzhir bcas pa'i/ /so so'i dbu mas gyur pa yi/ /'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /re re zhing du rigs kyi bdag /gsang ba rigs kyi bdag

po yis/ /rgyas gdab dkyil 'khor khyad par bya/ /lha rnams khyams la dgos pa ni/ /khro bo drug dang bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis las bsdus pa yi/ /tshangs pa dang ni gsang 'dzin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung bas

na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong dag ni/ /dbus su nye bar gzigs pa gang / /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri 'bar bas khyab pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /phyogs bzhir khyab par gnas

pa ste/ /shin tu rgya che'i rnam ma yis/ /dpag tshad byed ba'i khyon tsam du/ /gru ba'i shin tu gsal ba yi/ /mdzes ba rta bas dang ldan pa'i/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i pho brang las/ /mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa//

gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgyal sogs/ /gsang ba rab tu mchod pa'i phyir/ /shes rab can kyis gnas su bsam/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /de la mchod pa rgya mtsho dbul/ /de nyid phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /rim

pas rab tu phye ba yi/ /phyogs dang dus kyis gnas pa yi/ /lha mo drug brgya bdun cu dang / /rtsa lnga yi ni mchod pa nyid/ /nges par bsdus pas nyis 'gyur du/ /rin chen na bza' la sogs pas/ /byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /ye shes rgya mtsho

dus gsum gyi/ /gnas de yin par rnam par bsam/ /bdag ni thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'chod pa'i sprin rnams spros nas ni/ /nye bar gsang ba'i rim pa yis/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu lus kyi lha rnams mchod/ /de nas de nyid 'dus pa yi/ /

snying po bskul ba brjod par bya/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /khams kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /dpag med bye ba la gnas te/ /ye shes mngon par brtson gyur la/ /mi zad

khams kyi ye shes las/ /'dod yon sgyu mar rol pa yis/ /yongs su spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /de nyid rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bskul ba med pas mi g.yor bzhugs/ /gang du gsang ba la spyod pa'i/ /rig 'dzin mngon par brtson gyur la/ /spyan ras

kyis ni mi gzigs te/ /gang du mngon par mi 'tsho la/ /kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di dag /gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gsang chen spyod pa'i tshul gnas la/ /yongs su rdzogs par gyur te zhes/ /sbyong pa med phyir rgyu 'di ru/ /snying po rab tu

bskul bar bya/ /gang du mi mjed la sogs pa/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyar gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dzin rgyal po ni/ /sprul ba'i skur ni gyu pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig la/ /dmigs pa tshig gi lam brjod pas/ /gsang sngags mchog gi

snying po yi/ /snying por rab tu gsang ba gsungs/ /gzugs kyi khams nyid oM du bsdu/ /'dod khams kyi ni A las te/ /gzugs med hU~M du brjod par bya/ /khams gsum bdag nyid gcig ba'i ngang / /mchog gi khyad par gsang ba yi/ /

snying po bskul ba nyid yin no/ /rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i 'byung gnas nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni ro gcig tu/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs par gsungs/ /spyod yul byung ba oM yin te/ /dmigs pa

med pa AHyin no/ /mi shigs hU~M du gyur pa'i phyir/ /tha dad med pa'i spyod pa'o/ /'di ni longs spyod rdzogs sku yi/ /snying po mchog tu bskul bar gsungs/ /gsang ba rigs kun bdag po yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la/ /mi g.yog nas

med rtag pa las/ /gcig tu gyur byed don du ni/ /gsang ba sku yi ngo bo oM/ /dri med 'byung ba skye med AH/ /rtog med stong nyid ye shes hU~M/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /mi phyed gcig gyur lam 'di las/ /rgyun mi 'chad du bskul

gyur na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nyer 'grub ste/ /dam pa'i rigs ni brgya dag gis/ /thun mong ma yin gnas pa'o/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa'i gnas/ /sku yi snying po rab tu bskul/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor bye brag tu/ /rang gi rdo rje

'dzin pa yis/ /ma 'dres dag par bskyes pa las/ /rnam par snang bar ston pa'o/ /de nyid rigs ni lnga dag gi/ /rnal 'byor yongs su spyod pa las/ /bla med phyag rgya chen po'i gnas/ /gsung gi snying po bskul gyur pas/ /tshad med

byang chub dang las bskul/ /'di ni dam tshig chen po yin/ /mchog tu gsang ba bdag med pas/ /sa gsum du ni khyab pa yis/ /bde ba lhan cig skyes par bskul/ /de nyid dbyer med sgyu ma'i lam/ /yi ge mchog gyur gcig ba las/ /rlung

sems gnyis su med par ni/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog tu bskul/ /gang du lhag pa'i lhar gyur cing / /rdo rje 'dzin par gnas pa las/ /'od zer lcags kyu ma 'dres pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lngas spros pa las/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyer spyod pa/ /

spyi bo nas ni bskul bar mdzad/ /'di nyid dri med dbyangs gyur pa/ /'od zer kha dog lnga dag gis/ /gsung gi sgo nas bskul ba gang / ye shes sprin ni 'phro byed pa'o/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ khyad par

thugs las bskul gyur pa/ /sa gsum du ni khyab byed yin/ /mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur phyin/ /grub ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /thams cad ro mnyam dang du bskul/ /gang du rnal 'byor mchog 'dod pas/ /rdo rje dang ni b+ha ga

dag /thabs dang shes rab tshul dag tu/ /mnyams par sbyar ba'i dbang po yis/ /snyoms par zhugs ba'i bde thob pas/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag /rtsa gnyis 'dus par dbu mar ni/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i dngos po yis/ /srog rtsol gnyis kyi

rlung dag pa dang / /e ba~M kha sbyor sbyar ba gang / /des ni chos kun ma lus la/ /yongs su rgyas gdab gyur pa yin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags dam tshig ting 'dzin yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus ba'i snying po rab tu bskur

ba bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /mi phye ye shes rab bsgrub pas/ /'dus pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ yang dag ye shes 'di gsungs so/ /'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten na/ /go 'phang la ni byed 'gyur ba/ /

dbang dang de bzhin dgug pa dang / /bskrad dang gsad pa nyid dang ni/ /rmugs byed rengs byed rmongs byed pa/ /tshig 'phrog bya dang brgyal ba dang / /sna tshogs gzugs su sgyur ba dang / /gzhogs skams byed dang nus med du/ /byed pa las kyi cho ga yin/ /

'di dag nyer 'grub tshul 'di ni/ /rgyu dang mtshan ma thabs dang ni/ /las dang spyod tshul rim pa ste/ /phyag rgya rig sngags 'khrul 'khor te/ /ltas dang nges par zlog par byed/ /rnal 'byor pas ni grub dkyil 'khor/ /ye shes phrin las bstan pa'o/ /'di

grub pa yi nges pa yang / /rdo rje slob dpon dag gis ni/ /rjes su gnang ba byin pa dang / /dbang gi dus su phrin las kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs thob bas 'byung / /lam du lhag pa'i lha yis ni/ /brtan pas byin gyis brlab pa dang / /rig

sngags phreng pa 'dzin pa las/ /grags bshad pa las bdun 'gyur du/ /bsnyen pa nye bar grub par 'gyur/ /kha cag phran tshegs las rnams las/ /bzhi 'gyur bsam gtan ldan pas 'grub/ /rlung gi nus pa brtan pa dang / /lta stangs thogs

med 'byung ba yi/ /nye bar 'tshe ba'i gnod pa dag /bltas pa tsam gyis zhi ba yi/ /rang sems gnyug ma'i shos pa la/ /dbang thob rdo rje'i stobs gyur pas/ /'byung ba'i skye mched zil non phyir/ /las tshogs thams cad nges bar 'grub/ /

byang chub sems ni rjes dran zhing / /pha rol gnod byed gyur pa yi/ /srin mo sha za gtum mo dang / /'byung po dag gis gnod par bcas/ /de dag kun la dpa' po yi/ /rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar na/ /gnod par nus pa ma yin te/ /me dang

chu dang gcan gzan dang / /rgyal po'i chad pa mi rgod dang / /seng ge glang po srin po ste/ /'jigs pa brgyad sogs mi 'byung byed/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/ /

zhal gsum phyag drug sbrul gyis brgyan/ /sku mdog nag po 'bar ba'i sku/ /rang gi yum dang gnyis med pa/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pas/ /oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni rdo rje can gyi bka'/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las

rnams la/ /ma lus 'grub par byed pa yi/ /gsang ba nye bar 'grub pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan dam tshig che/ /rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /khro bo'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /kun du skrag par byed pa yi/ /

rdo rje khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyung / /khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /bdud dang log 'dren ma rungs pa/ /gang gis gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa/ /me srin ma he'i zhal phyung zhing / /

gtsigs pa khrag 'dzag kha dog dmar/ /steng du mngon par phyung ba dang / /dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pa'i sku/ /rigs kyi zhal drug 'bar ba mnga'/ /bcu drug zhabs kyis gshin rje gnon/ /de phyir 'jigs byed chen por brjod/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal

po gdul don du/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi'i phyag rgya can/ /dbang phyug drug po gdul ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba gyen du bsgreng ba'o/ /khyab 'jug gdul phyir ma he'i zhal/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras pa dang / /rang gi 'khor lor dbus bzhugs

tshe/ /lha mo rdo rje bde ma dang / /gnyis su med par gnas pa'o/ /de nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yis/ /ljon shing 'dzeg ltar sbyor bar mdzad/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gsang ba

'grub/ /oM hrIHSh+DIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ me thab dang ni dur khrod ras/ /gsal shing bskyon dang rdo rje yi/ /thob rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje dgra sta thod tshal dang / /rlung gis khyer ba'i ras dag gis/ /'dus par dgug dang nges ster ba/ /

gsad dang rab tu brdung ba dang / /rnam par mnan dang shin tu gsad/ /chu bo bzlog dang rlung bcing ba/ /las kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis shes par bya/ /de las gzhan du gyur pa yi/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs pa/ /'dir ni mi 'grub

gang yang med/ /de ltar tshar bcad las mdzad cing / /thugs rjes nye bar mi gtong phyir/ /zhi ba'i zhal ni spyi gtsug nas/ /kun nas nor bu'i snying por mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu 'bar ba dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las yang dag bstan pa'o/ /

gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dag dang / /tshan do nye ba'i tshan do dang / /'du sa nye ba'i 'du sa dang / /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod dang / /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /phyi nang bslab pa'i tshul dag gis/ /sa ni bcu gnyis

tshul du brjod/ /gnas ni sum cu rtsa gnyis su/ /chos rnams rmi lam tshul 'char ba/ /mi slob zung 'jug thob byed phyir/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du 'byung / /de nyid rim pa shes par bya/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yi/ /yan lag bcu gnyis dag gyur

pa/ /tshul 'di rtogs par bstan pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug /rig pa dag pas sku rdo rje/ /tshor ba sred pa len pa dag /mi dmigs gsung gi rdo rjer dag /srid pa skye ba rga shi rnams/ /rdo rje thugs kyis dag byed pa'o/ /ma

rig pa dang 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes pa rnam pa gsum/ /ye shes dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dbyer med rang 'byung ngo bor gyur/ /rtog pa med par bde ba'i ro/ /snang ba ngos bzung med pa yi/ /gnyis med bde ba'i rnam par snang / /bcom

ldan ye shes sku gcig tu/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yi/ /ye shes rdo rje rang byung ba'i/ /de nyid dang las sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i snang ba la/ /mi 'gag

lam ni mngon gyur cing / /gsang ba rdzogs pa'i lam dag pas/ /yang dag ye shes 'byung bar gnas/ /'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste/ /sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /dam tshig dag gis

rdzogs gyur ba/ /gsang ba chen po'i lam gyur ni/ /sngags kyi rim pa yan lag bzhis/ /lam gyi spyod pa'i tshul mchog gis/ /tshe gcig gis ni byang chub 'thob/ /gsang ba'i pad+mar nyi ma 'khyil/ /mdzod spu'i gnas su bdud rtsi yi/ /zla ba

sangs rgyas kun gyi nya/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /gang du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor las/ /zhi bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /mA ma kI dang gnyis med pas/ /tshad med bum pa bzang po 'thob/ /rin chen nor bu'i dkyil 'khor las/ /rnal 'byor

rgyas pa'i 'phel byed pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /dpag bsam shing chen rab grub pa'o/ /pad+ma 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /sngags pas chags med dbang sdud pa/ /gos dkar lha mo ye shes che/ /'dod 'jo'i ba ltar rab grub byed/ /ral

gri 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /gang du sna tshogs phrin las spyod/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i khyad par las/ /cang shes rta yi stobs kyis bgrod/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i rlung / /chos kyi dbyings kyi
