dbang phyug mas/ /bsam 'phel nor bu thob byed pa'o/ /rgyu ba'i rlung ni rab zin pas/ /'jig rten gsum po kun gyi ni/ /gzugs gsum phra rags med par ni/ /blo yi yul du mthong bar byed/ /rab tu rgyu ba rab zin pas/ /phyogs bcu kun du

khyab gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje dri yi bye brag kun/ /ma lus tshor bar gyur pa yin/ /mngon par rgyu ba zin pas na/ /sa gsum po ni grag pa yin/ /sgra yi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa/ /de kun drung na grag bzhin 'byung / /shin tu rgyu ba zin pa yis/ /rdo rje ro yi bye brag

kun/ /ma lus lus pa med pa dag /myongs 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa kye/ /yang dag rab tu rgyu ba ni/ /shin tu brtan pa thob pa las/ /srid zhi reg byar gyur pa dag /de yis nges par tshor bar 'byung / /gang du rdo rje brtan pa las/ /mi phyed srog ni gcig

gyur ba/ /de snyed snying las 'od 'byung ba'i/ /bsil zer rta bdun cha mnyam pas/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gar bcas pa'i/ /thabs dang thabs ldan bskyod pa'i rlung / /'dis ni mkha' la rab lding 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i

cha las ni/ /phyag rgya'i shu tra len byed pa/ /gsang ba rdo rje nang du ni/ /bde ba skyes pa til 'bru bzhin/ /de nyid yongs su dag pa ni/ /kun 'dar mar ni de bzhin gshegs/ /mkha' dang thig le sangs rgyas sku/ /rab tu mthong byed rnal 'byor che/ /

bde ba nyams pa med pa las/ /bcu drug cha yi rin chen rtse/ /ri rab steng du dbang po ni/ /thur bltas sum cu rtsa gsum pas/ /ri bong 'dzin phyir mi ldog pas/ /de nyid zag med khang na/ /bde ba chen por gnas gyur pa'o/ /khams rnams

las ni gyur pa yi/ /sdud dang 'bar dang smin pa dang / /'degs pa brtan byed 'khrul 'khor las/ /zag bcas rlung ni ldog pa dang / /zag med ting 'dzin thob pa las/ /sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / /brtan byed rgyu mthun rtags mthong phyir/ /

'jug cing ldog pa med pas na/ /dbu yi gtsug tor de nas 'byung / /rang gi ngo bo'i sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas stong dang gnyis bcas pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul ye shes las byung ba'o/ /de skad ces ni gsungs

pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni/ /kun du bzang pos legs thob pa/ /gsang ba'i don ni 'di zhus yin/ /gang du sum cu rtsa gnyis/ /gnas sogs dbye ba sa yi cha/ /de nyid nye bar bstan pa dang / /sgyu ma'i dpe ni bcu gnyis

las/ /chos nyid ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/ /ro hi ta la sogs pa yi/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis dag las ni/ /khyad par ji skad thob pa'i tshul/ /'dir ni nye bar bstan du gsol/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /khyad par don du bka' stsal pa/ /gnas ni

du li ra yar brjod/ /de bzhin dza lan d+ha ra dang / /au D+yan ar bu ta nyid de/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar brjod pa'o/ /ba glang bdag po nyer gnas te/ /ra me shwa ri nyid dang ni/ /de ba ko tsha mA la ba/ /dri ma med pa'i sa rab gnas/ /kA ma rU pa o Ta ni/ /zhing

du brjod pa nges pa yin/ /'od 'phro'i sa ni thob pa byed/ /tri sha ku Ni ko sa la/ /nye ba'i zhing steng sa bzhi pa/ /ka ling ka dang lam pa ka /tshan do ha ste sa lnga pa/ /kany+tsi hi ma la yar ni/ /nye ba'i tshan do su drug pa'o/ /pre ta pu ri khyim gyi lha/ /'dus pa

can te sa bdun pa/ /sau rASh+T+ra gser gling ste/ /nye ba'i 'dus pas brgyad pa/ /na ga ra dang sin+d+hu ste/ /dur khrod sa ni dgu pa yin/ /ma ro ku lu tha 'di dag /nye ba'i dur khrod sa bcu pa/ /chos kyi sprin du mngon par brjod/ /kong kha na dang kha ba'i ri/ /tsa ri tra dang

kaM po tse/ /'thung gcod sa ni bcu gcig pa/ /ha ri ke la taM b+ha la/ /tsa ra sing ha ri ldan pa/ /ni ri ti pa'i gling gyur pa/ /nye ba'i 'thung gcod brjod par bya/ /'di dag sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /khyad par 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i gnas/ /bcu

gsum pa yi sa brjod la/ /yongs su gnas pa bde ba che/ /khyad par gling ni bcu gnyis su/ /gsang ba'i rgyud rnams bstan pa ni/ /kla klo'i gling ni bcu gnyis su/ /rdo rje 'chang gis bstan pa yin/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /yang dag tu ni ston

par byed/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /ngo bo med cing gnas med pas/ /de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la/ /sems can don la bla med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs skye

bar/ /'dir ni the tsom yod ma yin/ /chos rnams sprul ba lta bu ste/ /de nyid rjes su spyad pa na/ /rnam pa kun du zhi ba yi/ /tshul gnas las dang mnyam par 'byung / /'di nyid mthar rtogs shin tu dben/ /rnam par mi rtog bye brag las/ /khyad par byin

brlabs sprul pa yis/ /dngos po rgyas 'debs gyur pa'o/ /chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ /brag ca lta bur rang stong zhing / /phyi nang med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /brjod du med pa'i sgra rnams la/ /rnam dag sgra med sgrar 'jug med/ /chos rnams rang bzhin

med pa'i gnas/ /mngon par ston pa'i tshul gnas kyang / /de nyid sgra la gnas pa min/ /chos rnams dri za'i grong khyer ltar/ /phyi dang nang dang bar du yang / /dngos po med de nges par snang / /sgro skur med de tha snyad 'das/ /chos nyid mngon par bsgrub

dag pas/ /tshad med bslab pa nus ma yin/ /chos rnams chu zla lta bur ni/ /snang ba ngos gzung med pa'i dngos/ /yang dag grub par gnas med de/ /de nyid khyab pas stong pa'i sar/ /gzung med bcing dang grol med pas/ /yang dag snang ba 'dir mtshon

rno/ /chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /grub pa med pa'i dngos po las/ /de nyid chur mthong 'khrul pa'i lam/ /de ltar sna tshogs snang ba yang / /grub med stong pa'i snang ba las/ /gzhan med 'khrul bar ma byed cig /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu

ste/ /rmi lam du ni 'jig rten dang / /'jig rten 'das pa ma grub ste/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bar bcas/ /'pho ba med cing skye ba med/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byed med/ /de nyid med bzhin snang ba yang / /'gag pa med par 'byung

ba'i phyir/ /rnam dag gnas med snang ba bral/ /de ltar chos kun rmi lam dang / /ngo bo nyid gcig shes bya ste/ /rmi lam gyi ni tshul du yang / /kun nas spyod pas khyab par bya/ /dngos snang ma lus chos khyab pa/ /thams cad rmi lam ri mo ltar/ /dngos

med snang bar ba shes bya/ /rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rmi lam la mngon par chags pa spong ba dang / rmi lam rab tu dben par shes pa dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin shes par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la rmi lam lta bur byin gyis rlob pa dang /

chos thams cad rmi lam dang tha mi dad par 'char ba'i don dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba dang / rmi lam nyid dung rnam par mi rtog cing mi spyod pa dang / rmi lam gyi 'jig rten khog du chud pa lta bur rab tu rtogs par bya ba nyid

ngo / /de nyid bla med tshul 'di rtogs par bya/ 'di dag rmi lam lta bur khong chud cing / /chos kun srid pa ma lus snang ba yang / /rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /'di ni yul dang phyogs la mi gnas te/ /rmi lam rab tu zhil de dag gzhol/ /rang bzhin

mkhas shing rnam par rtog med ldan/ /rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba med/ /kun du rmi lam lta bur shin tu spyod/ /dus gsum ma lus bag chags gzugs brnyan rnams/ /shin tu nyer 'byung lus 'das sbyang bar bya/ /rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur rab shes bya/ /

de lus shi med 'gyur med skye ba med/ /phyogs rnams kun du yod min med pa'ang min/ /khams gsum thams cad rmi lam tshul lta bu/ /'di la rnam par rto med tshul byas shing / /shin tu mkhas de'i sems la bcings pa med/ /'gro kun

rmi lam rang bzhin tshul 'dral/ /de dag mi gnas 'jig rten las rab dben/ /rten med mi rtog 'jig rten rnam rtog med/ /rmi lam chos rtogs mkhas pas spyod pa bya/ /rmi lam 'gro ba rnam pa du ma snang / /tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /bye brag

rnam mang rtog pa yongs su sbyang / /de nyid tshul gyis rnam pa rab tu rtogs/ /mtshan nyid rnam 'das skal ba mnyam pa nyid/ /gcig las rnam mang du mar gang snang ltos/ /rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba rab tu shes/ /kun la rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang / /

zhing rnams rmi lam chos rnams rmi ltar byed/ /kun nyon mongs dang rnam byang tshul 'di la/ /rab tu rtog med rmi lam spyod pa yis/ /yang dag 'grub par 'gyur ba'i lam yin te/ /rmi lam smon lam rnam pas gnas med pa/ /de ni chos rnams kun la mi gnas

so/ /tshul 'di la ni cung zad byed gnas med/ /'jig rten 'di 'drar 'byung ba shes shing dag /tshul rtogs 'gro kun mi 'jigs chos la sbyor/ /'dir sbyong srid pa kun du chud mi za/ /rmi lam brgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes/ /de nyid rmi lam mdzad pas

sangs rgyas zhing / /yongs su sbyangs shing sems can smin byed la/ /rnam thar sgo thob chos kyi 'khor lo yis/ /tshad med ye shes gzhal med gnas 'dir 'thob/ /chos thams cad la rmi lam yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bstan pa ste mngon bar 'byung

pa'o/ /chos rnams dbang po'i gzhu lta bur/ /rang byung dngos po med pa yi/ /'od snang dngos po med pa yi/ /'od snang lus kyis spros ba med/ /bde bzhi ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du/ /stong ba'i ngang nas kun nas ldang / /rlung las yang dag 'byung ba'i

phyir/ /nyer len rang sar grol ba'i gnas/ /chos rnams bar snang glog bzhin du/ /rang rig yid kyi rnam shes kyis/ /kun du khyab par rgyu ba ni/ /rtsa ba las rlung dag par bya/ /chos kun chu yi chu bur ni/ /rgya mtsho las byung ji bzhin par/ /

chos nyid sna tshogs rgya mtsho las/ /rtog pa'i dra ba dag par bya/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur 'char ba yang / /gang du rlung sems gcig tu ma dag na/ /'khrul pa sgyu ma lta bur dngos la zhen/ /de nyid srid pa kun du ston pa yin/ /de nyid dag pas snang

ba'i mngon zhen bral/ /rtog pa log pas brtan g.yo sgyu mar 'char/ /dngos rnams kun la chags pa med pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma'i tshul shes phyir/ /sgyu mar bzhi spros pa med pa ste/ /gnas med chos kyi dbyings la de gnas byed/ /chos

rnams kun dag sgyu ma tha dad med/ /dbye ba rdul tsam du ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /rang lus sgyu ma'i rnam par rab shes pas/ /'gro kun skyes pa bud med sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad gzugs ni sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /mkhas pa su dag de las gzhan du spyod/ /

de ltar sgyu ma chags med sna tshogs pa'i/ /gnas kyi dbang phyug de la zhen mi byed/ /'jig rten dngos dang dngos med gang gnas pa/ /sgyu ma'i tshul gyis gnas pa med par gnas/ /sgyu ma nyid du yang dag rab grol bas/ /de bzhin nyid la mnyam par gzhag

ba dang / /rjes thob gnyis med sgom dang bsgom bya bral/ /sems med de la sems las gzhan pa'i chos/ /'jig rten tha snyad tsam du'ang mi brjod de/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes sgyu ma'i sku/ /skye med nam mkha'i sgyu ma 'di la ltos/ /thams cad stong nyid gzugs

kyi glang po dang / /shing rta ma he 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyi/ /rin chen bdun dang dpung chen thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs nyid de yi 'bras bu las/ /gang du 'byung zhing gang du'ang song ba med/ /'gro 'ong gnas sgyu rgyu 'bras sgyu ma'i chos/ /'di ni ljon shing

rin chen 'bru 'bab cing / /'dzam bu'i chu bos shing gi 'bras bu yang / /mi mnyam mnyam med dus gsum phyogs bcu po/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgyu ma'i bkod pas sbyong / /sems can sgyu mar tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs pas/ /

'bras bu sku bzhi sgyu ma'i ye she can/ /'di ltar gang shes 'di ni mi skye ba'i/ /chos la bzod pa thob par rig bar bya/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'o/ /ro hi

ta snye brgyal bar byed/ /mo he te ni yan lag 'byung / /b+ha dra bkra shis byed pa'o/ /bre sha pa ni dge bster/ /bi sha pa ni 'dus pa la/ /kurmA pa la 'tsho ba skyong / /ma ka ra d+ha n+d+ha ba ni/ /mi phyed dbang po 'byung pa'o/ /ma skar ni dag par byed/ /bi tri ka ni rnam

par rgyal/ /b+ha ku la ni rten pa ste/ /swab+na zhes pa brab gang / /ka ma ni zhes rgyan yin te/ /'di dag lus ngag yid dag la/ /dkar phyogs bde ba 'phel byed yin/ /de las rnam par bzlog pa ni/ /nag phyogs ma rungs mngon brtson pa/ /bar mas

gti mug rmongs par gnas/ /rnal 'byor bas ni 'dir shes pas/ /las rnams thun gyis 'dir dag pas/ /bcu gnyis dag tu bstan pa yin/ /khyad par bsdus pa'i tshul shes pas/ /rgyu dang thabs dang khyad par gyi/ /bla med ye shes tshul 'di bstan/ /

'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /de nyid rnam par 'khrus gyur pas/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis su/ /lugs su 'byung bas 'khor ba yin /chos nyid sna tshogs 'khor lor ni/ /lam du sbyong bar rim shes bya/ /log pas lta dang brtul zhugs

'dzin/ /de 'bral gol bas thar pa med/ /dman pas mngon mthong spyod pa las/ /dkar po'i phyogs gnas skyabs gsum las/ /mos pas nyan rab zhi ba'i lam/ /ngal bso tsam las rnam dag min/ /khyad par byang chub sems dpa'i lam/ /rtsa ba

sa bon byang chub sems/ /de las rin chen ljon shing gi/ /pad sdong lo 'dab me tog rgyas/ /'bras bu bde gshegs yid bzhin nor/ /dgos 'dod dri ma med pa'i gter/ /rten 'brel lugs bzlog chos 'byung ba'i/ /zab dang rgya che'i snying po ni/ /

grub mtha' du ma rtogs pa'i gnas/ /de ni yang dag gnas mi 'thob/ /gsang ba rdo rje theg pa las/ /rgyud sde'i snying po 'dus pa'i don/ /dug lnga'i rtog pa spyangs gyur pas/ /dbang dang las kyi rim pa las/ /sku gsum sa yi dbang phyug 'thob/ /

phyi nang spyod pa'i don gnas la/ /dam tshig gnas pa'i tshul bzhin spyod/ /spyi dang khyad par sku gsum dang / /sku bzhi ye shes rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /mngon par byang chub lnga dang ni/ /drug pa dang po'i mgon po las/ /ye shes rgya mtsho sprin 'phro bas/ /

rigs ni brgya dang stong dag tu/ /spros dang sdud pa gsang chen gyi/ /gcig pa mi zad sems bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yang / /dkyil 'khor snying por 'byung pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba

gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las snying po mchog tu bskul ba dang yongs su dag par ston pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba bla na med pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rab tu phyung ngo / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi khu ba la sogs pas/ /cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /

rig ma gzugs bzang mdangs dang ldan/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog /spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hU~M

dang oM dag dang / /AHdang phaT kyang rab tu bsgom/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/ /pad+ma rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dgar/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /sangs

rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsams nas/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ /rang rigs las byung rab tu spro/ /'di ni bde ba mchog gyur pa/ /gsang ba ye shes grub pa'i gtso/ /

dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi legs byugs pa/ /shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga yi/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i dbyibs gnas pa/ /kha dog dmar po e yi dbyibs/ /de la gsang ba'i lha

tshogs kyi/ /thig le dkar po sum cu gcig /baM gyi rnam par brjod pa yin/ /der 'jug cho ga brtag pa yis/ /mkhas pas rim pa shes par bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol ba'i rigs can las/ /sme sha

can ni bcu gnyis ma/ /lang tshor ldan zhing sgeg pa dang / /bzhin mig dkyus ring ba ni/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid yongs shes pas/ /rig ma yongs su sbyangs pa gzhug /bla ma la ni dbul bya zhing / /gang du maN+Dal me tog dang / /mchod pa ye

shes sngon byas te/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba 'dzin/ /me tog bcas pa'i lha mo la/ /mnyam par phyag bya gsol ba gdab/ /mgon po gsang pa 'dzin pa po/ /sems dpa' chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi ye shes che/ /thams cad stong ba bla na med/ /mtshan nyid nyams myong gcig pa nyid/ /rdo rje gsang bas bdag la stsol/ /las dang skye ba las grol ba'i/ /tshe 'dir byang chub mchog thob la/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan du skyabs ma

mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen po/ /de bas blo mchog mnyes par mdzod/ /de ltar gsol ba gdab pa mchog /dam pa des ni thob gyur nas/ /dpal ldan bla ma yon tan mtshos/ /snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/ /bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur

nas/ /rang gi brtse bar rab dga' zhing / /gsang ba rgyud las bde thob pa/ /bzang po'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor bstan/ /de nas slob dpon snyoms zhugs nas/ /ka la sha'am dung chos su/ /byang chub sems ni rab dbyung ste/ oM AHbadzra d+h-IkA hU~M/ /

bzang po'i phreng ba nye bar byin/ /de nas slob ma de la ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs te/ /rgyal pa'i phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /dam tshig gsang ba sbyin gyur pa/ /rdo rje can ni phyed dus su/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /bkra shis sgra ni

bsgrags pa dang / rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po yis/ /khams gsum rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/ /slob ma 'dud cing thal sbyar ba/ /'dir ni rab tu bskur ba yis/ /khyad par nang du nges dbang bskur/ /phreng

ba chu dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni/ /slob dpon dag dang gnang ba sbyin/ /dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod lung bstan pas/ /dbang bskur rim pa 'di sbyin bya/ /de nas bdag byin brlab pa'i rim/ /bcud du bya ba'i thabs bstan

pa/ /kun rdzob bden pa yang dag sbyin/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /khyad par bde chen dbang bskur ba/ /rig ma dag par sbyangs pa dang / /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa yis/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /slar yang bla mas gsang ba

brjod/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/ /de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gtso bas bdag la bka' drin stsol/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen

gyis/ /bdag la nges par dbang bskur cig /de ltar lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /bla ma la ni bka' stsal zhu/ /lha mo gzugs bzang mdangs ldan pa/ /lo grags bcu gnyis lon rnyed la/ /rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te/ /bdag

gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros ches/ /de yi lag pa der gtad de/ /gzugs ma shin tu nyams dga' 'di/ /bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba dam pa yang dag myong / /bde ba

dpag med 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /ye shes chen po 'dir rtogs bya/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /'di las gzhan pa mchog med de/ /'gro ba gsum po dag rig par/ /dga' ba yang dag rtogs par gyis/ /de bas nams yang 'di dang ni/ /

khyed kyis bral bar ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /de nas dri zhim me tog spras/ /gcer bu chu skyes ston par mdzad/ /bshang

gci la sogs za ba dang / /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ /rtag par bud med mchog gus pas/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed dang / /ji ltar spro bar byed dam ci/ /ji ltar bde bar smros shig bu/ /de ni nye bar gzung bya ba/ /bshang gci'i bdud rtsi bza' bya ba/ /

bud med rtag gus gus cis mi bgyid/ /gsang ba'i pad+mar 'o byed pa/ /lha mo bdag ni cis mi spro/ /de ni nye bar gnas pa yis/ /gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par 'gyur/ /e ma ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /gang zhig cho ga bzhin

sten pa/ /de yi mdun bdag gnas te/ /sangs rgyas bsten pa la sogs pa/ /pad+mar bya ba ji bzhin gyis/ /bde chen rgyal por rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid du ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /b+hany+dza mok+Sha ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA pa A t+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ 'dod

chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /bde chen rang byung phyag rgya'i dbus/ /rdo rje skyil krung la sems ni/ /nor bu'i nang du brtag par bya/ /rgyu mthun la sogs

bde ba las/ /ye shes skye bas de bzhin du/ /dri ma med pa'i don du ni/ /thob pa sbyor ba las byung ba/ /b+ha gar ling+ga gzhag bya ste/ /byang chub sems ni dbyung mi bya/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad las/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /

mi 'gyur mchog tu bde 'thob pa'o/ /tshangs spyad brtan pas gnas pa ni/ /yongs su sdom pa rig pa 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gar mkhan te/ /sdom pa bcom ldan yang dag 'dzin/ /'dir ni rim pa 'di shes bya/ /sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /

rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs las nges bstan pa'i/ /spyad bya stobs ldan mchog 'di yin/ /g+ho/ sangs rgyas rigs ni dag pa yi/ /lha mo rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ /ba glang sha yi rigs dag pas/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i dam tshig yin//

ku/ za byed 'thung zhing kun du rgyu/ /rin chen rigs la des 'byung ba'i/ /khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /d+ha/ myur du 'gro zhing shugs dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /rta sha dag gi dam tshig

gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /ha/ g.yul du dpa' zhing mi ldog pa/ /las kyi rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob 'gyur ro/ /mu/ pad+ma'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /rta sha dag gi

dam tshig gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /ha/ g.yul du dpa' zhing mi ldog pa/ /las kyi rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob 'gyur ro/ /mu/ phyag rgya chu yi rnam pa las/ /zhe sdang dpa' bo rdo rje

'dzin/ /bshang gci dam tshig mchog 'di ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /b+hi/ bzhi mnyam lus las 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gti mug 'dren pa 'khor lo che/ /rnam snang dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i

dpal ldan 'gyur/ /maH/ sgo dgu nas byung rgyungs pa dang / klad pa rkang du bcas pa las/ /rin chen nga rgyal 'dzin pa'i skus/ /'dis ni pad+ma'i mdangs can 'gyur/ /rA dza'i bu gar rang byung ba'i/ /rA ga 'bar ba'i 'od can ni/ /'dod chags chen po'i

'byung gnas las/ /'dzam bu'i chu po'i 'od ltar 'gyur/ /shu/ lus kun las ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /kun da lta bu'i byang chub sems/ /las kyi phrin las ral gri che/ /phran las sna tshogs dbang thob 'gyur/ /ma~M/ kun du myos byed bcud bsdus pa'i/ /snying

po 'chi med rtog med pa'i/ /ye shes 'byung gnas khu ba 'di/ /rnal 'byor pa yi grol ba'i rgyu/ /'jig rten kun du rgyal byed pa/ /gsang ba dag pa'i dam tshig gnas/ /hU~M b+h+rU~M trA~M hrIHkha~M la~M ma~M pa~M ta~M AH/ /sgron me lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /yid bzhin nor

bu mchog ster byed/ /dug lnga bdud rtsir dag pas ni/ /ye shes lnga thob phyir mi ldog /'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can/ /rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya/ /'dis ni gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /

gsang ba shes rab la brten pa'i/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag pa ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gnas/ /'di dag rim pas sbyang bar bya/ /ji bzhin gzhi la spyod pa las/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs la ma gyur pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab rol bas ni/ /

'dod yon lam du byed pa'o/ /gang du phyag dar khrod pa yi/ /gos 'chang spyod pa ku su lu/ /bskus te bor ba'i sman za bas/ /'dir ni sna tshogs chos su spyad/ /spyod lam kun du 'dris pa las/ /phying bu tshal pa tsam 'dzin pa/ /'di ni phyogs med gos

can te/ /rnam pa thal ba yis byugs yin/ /gang du chos gos gsum pa ni/ /stod g.yogs glang po'i pags pa dang / /mi yi pags pa nyid la rten/ /smad dkris stag gi ko bas dkris/ /phyis mi len pa lan cig ste/ /spros pa

gcod par byed pa yis/ /byin gyis ma brlabs zas dang gos/ /skad cig tsam du sten mi byed/ /rang nyid lhan cig phyag rgyar bcas/ /snod gcig za ba'i gtsang sbra las/ /du mar 'byung ba ma yin pa/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo gcig tu grags/ /

lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shig gcig drung / /gdug pa ma lus gdul don du/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'am gcig tu yang / /brtul zhugs sbyor bas gnas par byed/ /chu gling ri sul bla gab med/ /der ni gcer bu'i rol pa yis/ /bdud rtsi za zhing

rig ma dang / /gcig par gnas pa'i spyod pa che/ /kha T+wAM Da ma rur bcas shing / /thod pa'i tshal bus rdzas khyer te/ /shin tu gsang bas spyod pa ni/ /bsam mthar gnas pa dben pa'o/ /dur khrod rab son dge 'dun sar/ /chos kun bdag med mi rtog pas/ /

rtog pa de bas gnas pa gang / /dur khrod pa zhes brjod pa'o/ /tha dad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /du ma'i snag ba ro mnyam pas/ /kun du bsod nams byed pa dag /ro snyoms ye shes spyod pa yin/ /'di dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dge slong

chen por shes par bya/ /tshangs par spyod pa mi ldog pas/ /kun du ye shes 'bral mi byed/ /'jig rten sgyu ma'i snang ba las/ /chags pa med pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'thob pa'o/ /gsang ba sbyangs ba'i tshul 'di ni/ /

gzhan du rtogs par mi 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i

dbang dang / spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad mi 'gyur te/ /thams cad dbang bskur ye shes mchog /ye shes dkyil 'khor gsang ba bshad/ /

zhing 'dir rin chen 'dun dag gis/ /mkhas pas khyab par yongs bkang ste/ /khyad par ye shes bde don du/ /shes rab ldan pas bla mar dbul/ /de mdun yan lag rnam dag pas/ /dpe med rol bas dbul bar bya/ /khu ba byung bas rang

lus las/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spro ba ste/ /rigs kyi lha rnams cho ga bzhin/ /lus la nye bar dgod pa'o/ /ye shes 'bras bu thob 'dod pas/ /gnyis su med par btung bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /bsdu ba nyid kyis

nyer gsad pa/ /'di ni dngos grub rgya mtsho yi/ /bla med 'bras bu thob 'gyur ba'o/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje stong pa nyid/ /dbus gnas mngon par byang chub brjod/ /de nyid me long ye shes ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtag /nyi ma mnyam

nyid ye shes te/ /bdun dang ldan pa'i dbus nyid do/ /sngags ni dbus su gnas gyur gang / /sa bon so sor rtog pa ste/ /mngon par byang chub pa nyid do/ /rdo rje la sogs gang gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yongs su

rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /zhal gsum rtsa gsum brjod par bya/ /sku gsum lus ngag yid yin te/ /de nyid mngon par byang chub brjod/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma dang / /nor bu ral gri 'bar ba las/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam pa ste/ /bla med ye

shes byang chub brjod/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa'i mchog ni kun ldan pa/ /skad cig gcig la rab rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /gsang sngags sa bon bskyed pa can/ /phyag rgya'i

tshogs su brtags pa yis/ /rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /de ni bskyed par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /de nas gsang ba'i dngos bsdus pa'i/ /ye shes bsam gtan gnyis kyis ni/ /bdag dang bdag

gir 'dzin pa yi/ /dngos po sreg byed ye shes med/ /bsam gtan gnyis pos gcig tu yang / /stong nyid ngang du gnas byed pa'o/ /ril por 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gzung ba'i rtog pa spong byed cing / /shes rab zab mo'i ngo bo nyid/ /

de nyid bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /sgyu ma'i lus kyi snang ba nyid/ /dngos po'i chos nyid stong nyid 'jug /rjes su gzhig pas ting nge 'dzin/ /'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms byed pa/ /thabs nyid rgya che'i rang bzhin can/ /de nyid spros pa'i tshul bstan pas/ /

stong nyid gcig tu gnas pa ni/ /kun khyab ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gro/ /stong nyid ye shes chen po'i mes/ /rang bzhin rtog pa'i gnas ngan len/ /mngon rgyu bag chags bcas pa yi/ /rang bzhin brgya dang drug cu dang / /thog mtha' med pa'i byang

chub sems/ /rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang / /dngos dang dngos min rtog pa'i tshogs/ /snang ba tsam du 'dzin med par/ /stong nyid 'od gsal nam mkha' la/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ngang du 'gro/ /de

nyid kun khyab kun gyi gnas/ /brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sku/ /thams cad 'od gsal mngon byang chub/ /de ltar ma rtogs ma rig pas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /de dag rab tu mi shes shing / /thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi/ /bag chags

rab tu bsags byed pa/ /de dag sngon gyi las kyis ni/ /skye dang 'chi bar yang dag 'byung / /rig pa 'od gsal dbyings gnas kyang / /'gyu byed rlung las ma rig byung / /de las snang ba dang po dang / /mched pa dag dang thog pa dag /lugs su

'byung bas rnam shes la/ /rlung gi spyod pa shin tu 'khrul/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid/ /yid kyi rnam shes 'gyur ba yi/ /rlung las kun du 'khrul pa'i las/ /'byung ba de nyid kho na la/ /ma rig rmongs pas ltung ba ni/ /bla ma med phyir

'khyams pa'o/ /kun du brtags pa'i ma rig pa/ /dngas snyigs gnyis su rlung gis phye/ /dngas ma stong nyid ye shes sems/ /kun gzhi rang byung chos nyid gnas/ /snyigs ma'i snod bcud khams gsum du/ /dug gsum ngang las 'byung ba ni/ /srog

'dzin rlung las zhe sdang skyes/ /gyen rgyu las ni 'dod chags byung / /gti mug khyab byed dus kun du/ /'bral ba med pas gnas pa yin/ /de nas me dang mnyam pa las/ /phrag dog 'byung bar gyur pa yin/ /thur sel las ni nga rgyal dang / /ser sna

mngon par byung ba yin/ /rlung rnams gang las 'byung ba ni/ /rig pa kun du rten gyur pa/ /sa bon cha las 'byung bzhi gnas/ /de las rtsa ba'i rlung du byung / /phyi rol 'od lnga'i snang ba las/ /zhen pas rgyu 'bras la rmongs shing / /ma rig pas ni de dag

las/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul du 'khor/ /dug gsum las ni rtsa gsum ste/ /chags sdang dbang gis pho mor byung / /de phyir sngon gyi las kyis ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi 'phor 'gyur/ /rab tu dngas pa rnam par shes/ /'od gsal byang chub gnas

'di yin/ /cung zad tsam du dngas pa la/ /bde ba las ni 'dod par gyur/ /gsal bas gzugs khams kun du skye/ /mi rtog pas ni gzugs med du/ /nges par 'char ba chos nyid can/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin/ /khams ni snyigs mar

gyur pa las/ /kun du 'pho zhing rgyu byed pa'i/ /nus pa yon tan cung zad can/ /bskal pa dang po'i mi ltar 'byung / /yul gyis 'dod chags sad pa las/ /tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du/ /bar ma do yi srid par gnas/ /srid par ltung ba'i sems can ni/ /bgrod

pas 'gro ba ji bzhin du/ /las kyi dra ba'i zhags pa yis/ /'gro ba drug tu 'joms par byed/ /de nyid rgyu rkyen sngon 'gro bas/ /nyer len 'jug par 'dod pa dang / /rang dbang med par 'jug pa dang / /skyabs gnas tshol ba'i yid 'gro bas/ /'phen

pa stobs byung 'jug par 'gyur/ /gal te mi ru skye ba na/ /pha ma'i kun du 'khrig mthong pas/ /sdug bsngal nyid kyis gdungs gyur te/ /bzhon par bcas pa'i myur 'gro ltar/ /rlung gi bzhon pa la brten te/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la/ /

shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur pa/ /dga' dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/ /bde ba'i ngang du sems zhen pas/ /kha yi lam nas thur du 'jug /ngan 'gro'i gnas la pha yi ni/ /bshang ba'i lam nas khang / /mthong nas kun du 'jug

par 'gyur/ /dus der pha ma gnyis dang ni/ /dus gcig bde ba myong byas pa'i/ /rtsa phran stong phrag bdun cu las/ /rab brgyud de yi skad cig la/ /A li kA lir zhugs gyur te/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag 'thob/ /khu ba dang ni khrag bcas

pa'i/ /dbus su bar do'i shes pa ni/ /'dus pa thig le'i gzugs su gnas/ /dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po/ /de las mer mer po ru gyur/ /ltar ltar po dang gor gor po/ /rlung rnams kyis ni bskul gyur pas/ /sha yi rnam pa mkhrang gyur du/ /

lnga pa'i dus su rkang lag 'gyu/ /yan lag lnga ni dod gyur pas/ /bdun du gyur tshe mtshan ma dang / /skra dang sen mo ba spu'i tshogs/ /mkhrang ba'i cha shas rdzogs gyur pa'o/ /brgyad pa'i dus su cher rtags shing / /zla ba dgu na lus kun rdzogs/ /bcu pa

yul gyi rtsol ba byed/ /nur nur rang bzhin mi bskyod pa/ /mer mer po ni dkon mchog dpal/ /ltar ltar po ni 'od dpag med/ /gdon mi za ba gor gor po/ /rnam snang mkhrang gyur dag tu brjod/ /gnas skabs 'byung ba lnga ldan pa/ /chu dang rlan gyis

sdud pa dang / /drod dang me yis smin par byed/ /las ni brtan dang bskyed pa las/ /rlung gis g.yo zhing 'phel bar byed/ /nam mkha' kun du rten gyur pa'o/ /dri chu khrag ni 'dus pa yi/ /dri chu'i cha ni mi bskyod zhugs/ /bzhi

mnyam rnam par snang mdzad de/ /khrag ni 'dod chags med pa'i cha/ /sha ni rin chen rgyal po nyid/ /khu ba gdon mi za ba'i lus/ /zla ba me long ye shes te/ /nyi ma mnyam pa nyid gyur pa/ /sa bon rnam pa so sor rtog /phyag mtshan las ni de nyid de/ /

thams cad gcig gyur nan tan brjod/ /lus kyi gong bu bsdus pa yis/ /stong nyid chos dbyings ye shes brjod/ /mngon par byang chub lnga yis ni/ /bskyed dang gnas dang sdud par mdzad/ /de nyid ye shes yongs dag pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byang

chub sems/ /gsang ba mchog tu bstan pa yin/ /skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas/ /g.yon nas khu ba de bzhin te/ /g.yas na de bzhin khrag yin na/ /de dag gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin

no/ /las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas/ /rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas ni/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas pad+ma'i snod/ /gdong ni nges par phyogs par gyur/ /dku g.yas su ni brten nas su/ /tsog bur mngon par phyogs te gnas/ /dku g.yon yang dag

brten nas ni/ /shes rab g.yas su mngon par phyogs/ /sa bon lhung bas dus kyis ni/ /mkhas pas dus kyis skad cig las/ /nges par brtag par bya ba yin/ /g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba na/ /thams cad du ni skyes bur byed/ /g.yas nas nges par rgyu ba ni/ /

kun du bu mor 'byung ba yin/ /thabs dang shes rab cha las ni/ /bzlog pa'i shes par bya/ /gnyis ka'i dbus su rgyu bas na/ /ma ning dang ni za mar 'byung / /'di dag 'gyur ba ngo shes pas/ /thob pa mtshan nyid brtag par bya/ /'di ltar gsang ba'i

lus 'byung ba/ /bskyed dang gnas pa 'jig tshul du/ /'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan mgon gsungs la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /thams cad dgyes pa bskyed gyur cing / /kun du bzang po'i tshul 'di zhus/ /

mngon par byang chub ye shes las/ /rigs kyi khyad par 'byung ba'i don/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas rnam pa can/ /ngo bo nyid shes snying po'i gnas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gang gsungs pa/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnams ni phung po ru/ /rags

dang phra dang shin tu phra/ /lus 'di dngos po'i tshul rtogs pas/ /phung por nges par skyes pa yin/ /srid pa skye ba'i rim shes pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir/ /'di ni rnam pa kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis

gsungs/ /de dag sgrib pa rnam sel sogs/ /kun gyis thos shing khong chud la/ /legs so legs so zhes brjod cing / /ngo mtshar gyur cing rmad byung ba'i/ /dgongs pa cang ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /'di dag chos kun rab tu zhi zhing gnyis med pa/ /

phyogs bcu kun nas snang ba'i rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs/ /dus gsum sems can khams rnams 'dul ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /lam rgyud ma lus gnas las grol byed mchog 'dir rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi

gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sems can gyi khams bskyed pa dang bsdu ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /

gsang ba dpal ldan byang chub sems/ /srid zhi mnyam par sdud mdzad pa/ /'bar ba drag pos tshul 'di gsungs/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bu'i gnas/ /spyod pa sbyin pa'i tshul bstan pa/ /gsang ba 'gro ba'i dgos 'dod skong / /nor ster lcam dral

'dir bstan pa'o/ /dzA~M k+Sh+bi~M/ 'phags pa yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog /zhal gsum phyag drug gser gyi mdog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras pa/ /sku mdog las byung rigs 'phro bas/ /don grub rgyal pos dbu brgyan pa/ /g.yas pa sngo

zhing g.yon dmar ba/ /dang po gnyis kyis ne'u le yi/ /kha nas skyug byed nor bu 'dzin/ /g.yas g.yon gzhan gyis rgyal mtshan dang / /bI dza pu ra rin chen gyi/ /bzang po'i snod bcas 'dzin par bsam/ /de las gsang ba bdud rtsi'i chu/ /rtsa lam lag

mthil brgyud nas ni/ /dbul ba mkhas pa dag gis bya/ /nyin re zhing du mchod byas nas/ /de la dngos grub nges ster byed/ /'phags ma nor ldan ma bskyed pa/ /zhal gsum phyag drug gur kum mdog /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ljang spyan gsum/ /

dang po pi tsu da la dang / /g.yon pas 'bru yi snye ma 'dzin/ /lhag mas bum pa pad+ma snod/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpal be'u 'dzin/ /'di ni rin chen sna tshogs pa'i/ /phreng ba 'od 'phro bsam par bya/ /de las spro dang bsdu ba ni/ /gnod sbyin mo ni rnam mang po/ /

zla ba bzang dang rab bzang ma/ /bde sbyin ma dang stobs chen mo/ /lha mo bkra shis sbyin pa mo/ /dpal sbyin ma dang don grub ma/ /rab dgyes bde sbyin mi 'khrugs ma/ /yang dag rgyan ma 'di rnams te/ /'khor los yongs su legs bskor ma/ /rin chen

gzhal yas khang gnas pa'i/ /lha mo rnams la dus gsum du/ /bsreg spos dbul zhing phrin las gzhol/ /'di ni gsang ba ma lus pa'i/ /gnod sbyin mo yi rtog par gsungs/ /'di las 'da' bar byed pa ni/ /gsang ba tshul gnas ma yin na/ /

de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal ba yi/ /gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /'di nyid de ma thag phyung nas/ /ye shes dam pa bka' stsal to/ /hriHshin tu dben zhing rab tu nyams dga'

bar/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom par bya/ /de nyid nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas sa bon dmar por 'phro/ /de las spro bsdu'i 'od kyi snang ba

las/ /ma lus 'gro tshogs legs par sbyangs nas ni/ /dag par byed pa'i sa bon la zhugs te/ /pad+ma ge sar 'od bcas yongs gyur pas/ /skad cig de las rje btsun spyan ras gzigs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /g.yas pa

kun+da ut+pal sngo 'dra g.yon/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras thugs rje can/ /dang po gnyis kyis ye shes rig ma la/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor bas 'khyud par mdzad/ /bar mas pad+ma sdong bu nor bu 'dzin/ /tha mas ral gri 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /dar gyi cod pan sna

tshogs kyis brgyan mdzes/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa/ /rang srog sa bon hriHyig rnam par bsam/ /de yi 'od zer ma lus tshogs 'phros pas/ /'gro ba ma lus don ni phun tshogs pa'o/ /rtog pa'i rnyog ma ma lus sel byed pa/ /thub pa'i dbang

po phyogs mtshams rab 'phros pas/ /sna tshogs nor bu 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas/ /slar 'dus rang la phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i/ /'khor lo'i lha tshogs du ma bsam par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i snying po yi/ /kha dog dkar po rnam par bsam/ /hU~MH'od kyi sprin

gyis shin tu 'bar/ /zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil/ /gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yi/ /de ma thag tu 'byung bar byed/ /lan gsum legs par bsgoms pas ni/ /skyug pa dag tu rnam bsams nas/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i dug kun yang / /de ma thag tu med par

byed/ /'di ni dngos kyi dug zhi bar byed pa'o/ /AH 'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang / /gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsam pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur/ /pad+ma 'bar ba 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su dug bsams

nas/ /'od zer lnga ni rdzogs par spro/ /dug bsdu ba ni kha dog nag /bskul ba'i zhi byed dkar po yin/ /bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba gang / /ye shes dri med gsang chen yin/ /de la 'dis ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o/ /gang dus

bdag klu las gyur/ /gnod pa ngan pa byung gyur pa/ /'dis ni skad cig dag gis kyang / /nges par zhi bar byed pa yin/ /dpal ldan seng ge sgra sbyor bas/ /gdug pa'i 'tshe ba zhi byed pa/ /pad sdong thod pa bdud rtsi bcas/ /de ni me tog rab bkang ba/ /tri shUl

sa gsum gnas las skyobs/ /rgyal po rol pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /thugs rjes dug sel bar mdzad pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje

gsum gyi gsang ba gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyungs pa'o/ /namaHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrA nAM/ oM AHuSh+NI Sha badzra/ tsakra birti/ bitsUr/ zhuSh+ShISha bi dza ya/ tsakra bi rtiH/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a mu ka~M mA ra ya phaT/ de

nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rjes su dran/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms/ /zhags pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas 'gugs pa dam tshig yin/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum sbyor ba yin/ /'khor lo chen po'i sbyor

ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /rtag tu nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'di ni ye shes me sbyor bas/ /spar ba'i dngos grub gnas thob byed/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis/ /sngags

rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog /rdo rje las byung thams cad pa/ /rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/ /rab tu mdzes ma'i mchog rnams kyis/ /snying gar rdo rje 'bar bar sbyar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje'am/ /rang sngags don gyi yon tan gyis/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur sbyor bas/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog /rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/ /'di ni rdo rje ma lus pa'i/ /byang chub srung ba'i don chen bya/ /bcom ldan

'das kyi sku ye shes rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje rta mgrin du bsgom pa/ /khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag /thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro/ /klu rnams ma lus

zhabs kyis mnan/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /kha rlangs dug rnams zhi byed pa/ /klu rnams kyis ni rgyan du byas/ /kha dog 'bar ba dmar ba'i sku/ /rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan can/ /bsams na rdo rje can 'di mnyes/ /'di ni ye shes rdo rje can/ /khro bo kun gyi dam tshig

ste/ /gsang ba nye bar bstan pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos tshe dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas pad+mo 'byung ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rab tu phyung ngo / /oM namaHsa man+ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta

badzrA NAM/ oM shrI badzra kro d+ha pa d+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya g+h+rI ba hU~M hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes/ /de nas 'jigs shing brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/ /mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba/ /rdo rje ha la ha la

'od/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /dug rnams skad cig gis med byed/ /rdo rje rta mchog bskyed pa 'byung ba rdo rjes gsungs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bcud

gyur mchog /'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba can/ /rdo rje sprin ni kun du 'khrugs/ /khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang / /mche ba rab tu rno ba ni/ /rnga sgra'i dam tshig dbu brgyan pa/ /bsgoms na khro bo mchog 'di mnyes/ /'di ni khro bo thams cad kyis/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i

dam tshig yin/ /bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje'i dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo mi 'chi gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di rab tu phyung ngo / /oM AHhU~M/ oM AH

big+h+nA n+ta kr-ita a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom/ /'bar ba me stag 'phro ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la gdab bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis/ /gdug cing khro ba tshar gcad la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi

dngos gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas byas pa na/ /spyi bo dang na mgrin pa dang / /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /rdo rje phur bus rab tu bsgom/ /dam tshig 'di las 'da' mi bya/ /'di ni phur bu'i rnam par 'phrul/ /bsam gtan rdo rje phur bu yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par

'debs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /phur bus btab na med par 'gyur/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu ni/ /rdo rje sku yi phur bu ste/ /gti mug gnas la gdab par bya/ /pho rlung dag pa'i gnas gyur pa'o/ /seng ldeng rtsa li phur bu ni/ /rdo rje gsung gi phur bu ste/ /'dod

chags gnas la gdab bya ba/ /mo rlung dag pa'i gnas gyur pa'o/ /lcags las byas pa'i rdo rje gces/ /rdo rje thugs kyi phur pa ste/ /ma ning rlung ni gnas gyur byed/ /zhe sdang gnas la nges gdab yin/ /dngos po tha dad 'dzin pa yi/ /ye shes sku gsum 'jig byed

'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar/ /rig ma'i b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor gnas gyur pa/ /de dag gsal bar dmigs nas ni/ /lha rnams gnad la dbab bya ba/ /byin rlabs shin tu myur 'dod pas/ /'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs

ldan pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan rdo rje phur bu yi/ /b+ha ga la ni nges gdab pa/ /'di nyid sku gsung thugs gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje phur bu'i sbyor ba can/ /sku gsung thugs gsum lha bskyed pa/ /gnas gang du ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /phur bus gdab par gyur pa yin/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma

nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje phur bu ling ga yi/ /byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi yis/ /bdud rtsi 'bab pas phur gdab yin/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i b+ha gar ni/ /bde bas phur bu nges par 'debs/ /de yi de ma thag tu yang / /phung

po khams dang skye mched dang / /lus kun la ni gnas gyur pa'i/ /lha rnams bdud rtsi'i cha dag tu/ /nges par zhu bas de las bskul/ /shin tu zhu bar gyur pa las/ /byang sems bde ba'i khu ba dag /snang ba dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po

che/ /phur bus btab na nges par 'chi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum/ /gsang ba'i tshul la gnas pa yis/ /rtsa rlung byang chub sems rnams ni/ /bde stong gnyis med gyur pas na/ /'chi ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /phyi rol nad gdon nyon mongs dag /bdud bzhi bcom pas

ldang bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba dam pa bsdus pa yis/ /snying po mchog tu 'byung ba nyid/ /rdo rje phur bu bstan pa gdab par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /'gro ba'i gnod pa zhi byed pa/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rgyas pa po/ /de nyid dang

la gnas par gyur/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /sku yi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ /nges 'byung rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms par zhugs te tshul 'di gsungs/ /'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag nas/ /rdo rje gsum

gyi sku yi mthar/ /gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsams pa/ /sngags kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi/ /'dis ni rdo rje gnas gsum byed/ /chos nyid ye shes ngang las bsdus pa yis/ /stong nyid byang chub

sems kyi ngang nyid las/ /rang byung rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo spro dang bsdus byas la/ /hU~M dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /gur kum bzang po'i mdog can dmar ser la/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang sngo/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par

brgyan pa yi/ /phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa dang / /mdangs ldan ral gri dang ni ut+pa la/ /shes rab mda' gzhu legs par 'dzin pa mdzad/ /de nyid shin tu gsal ba'i sku ru bsgom/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /sa bon rgyas

gdab de 'dra gnyis med bstim/ /ye shes dbang bskur dam pas rgyas gdab bya/ /ma lus rigs kyi 'khor lo spro ba yi/ /tshul gnas ye shes spyod pa go 'phang nyid/ /sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang / /nam mkha'i snying po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bar

bcas/ /dpal ldan kun du bzang po zhes bya ba/ /de dag mig la sogs pa grangs bzhin du'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang / /reg bya dang ni chos dbyings rdo rje dang / /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid gyur spyan la sogs par grags/ /gzugs dang tshor ba de bzhin

'du shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam par shes bshad pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bde gshegs te/ /rdo rje sa bon gyis ni dbyung bar bya/ /k+ShiM dzra~M kha~M ga~M khrA~M sa~M zhes bshad pa/ /'di dag mig la sogs pa rnams kyi yin/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHkha~M ra~M zhes bshad pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi rdo rje

la sogs pa'o/ /mA~M lA~M pA~M tA~M zhes bya bzhir bshad pa/ /de dag spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi yin/ /b+h+rU~M a~M dzra~M kha~M oM zhes bya ba dag /rim pa ji bzhin rtag pa la sogs pa'i/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /rim bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lta

bur ni/ /chos nyid kyis ni phan tshun khyad par med/ /phyin ci log gi rtog pa las grol bas/ /bya ba ma lus par ni rdzogs par bya/ /thub pa'i 'khor lo ma lus mchod par bya/ /mchog 'di de dag kun du rab tu dbul/ /zas la spyod tshe snying ga'i zla ba yi/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo rang gi

gsang sngags kyis/ /kun du dmigs te byang chub sems kyis ni/ /ngo bo nyid gyur 'od dang ldan par bsam/ /dngos po de dag gsum gyis bzlas bya ste/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rnam dag pa/ /de nyid sku yi rdo rje la sogs pa/ /lha rnams kun du tshim pa nyid du bya/ /phyi yi sbyin sreg

cho ga ji lta bar/ /yid kyi spyod yul sems kyis bya ba ste/ /phung po'i bud shing rnam par sreg byed pa/ /ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad/ /dam tshig nyams la snying gar zla ba la/ /snying po sna tshogs rdo rje ji bzhin bsam/ /dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro

ba rang bzhin gyis dag rnam bsams la/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbus su ni/ /sngar gyi rim pas dbang bskur kun du blang / /phyi rol dag tu khrus kyi cho ga la/ /rim 'dir khyad par yang dang yang bsam bya/ /thun mtshams rnams su de bzhin mchod la sogs/ /sngon du

'gro ba'i bzlas brjod byas nas ni/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo'i nang du chud par bya/ /snying rje shes rab ldan pas dbyings su nyal/ /ldang ba'i dus su dam tshig lha mo yi/ /yang dag glu yis dpa' bo yongs bskul ba'i/ /ldang bas thub pa bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i/ /cho ga snga ma

bzhin du bya ba yin/ /dngos grub nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni/ /de nyid gsum brjod byas nas rang gi sems/ /sngar bshad dkyil 'khor dag la gnas nas ni/ /rang 'dod go 'phang rab tu bsgrub bya yin/ /bgegs rnams bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'khor lo yi/ /bsrung ba bka'

yi 'khor lo rab sbyar bya/ /de nyid bdud las rnam par rgyal byed yin/ /dbang bskur byas pa'i 'bad pas nges par gzhom/ /gang zhig dbus su gnas par gyur pa yi/ /'khor lo de yang de yi cho 'phrul 'gyur/ /tha mal rnam rtog rgyun las ma gtogs par/ /srid pa'i sdug

bsngal yod pa ma yin te/ /de ni rnam par 'gog par 'gyur ba'i sems/ /sems ni mngon sum byin brlabs kyis mngon 'gyur/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi bdag nyid can/ /der ni kun rtog gang yin snang mi 'gyur/ /yang dag sems las tha dad ma yin zhing / /kun brtags mtshan

ma sngar ni bsgrub log pas/ /srid pa lan cig tsam du ldang mi nus/ /gang du ldog pa med pas bgrod phul byung / /'dir ni mthong ba dang ni bslabs 'phel bas/ /rnam dag rtog pa yang dag 'gog pa ste/ /tha mal pa yi rang gzugs dngos po yis/ /bdag med sbyin sogs mi

zad gter mi 'gyur/ /'dir ni gnas med ye shes dge ba'i lam/ /'dir ni bden yang der ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rtogs nas snying rjer ldan pa dag /ye shes bsam yas skad cig gis bsgrubs pa/ /dpal ldan kun du bzang po'i ngo bo nyid/ /mkhas

pas gang zhig nges par bsam mi byed/ /gang du dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam las ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis bgrod pa'i don/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes dam pa'i gzhi/ /tshad med byang chub rgyan gyur gsang ba'o/ /'di ni mtshungs med dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /

dug lnga'i rtog pa de nyid ngo bo nyid/ /yongs su shes pa'i lam gyur bsam mi khyab/ /'phags pa nyan thos dgra bcom zag pa zad/ /de la thog mar rgyun du zhugs pa dang / /phyir mi 'ong dang lan cig phyir zhugs pa/ /de dag 'khor ba dag par 'dod pa'i lam/ /rang sangs

rgyas ni 'byung tshul gnyis su gnas/ /smon lam 'bras bu thob pa ngal bso'i lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po ltar/ /phra mo skrag byed 'dir 'byung ba/ /ngang pa glang chen khyu mchog rtsal gyis ni/ /seng ge sha ra Na mchog dang / /mkha' lding

ga ru Da li lding gyur pa/ /'brug sgra sgrogs byed cang shes rta yi rtsal/ /bya khyung chen po shang shang ru ru ste/ /ri bong dag gis rang spyod shugs bstan pa'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nor bu gnas pa'i gzhi/ /klu dbang rnams dang chu srin chen po dang / /ltos 'gro za byed shin tu mi bzad pas/ /

rus sbal dung ltar ma 'dres gnas byas pa/ /de las mu tig la sogs sna tshogs pa/ /gang du yon tan ldan yang bag med gnas/ /bag la nyal ba'i phyogs ni zlog pa gnyis/ /skabs las ma bab nus pa 'byung mi nus/ /sa bon phra mo kun nas ldang ba na/ /dus

la bab tshe slu ba med par 'byung / /ded dpon thabs la mkhas pa'i gzings bcas pas/ /thar pa thob byed yan lag kun ldan pas/ /rin chen nor bus dgos pa rab sgrub pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du shes par bya/ /dbang thob byed pa rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir/ /bum pa

bzhi ldan lam bgrod rdo rje dang / /dkyil 'khor chos 'byung pad+ma'i sdong por 'byung / /sa lam khyad par rigs dang ldan pa'i chos/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal rin chen bdun ldan pa'i/ /gsang ba'i mas 'jug yas babs tshul shes pas/ /spre'u khwa ta'i tshul las bstan pa

yin/ /rdo rje gsum dang zla ba nyi ma dang / /mun pa dag gis rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /me long gzugs brnyan rdo rje sems dpa'i sku/ /ye shes 'ja' tshon chu yi zla bar ston/ /me 'od 'bar bas kun nas snang ba che/ /des khyab kun du ston pa de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs kyi sku

dang sa bon mtshan mar snang / /de nyid sangs rgyas mchog tu 'byung ba las/ /de dag gnas skabs phrin las dngos grub kun/ /du ma'i mthu stobs yon tan dpal du 'char/ /du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer ba/ /mar me 'bar dang mkha' snang dag pa ste/ /sna tshogs rtags dang yon tan

mi zad pa/ /grub pa spyod pas rgyu 'bras tha dad pa/ /ma 'dres yongs su dag pa dus med pa/ /bskal pa grangs med skad cig sgyu ma yis/ /gsum gyi dus la 'da' ba dbang phyug mchog /kha sbyar bde chen sku ni rdo rje 'chang / /dkyil 'khor bdag po dpal ldan byang chub sems/ /

des ni dag dang ma dag zhing khams su/ /mdzad pa rgya mtsho sprul pa'i snang ba yang / /bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes rol par ston/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i mgon por ni/ /spros med bde chen mi 'gyur gcig pa nyid/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i rang byung ngang la bzhugs/ /zhes gsungs

pa dang / 'dus pa rnams kyis dgyes pas yongs su khyab cing sems kyi rtog pa yongs su chod de cang mi smra bar rang rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med

pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyal po 'khor lo'i gtso/ /bdag med ye shes rgyal po che/ /ci yang mi gsung

bzhugs pa la/ /rdo rje dpal mchog chen po yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /ma lus kun gyis bkur bar mdzad/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i gnas ni dag pa nyid/ /gsungs shing gsungs shig tshul chen po/ /yid

dang ye shes spyod pa las/ /dam tshig mchog 'di bstan du gsol/ /de nyid nye bar dgongs gyur nas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /zab cing rgya che tshul bstan te/ /sngags kyi spyod pa tshad med cing / sangs rgyas ye shes

bsam mi khyab/ /rigs kyi phyi rol phyag rgya che/ /'di las gzhan du ma rtog cig /rigs kyi bu rnams mdor bsdu na/ /'di ltar sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang dag tu/ 'dod yon mngon par rol gyur kyang / /zag med bde ba chen po yi/ /ye shes kun du

spyod pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin/ /dpa' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhinagyis/ /rtog med lhan cig skyes par 'char/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ /dper na nam mkha'i khams 'di ni/ /kun gyi rjes su song bste/ /chos rnams ma lus dkyil 'khor dag /

nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin chos rnams ma lus pa/ /de dag ngo bo nyid dag pas/ /khams gsum kun du mi gnas shing / /'byung ba bzhi la gnas mi byed/ /gang du 'gro 'ong rnam bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de des bsten na/ /ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa yi/ /

chos rnams de ltar rjes rig bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /don gyi dbang ni bla na med/ /'di ltar mkhyen pas 'chang mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu rnams de ltar na/ nam mkha'i tshig ltar nges brjod pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshig dag kyang / /de dag de ltar rjes rig

bya/ /'di ni gsang ba'i gnas yin no/ /chos can gcig la rtog pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba yin/ /bde sdug 'gro bar 'byung ba rnams/ /las kyi khyad par goms pa'i phyir/ /de phyir dge dang mi dge'i las/ /lus la sogs pa'i rnam rtog byung / /rtog pa

thams cad med grol ma/ /der rtog pa la gnas pa med/ /rtog pa las ni ye shes med/ /ma rtogs nyes pas ye shes 'joms/ /mi rtogs pa las rtog pa ru/ /ldog pa nam yang mi srid do/ gzhan du rtog pa'i gnyen po ru/ /ye shes bsam pa ma yin te/ /spang bya

gnyen po gnyis med pas/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du/ /skye dang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bsam pa rdzogs pa'i lam/ nges par 'di ni rtogs par rtags/ /ngo bo rgyu tshul 'byung ba khams/ /las dang dbye ba de nyid rlung / /'byung 'jug gnas pa

rnam par brtag /'bru gsum sngags kyi ngo bo nyid/ /A li kA li sbyor dbul bas/ /brtag pa grags ldan bzlas pa nyid/ /sbyor dang byed par rtags ldan pa/ /ngag dben rlung gi rnal 'byor brtan/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyor ba gang / /snang ba gsum po 'char tshul te/ /dus

dang 'byung 'gyur thabs khyad par/ /dbyer med ye shes gnas thob pa/ /spyod pa ye shes mngon du byed/ /slob dang mi slob der spyod pa'o/ /rang bzhin shes pa'i lam gyur pa/ /rnam shes sgyu mar mtshan pa'i chos/ /khyad par las dang spyod pa gang / /dngos grub thob phyir

bdag byin brlab/ /phyi nang mngon par byang chub tshul/ /rnal 'byor thob pa'i bsam gtan gnas/ /'jug dang 'byung ba rtags bcas pas/ /spyod tshul ye shes des 'thob po/ /lta dang nyams myong lus dang ngag /bsam gtan mnyam rjes spyod pa dang / /slob dang mi slob gnyis

med cing / /rab tu mi gnas zung du 'jug /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sdom ldan pas/ /ji skad thob pa mnyam par spyod/ /dam tshig med la blo ldanagyis/ /gzhan la gsang ba 'dus rig bya/ /snying rje gnas pa las byed pa/ /sangs rgyas mchod dang 'gro don dag /mthong na lus dang ngag

las 'byung / /phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /'di ni gsang ba nges bstan pa/ /yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing / /rtog pa'i tshul ni rnam spangs nas/ /gug skyed thig le las 'das pa/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /sems can thams cad 'jug pa ni/ /rang

bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin spangs/ /sems ni skul zhig rtog byas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /yod dang med pa gnyis mtha' yin te/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis ka 'di yang mtha'/ /de bas mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas

dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed do/ /gang du nyan rang theg la mi bslab cing / /byang chub spyod pa de la nges bslabs na/ /byang chub spyod la spyad pas rgyal yon tan/ /gling bzhi 'di las rab byung chen por 'gyur/ /chos thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sa bon yang dag par phyung ngo / /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed

sbyar ba las/ /gang du phreng ba bkod par byed/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi ba la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyin/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi

bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /uSh+ma yi ni thar gyur pas/ /gnyis pa'i thig le brgyan pa nyid/ /dbyangs kyi drug pas brgyan pa ni/ /mi bskyod pa yi gsang sngags brjod/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa sbyin/ /gsum

pa yi ni gsum pa la/ USh+ma Na yi mtha' ma sbyar/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi ba la/ /mthar nas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pa sbyin par bya/ /steng du thig le nA das brgyan//

'di ni rtag pa'i snying po brjod/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis par sbyar/ /steng du dbyangs kyi lnga pas/ /brgyan gyur 'di ni sa bon yin/ mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pas brgyan/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa tha ma sbyin/ /lnga pa yi

ni bzhi pa la/ /at+na s+tha yi gnyis pa'o/ gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /'di ni rin chen rgyal po yi/ /gsang sngagasabasdus pa'i tshul du brjod/ /dbyangs kyi dang po nyid la yang / /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa

dang / /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa sbyin bya/ /dbyangs kyi bcu pa nyid la ni/ /gnyis pa gsum pas mthar brten pa'o/ /uSh+ma Na ni bzhi ba la/ /dbyangs yig bdun pas steng dang 'og /dbyangs kyi lnga pa dang sbyar/ /'di ni 'od dpag med pa yi/ /gsang

ba 'jig rten dag pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis pa nyid la ni/ /dbyangs kyi thig le nA das brgyan/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /at+na s+thA yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /gsum pa yi ni lnga pas brgyan/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi ba la/ /an+ta s+thA yi gnyis

pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas mtha' brten pa/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /gdon mi za ba'i rjes 'gro ba'i/ /gsang ba las kyi rigs 'byung ba'o/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan bya/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs

kyi bcu gnyis pas brgyan bya/ /uSh+ma yi ni dang po dang / /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa las/ /lnga pa'i dang po nyid dag la/ /uSh+ma na yi gsum pas brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pa dang sbyar/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa

la/ /dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa sbyin bya/ /uSh+ma na yi tha ma las/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /bzhi ba'i dang po nyid dag la/ /uSh+ma na yi gnyis po sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa'i lnga pas brgyan par bya/ /

an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa la/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pas dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas sbyin par bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni lnga pas brgyan/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa

dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa sbyin/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /at+na s+tha yiganyis pa las/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /uSh+ma na yi gsum pa sbyin/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ /'di ni 'byung ba dag pa yi/ /rigs kyi yum

bzhi'i snying por brjod/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po las/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga ba'i gsum pa bcas pa la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa sbyin

par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pas mdzes/ /gsum pa yi ni bzhi par ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa gsum pa ldan pa nyid/ /

dbyangs kyi bzhi ba sbyin par bya/ /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa sbyar/ /drug pa'i tha ma gzung bar bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/ /an+ta s+tha yiganyis pa sbyar/ /lnga pa'i gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan

par bya/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /gnyis pa gsum pa sbyar ba dang / /dbyangs kyi gsum pa steng nas sbyin/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga par bcas/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /gnyis pa'i dang po dang bcas pa/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /bzhi

ba'i gsum pa dang ldan par/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa thog mar sbyar/ /'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi/ /bla med rigs kyi sgo bzhi 'byung / /gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rig pa'i gtso/ /rtsa bar gyur pa'i don shes pas/ /

nus pa sngon du 'byin par byed/ /thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /sngags kyi khyad par bstan pa yin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gzhi pa la ni/ /lnga pa yis sbyar ba gang / /'di ni sku ni gzi brjid mchog /spyan 'dren pa ru gyur pa yin/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i tha ma la/ /

dbyangs yig drug pa sbyar bar bya/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i tha ma sbyin/ 'di ni sdud cing gshegs gsol ba/ /dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin can/ /gnas shing bzhugs par byed pa'o/ /mi phyed ye shes 'byung ba ste/ /khyab cing dri ma med pa'o/ /bu mo lo grangs

bcu gnyis ma'am/ /khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pas/ /bzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag /rdza yi phye ma so ma dag /so so yi ni rkang 'og tu/ /nyi zla gnyis su bri bar bya/ /de las khrus bya rgyan btags nas/ /de nas langs pa'i

skyes bu 'di'ang / /thal mo snying gar sbyar byas shing / /steng 'og rlung la bslab par bya/ /de nyid mi yi sha dang ni/ /bdud rtsi sbyar ba bsres de yang / /gu gul nag po bcas pas 'dug /dang po rkang ba'i mthil dag tu/ /ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngo/ /ba dan gyis ni mtshan pa

bsam/ /mdoms bar du ni me yin no/ /sa bon dkyil 'khor 'bar ba bsam/ /lte bar ba~M las chu yi gnas/ /dkar po zlum po dgod par bya/ /de steng sa yi dkyil 'khor dang / /la~M las byung ba rdo rjes mtshan/ /gru bzhi mdzes pa nyid du bsam/ /lte bar dz+haiM dmar skul bar byed/ /

'bar ba 'od 'phro mi zad pa'o/ /snying gar hU~M mthing 'od 'bar dang / /spyi bor ha~M dkar bsil bar gyur/ /mgrin par a dmar rim pa ste/ /de dag kun la bla ma yis/ /hU~M tra~M a dz+he zhes bya ba'i/ /rig sngags rdo rje bzlas pa dang / /lha yi sa bon phreng sngags kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis

kyang bsam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin mi rtog cing / /rtog pa gzhan dag ma gos pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lus gnas su/ /mi bskyod pa dang sku rdo rje/ /chos 'dzin pa dag rang gis bsam/ /rang gi lte ba'i dz+haiM 'od las/ /'od zer dpag med byung nas ni/ lha gsum po ni bskul byas te/ /de

nas khye'u lus kyi ni/ /yi ge dz+haiM la bskul bar bya/ /de las rlung dang bcas pa'i sgra/ /myur du zhugs te rkang mthil gyi/ /rlung dang bcas pa'i ba dan bskyod/ /nyi zlas nam mkhar bteg nas ni/ /sum mdo'i me sbar chu yang khol/ /snying gar sa g.yos 'khor ba las/ /yi ge snga ma gsum

bskul te/ /'od kyis lus kyi nang khengs shing / /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas kyang / /der gnas pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /sna bug g.yon du zhugs byas te/ /kun la 'od 'bar 'khor ba yis/ /lus nang rab tu khengs par bsam/ /de nas bdud rtsi lus la

gtor/ /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs bya/ /des ni bskul bar the tshom med/ /gal te lus ngag yid gsum la/ /rtags rnams nges par ma byung na/ /lan gsum bar du bzlas par bya/ /des ni nges par bskul gyur pa'i/ /'gul ba dang ni bskyod pa sogs/ /ma lus

sngags kyi tshig 'byung ste/ /'di yis bskul ba ma lus pa'i/ /gsang ba rab tu gyur pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /ye shes mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas/ /rdo rje

gsung gis bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun rtog dag par byed par rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa'o/ /gang du dug gsum cha las ni/ /rtog pa'i snang ba rgyas pa las/ /rang bzhin 'byung bar gyur pa dag /thabs kyi rang bzhin

shes rab kyi/ /yi ges dag par byed pa dang / /shes rab rang bzhin gyur pa la/ thabs kyi yi ges dag par byed/ /gang du 'gron par gyur pa la/ /tha mi dad pa'i yi ge yis/ /rtog pa mngon par sbyang ba ste/ /g.yas rtsal ni brten nas ni/ /zhe sdang rtog pa gtso gyur pa/ /

g.yon rtsal ni brten pa yis/ /'dod chags rtog pa gtsor byed 'byung / /sgra gcan la ni brten nas ni/ /ma rig pa ni 'byung zhing 'gro/ /gnas pa lus kyi yi ge las/ /'khor bskyed byed rtog pa 'byung / /de nyid rang bzhin rtog pa yis/ /srog dang rtsol ba la skyangs te/ /pho mo ma

ning rlung 'di dag /cung zad dul bar gyur pa na/ /lam gyi chos 'byung rtags 'char byed/ /rlung nyid nyid shin tu dag pa yis/ /yi ge gsang sngags dag gyur bar/ /rtog pa ye shes chen por 'char/ /a zhes bya ba mi chags byed/ /A zhes bya bas bar mar gnas/ /i zhes bya ba

chags chen te/ /I zhes bya ba g.yeng bar 'gyur/ u zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i yid/ /U zhes mya ngan bskyed 'gyur bas/ /r-i zhes mya ngan gyis gdung byed/ /r-I zhes mya ngan gyis gnod byed/ /l-i zhes cung zad zhi bar gnas/ /l-I zhes kun du rtog pa nyid/ /e zhes 'jigs pa

tsam gyur pa/ /ai zhes bar ma'i 'jigs bcas pa/ /o zhes 'jigs pa chen po yin/ /au zhes sred pa'i zhen pa nyid/ /aM zhes bar ma'i sred zhes bskyed/ /AM zhes sred pa chen po yin/ /a zhes nyer len gzhis yin te/ /A zhes mi dge log lta can/ /i zhes

pa ni bkres pa ste/ /I zhes skom pas gdungs pa yin/ /u zhes tshor ba'i bye brag myong / /U zhes tshor ba'i bar ma gnas/ /r-i zhes tshor ba chen po dang / /r-I zhes rig par byed pa po/ /l-i zhes mi 'gyur rig pa 'dzin/ /l-I zhes rig pa'i yid 'jug zhi/ /e zhes so sor rtog

sbyong ba/ /ai zhes ngo tshas bag yod byed/ /o zhes snying rje bar sems pa/ /au zhes brtse ba byams par bcas/ /a zhes bya bar dog par byed/ /a zhes bsags pa sna tshogs pa/ /k+sha zhes phrag dog rtog pa ste/ /'di dag rang bzhin rtag bcas yin/ /ka zhes bya ba chags

sems yin/ /kha zhes zhen par 'byung ba dang / /ga zhes dga' ba'i chags pa can/ /g+ha zhes bar ma'i dgang ba can/ /nga zhes shin tu dga' ba'i dges/ /tsa zhes bde bas yi rangs te/ /tsha zhes rab tu mgu bas rangs/ /dza zhes bya ba ngo mtshar skyes/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba dgod par byed/ /nya zhes

de nyid kyis tshim yin/ /Ta zhes 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ /Tha zhes 'o byed par 'dod pa/ /Da zhes 'jib par byed pa yin/ /D+ha zhes brtan pa'i sems gnas yin/ /Na zhes brtson 'grus skyed byed pa/ /ta zhes nga rgyal rtog pa yin/ /Tha zhes lus ngag bya ba byed/ /da zhes 'phrogs

pa bskyod pa yin/ /b+ha zhes stobs skyed khyad par la/ /na zhes sems spro dang bcas/ /pa zhes tha dad med bdag gyur/ /pha zhes tha dad med btang snyoms/ /bzhes tha dad med pa'i dngos/ /b+ha zhes drag po'i bde ba 'dod/ /ma zhes sgeg par byed pa'o/ /ya zhes rlung gis 'gres byed pa/ /ra

zhes cung zad 'bar ba'i dge/ /la zhes gsal ba'i tshig brjod pa/ /wa zhes bden smra g.yo med pa/ /sha zhes du smra byed pa/ /Sha zhes de bzhin nyid des byed/ /sa zhes nye bar mi 'dod pa/ /ha zhes sbyin par byed pa yin/ /k+sha zhes kun du bskul 'dod pa/ /kla zhes

pa ni de bzhin des/ /sla zhes pa ni dpa' bar 'dod/ /l+la zhes bag med shes bzhin bral/ /sh+la zhes g.yo sgyu ston pa dang / /d+ha zhes mi srun par 'byung zhing / /da zhes byas gyur 'gro bar byed/ /'di ni kun du rtog par 'gyur/ /a A zhes par gyur pa gang / /bar ma'i chags

gyur ma rig che/ /i I zhes pa bar ma ste/ /rjes su 'dzin pa med pa la/ /u U zhes pa rnam gnon pas/ /'grub pa nyid du gnas pa yin/ /e ai zhes pa thob pa'i cha/ /'gog pa la ni 'jug pa'o/ /o au zhes pa tha ma ste/ /yid ni skyo bar gyur pa'o/ a aH bcas

pa 'thibs pa nyid/ /le lo snyom las gyur pa'o/ /r-i r-I l-i l-I 'byung ba las/ /mi phyed the tsom gyur pa ste/ /'di dag phra dang rags pa dang / /bar ma'i dbye ba bstan pa yin/ /thog ma dang ni tha ma dang / /dbus su 'byung ba'i skad cig ma/ /skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa las/ /

rang bzhin tha ma rtog las 'byung / /de nyid 'gro dang 'ong ba dang / gnas pa yi ni rlung gi cha/ /thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yi/ /nyin dang mtshan du 'byung ba ni/ /brgyad cu phrag gnyis nye bar 'byung / /sa bon cha dang rnam par smin/ /yul gyur rkyen 'byung 'di dag ni/ /kun du rtog

pa chen po ste/ /'di las dge dang mi dge byung / /de las bag chags las byung ba/ /bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag gis 'khor/ /'di dag lugs las bzlog gyur na/ /rang byung rnal 'byor pa ni 'gyur/ /'dir ni tshogs pa las skye ba/ /rten 'brel

tsam du 'byung ba yin/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ /dper na gtsub shing gtsub bstan dang / /skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol pa yi/ /rkyen gyis rab tu bskul gyur na/ /du ba me dang 'bar bcas pa/ /ji bzhin bar nas 'byung mod kyi/ /legs par brtags shing btsal ba na/ /me de gang

du'ang mi gnas pa/ /rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /bla med rang bzhin 'di dag kyang / /dam tshig stong pa nyid gnas pas/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /'gro 'ong med par rjes rig bya/ /de nyid 'di ni bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs

so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas rngam zhing mig gdang te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rmad byung chen po chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs gyur cing / /rnam par mi rtog dag pa la/ /kun rdzob tsam du gsungs

pa mtshar/ /de bzhin gshes pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa/ rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag cing don dam pa'i gnas kyi dag pa chen po de kho na

nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog dbang phyug 'khor lo'i gtsos/ /rab tu byin brlabs snang ba las/ /bka' stsal rdo rje tshig 'di bstan/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi

gsang ba gang du byin gyis rlob pa 'di/ nges par gyur pa 'di phyung ngo / /gang zhig skyes ba'i spyod yul du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /gang zhig mthong zhing gang babs pa'i/ /yang dag ye shes rtogs par bya/ /sku babs pas ni 'dar bar byed/ /'phar zhing gar dang

phyag rgya 'byung / /thugs kyi snying po rab bskul ba/ /srog rtsol 'gog pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri gangs pa nyid kyang gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam rtog dang ni yul rnams dang / /'byung ba 'gag cing bde bar 'gyur/ /smig rgyu la sogs mthong bar 'byung / /lha chen dag kyang dbab pa 'byung / /

tshangs pas lus la byin brlabs na/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni ston par byed/ /brgya byin gyis ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /lkog tu gyur pa mthong bar byed/ /drag po bas ni stobs rnyed cing / /rig byed dag ni 'don pa dang / /u mA de bI la sogs pas/ /rtse 'jo chags pa skye bar ston/ /lha chen dag ni gang

babs pa/ /'khor lo 'dzin pa'i brda dag dang / /sa 'og sa steng sa bla'o/ /dbang du byed pa ston par 'gyur/ /'phags lam bzhi ni bden pa bzhi/ /chos rnams rtogs pa ston par byed/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi ni/ /grub pa'i mtha' ni ston pa

dang / /spyad pa'i yon tan 'byung ba las/ /sde pa rnams kyang spyod pa dang / /bse ru lta bu'i spyod tshul lo/ /theg pa dman par ltung ba'i rtags/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa gang / /tshad med bzhi dang de la sogs/ /lus ngag yid kyis gang byung ba/ /sems

dpa' lta stangs byed ba na/ /byang chub sems nyid 'grub 'gyur ba/ /ngo bo nyid med tshig brjod 'gyur/ /khru gang dag tu 'phags pa ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan par byed/ /khru do ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /khru brgyad kyis ni phyir mi ldog /lnga pas lam lnga mthar phyin pa/ /tshe gcig

'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /gsang ba grub pa dag gis ni/ /'bar pas dbab pa brtag par bya/ /rdo rje sku ni byin brlabs shing / /gzugs kyi phung po babs gyur pas/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes ni/ /gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje gsung gis byin brlabs shing //

'du shes phung po babs gyur pas/ /'od dpag med pa'i ye shes ni/ /'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje thugs kyis byin brlabs shing / /rnam shes phung po dag byed babs/ /mi bskyod pa yi ye shes ni/ /zhe sdang rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /rdo rje yon tan gyis byin

brlabs/ /tshor ba'i phung pos bdag byin brlabs/ /dkon mchog dpal gyi ye shes ni/ /nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig sbyong / /rdo rje phrin las byin gyis rlobs/ /'du byed phung po babs gyur bas/ /gdon mi za ba'i ye shes ni/ /phrag dog rigs kyi dam tshig spyod/ /sangs

rgyas spyan ni babs gyur cing / /sa yi khams ni byin brlabs na/ /dbang chen ri rab ltar brtan cing / /rdo rje rgyas pa'i las 'grub 'gyur/ /mA ma kIs ni bdag rgyud la/ /chu yi khams ni byin brlabs ni/ /gdug pa rnams las bsil byed cing / /lha mo sgrol rnams 'grub pa'o/ /na bza'

dkar mo bcas pa yis/ /me yi khams ni byin brlabs pas/ /bag chags de ni sreg byed cing / /rdo rje dbang du sdud par byed/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rlung gi khams ni byin brlabs pas/ /thams cad skrod pa'i las byed do/ /rdo rje mngon spyod cher spyod do/ /lha mo

gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /smig rgyu lta bur mthong bar byed/ /lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /du ba lta bur 'char bar byed/ /lha mo dri yi rdo rje ma/ /skar ma srin bu me khyer 'char/ /lha mo ro yi rdo rje la/ /mar me 'bar ba ltar gsal zhing / /lha mo reg bya rdo rje ma/ /thams cad stong pa'i chos nyid la/ /

nam mkha' khams ni babs gyur pas/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes skye/ /de yi mig gi rnam shes la/ /sa yi snying pos byin brlabs pas/ /gzugs kyi dngos po sna tshogs dang / /lkog tu gyur pa'i rdzas rnams mthong / /de yi rna ba'i rnam shes la/ /lag na rdo rjes byin

brlabs pas/ /phra rags sgra rnams thos pa dang / /lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /de yi sna yi rnam shes la/ /nam mkha'i snying pos byin brlabs pas/ /sna tshogs dri rnams tshar ba dang / /sna rtse'i 'od zer tshogs mthong 'gyur/ /de yi lce yi rnam shes la/ /'jig

rten dbang phyug gis byin brlabs/ /lha yi bdud rtsi myong byed cing / /gsung dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs 'byung / /de yi lus kyi rnam shes la/ /sgrib pa sel bas byin brlabs pas/ /'jig rten khams ni gsum dag gi/ /reg bya'i khyad par mchog rnams thob/ /de yi

yid kyi rnam shes la/ /kun du bzang pas byin brlabs pas/ /dus gsum shes pa'i ye shes ni/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran/ /de yi yid la khyab byed par/ /byams pa mgon pos byin brlabs pas/ /nyon mongs ye shes gyur nas kyang / /rtog pa med par 'gro

zhing lding / /de yi kun gzhi'i rnam shes la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin brlabs pas/ /lus kyi cha shas g.yo 'gyur zhing / /mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gro/ /sku ni snang ba sgyur bar byed/ /gsung ni grag pa sngags su brjod/ /thugs kyi snying po rab bskul pas/ /srog rtsol

bzlas pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi/ /de nyid byin gyis brlabs gyur na/ /bar chad bdud dpung ma lus 'joms/ /brtan pa mchog tu 'bebs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu rnams kyis/ /las la nges par byin

brlabs na/ /phyag rgya byed cing sdigs mdzub byed/ /phyogs skyong bcu po 'joms par byed/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang rdo rje'i gar/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgyur ba dang / hU~M phaT rngams pa'i gad mo yis/ /rlung bcu dbang du sgyur par gnas/ /khro bo du ma spro zhing sdud/ /

ye shes thugs rje khros pa yis/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon rnams 'joms/ /lus kyi cha shas 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa so sor rab tu bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pas/ /gsang ba 'dus ba rtsa

ba'i rgyud/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /ta thA saM gra ha yi rgyud/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyis ni/ /sgyur 'phrul dra ba chen po'i rgyud/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa yis/ /zla gsang thig le'i rgyud gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thogs med grub pa yis/ /

dam tshig gsum bkod rgyal po bshad/ /sangs rgyas spyan mas mnyam sbyor rgyud/ /mA ma kIs nihe badzra/ /gos dkar mas ni 'khor lo sdom/ /sgrol mas sgyu 'phrul chen po nyid/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dbyings phyug mas/ /rdo rje gdan bzhi gtsug lag rgyud/ /gzugs kyi rdo rjes gsang

ba'i mdzod/ /sgra yi rdo rje'i lha mo yis/ /bde ba dam pa rtogs skyed gsungs/ /dri yi rdo rjes sangs rgyas thod/ /ro yi rdo rje'i lha mo yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud mchog gsungs/ /byams pa mgon pos rig mchog dang / /sa yi snying pos sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje gsang pa'i

rgyan bkod gsungs/ /gsang ba'i bdag pos dbang bskur rgyud/ /nam mkha'i snying pos dpal ldan ni/ /gsang ba thig le'i rgyud mchog gsungs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mchog gis ni/ /pun+ta rI ka dra ba can/ /'jam dbyangs dpa' bo rtsa ba'i rgyud/ /sgrib pa thams

cad rnam sel bas/ /ma mo g+ha yi rgyud bstan pa/ /kun tu bzang pos gsang ba'i rgyud/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis gsungs/ /gshin rje'i gshed pos dgra nag po/ /shes rab mthar byed khams gsum rgyal/ /rta mgrin gsang

ba mchog tu rol/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas rdo rje sgo/ /mi g.yo mgon pos gangs pa'i rgyud/ /'dod rgyal thabs kyi zhags pa phreng / /dbyug sngon gdug pa kun 'dul ba/ /stobs po che yis sgra rgyal rgyud/ /suM b+ha rA dza sa rdo rjes/ /gtsug tor rdo rje

gtsug tor rgyud/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mchog rnams kyis/ /rim par gsungs pa bstan pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud gyur sum cu gnyis/ /re re la yang phyi nang gsang ba bcas/ /khyad par phyi yi 'bum phrag sum cu drug /yi ge'i dbye ba stong phrag sum cu bzhi/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rig mar bcas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis nges par gsungs pa'o/ /'di dag 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /sngon rgyu'i nus pa rten can la/ /de nyid khro chags sku ru ston/ /bag la nyal dang phra ba yi/ /zag pa med pa'i

spyod yul la/ /zhi ba spros med mdzad pa byed/ /zhing khams bye ba stong phrag tu/ /mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pas/ /gcig las du ma rnam par 'phrul/ /sems can khams rnams skyes pa dang / /'byung ba gnas pa'i srid pa ru/ /rgyu dang rkyen las

grub tshul dang / /nyon mongs khams dang dbang po dang / /bag la nyal sogs dri ma rnams/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo ba yi/ /rgyu 'bras phra ba'i phra ba la/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag 'dra/ /rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i snyan/ /rdo rje'i thugs dang

rdo rje gnas/ /rdo rje spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub/ /yongs su ma dag kla klo'i gling / /tha dad par ni nyon mongs can/ /de dag shin tu dul bar mdzad/ /drag po'i nyams ni gar dgu rol/ /dbang la chags tshul drug

cu bzhi/ /rgyas la khyad par bcu drug ste/ /zhi ba'i tshul ni bcu gnyis yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yang / /gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa nyid/ /dpal mchog rten pa bdun pa ste/ /rtog pa dang po gling slong ba/ /gsang ba rgyas par bstan pa yin/ /rtog pa gnyis

pa rdo rje'i rigs/ /mchog tu brtag pa chen po las/ /brjod bya rjod byed tshul ldan pa/ /ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa'o/ /rtog pa gsus pa rin chen rigs/ /'od zer snang ba'i ye shes che/ /tha dad med pa chos kyi dbyings/ /byang chub chen po brjod pa'o/ /rtog pa bzhi po pad+ma'i rigs/ /

ma chags bde ba 'od 'bar ba/ /so so'i ting 'dzin la zhugs nas/ /rtog pa'i ye shes 'char byed pa'o/ /rtog pa lnga pa las kyi rigs/ /sna tshogs don kun sgrub byed pas/ /shes rab ral gri yongs gcod pa'i/ /khyad par bsgrub pa brjod pa'o/ /rtog pa drug pa chos kyi dbyings/ /

sangs rgyas du ma'i dgongs pa dag /gcig tu yang dag bsdus pa ni/ /de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /rtog pa bdun pa snang ba rgyas/ /ye shes lnga ni rab 'byung ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs tshad med pa/ /bkod pa mtha' yas sprin tshogs pas/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ /

dpag med tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyis sbyar pa dang / /g.yon brkyang du ni nyer sbyor ro/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam par 'byung / /khro bo skyil krung longs spyod pas/ /thams cad ma lus bdud 'joms mdzad/ /rten cing 'brel las

'byung ba las/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par brtag /bla ma sangs rgyas chos gyur cing / dge 'dun kyang ni 'di nyid de/ /de yi drin gyis shes 'gyur ba/ /de bas dkon mchog gsum bdag yin/ /mi shes rab rib kyis ldongs la/ /'di ni lam rab ston byed yin/ /bde ba kun
