gyi mchog gyur dang / /'dod pa'i don kun ster byed yin/ /de bas de dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod bya gzhan ni byed ma yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /brtul zhugs ldan pas bla ma mchod/ /de mnyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na/ /khams gsum kun las mi rnyed de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

'jig rten du/ /phun sum tshogs pa ston phyir gsungs/ /rnal 'byor pa 'di ci spyod kyang / /thams cad du ni smad mi bya/ /rtog pa kun las rnam grol phyir/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba med/ /de ni dngos kun ngo bo ste/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rang byung ji ltar 'dod

ba spyad/ /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /de nyid thams cad bla na med/ /'di ni rnal 'byor dbang po mchog /rnal 'byor skyes bur bshad pa ste/ /rjes su rnal 'byor rigs pa mchog /gnyis 'dus shin tu rnal 'byor te/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /rnal

'byor de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dam pa nyid/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/ /mar ni shin tu 'du ba ltar/ /dba' rlabs 'dus pas stobs gyur pa/ /gzhan yang thams cad skye 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /brtan dang g.yo

ba'i chos kun gyis/ /srid gsum bdag po rnam par 'phrul/ /de ltar bdud rtsi las ni langs/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'byung ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ni/ /khyad par 'gro ba gcig pa nyid/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa sa dge ba/ /bcu gsum du yang rnam bshad pa/ /

gru gsum rnam par 'byung ba ni/ /'dir ni chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ni/ /ji ltar kun du snang gyur pa/ /de bzhin gnyis med ye shes 'dir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams la/ /rnam par

rtog pa'i rgyan gyis brtags/ /rang byung gcig nyid gnyis su med/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lta dang grub mtha' sna tshogs bstan/ /tha dad lta bar 'jig rten pa/ /kun mkhyen gcig bu gnyis su med/ /gang du bdag dang phyag rgya dag /

gnyis med bde bas brgyal gyur tshe/ /de yi bde bas kun khyab byed/ /chos kun ngo bo gcig par ni/ /ye shes 'du 'bral med pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gsang ba yin/ /dga' ba skyed byed bzang po ste/ /ma lus don gyi 'bras rab ster/ /dngos po'i

bdud rtsis lus gang zhing / /nor bu rin chen sten par mnyam/ /yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /bde ba rdo rje can gyi gnas/ /nyon mongs ye shes gnas gyur pas/ /myur du bgrod pa'i go 'phang gis/ /ro mnyam mi mnyam 'phel ba las/ /bde

bas ma lus sa gsum po/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa po/ /gnyis med ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /'gro ba'i nor bu ster byed pa/ /ded dpon chen po 'dir gnas pa/ /bla ma'i gzugs su gang byung ba/ /nga nyid thugs rje der zhugs pa/ /mi yi gzugs su

nyer bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /mi phyed rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kun/ /rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te/ /dgyes pas yongs su khyad par 'gyur/ /de ni gsang ba'i chos can yin/ /rdo rje'i gdan du

bzhugs nas kyang / /mnyam pa'i skyil krung tshul gnas nas/ /nyi ma snang ba mched pa'i cha/ /gsal la snang ba mtshan mo'i cha/ /mtshams las thob pa mun par bcas/ /dug gsum rang bzhin kun rnams las/ /nges 'byung bsnyen pas rtsa gnas las/ /zag

bcas 'byung ba zlog par byed/ /bsgrub pas yi ge gsang ba las/ /thos pas sgra rnams dbyangs dbyung nyid/ /nyer sgrub shin tu mi shigs pa/ /khams las bdud rtsi dngas par gyur/ /srod dus mun pa'i smag rum du/ /bdud bcom lha yi bu yi tshogs/ /rgol ba ngan

pa zlog gyur cing / /de nyid kun du brtsams pa'o/ /tho rangs dus su 'das cha las/ /shin tu nyer thob rang byung las/ /bcu dang brgyad du mthar son tshe/ /skya rengs nges par 'char dus su/ /mngon par byang chub legs mthong ba/ /'di ni mchog tu 'byung ba nyid/ /

gsang ba yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsgom pa mchog gis bsgrub 'gyur pa'o/ /'di ni thabs dang shes rab dag /gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug pas/ /de yi chos kyi 'byung gnas su/ /bde chen sgyu ma'i rol ba yi/ /kun du dbang bskur gyur par ni/ /

dngos grub ye shes thob byed yin/ /snga ma 'jig rten log rtog dag /dgag phyir mi rtag gzugs su brtan/ /de nyid yongs su dag pa yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gnas bsgyur bas/ /gzhon nu'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ /'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste/ /thams

cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul lo/ /de ltar ye shes gnas thob pas/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa/ mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos po thams cad phyin ci ma log pa dag pa bsam pa sna tshogs pa'i don rab tu bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes gsang ba'i spyod yul phun sum

tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas yongs su ston par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar rab tu 'dud cing mchod pa rnam pa du mas yongs su mchod la gsang ba'i don 'di

dag rab tu zhus so/ /de nas gsang ba 'dzin pa pos/ /mi 'gyur ba ni rgyas pa'i tshul/ /mgon po byang chub chen po ni/ /zab dang rgya che'i gnas 'di gsungs/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas phyogs bcu yi/ /gnas sogs zhing khams ma lus pa'i/ /rgyal

ba 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /til 'bru lta bu gang ba yi/ /ma lus rgya mtsho'i dbus bzhugs la/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad/ /dam tshig mchog

tu brtag pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun du rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje ral pa gcig ma'i dam tshig chen po'i/ /rgyal mo rdo rje mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi

sems 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra e ka dza Ti khu li ni swA hA/ /rdo rje ral pa gcig ma yi/ /gsang ba ye shes rang byung bas/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ma/ /kha dog mthing nag 'bar ma che/ /g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar ba'i mdangs/ /gri gug thod

pa 'dzin par mdzad/ /rdo rje dang ni thod dbyug ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsnams par bsgom/ /dril bu rdo rje'i zhags pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag tu bsnams par bsgom/ /rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /shin tu sgeg cing 'gying bar bsam/ /'di ni klu yi bu mo rnams/ /

rab tu 'gugs pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /sa g.yo ba yi dus su ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par shes/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams/ /tshig par gyur cing gos dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran/ /gsang sngags

rig pa 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /klu yi bu mo mig rnams/ /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos chen po'i dam

tshig 'di rdo rje khro gnyer ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M sarba b+ha ya nA sha ya tra sa ni tra sa ya tra se yA b+ha ta ri b+h+r-i ku Ti ti d+hi b+he re tI ShI tA she ta dza ni Ni swA hA/ /rdo rje'i lha mo khro gnyer can/ /sku mdog sngo ljang dngas pa la/ /zhal gsum phyag drug spyan

gsum ma/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar cung zad khros/ /dang po gnyis kyis bde bar ni/ /thugs kar bsnol bas 'khor lo dang / /rin chen 'bar ba 'dzin pa'o/ /ral gri dang ni rtse gsum pa/ /g.yas pas nges par 'dzin par mdzad/ /sdigs

mdzub zhags pa bum pa ni/ /g.yon du nges par 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs par bsam/ /sku la 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro bas/ /gnod pa ma lus zhi byed bsam/ /'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /rig

pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po kun/ /rab tu 'dar bar gyur nas ni/ /ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha mo mchog /gser gyi rna cha g.yon pa rnams/ /sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni/ /dam tshig la sogs pas bkug bya/ /gang du phrin las ma lus

pa/ /gsang ba mchog tu bsgrub pa ni/ /'gog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /yongs su rdzogs pa mdzes mchog gis/ /ye shes rdo rje gsum las 'byung / /kun nas de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po'i bsgom pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /tsu~M oM ma hA bid+yA d+ha ra tsa li tsu li tsun+ta le dz+nyA na bi shud d+ha sarba d+ha rmA bud+d+he swA hA/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /kun

nas 'bar ba'i ye shes spyan/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas chen ni/ /lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab/ /lha mo skul byed rdo rje bsam/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ma/ /dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dang / /pad+ma 'bar ba bsnams

pa'o/ /rin chen nor bu rdo rje sprin/ /zla ba chu shel 'bar ba dang / /phyag gzhan rnams kyis 'dzin par mdzad/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /bsams la sngags kyi yi ge dgod/ /nad rnams ma lus zhi byed pa/ /

gsang ba ye shes rgya mtsho nyid/ /bde ba mchog tu bsam par bya/ /'di na zhi ba'i las bsgrub pa/ /gsang ba nye bar bsdus pa'o/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi/ /'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo

rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsam gtan gyi dam tshig gi mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bI/ oM a badzra yak+Sha gar+b+ha ya rat+na d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ /

rdo rje gsum sbyor ba yis/ /skyed pa 'di ni rnam par bsam/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /ma rgad ta dang cha dgu pa/ /'khor lo ut+pal sdong bu dang / /ral gri 'bar ba bsnams par bsam/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs

rdzogs pa/ /cung zad ser po rdo rje 'gying / /zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/ /de bsams rgyas pa'i las kun la/ /myur ba nyid du grub par byed/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i rlabs kyi phreng ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgom pa/ /sbyor tshul nyid kyis bya ba ste/ /'dis ni dngos grub myur 'thob byed/ /dam tshig bskul ba byang chub sems/ /'gro ba'i don du rab 'jug pa/ /rdo rje gsum

dbyer med gzugs can/ /de nyid las kyi phyag rgyar brjod/ /dam tshig stong pa bde ba che/ /'od zer spro zhing sdud par mdzad/ /'gro la dngos grub rgyun byed pas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes che/ /gsang ba dam tshig bod pa ni/ /srog gi snying por gyur pa

yi/ /sa bon sngags las rab grub pa/ /de nyid las ni 'da' mi byed/ /rtsa gsum rlung gsum sku gsum ni/ /thig le sngags kyi sbyor bas ni/ /bcing ba rab grol phyag rgya che/ /de nyid sku gsum dag pa'i bdag /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang

ni/ /dbyer med rdo rje'i dam tshig gnas/ /dbang bzhi'i lam gyi dam tshig las/ /rang gi ngo bo'i dam tshig dang / /spyod pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / /longs spyod yan lag dam tshig ste/ /gsang ba bsrung ba'i gnas dang ni/ /de nyid bza' ba'i dam tshig ste/ /

rnam pa rang bzhin ngo bo dang / /mtshan nyid ldan pas dang po yin/ /snang ba rang bzhin bdag nyid can/ /dbyer med sbyor ba'i tshul ldan pa/ /rigs su dbye ba khyad par gang / /rigs su sgrub pa thun mong tshul/ /'di dag gsum pa'i don bstan pa'o/ /longs

spyod thob bya mi gnas tshul/ /'di ni dam tshig dag par brjod/ /'dis ni dam tshig rgya mtsho yi/ /sngags kyi gsang ba bsdus pa'o/ /sems ni rab tu dang bas rtse gcig rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig gsang ba mi zad rgya mtsho rab bsten na/ /de ring tshegs

chung bde bas 'gro ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam nyid rtag pa nyid du mngon du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /ma las khams gsum sa rnams kun/ /dbang phyug de yi longs spyod

cing / /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rgyal sras thams cad bdag nyid yin/ /phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas te/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du gyur/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor bas/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog /ma lus sangs

rgyas rgyu can te/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas sems/ /dkyil 'khor spro dang sdud pa'i gnas/ /bla na med pa tshad med mchog /mkhas brtson spro ba'i las bdag nyid/ /shin tu rmad byung ye shes can/ /bla na med pa'i chen po'o/ /sems bskyed smon

dang 'jug pa dang / /zab dang rgya che dbyer med pa/ /mi ldog pa yi mngon gyur pas/ /khyad par 'phags pa theg pa che/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /dag pa dang ni ma dag pa'i/ /ye shes ye shes khyad par che/ /bsam pa zag med tshul

thob pa'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla med ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gsang ba dag pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ye shes dam pa bka' stsal mdzad/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas nyid dang / /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo dang / /ston mor gyur pa nyid dang

yang / /sna tshogs ston mo'i rim shes pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gsang ba yis/ /mchog tu gyur pa 'dir brjod yin/ /'dir ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba'i cha la hU~M gnas pa nyid de/ 'og

tu ya~M las bskyed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam rgyal mtshan sngo ljang gis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du ra~M dmar po las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar ba du mas mtshan pa rnam par bsam par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams thams

cad thun mong du bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste/ der ka~M las byung ba'i thod pa skya bo gsum gyi steng gi bar snang gi char a dkar po las byung ba'i pad ma'i snod du blta ste/ de'i nang du bkod pa gur gum dang / sman dang / ga pur dang / pad+ma dang / me tog ste/ mu bi shur

ma ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i cha 'og tu glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / khyi'i sha dang / sna tshogs pa'i sha ste/ ha d+ha go kun ste so sor thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du sgyur ba ste/ /hU~M b+h+rU~M trU~M hrI kha~M steng gi cha 'o/ /a~M lA~M mA~M b+hA~M hA~M rnams 'og gi cha la ste yang na

phyogs dang mtshams kyi cha'o/ /de dag kha dog so sor gsal bar ma 'dres par blta ste/ rdo rje las byung ba'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa dang / de'i 'od phyir log pas de nyid kyi nang du thim nas yi ge gsum mngon par bsngags te/ me'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'od 'bar

ba rnams kyis de dag zhu bar gyur pa dang / dag cing skyon med par bya ba dang / dpe med pa'i ro mchog rdo rje'i mthu dang ldan zhing yongs su smin pa'i bdag nyid du mos pa ste/ de'i steng du ye shes dang ldan pa'i yi ge o~M dkar po 'bar ba dgod par bya'o/ /de'i

'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams de'i nang du yongs su thim nas/ oM AHhU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags las 'od spro ba dang bcas pas mngon par bsngags pa 'di nyid 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzlas par bya ba dang / rang nyid kyi

rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsal bar dmigs te/ sbyang ba dang / spel ba dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi las blangs pa'i tshul du yi ge gsum zhu zhing 'dren pa'i 'od zer dpag tu med

pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'od zer gyi rnam par byon te de dag snga ma dang tshul gcig tu gyur par blta'o/ /de nas yang bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rig ma lha mo khro bo'i tshogs du ma'i snang bar gyur pa bar snang rab tu gang ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bdag dang bcas pa thams cad kyi ljags la hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po nas kyi 'bru tsam pa de'i lte

ba hU~M dang bcas pa las 'od zer gyi sbu gus drangs nas bdud rtsi gsol bar bya'o/ /des bdag gi lus kyi lha dang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa yongs su mchod cing mnyes te tshim par blta'o/ /'dis ni ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas/ /bla med khyad par 'byung ba nyid//

bdud rtsi tshim khyed mchog gyur ba/ /bde ba chen pos gnas par bya/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi'i rnam pa ru/ /rab 'bab spyi bo nas rtag tu/ /lce dbang gis ni de btung ba/ /de las rga shi 'jig byed 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i sdong po las ji ltar/ /nus pa chu ni 'dren pa ltar/ /bcud

rnams nye bar 'thung byas pas/ /stobs 'gyur rnal 'byor 'tsho bar byed/ /gang du nang gi bdag nyid dus/ /de ni gsang ba bstan pa'o/ /nang gi bdag nyid can dus 'gyur/ /de nas ye shes phrin las 'byung / /zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus zhes gang la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus zhes bya ba 'di ni gsang ba chen po shin tu gsang ba/ shin tu phra ba'i

byang chub kyi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ de nyid rnam par mi rtog pa/ /chos nyid ye shes ches phra bas/ /de nyid rtsa las rgyu ba can/ /khong stong med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sems can grol byed ye shes yin/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor dngos grub ster/ /

zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang dgug pa mngon spyod la/ /drag po 'chi byed 'joms pa po/ /ye shes mngon par grub pa ste/ /bcom ldan de la zhi ba gces/ /rang rig dbyings su de bzhin gshegs/ /me tog dang ni dri bzhin du/ /rten dang brten

par dbyer med pa/ /dngos med ngo bo gcig pa'i bdag /g.yo ba med par kun tu gnas/ /de nyid 'gro snying rnam dag pa/ /ye shes phra ba'i tshul gnas pa/ /dmar dang nag dang ser po dang / /dkar po de bzhin mdor bsdus pa/ /thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/ /lus

las 'gro dang 'ong ba dang / /gnas pas g.yo bar byed pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim bzhin du/ /nyin dang mtshan du mngon par 'byung / /de las srog dang rtsol ba ru/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /dbu ma ru ni gnas pa yin/ /mi gnas de las rtog pa byung / /

dge dang mi dge'i las rnams las/ /'khor ba mngon par sgrub pa yin/ /rtog pa dag las rlung dag ste/ /ye shes kyis ni mya ngan 'das/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje

rab tu dgyes shing tshim par gyur to/ /'di ni thabs kyi khyad par las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa 'di nyid do/ /bdag nyid sems dpa' gsum brtseg tu/ /gnas pa gsang ba 'di 'byung ba'o/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa'i cha las ni/ /'od

zer dpag med phyung nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsal ba las/ /'gro ba kun la'ang thabs ldan pa'i/ /dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin dngos las byung ba/ /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor

lor gyur nas kyang / /de nyid du ni thim byed pa'o/ /shin tu phra mor gyur nas ni/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam gyi/ /thig le 'bar ba'i dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lhar bcas gyur pa dag /rten dang brten par bcas pa las/ /byung ba'i 'od zer dpag med pas/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas

pa dang / /dam tshig dag gis bskul ba na/ /de dag las byung 'od kyis ni/ /nang du ma lus gang byas te/ /des ni kun du mtha' yas par/ /ba spu'i bu ga las byung ba'i/ /snang ba chen po dpag med pas/ /'jig rten khams kun khyab gyur te/ /slar log de nyid la zhugs

gyur/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi/ /bdag nyid nye bar bsdu ba'o/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bcas pa thim pa mngon du gyur pa las rang gi rig ma'i chos 'byung gi pad+ma'i ge sar du gyur pa'i ze'u 'bru'i sna rtser byang chub kyi sems las bskyed pa'i bU~M las

gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa nas tsam pa'i lte ba la nyi ma'i gdan dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i hU~M las 'phro ba'i rin po che shin tu phra bar gyur pa nyungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa ste/ de lta bu'i yungs 'bru rin po che

de dag gi dbus na rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga so sor bsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga so so'i dkyil 'khor bye brag tu gyur ba dgod par bya'o/ /de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba la dbang thob par bya ba ste cig car ram/ rim gyis yang dang

yang du bsam gtan la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de dag kyang rnam pa gsal na lha'i sku dang / sgra'i de kho na nyid yig 'bru la gnas pa dang / thig le'i ngo bo phyag mtshan du gsal ba 'od kyi gong bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /'di nyid so sor rang rig pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen

po 'dus pa'i cha las yongs su sprul pa nyid la spro ba dang bsdu bas gnas par bya'o/ /de las brtan pa nyid du gyur ba na smig rgyu dang du ba lta bu la sogs pa'i rtags rnams nges pa nyid du 'byung bar byed do/ /de nyid la bying ba dang rgod pa la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sgo nas

bsam gtan bya'o/ /so so rang gis rig gyur ba/ /ye shes lnga yi gzugs gyur pas/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos kun gyi/ /ma lus khyab pa'i byin brlab cing / /yul dang dbang po rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jug dang 'byung dang gnas pa dang / /bde ba chen por gyur

pa'o/ /gsang ba ye shes bsdus pa las/ /yongs su gsal ba skyon med pa/ /myur zhing phan tshun ma 'dres phas/ /sgra bcas phreng sngags brjod par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba rgyal po yi/ /lha rnams mnyes byed dngos grub ster ba'o/ /gsang sngags snying

po sku gsum gyi/ /snying po yi ge'i tshul gnas pa/ /A li kA li phreng ba las/ /sngags rnams dbyangs dang gsal byed las/ /'byung zhing 'jug par byed pa yin/ /gnas pa ye shes lam gyur pa/ /bde gshegs thugs las mnyam gnas pa/ /tshul

gcig par ni lam gyur pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta ste/ /gsang sngags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku spro ba dang / sdud pa dang / rab tu byung ba rdo rje'i gnas bying ba ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas sems la mi gnas so/ /chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de

'di ni ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ /chos kun sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /gsang ba'i ye shes kun 'byung ba/ /mi rtog rnam par mi dmigs pas/ /zag pa med pa'i tshul 'byung 'gyur/ /de las kun tu dge ba yi/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i 'od gsal dbyings/ /

spros med mkha' la kun khyab par/ /rang byung dri med tshul 'di bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba las sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsang ba bdud rtsi dag par ston pa rgyal po'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag

'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po bla na med pa'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'dug /gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas

bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud rdo rje la gnas so zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

slar gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / khams gsum thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i snying po gang du gnas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba sems kyi rgyud snying po ye shes ni nam mkha' la gnas pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rjes

gsungs pa/ gang na'ang gnas pa ma yin no/ /de nas gzhan yang dngos grub thob pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ de la gsang ba chen po'i dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir dngos grub tha mal pa

gang ci yang rung ba la 'tshol zhing bsten par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa la sogs pa dag gi dngos grub dang / mngag gzhug pa don du gnyer ba'i dngos grub dang / bum pa bzang po'i dngos grub dang / sa 'og gi dngos grub

dang / rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang / rgyas pa'i dngos grub dang / dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub dang / mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la sogs pa rnam mang don du gnyer bar mi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i

don du 'jig rten pa'i las kyi dngos grub phra mo la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'ba' zhig la sems rtse gcig tu gnas par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag

pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dme tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lus kyi spyod pa ma lus pa/ /de nyid thams cad yang dag par/ /sku yi rdo rje las dbyung bya/ /de nyid ma lus dkyil 'khor du/ /sems can khams rnams thams cad la/ /

dri med phreng bas sbyar ba'i dngos/ /rtag par dus gsum kun tu yang / /sangs rgyas skur ni byed pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas/ gang gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

brjod pa tshig gi lam rnams la/ /grag pa sgra rnams ma lus par/ /khams gsum rdo rje'i gnas la ni/ /dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /so so yang dag rig pa yi/ /tshig gi dngos grub bla na med/ /yid kyi sngags ni sdom pa po/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da'

dka'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas sems rdo rje'i dam tshig dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /yid kyi rtog pa ma lus pa/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad kun/ /bstan pa'i snying po

gsang ba che/ /rdo rje ye shes dag pa ni/ /mi phyed gsum ldan 'od gsal ba/ /rdo rje byang chub mngon byung ba/ /thams cad stong nyid ston pa las/ /dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no/ /kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

la/ /sngags slob pas ni bsam gtan bya/ /bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kun du mdzes dga' kun du rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ /e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ /e ma'o gsang ba che bshad pa/ /gang du lus dang ngag sems med/ /de ru gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje chen po'i dbyings 'byung ba/ /de nyid

yang dag ston par mdzad/ /ces gsol to/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi mchog chen po/ /rdo rje gsum gyi mchog dbang bsgyur/ /rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa yi/ /dngos grub kun nas bshad pa mdzad/ /

rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /gsang ba zab dang rgya che'i dbyings/ /thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo'i gtso/ /dngos grub 'dis ni bsdus pa yin/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du brjod

pa yang dag par bstan pa/ gang du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba ma lus pa snying po gcig tu yang dag par gsungs pa ste/ /'di ni bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par yid bzhin gyi nor

bu chos bla na med pa gsang chen rdo rje'i theg pa/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrog pa/ /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag bar rdzogs par byed pa/ lam thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis thub pa

med cing zil gyis mi non pa bdud kyi rigs ma lus pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ kun du rgyu ba'i log sred can rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i yul tha snyad thams cad las rnam par 'das pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mtshungs pa med cing kun las gol ba'i don te/ gsang ba chen po'i tshul 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ /spyod pa bla na med pa 'di thos pa'o/ /lha dang mi dang lha min dbang po dang / /tshangs brtsegs rnam grol 'bras

bu rab tu thob/ /gtsang ma lha rnams bya ba rab tu dga'/ /dbang po tshangs pa bar snang mkha' la gnas/ /bde bar gshegs la shin tu mchod par byas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /bar snang gnas te rab tu dga' gyur cing / /chu yi sprin

med yid du 'ong ba dag /'gro ba'i dug sel dri zhim bdug par byed/ /lha yi dbang po rab bsgyur rab dang zhi/ /mkha' las lha 'khor khrag khrig dpag med dang / /rim gror bcas pas gos rnams 'thor bar byed/ /yid 'ong gos brgya dag gis gtor bar

gyur/ /'dod par spyod pa'i lha yi bu mo dag /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug rdul phran gyi/ /grangs mnyam dag gis dgyes pa'i rol mos mchod/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lha yi bu mang po/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug rdul mnyam pas/ /kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa la

mchod de/ /rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig dag /rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo dpag tu med/ /de snyed gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rjes 'brang zhing / /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /e ma sgra dbyangs yan lag kun 'byung ba/ /kun du bzang po'i rnam

'phrul du mar shar/ /zhing mchog gcig na bde gshegs bzhugs mdzad pa/ /zhing rnams du mar sku gzugs rab tu bstan/ /de nyid sangs rgyas stong phrag gcig nyid las/ /sangs rgyas bye phrag stong ni gong du bstan/ /gsung gcig gis ni rab tu gang

bstan pa/ /bsam yas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed du/ /tshul rnams mi zad chos sgra sgrogs par mdzad/ /de snyed gsang ba mchog 'di rgyas par bkang / /gang du ye shes rdo rje mi 'byung ba'i/ /ting 'dzin gcig pa nges par bzhugs nas ni/ /chos kyi

dbyings las 'byung ba du ma yi/ /ting 'dzin sgo ni nam mkha' khyab par 'byung / /sangs rgyas skus ni zhing khams khrag khrig dag /yid 'ong sna tshogs khyab pa'i ye shes sku/ /chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bar bkang / /ba spu gcig las bde ldan 'od

bkye ba/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs yid 'ong zhi bar spro/ /zhing gi rdul phran zad par nus 'gyur gyi/ /'di dag bgrang bar shes par mi nus so/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dam par la las mthong / /la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong / /la las rigs drug

thub pa sprul par mthong / /zhing rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing / /dag cing rkang gnyis zhi ba dam pa mthong / /dga' ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang / /rgyal tshab bsko mdzad nye bar 'pho ba bstan/ /gshegs dang gzigs pa de dag rab tu bstan/ /

zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi lhums 'jug dang / /zhing rnams kun du skye ba ston pa nyid/ /gzhon nu rol cing sgyu rtsal gnas pas mkhas/ /pho brang btsun mo'i nang na bzhugs par ston/ /'gro ba'i don du mgon po nges 'byung zhing / /dka' thub spyad cing de las

ldang bar ston/ /mi g.yo go 'phang du ni gnas byas shing / /bsam gtan bskul ba mdzad dang rgyal ba thob/ /rgyal ba'i dus las bslang ba 'di dag gis/ /gsang ba mngon par byang chub de nyid bstan/ /byang chub snying po rdo rje gdan du gshegs/ /de nyid

bcom ldan mngon par sangs rgyas la/ /sa yi lha mo dgyes pas khyab byas shing / /bdud sde bcom pas mi 'gyur mchog gi gnas/ /gsang ba 'og min 'di ni ye shes yul/ /gnyis med rdo rje'i gnas su rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo des

legs lam bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du gsang ba bstan/ /rgyud sde yan lag phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /rnam pa gsum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshul 'di gsungs/ /stong pa zhi ba bdag med

mtshan nyid bral/ /chos nyid rang byung mkha' dang mtshungs pa las/ /rgyal bas don dam rab tu mi gnas pa/ /chos nyid stong nyid de bzhin nyid du ni/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams la/ /rgyu rkyen 'bras bus grub pa yang dag lam/ /

kun rdzob spyod yul yin par rab tu bstan/ /zhing mang mtha' yas kun du de nyid ston/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas pas gang du ni/ /'gro ba'i gzugs brnyan du ma ston pa bzhin/ /de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa/ /kun du 'gro ba'i don du rab tu

ston/ /thams cad ma lus chos nyid de 'dra ste/ /mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra/ /mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /bde bar gshegs pa'i lam 'di thob 'dod pas/ /rtog dang rnam rtog ma lus spang med pas/ /gsang chen

tshul 'di gang gis spyod pa ni/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis/ /gang du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug du ma'i spyod yul gsang ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshungs pa med par spyod pa 'di la 'di lta ste/ gsang ba chen po bla na med pa'i

tshul 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rab tu spyod pa/ /gsang ba chen po chos kyi tshul/ chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med pa/ chos

thams cad shes pa po med par yang dag par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du yang dag par lta ste/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pas chos thams cad la lus med par rab tu mthong ba/ chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rgya mtsho la mi gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa nyid

do/ /srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba nyid nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par spags par mi byed la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su sgro btags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog

par gnas pa ste/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ /bsod nams yongs su rgyas pa dag pa'i zhing / /snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i 'od zer ni/ /skye dgu kun gyi blo yi 'char byed pa/ /gang du sku gsung thugs kyi snang ba ni/ /rnam par

gsal ba sgrib pa med pa nyid/ /chos rnams kun la yang dag rab 'jug cing / /chos kyi dbyings las ye shes 'bral med pa/ /lus ngag yid gnas kun gyi rjes 'gro ba'i/ /skad cig nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /skad cig thog mtha'

med par rab ston pa/ /'di ni ye shes mi zad 'byung gnas kyi/ /tshul la gnas pa gsag ba'i spyod tshul lo/ /brtan pas kun du rtog pa rab zhi ba/ /'di ni mi gnas gsang ba'i spyod yul 'thob/ /sems can rgyud na'ang mi spyod ma yin te/ /'di

'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud/ /de la kun du rtog dang mi rtog med/ /blo mchog de dang 'gro kun kha lo sgyur/ /rnam par smin pas gos med nam mkha' bzhin/ /'jig rten thams cad rgyu dang bcas pas na/ /chos rnams kun du rgyu med bstan pa min/ /'di

nyid rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /phyogs bcur ye shes bzhugs pa'i byang chub tshul/ /gsang ba dam pa'i spyod yul 'di bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi gnas ye shes kyi yul sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab 'byam tshad med pa'i rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga las

mngon par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor las/ yang dag pa'i thugs rje chen po'i ngang las ye shes kyi sprin rdo rjes kun du khyab par spro ba dang sdud pa'i tshul gyis gang du mi gnas shing

rang 'byung chen po'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med par ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa nyid du ston to/ /de nas dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bo

nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang ba mi zad pa'i tshul 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba spros med 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang / /kun du ma skyes skye med dga' ba'i dbyings/ /bde chen ro

mnyam rgyal ba kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun rang bzhin yongs su mnyam pa nyid/ /mngon par chags med mi gnas ye shes las/ /rlom sems med pa'i chos nyid skye ba med/ /ye shes chos kyi sgo yi ting nge 'dzin/ /nam mkha'i chos nyid 'byam klas thogs

med pa/ /byang chub sems ldan bde gshegs spyod yul can/ /rdo rje lta bu'i gnas las bstan pa dang / /phyir mi ldog pa ye shes 'byung gnas nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med 'bras bu'i yul/ /grangs med gzhal du med pa'i don 'byung ba'o/ /

'di dag kyang ji ltar rtogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i sa khong du chud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rjes su chags pa med par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med

pa sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo du mar rab tu thob pa/ ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu 'jug pa bla na med pa'i ye shes dam pa'i spyod yul yin par rig

par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'dir gsang ba'i yi ge de dang ldan na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pas

de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsang chen gyi spyod pa rdo rje

gang yin pa 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsang ba'i yi ge gang zhig lags/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang

ba chen po'i rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje ste/ de dag nyid do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams

cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog ye shes ston mdzad pas/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi gsungs shing / /don chen 'bras bu lam gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ /rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa nyid/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /'jig

rten du ni rnyed dka' ba/ /kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i mdo/ /gsang ba 'dus pa chen po yin/ /dbyings gyur khams gsum gsang ba che/ /de nyid bde bar 'gyur bsams pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas mtshan pas/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje khyu mchog

dgyes/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /'di ni gang zhig gnas byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen rnams/ /zhag bdun gyis ni phun tshogs pa'i/ /sku gsum dngos grub 'dir thob 'gyur/ /bcom ldan sku gsung thugs

gsang ba/ /rdo rje bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dri med ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /khyad par mchog 'di phyung ba'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na/ /skad cig

gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /gsang ba'i don 'di 'byung dka' ba'i/ /bla med bde chen mi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni snying po bsdus pa ste/ /gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba min/ /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa chen po 'di la

skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gnas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do/ /bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing rtsol kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de dpal gsang ba 'dus ba la dga' ba'i byang

chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de dag shin tu dkon gyur pa/ /rnam grangs 'di na bstan pa'i tshe/ /de tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /shin tu gdung bas cher non te/ /gsang chen

bskal pa ngan gyur ces/ /dus gcig bstan pa nyid gcig dang / /ston pa gcig las gzhan pa yi/ /spyod yul ma gyur de yi tshe/ /ji ltar thabs 'di ston byed 'gyur/ /ming tsam du yang mi thos na/ /gzhan ci smos lta ga la dgos/ /de nyid kun

du bsgrags gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ces ma zer cig /yi ge 'di kun dang thun mong ste/ /rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang / ma thob pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /gsang ba'i yi ge ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang

mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po mnyam pa nyid la rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas yang

brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi bdag pos 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang na cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'

de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slang du sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid las dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i

tshogs la ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

de nas lha mo bzhi dag gis/ /tshad med ye shes dag pa'i sa/ /yang dag bskul ba mdzad pa las/ /de bzhin nyid las bzhengs par 'gyur/ /dpag med rdo rje'i tshul mchog las/ /'dod chags gnas la spyod pa yi/ /
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs na/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig skyes/ /dam tshig 'khor lor gnas pa yis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod nyer ldan pas/ /gnyis med byang chub sems gnas te/ /dgyes pa yongs

su spyod pa mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje'i lus kyi ni/ /rtsa yi khog stong thams cad du/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /yon tan phrin las dam tshig gi/ /khu ba byang chub sems rgyun gyis//

kun tu khyab par gyur pa ni/ /dper na bum pa chus gang ltar/ /shin tu bde bas rgyas par gnas/ /de nyid ye shes gyur pa'o/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba'i phung po ji snyed kun/ /sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba/ /de la

bdud rtsi'i 'od zer gyis/ /glog gi zer ma ltar 'phro bas/ /shin tu bde bar rig nas ni/ /de nas brtsams te sems can khams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa la/ /rdo rje dpal gyi reg byung bas/ /yang dag mchog tu byin brlabs shing / /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ye shes dri med dbang bskur cing / /ma lus kun kyang kun tu bzang / /kun tu bzang po'i dpal zhes par/ /bla na med par dbang bskur to/ /de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni/ /

thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can/ /bde chen ngo bo nyid skur gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes spyod pa mthong

gyur pas/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ /slar gsol ba ni mthong lags so/ /ye shes spyod pa rdo rje che/ /bde bar gshes pa mthong zhes gsol/ /de ltar yang dag gyur pa'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i

b+ha ga las/ /mngon par byung nas 'di skad gsol/ /gang du 'dod chags chen po yi/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub rjes su rtogs gyur gang / /de nas bcom ldan ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /de nas rigs kyi

bdag po yis/ /gsang ba mchog tu bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /de skad ces ni ma zer cig /de nyid ci yi phyir zhe na/ /chos rnams nam mkha'i rdo rje'i gnas/ /de nyid mtshungs phyir stong pa nyid/ /rab tu mi gnas bdag nyid

las/ /chos rnams 'od gsal dbyings gyur pa/ /de nyid ye shes 'byung gnas gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i mnyams pa nyid spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /

rig ma dang / lha mo dang / khro bo'i rgyal po du ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di bgo

bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la bka' stsal

pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di nyid zung cig /khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol nas/ cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i rgyal po'i sku gcig las/ /zhing khams ma lus snang mdzad cing / /

khams gsum spyod dang sangs rgyas gyi/ /rnam pa du ma'i skur bstan mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum nyid kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid la

dgongs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gsung gcig gis/ /'jig rten khams kun khyab gyur cing / /chos kyi tshul ni mi zad las/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje 'di

dpag tu med pa khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mnyam pa nyid la gnas nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /rdo rje 'chang gi thugs kyi ni/ /ting 'dzin gcig tu ma bzhag nas/ /ting

'dzin du ma'i chos kyi sgo/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs

nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /'dir snang ba ni gsum ste/ /so so'i skye bo'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba'o/ /gsang ba ni gsum ste/ /sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa

dang / /gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / /thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ni gsum ste/ sku rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang / gsung rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thugs

rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ /mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni gsum ste/ sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyid do/ /rgyud kun snying po bsdus pa yi/ /phyag

rgya chen po'i ngang 'byung ba/ /grub pa rab tu mi gnas pas/ /gsang ba'i rgyal po bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa chen po bla na med pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i gnas rab tu

rgyas pa chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba brjod du med pa'i gnas la dgongs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa de dag

dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod du med pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do// //dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i gnas kyi zhing khams rdul phra rab snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba thams cad kyi gsang chen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

kun du bzang po la sogs pa/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams kyi dgongs pa rab tu gsang ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad

kyi/ shin tu gsang ba'i gnas kyi rgyal po/ rdo rje dpal mchog chen po nges par brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po gnyis su med pa mnyam

pa nyid/ rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mchog tu dbang skur bar byed pa/ rgyud sde stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi'i snying po/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod rgya mtsho'i gnas las mngon par bsngags pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal

po bdun pa chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //du la k+She tra'i grong khyer chen por rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ye shes snying po dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar pa lho brag pa chos kyi
blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur byas pa cig kyang yod par gda'o// //e ma ho nyi zla ltar grags

dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor dpal mchog chen po 'dis/ /shin tu gsal bar ston pa nges pa nyid/ /ma 'ongs dus su rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /rnam bzhi'i 'khor ldan dbus su 'di gsal 'gyur/ /
bstan pa'i sgron me nyid du 'byung ba'i phyir/ /skal ldan rnams dang rgyud 'di 'phrad par shog /rgyud 'di u rgyan nas slob dpon chen po Dom bi he ru kas gdan drangs gsung ngo rdzogs so// //
